30a1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi sngon du'ang byang chub kyi sems 'gro bar bya'o/ / khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim gyi sa la gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam kyi dka' bzhin
30a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yin te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las mi nyams yongs su mi nyams so// tshe 'di la'ang kha na mtho ba'i las med cing gzhan du'ang bye brag tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro//
30a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas khyim bdag drag shul can dang / khyim bdag gzhan de dag gis kyang mgrin gcig tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
30a4(dkon brtsegs): to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim na gnas pa'i nyes pa dang / sdom pa dang / spyod pa dang / rab tu byung ba'i yon tan gyi phan yon 'di legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar
30a5(dkon brtsegs): to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang 'dir khyim na gnas pa la nyes pa'i skyon chags pa ji snyed pa dang / rab tu byung ba'i yon tan gyi phan yon mtha' yas pa mngon sum du gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das
30a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag rnams rab tu byung ste/ bde bar gshegs pas legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
30a7(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / khyim bdag rnams rab tu 'byung ba ni 'byung bar dka' ste/ spyod pa shin tu rnam par dag par bsgrub par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal
30b1(dkon brtsegs): padang / maldan dasapa/ khyim bdag de dag 'di sbyid rgyas gso// / chos su 'das tu 'byung ba'ang 'byung ba dka' lanas da/ 'o sa
30b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis bdag cag rab tu 'byung ba'i slad du skabs dbye bar gsol/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la nan tan gyis bsgrub par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rje
30b3(dkon brtsegs): dag la rab tu 'byung ba'i skabs phye ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag pa la 'di skad ces
30b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to/ / skyes bu dam pa khyed gnyis kyis khyim bdag 'di rnams rab tu phyung la bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byas
30b5(dkon brtsegs): pas khyim bdag dgu stong rab tu phyung ngo / / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag pas ni/ khyim bdag bdun stong rab tu phyung ngo // byang chub sems dpa'
30b6(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa rnams kyi bslab pa'i rgyun bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags stong du tshang ba dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
30b7(dkon brtsegs): / bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ khyim bdag drag shul can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
31a1(dkon brtsegs): dus byung chub sems 'a pa rnams kyi rgyas kyis dang / mun gnas pa do banan pa shad / ldan 'das
31a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rang du byung bar gtogs pa rnams kyis rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa dang / tshul khrim dang / thos pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsrungs pa dang / d
31a3(dkon brtsegs): ang / cho ga phun sum tshogs pa de legs par bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung nas/ gus par smrab
31a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / 'dud pa'i las don ma mchis par mi bgyid pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag
31a5(dkon brtsegs): drag shul can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / khyim bdag khyod gang de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /
31a6(dkon brtsegs): yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / spyod pa dang / cho ga phun sum tshogs pa kun 'dri ba ni legs so legs so// khyim bdag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba /
31a7(dkon brtsegs): pas ji ltar gnas par bya ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ khyim bdag drag shul can bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi de la 'di ni bka' stsal to// khyim bdag 'di
31b1(dkon brtsegs): labyang chub sem dpa' rab tu byung bas 'di ltar bdag su'i ched la khyim nas khyim ma yin par rab tu byung snyam du gzhal bar bya ste/ des mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du ye shes yongs su btsal ba la
31b2(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/ / de de ltar yongs su 'jal ba'i thog ma nyid du 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po de dag la rab tu gnas shing sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa la mngon par
31b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar bya'o/ / khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po de dag la rab tu gnas pa yin zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems
31b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rab tu byung ba ni chos gos ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa yin/ chos gos ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa'ang rjod pa yin te/ de chos gos kyi phyir tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i tshol
31b5(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed do/ / chos gos ma rnyed na'ang yi mi 'chad cing yongs su gdung ba med do// chos gos rnyed na'ang chags pa med// rmongs pa med/ dga' ba med/ zhen pa med cing zhen
31b6(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur te/ nyes dmigs mthong la 'byung ba rab tu shes nas chags pa med par spyod de/ chos gos ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa de dag la mi bstod cing gzhan la mi smod do//
31b7(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni bsod snyoms ngan ngon gyis chog shes par 'dzin pa yin/ bsod snyoms ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags
32a1(dkon brtsegs): pa' rjod pa yin te/ des bsod snyoms kyi phyir chul dang mi 'drabs rlos par mabyed do// bsod snyom snyas nad na'ang yi ma 'chad cing yongs su gdung ba med do//
32a2(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms rnyed na'ang chags pa med/ rmongs pa med/ dga' ba med/ zhen pa med cing zhen par mi 'gyur te/ nyes dmigs mthong la 'byung bar rab du shes nas chags pa med par spyod
32a3(dkon brtsegs): de/ bsod snyoms ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa de bdag la mi bstod cing gzhan la mi smod do// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni mal chang nang
32a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis chog par 'dzin pa yin/ mal cha ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa'ang rjod pa yin te/ de mal cha'i phyir tshul dang mi 'dra bas tshol bar mi byed do// mal cha ma rnyed na'ang yi mi
32a5(dkon brtsegs): 'chad cing yongs su gdung ba med do/ / mal cha rnyed na'ang chags pa med/ rmongs pa med/ dga' ba med/ zhen pa med cing zhen par mi 'gyur te/ nyes dmigs mthong la 'byung bar rang
32a6(dkon brtsegs): tu shes nas chags pa med par spyod de/ mal chang na don gyis chog par 'dzin pa de bdag la mi bstod cing gzhan la mi spyod do// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ra
32a7(dkon brtsegs): du byung ba ni na pa'i gsos sman dang yo byad ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa yin/ na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa'ang rjod pa yin te/ den pa'i gsos ldan
32b1(dkon brtsegs): dang yo byad kyi phyir tshul dang mi 'dra bas tshol bar mi byed do/ / na ba'i gsos smran dang yo byad ma rnyed na'ang yi mi 'chad cing yongs su gdung ba med do// na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad rnyed na'ang
32b2(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med/ rmongs pa med/ dga' ba med/ zhen pa med cing zhen par mi 'gyur te/ nyes dmigs mthong la 'byung ba rab tu shes nas chags pa med par spyod do// na ba'i gsos smran
32b3(dkon brtsegs): dang yo byad ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa de bdag la mi bstod cing gzhan la mi smod do/ / spong ba la dga' ba'ang yin te/ spong ba la mos shing spong ba la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson no// de sdig
32b4(dkon brtsegs): pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams spangs pas dga' bar 'gyur te/ ma spangs pas ni ma yin no// de bsgom pa la dga' ba yin te/ bsgom pa la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson no// dge ba'i chos
32b5(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pas ni ma yin no/ / spong ba la dga' ba/ spong ba la mos pa/ spong ba la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson pa/ bsgoms pa la dga' ba/ bsgom pa la mos pa/ bsgom pa la dga'
32b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sbyor ba la brtson pa de bdag la mi bstod cing gzhan la mi smod do/ / khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po dag la gnas pa yin no// ci'i phyir 'phags
32b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rigs zhes bya zhe na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'di la gnas pas de'i phyir 'phags pa'i rigs zhes bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab du byung bas phan
33a1(dkon brtsegs): @/ yon la dga' ba bcus chos gos sus la bcang bar bya ste/ bcu gang she na/ 'di lta ste/ ngo tsha zhing 'dzem pas dkri ba dang / sha b+ha dang / sbru lu dang / rlung dang / nI ma
33a2(dkon brtsegs): sdig sbrul gyis reg par 'gyur ba g.yog pa dang / dge sbyong gi kha dog dang / rtags bstan pa dang / ngur smrig de dag ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten yin no snyam
33a3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ mchod rten gyi phyir yang dag par gzung bar bya ba dang / de dag ni yid 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas kha dog bsgyur ba yin te/ 'di dag ni 'dod chags kyis kha dog bsgyur ba ma
33a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / 'di dag ni nye bar zhi ba dang mthun pa yin gyi/ 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa 'bar ba dang mthun pa ma yin pa dang / ngur smrig 'di dag gis dkris shing g.yogs nas/ sdig pa
33a5(dkon brtsegs): las ldog par bya ba dang / legs par bya ba'i las bya ba dang / chos gos kyis tsha bar sbyor ba la brtson pa ma yin pa dang / ngur smrig 'di dag 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshogs dang mthun pa
33a6(dkon brtsegs): yin par shes nas/ ci nas skad cig gcig la'ang rnyog pa mang ba dang 'grogs par bya bar ngur smrig rnams bcang bar bya ba ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon
33a7(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba bcu po de dag gis chos gos lus la bcang bar bya'o/ / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rang du byung bas phan yon bcu mthong nas/ ji srid 'tsho
33b1(dkon brtsegs): mtha'i bar du bsod snyoms spyod pa gtang bar mi bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ rang dbang du gyur pa'i tshul gyis 'tsho bar bya'o// gzhan la rag lus pa ma yin pa dang / sems can gang dag bdag bsod snyoms
33b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la bsod snyoms byin pa de dag kyang dkon mchog gsum la bkod de/ phyis bsod snyoms blang bar bya ba dang / sems can gang dag bsod snyoms 'dod pa la bsod snyoms mi ster bde dag la snying rje chen
33b3(dkon brtsegs): po bskyed nas/ sems can de dag gtong ba la gzud pa'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang / bya ba byas te bsod snyoms bza' ba dang / bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang mthun par
33b4(dkon brtsegs): byas par 'gyur ba dang / dgang sla zhing gso sla bar bya ba'i phyir bdag gis rgyu bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis nga rgyal ba cag pa bsten par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba'i dge
33b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba bsags par 'gyur ba dang / bdag mthong nas de bzhin du slob par 'gyur zhing / bdag skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo la rten par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsod snyoms yang
33b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par blang ba'i spyod pa'ang / bdag sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur ba ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab du byung bas phan
33b7(dkon brtsegs): yon bcu po de dag mthong nas/ ji srid 'tsho'i mtha'i bar du bsod snyoms spyod pa mi gtang bar bya'o// gal te de la la zhig gis mgron du bos na des lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dad pa dang / dang ba bskyed
34a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir 'gro bar bya ste/ 'dzud pa dang 'chos pas ni ma yin no// gang la la bsod soms thas te/ bdag dang gakun gyi na rdzogs par byed na rlung rgya/
34a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de mthon du 'gro bar gnang ngo // khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ra' du byung bas phan yon bcu mthong nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sman bkrus pas chog shes par bya ste/
34a3(dkon brtsegs): bcu gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi ngor lta bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bsten par 'gyur ba dang / bdag mi
34a4(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa'i 'du shes so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ro bro ba la chags pa'ang bdag gis chags chung ngus spangs par 'gyur ba dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad bdag la yid rton
34a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / bdag kha zas bsnyungs pa mngon du gyur par 'gyur ba dang / bdag la sman yongs su tshol ba'i 'phongs pa med par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi sems la nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis
34a6(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa med par byas par 'gyur ba dang / de ltar zhugs na myur du nyon mongs pa'i nad dang bral bar 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bcu po de dag
34a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sman bkus pas chog shes par bya'o/ / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bcu mthong nas ji srid 'tsho'i
34b1(dkon brtsegs): mtha'i bar du dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtang bar bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ bdag gi nyam rangs dang bdag gi dbang du 'gro ba dang / nga'i ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med
34b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mal cha lkug par gtong ba dang / dgon pa'i gnas la dga' ba dang ma bral ba dang / gnas rnams su don nyung zhing byed pa nyung ba dang / g.yog gi tshogs 'dor zhing
34b3(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / dben par dga' zhing 'du 'dzi yongs su spong ba dang / las byas pa'i yon tan gyi phan yon yongs su gtong ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang mthun pa'i
34b4(dkon brtsegs): sems rtse gcig pa dang / yid la byed pa bla gab med pa yid la byed pa sgrib pa med pa ste/ khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bcu po de dag mthong
34b5(dkon brtsegs): nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtang bar bya'o/ / khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa la gnas pa chos nyan par 'dod dam/ slob dpon dang
34b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhan po blta bar 'dod dam/ na ba 'dri ba'i phyir grong gi gnas su 'ongs na des dgongs su slar ldog par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de gal te lung mnod pa dang /
34b7(dkon brtsegs): kha ton bya ba gzhan la rag las te/ gtsug lag khang na gnas na'ang des dgon pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyis gang dngos po thams cad la dgon par 'du shes pa dang / chos tshol bas mi ngoms
35a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de nyid dgon pa pa la gnas pa yin no snyam du bsam so/ / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dkon pa la gnas pas/
35a2(dkon brtsegs): ltar bdag ci'i phyir dgon pa la gnas/ dgon pa la gnas pa 'ba' zhig ni dge sbyong ma yin te/ 'din ni ma byang ba/ ma sbas pa/ ma zhi ba/ ma dul ba/ mi 'grus pa/ rab du mi brtson
35a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'di lta ste/ ri dgas dang / spreru dang / bya mang po dang / chom rkun dang / gdol pa dag kyang mang du gnas te/ de dag kyang dge sbyong gi yon tan dang ldan pa ma yin pas
35a4(dkon brtsegs): gang gi phyir bdag dgon pa la gnas pa/ 'di lta ste/ dge sbyong gi don de yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam du brtag par bya'o// khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab du byung ba'i dge sbyong
35a5(dkon brtsegs): gi don gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / mi g.yeng ba dang / gzungs rab tu thob pa dang / byams pa bsten pa dang / snying rje bsten pa dang / mngon par shes
35a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la dbang sgyur ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba dang / thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes
35a7(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yongs su mi gtang ba dang / rjes su dran pa drug rjes su dran pa dang / thos pa dang brtson 'grus mi
35b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dor ba dang / tshul bzhin du chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang / yang dag par rnam par grol ba'i phyir brtson pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa rnamal shes pa dang / sngon med pa la 'jug par gnas/
35b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad rab tu chad pas yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /
35b3(dkon brtsegs): mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pas yang dag pa'i ngag dang / las zad pa yongs su rdzogs pas yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcom
35b4(dkon brtsegs): pas yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub khong du chud pas yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / brjed pa med pa'i chos nyid kyis yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i/
35b5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes yongs su thob pas yang dag pa'i ti nge 'dzin dang / stong pa nyid kyis mi skrag pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la mi zhum pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi 'gong ba dang / bsam
35b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du ye shes kyis srid pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / don la rton gyi/ yi ge la mi rton pa dang / ye shes la rton gyi/ rnam par shes pa la mi rton pa dang / chos la
35b7(dkon brtsegs): rton gyi/ gang zag la mi rton pa dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rnon gyi/ drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde la mi rton pa dang / thog ma nas ma byung zhing mi 'jig pa'i tshul gyis ngo tsha
36a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid la mi rtog pa de ni/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i dge sbyong gi don ces bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub
36a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rab tu byung bas 'grogs pa med pa mang du bya'o/ / des 'di ltar yang bdag ni sems can dang 'dre bar mi bya ste/ bdag gis sems can gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par
36a3(dkon brtsegs): mi bya'i/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o snyam du brtag par bya'o// de lta mod kyi khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i 'grogs pa bzhi po
36a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'grogs pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'grogs pa dang / de bzhin
36a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba'i phyir 'grogs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems 'grogs pa med pa dang 'grogs pa ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung
36a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i grogs pa bzhi po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba'o/ / khyim bdag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas 'grogs pa las rnam par grol bar bya'o//
36a7(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pas/ bdag ci'i phyir dgon par 'ongs snyam du brtag par bya ste/ des yang 'di ltar bdag ni 'jim
36b1(dkon brtsegs): shing skrag pa'i phyir dgon par 'ongs so/ / ci zhig gis 'jigs shing skrag ce na/ 'du 'jis 'jigs shing skrag go/ 'grogs pas 'jigs shing skrag go// 'dod chag
36b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis 'jigs shing skrag go// nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / 'chab pas 'jigs shing skrag go// chags pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser snas
36b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs shing skrag go/ / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg byas 'jigs shing skrag go/ phung po'i bdud kyis 'jigs shing skrag go// nyon mongs pa'i bdud
36b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'jigs shing skrag go/ / 'chi bdag gi bdud kyis 'jigs shing skrag go// mi rtag pa la rtag par phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing skrag go// sdug bsngal la bde bar phyin ci log pas
36b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs shing skrag go/ bdag med pa la bdag tu phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing skrag go/ mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing skrag go/ sems dang / yid dang /
36b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pas 'jigs shing skrag go// sred pas 'jigs shing skrag go// 'khor bas 'jigs shing skrag go// sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas ldang bas 'jigs shing skrag go
36b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs la lta bas 'jigs shing skrag go/ / bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bdag gir 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go// rgod pas 'jigs shing skrag go/ 'gyod pa dang the tshom gyis 'jig
37a1(dkon brtsegs): shing skrag go/ / sdig pa'i grogs pos 'jigs shing skrag go// rnyed pa dang bkur stis 'jigs shing skrag go// mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis 'jigs shing skrag
37a2(dkon brtsegs): go/ / ma mthong bar mthong ngo snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go// ma thos par thos so snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go// ma dran par dran no snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing
37a3(dkon brtsegs): skrag go/ / bye brag ma phyed par bye brag phyed do snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go// mi shes par shes so snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go// dge sbyong gi dri mas 'jigs shing
37a4(dkon brtsegs): skrag go/ / gcig la gcig gnod par sems pas 'jigs shing skrag go// 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyis 'jigs shing skrag go/
37a5(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho ba dang skye bas 'jigs shing skrag go// sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dwags kyi yul du 'gro bas 'jigs shing skrag go//
37a6(dkon brtsegs): gi khom pas 'jigs shing skrag go// mdor na mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yid la byed pas 'jigs shing skrag ste/ bdag de lta bu'i 'jigs shing skrag pa de dag gis 'jigs nas dgon par
37a7(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs te khyim na gnas pa dang / 'du 'jil gnas pa dang / mi 'grus shing rnal 'byor la mi brtson pa dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la gnas pas ni 'di lta bu'i 'jigs
37b1(dkon brtsegs): shing skrag pa de dag las yongs su thar par mi nus te/ gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang dgon pa la gnas nas/ 'jigs
37b2(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad las rnam par grol te/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jigs pa med pa thob bo// gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i phu na byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
37b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang dgon pa la gnas nas/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jigs pa
37b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / gang dag da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa de dag thams cad kyang dgon pa
37b5(dkon brtsegs): la gnas nas/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jigs pa med pa thob bo// de bas na bdag kyang 'di la
37b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs shing skrag ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las shin tu ni 'da' bar 'dod/ mi 'jigs pa ni rjes su thob par 'dod pas dgon pa la gnas par bya'o snyam du yongs su dpyad par bya'o//
37b7(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'jigs shing skrag nas dgon pa'i gnas la gnas pas/ 'di la gang cung zad 'jigs pa skye ba de dag
38a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni bdag tu 'dzin pa las skyes so/ / bdag tu mngon par chags pa dang / bdag tu yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bdag gi gzhi dang / bdag
38a2(dkon brtsegs): tu 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu smra ba nye bar len pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / bdag gis gnas dang / bdag tu yongs su rtog pa dang / bdag srung ba las skyes te/
38a3(dkon brtsegs): gal te bdag dgon pa na gnas la/ bdag tu 'dzin pa yongs su ma spangs/ bdag tu mngon par chags pa dang / bdag tu yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bdag gi gzhi dang //
38a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag la sred pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / bdag du smra ba nye bar len pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / bdag gi gnas dang / bdag tu yongs su rtog pa dang /
38a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag srung ba yongs su ma spangs na ni bdag dgon pa la gnas pa don med par 'gyur ro snyam du bslab par bya ste/ bdag tu 'du shes pa la dgon pa la gnas pa med do//
38a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du 'du shes pa la'ang med do// ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa la ni dgon pa la gnas pa med do// dmigs par lta ba la ni dgon pa la gnas
38a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med do/ / phyin ci log tu lta ba la ni dgon pa la gnas pa med do// khyim bdag mya ngan las 'da' bar 'du shes pa la'ang dgon pa la gnas pa med na/ nyon mongs pa thams
38b1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi 'du shes can lta ci smos/ khyim bdag dgon pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad la mi rten par gnas pa'o// chos thams cad la mi 'dzin par gnas pa'o//
38b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma thams cad la mi chags par gnas pa'o// gzugs thams cad la mi rten par gnas pa'o// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya thams cad la mi
38b3(dkon brtsegs): rten par gnas pa'o/ / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa'o// sems shin tu zhi bas shin tu sbyangs par gnas pa'o// 'jigs pa thams
38b4(dkon brtsegs): cad spangs pas mi 'jigs par gnas pa'o/ / nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bas chu bo las brgal bar gnas pa'o// brtan par gnas pa'o// ngan
38b5(dkon brtsegs): don gyis chog shes par 'dzin cing 'dod pa chung ba 'phags pa'i rigs rnams la rab tu dga' bar gnas pa'o/ / dgang sla zhing gso sla bas chog par 'dzin par gnas
38b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / shes rab kyi phyir tshul bzhin la sbyor bas thos pa la gnas pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la so sor
38b7(dkon brtsegs): rtog pas thar par gnas pa'o/ / bcings pa bcad pas rnam par grol bar gnas pa'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mthun pas ma dul ba rnams nye bar zhi bar gnas
39a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / shin du rnam par dag pas bya ba byas par gnas pa'o// khyim bdag 'di lta ste/ dper na dkon pa larbA dang / shing gel ba dang / na
39a2(dkon brtsegs): tshal gnas kyang 'jigs pa med cing mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ / khyim bdag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pas kyang lus la rtsa dang / shing
39a3(dkon brtsegs): ge la ba dang / sman dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ 'di la su zhig 'jigs par 'gyur//
39a4(dkon brtsegs): su zhig skrag par 'gyur snyam pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de 'jigs shing skrag pa lta na/ 'di ltar lus 'di la ni bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba
39a5(dkon brtsegs): po 'am/ gso ba 'am/ skyes bu 'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes sam/ shed bu med de/ 'di ltar 'jigs pa zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags
39a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin gyis/ bdag gis ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa de la brtag par mi bya'o snyam du lus la tshul bzhin brtag par bya'o// des ji ltar dgon pa la rtswa dang / shing
39a7(dkon brtsegs): gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal gnas pa rnams nga'i ba med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nga'i ba med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pas
39b1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad dgon pa nyid do snyam du shes nas nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dkon pa la gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa gcod pa ste/ nga'i ba med pa yongs su
39b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa med pa'o/ / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pas/ 'di la dgon pa la gnas pa ni tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /
39b3(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po la gzhol ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni shes rab kyi phung po tshogs pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni rnam par grol
39b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phung po 'grub pa'o/ / dgon pa la gnas pa ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po skye ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub kyi phyog kyi chos rnam rab tu bsten pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa
39b5(dkon brtsegs): ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis po dag sdud pa'o/ / dgon pa la gnas pa ni bden pa rnams rtogs pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni phung po rnams yongs su shes pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni
39b6(dkon brtsegs): khams rnams chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam par 'jal ba'o/ / dgon pa la gnas pa ni skye mched rnams sel ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni/
39b7(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid la so sor rtog pas skrag pa med pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni chos kun tu 'dzin pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad chud mi gzon pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni sangs
40a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa'o/ / dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bstod pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyis bkur ba'o//
40a2(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa la gan pa ni thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis bstan pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bsnyen pa'o snyam du bslab par bya'o//
40a3(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa ni tshegs chung ngus pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
40a4(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog la'ang mi lta ba yin te/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// khyim
40a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ khyim bdag gang byang chub sems
40a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bskyungs pa la rab tu gnas nas/ sdom pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrubs te/ de ltar dkon pa la gnas pa de'i
40a7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
40b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ khyim bdag gang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa ni sems can la gnod sems med cing sems can thams cad la byams par byed la
40b2(dkon brtsegs): de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang bzod pa yin te/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sem
40b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni mi skye
40b4(dkon brtsegs): ba la bzod pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag dgon pa 'di las ldog par mi bya'o snyam du slob ste/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongs
40b5(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'gyur zhe na/
40b6(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa rab tu 'thob ste/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'ang yal bar mi 'dod
40b7(dkon brtsegs): la/ 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang sogs par 'dod pa yin te/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// khyim
41a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ khyim
41a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni 'di la lus ji lta ba dgon pa'ang de bzhin no/ / lus ji lta ba byang chub kyang de bzhin no snyam du slob cing de bzhin nyid kyis mi rtog rnam par
41a3(dkon brtsegs): mi rtog ste/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas
41a4(dkon brtsegs): pa tshegs chung ngus pha rol du phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dgon pa la gnas
41a5(dkon brtsegs): par gnang ba yin no/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba mang du thos pa yin te/ thos pa 'dzin pa chos rnam par nges pa la mkhas pa tshul bzhin yid la byed
41a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la brtson zhing chos dang chos kyi rjes su mthun par sgrub pa des dgon pa la gnas par byo'o/ / khyim bdag gzhan yang byung chub sems dpa' rab tu byung brtson mongs pa'i shas chen des nyon rdzo
41a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 'grogs pa med par dgon pa la gnas par bya ste/ des nyon mongs pa tshar gcad par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni
41b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa lnga po dag thob pa yin te/ des lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dgon pa la gnas par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byung chub
41b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rab tu byung bas sangs rgyas kyis dgon pa la gnas par bka' stsal par shes nas dgon pa la gnas par bya ste/ der dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
41b3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brten nas phyis grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dag tu zhugs te chos bstan par bya'o// khyim bdag byang chub
41b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rab tu byung ba chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ dgon pa la gnas par gnang ngo // khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba lung dang kha ton mnod pa'i
41b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir tshogs kyi nang du 'jug na/ des der gus pa dang bcas par bya ste/ slob dpon dang / mkhan po rnams dang / gnas brtan dang / bar ma dang / dge slong gsar bu rnams la zhe sa dang
41b6(dkon brtsegs): bcas par bya/ / tshul mkhas par bya'o// snyom las med par rang gis bya ba dang / gzhan la gdung ba med par bya'o// des bsnyen bkur la gdu bar mi bya'o// des 'di ltar de bzhin//
41b7(dkon brtsegs): shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye
42a1(dkon brtsegs): dgu dang bcas pa/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pas mchod pa/ sbyin gnas su gyur pa de'ang sems can thams cad la gang las kyang rim gror bya ba
42a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gir mi mdzad na/ bdag cag ma bslabs pa slob 'dod pa rnams lta ci smos te/ bdag gis ni sems can thams cad la bsnyen bkur bya'i/ gang las kyang bsnyen bkur bya ba bdag gir ni
42a3(dkon brtsegs): mi bya'o snyam du brtag par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyim bdag dge slong bsnyen bkur la gdu ba ni yon tan gyi chos rjes su bzung ba chud gson pa yin te/ des gang dag sdud pa de dag kyang 'di snyam
42a4(dkon brtsegs): dusems te/ bdag cag ni bsnyen bkur gyi phyir sdud kyi/ chos kyi phyir ma yin no snyam ste/ de dag nyid kyi dad pa chud gson to// gang dag de la bsnyen bkur byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa
42a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi'ang don chen por mi 'gyur ro/ / 'bras bu chen por 'gyur te/ de slob dpon dang mkhan po'i gan du 'gro na'ang slob dpon dang / mkhan pos ma dad pa'i bag gang yang rung ba zhig las brtags
42a6(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bdag la lung dbog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / rjes su bstan pas phan 'dogs par mi 'gyur du 'ong zhes lus dang sems las su rung ba dang / sems cad shes pas 'gro bar bya'o//
42a7(dkon brtsegs): des lung mnod pa dang kha ton gyi phyir lus dang srog la'ang mi blta bar bya'o// chos 'dod pas slob dpon dang mkhan po rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// yon tan don du gnyer
42b1(dkon brtsegs): bas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad don du mi gnyer bar bya'o// khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung mnod pa dang kha ton bya ba don du gnyer bas gzhan dag
42b2(dkon brtsegs): la tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam mam/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang ldan pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' lam
42b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshogs sogs pa dang ldan pa'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa su las mnyan tam/ lung mnos sam/ blangs pa'i slob dpon de la des chos kyis gus par bya'o// ming dang / tshig dang / yi ge ji ste
42b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa de snyed kyi bskal par gal te slob dpon de la g.yo med par rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / mchod pa thams cad kyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byas kyang / khyim bdag
42b5(dkon brtsegs): dadung du slob dpon la slob dpon du gus par bya ba rdzogs pa ma yin na chos ma yin pa'i gus pas lta ci smos/ khyim bdag dad pa'i mnyan cing bsgom pa dang kha ton la 'jug pa de'i sems dang sems
42b6(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba dge ba dang ldan pa 'am/ sangs rgyas dang ldan pa 'am/ chos dang ldan pa 'am/ dge 'dun dang ldan pa 'am/ skyo zhing 'dod chags bral ba dang ldan pa 'am/ byang ba dang / dul ba
42b7(dkon brtsegs): dang zhi ba dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa ji snyed pa gal te de snyed kyi bskal par slob dpon la bsnyen bkur byas su zin kyang / khyim bdag da dung slob dpon du ri mo bya ba rdzogs pa ma yin no// khyim bdag
43a1(dkon brtsegs): nam grangs 'das kyang dza ltar rnam par smin pa'i chos tshad med cing ye shes khongs chung ba tshad med pa de ltar rig par bya'o/ / khyim bdag de ltabs na nas byur gyi/
43a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos tshad med pa dang / ye shes khong du chud pa tshad med pa dris pas/ bdag gi slob dpon yang tshad med do snyam nas/ byang chub sems dpas chos la ri mo tshad med par bya'o//
43a3(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab du byung ba'i bsgrub pa la gnas par bya'o// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa la gnas
43a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba tshul khrims yongs su dag pa thos na de la slob ste/ bzhi po 'di dag ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o// bzhi
43a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i rigs rnams la gnas pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang mi 'dre
43a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / tshul 'chos pa med par dgon pa la gnas pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims yongasu dag pa bzhi ste/
43a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ lus bsdams pas lus mi dmigs pa dang / ngag bsdams pas ngag mi dmigs pa dang / yid bsdams pas yid mi dmigs pa dang / lta ba dang bral bas
43b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bzhi ste/ bzhi
43b2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ ngar 'dzin pa spangs pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa dor ba dang / chad pa dang rtag pa dang bral ba dang / rten pa'i chos la 'jug pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yongs
43b3(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa'o/ / khyim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ phung po rnams la 'byung ba dang 'jig par rtog pa dang / khams
43b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la chos dbyings su yongs su 'jal ba dang / skye mched rnams la grong stong par 'du shes pa dang / tha snyad brtags pa rnams la mngon par ma zhen pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul
43b5(dkon brtsegs): khrims yongs su dag pa'o/ / khyim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag la bdag med par 'du shes pas bdag la
43b6(dkon brtsegs): mi bstod pa dang / gzhan la mi dmigs pas gzhan la mi smod pa dang / sems shin tu sbyangs pas rloms sems med pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas g.yo ba med
43b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ bzhi pa de dag ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bzhi ste/ ba'i gang zhen/ stong pa nyid la mos pa dang /
44a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pas mi sdug pa dang / sems can thams cad la cher snying rje ba dang / bdug sred pa la bzod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni rdub khrims yongs su dag bgo
44a2(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa thos na de la slob ste/ ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa de gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad la
44a3(dkon brtsegs): rtsol ba med pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas gnyis su dbyer med pa dang / sems las su rung ba dang / sems rtse gcig pa dang / sems nges par 'byung ba dang / sems mi 'phro ba
44a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems kun tu mi rgyu ba dang / sems mi gnas pa dang / sems nges par sems par byin gyis rlob pa dang / sems la dbang sgyur ba dang / sems 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la mi chags
44a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems chos la sgyu mar so sor rtog pa dang / ji ltar chos kyi dbyings mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ji ltar mi skye mi 'byung zhing mnyam pa nyid pa de ltar/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa'
44a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa la so sor rtog go/ / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa thos mede la slob
44a7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ shes rab yongs su dag pa de gang zhe na/ de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ chos thams cad mngon sum du shes pa dang / chog rab tu dbye ba shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la
44b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa shes pa dang / sems can gzhan dag la chos go bar byed pa shes pa ste/ khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba shes rab yongs su dag pa la so sor rtog go/
44b2(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu byung ba 'di la shes rab 'di ni lus med pas thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do// rgyu ba med pas bzung ba med pa'i mtshan
44b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid do/ / skye ba med pas gnas med pa'i mtshan nyid do// nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid pas mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid do snyam du rab tu slob bo// khyim bdag de ltar na gang 'di ltar
44b4(dkon brtsegs): chos la so sor rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags brgyad stong gis ni bla na med pa
44b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / khyim bdag de dag thams cad las phar cher ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob po// srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni
44b6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go/ / de nas khyim bdag drag shul can dga' la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' nas mgu ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/
44b7(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong ri ba'i ras bcos bu zung bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di sems can thams cad la stsal to// bdag gi
45a1(dkon brtsegs): d ge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa rnams kyi bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang lags pa de dag gi chos yongs su rdzogs par
45a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba rnams kyi bslab pa bcas pa'ang de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba gang dag lags pa de dag gi chos yongs
45a3(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das la'ang zhu bar 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa chos du zhig dang ldan na rab tu byung ba'i bslab
45a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la slob pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag drag shul can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa
45a5(dkon brtsegs): khyim na gnas pa chos lnga dang ldan na rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob pa yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa mi lta bar dngos po thams cad
45a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gtong ba yin te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldan pas rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa dang / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa tshangs par
45a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod cing gtsang ba yin te/ yid kyi dgu la'ang 'dod pa mi spyod na mtshan gnyis spyod pa 'am/ yan lag ma yin par 'jug pa lta ci smos pa dang / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
45b1(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa khyim na gnas pa yang dag pa skyon med pa la mi reg cing khyim stong par zhugs nas/ thabs kyis mngon par bsgrub pa bsam gtan bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / khyim
45b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag bzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa sems can thams cad bde bar byed pa la brtson pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par 'byung bar brtson
45b3(dkon brtsegs): 'grus rtsom pa dang / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa bdag kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing gzhan yang dam pa'i chos la sbyor bar byed
45b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ khyim bdag drag shul
45b5(dkon brtsegs): can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi bar 'tshal lo// rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob bo// chos mnyam
45b6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid 'di lta bu la'ang 'jug par bgyi'o/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i
45b7(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phrob kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs byung ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang /
46a1(dkon brtsegs): shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'od kyi snang bas khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig
46a2(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te// bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas tshe
46a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ku dga' bo/ / sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
46a4(dkon brtsegs): logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum
46a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga'
46a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo khyod kyis khyim bdag drag shul can 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/ chos bsgrub pa'i phyir seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
46a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das mthong lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom 'das kyis stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyim bdag drag shul can 'di ni gang dag bskal pa bzang po 'di la
46b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams can la rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/ / sti stang dang mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur
46b2(dkon brtsegs): ro/ / rtag tu'ang khyim bdag tu gyur nas rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub de'ang rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe
46b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ khyim bdag drag shul can la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis gang khyim na gnas shing rdul la gnas pa la dga' bar byed/ drag
46b4(dkon brtsegs): shul can gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo rdul ni rdul cung zad kyang med de/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pas bdag la bde ba la mi re ba yin no// btsun pa kun dga' bo byang chub sem
46b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni sdug bsngal thams cad kyis gzir kyang bzod de/ sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong ngo // de skad ces spras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
46b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kun dga' bo khyim bdag drag shul can 'di khyim gyi sa la gnas nas/ bskul pa bzang po 'di la sems can rab tu mang po yongs su smin par byed par
46b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong du'ang de ltar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar khyim bdag 'di
47a1(dkon brtsegs): la yod pa'i yon tan rnams ni rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' stong la'ang med do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di
47a2(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam
47a3(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di drag shul can gyis zhus pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la bsgrub pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i
47a4(dkon brtsegs): le'u zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang / brtson 'grus dang / chos mang po rab tu 'thob ste/ brtson 'grus
47a5(dkon brtsegs): zhan pas bskal pa brgyar tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pas ni de ltar ma yin no/ / kun dga' bo de bas na bdag kyang 'di la brtson 'grus bskyed par 'dod pa dang / gzhan yang brtson 'grus
47a6(dkon brtsegs): la gzud par 'dod pa dang / bdag kyang yon tan gyi chos mnyam pa nyid thams cad la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gzhan yang yon tan gyi chos mnyam pa nyid thams cad la dgod par 'dod pas
47a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ / kun chub par bya/ bklag par bya/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// kun dga' bo ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dang
47b1(dkon brtsegs): yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir khyod la yongasu gtad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du yon tan thams cad 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pas bshad
47b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ro/ / kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang mi 'bral bar gnas pa de sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mi 'bral lo// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang
47b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan tam/ 'dzin tam/ klog pa dang mi 'bral ba de sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga'
47b4(dkon brtsegs): po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du yon tan thams cad 'dus shing / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du bslab pa bsgrub pa'i lam gyi yon tan thams cad 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pas yang
47b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rab tu bshad pa'i phyir ro/ / kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
47b6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams mes rab tu gang ba'ang 'bogs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ kun chub par bya'o// kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna
47b7(dkon brtsegs): bdun gyis rab tu gang ba tsam yang ri mor byas te/ slob dpon la phul nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis 'das
48a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mchod rten rin po che las so sor byas te mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod la/ de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
48a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing / gang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang
48a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bran dang slob mar khas blangs te bsnyen bkur byas su zin kyang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi 'dzin/ mi 'chang / mi klog/ kun chub par mi byed/ 'jug par mi
48a4(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / bsgrub pa 'di la'ang mi gnas na/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa byas par mi 'gyur
48a5(dkon brtsegs): ro/ / kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing kun chub par byed la/ dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i
48a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cing bsgrub pa 'di la'ang gnas na/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
48a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / gus pa dang bcas pas bsnyen bkur byas par yang 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ che dang
48b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / khyim bdag drag shul can dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
48b2(dkon brtsegs): rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchogs brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/
48b3(dkon brtsegs): drag shul can gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bcu dgu pa rdzogs so// / sh+lo ka dgu brgya bam po gsum mo// rgya gar gyi mngon po su ren dra bo d+hi dang
48b4(dkon brtsegs): zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba zhad ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// / bod skad du/
48b5(dkon brtsegs): glog thob kyi zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
48b6(dkon brtsegs): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong gis dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa phun sum
48b7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs shing seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa stong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de dag thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/ spobs pa
49a1(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med par gyur pa/ mi skye ba'i bzod pa mngon sum du byas pa/ phyir mi ldog pa la gnas pa/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes
49a2(dkon brtsegs): pas rnam par rtsen pa/ sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i
49a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu mtho bsal dang / byang chub sems
49a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnam par snang byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i yon tan 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pa dang /
49a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi rkyen dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' smon lam dang spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub
49a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' mnyam pa'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' dga' sred dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lo mos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dang /
49a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' glog thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i spobs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i nga ro dang /
49b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rab dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sad byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa sbyar ba la mkhas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i spyod pa
49b2(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni gtso bor gyur to/ / gzhan yang brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'jig
49b3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i rgyal po dang / mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
49b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor tshad med pa rnams dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'
49b5(dkon brtsegs): thog thob ces bya bas 'khor mang po rab tu zhi zhing yongs su dag pa dag 'dus par gyur pa mthong ba dang / stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo
49b6(dkon brtsegs): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la the tsom
49b7(dkon brtsegs): cung zad cig mchis te deng zhu bar 'tshal na/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs rjes gsan cing gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
50a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' glog thob la bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod la skabs phyes
50a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod ci dang rtsi 'dod pa dris shig dang / khyod la yang dag par bstan par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' glog thob kyis 'di skad ces
50a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur na/ bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid
50a4(dkon brtsegs): cing / skyon rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba dang / dbang po dang / rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du thabs mkhas pas sems can de dag drangs te/ lus zhig pa'i 'og tu ngan
50a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro rnams su lhung bar mi 'gyur zhing / gdon mi 'tshal bar mnyam pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten na gnas kyang pad+ma bzhin skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur ba dang /
50a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos par yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu rgyu zhing / rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa
50a7(dkon brtsegs): gsum la rab tu gnas kyang / snyoms par mi 'jug par sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa yongs su sbyangs nas skad cig ma
50b1(dkon brtsegs): gcig la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glog thob kyis/
50b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de zhu ba zhus pa// bla nam mchis mi yi gtso// mkhyen dang gzigs pa tshad ma mchis// ma 'dres chos la bzhugs nas ni//
50b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad// sems can kun la snyoms par gzigs// 'jig rten kun gyi mgon skyabs mdzad// log dang yang dag lam bstan nas// mthar thug bdel
50b4(dkon brtsegs): dgod par mdzad/ / yon tan mchog ni rab bsags pas// rin chen sna tshogs phung po 'dra// 'jig rten shes rab nyi ma khyod// khams gsum mchod 'os gtso bo lags// theg
50b5(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po bkas bshad nas/ / byang chub lam ni rdzogs par mdzod// zhal mtshan zla ba nya ba 'dra// zhi gnas dag ni phun sum tshogs// nyer zhi chos ni rab bstan nas// nyon
50b6(dkon brtsegs): mongs rnams ni zhi bar mdzad/ / byang chub spyod pa bkas bshad nas// sems can rnams la phan mdzad gsol// sangs rgyas zhing dang sku tshe dang // gzugs sku dang ni 'khor
50b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / / 'phrin las gsum dang chos rnams kyang // thams cad kun ni rnam par dag/ bcom ldan byang chub sems dpa' yi// rnam dag spyod pa bkas bshad gsol//
51a1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bdud ni gdul bar bgyi// ji ltar chos ni bstan par bgyi// ji ltar dran pa nyams mi 'gyur// khyod kyi bkas ni bshad du gsol// ji ltar
51a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bo dag gis ni/ / 'khor ba kun tu zhugs gyur kyang // mtshan nyid gcig la gnas bgyid cing // chos la rtag tu g.yo mi 'gyur// ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams la ni//
51a3(dkon brtsegs): brten cing mchod pa bgyis nas ni// rtag par sangs rgyas sku bltas kyang // mthar ni mtshan ma spong 'gyur lags// rnam thar gsum po mngon bgyis kyang // mkha' la bya/
51a4(dkon brtsegs): ni 'phur ba bzhin// yon tan phun tshogs ma gyur par// nam yang mya ngan mi 'da' lags// dbang po rang bzhin yongs rtogs nas// 'jigs pa ma mchis rjes
51a5(dkon brtsegs): 'brang zhing / / mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pas// sems can de dag smin bgyid lags// sngar ni 'jig rten bde btang nas// slad kyis dang ba'i sems skyed de//
51a6(dkon brtsegs): shes gya nom phun tshogs pas// bla med byang chub 'thob 'gyur ba// 'di 'dra'i zab mo gya nom don// de bzhin gshegs pas bkas bshad gsol/ de nas bcom
51a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glog thob la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can tshad med pa rnams la phan zhing bde bar bya ba dang / da ltar
51b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di lta bu zhus pa legs so legs
51b2(dkon brtsegs): so/ / de'i phyir klog thob shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / khyod la yang dag par bstan par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' glog thob kyis/ bcom
51b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin du thos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gter
51b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / zad mi shes pa'i gter dang / kun tu zad mi shes pa'i gter dang / mtha' med pa'i gter rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i gter
51b5(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs par gyur pas/ rgud pa rnams gtan du spong zhing / gong du bstan pa lta bu'i yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa'ang yongs su rdzogs par byed la/ tshogs nub
51b6(dkon brtsegs): dus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags spyod pa'i gter dang / zhe sdang spyod pa'i
51b7(dkon brtsegs): gter dang / gti mug sprod pa'i gter dang / cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa'i gtar dang / chos thams cad kyi gter gang yin pa'o// thog thob byang chub sems dpa'
52a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags spyod pa'i gter zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams ni 'dod chags kyi spyod pa'i
52a2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su mthun zhing / phyin ci log gis bcings pas/ mtshan ma rnams kyi rjes su gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la sogs pa'i
52a3(dkon brtsegs): yul dag la rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par brtags nas/ brtan pa nyid du mngon par zhen pa dang / bde ba la chags shing myos par gyur pa yin la/ byang chub sems
52a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni sems can de dag gi sems kyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas/ sems can de dag gang la mos shing 'dun pa dang //
52a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul gang la chags shing goms pas mthu can du gyur pa dang / dad pa ji lta bu dang ldan zhing phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang / sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu bskyed pa dang /
52a6(dkon brtsegs): theg pa gang la gzhol bar byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed yod pa dag rnam zhig na yongs su smin par gyur pa'ang rab tu shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can de dag gi
52a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir dang / de dag gi dge ba'i sems rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir shin tu legs par brtags nas yongs su gso bar byed do// glog
52b1(dkon brtsegs): thob sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang / spyod pa'i bye brag shin tu shes par dka' bar rig par bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rig par mi nus nA/ so sor
52b2(dkon brtsegs): skye bo dang mu stegs can rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ glog thob sems can kha cig ni 'dod pa rnams la mngon par zhen par gyur kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
52b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par byed pa'ang yod do/ / sems cam cig ni 'dod pa'i yul reg pa tsam mam/ 'dod pa'i sems kyis tshig smras pa tsam gyis tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
52b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'ang yod do/ / sems can kha cig ni gzugs sdug gu dag mthong nas/ 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa las gzugs de rnam par 'gyur zhing /
52b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig par mthong ba nyid kyis khong du chud par gyur nas/ 'dod pa'i gdung ba nye bar zhi ste/ mi rtag pa nyid shin tu yid la byed pa nyid kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
52b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'ang yod do/ / sems can kha cig ni bud med mthong ba na/ mngon par zhen pa skyes pa med kyang / phyis yid la dran pa'i dbang gis 'dod chags kyi
52b7(dkon brtsegs): sems skyes nas de'i kha dog dang dbyibs yid la byas nas rjes su chags pa skye bar 'gyur ba'ang yod do/ / sems can kha cig ni rmi lam na gzugs yid du 'ong ba dag mthong ba'i dbang gis 'dod
53a1(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi mngon par zhen pa bskyed/ yid la byed cing yongs su gnyer bar byed pa'ang yod do// sems can kha cig ni bud med kyi sgra thos pa tsam gyis 'dod chags kyi
53a2(dkon brtsegs): sred pa skyed par byed la/ res 'ga' ni mthong ba tsam gyis 'dod chags kyi sems dang bral nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'ang yod pas/
53a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir glog thob byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags kyi nad rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa dang / 'dod chags kyi sman rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag thabs mkhas pas legs
53a4(dkon brtsegs): par khong du chud kyang / chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma'ang med la/ chos kyi dbyings la rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can de dag la'ang snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o// /
53a5(dkon brtsegs): glog thob 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ces bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes zhes bya ba'i chos cung zad tsam yang dmigs su med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam
53a6(dkon brtsegs): du bdag gis mthong ba ltar na/ sems can rnams ni mtshan ma med pa/ rang bzhin gyis stong zhing dben pa/ btags pa tsam du rnam par gzhag pa/ tshogs shing 'dus pa'i chos 'di la
53a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug skyed par byed pas/ bdag gis 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags nas/ 'dod chags kyis rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can
53b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi ched du snying rje chen po la gnas nas/ sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos par rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin
53b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o snyam du sems so/ / skyes pa gang zhig bud med dag la yang dag pa ma yin pas sdug pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ 'dod chags lci ba skyes par gyur na byang chub sems
53b3(dkon brtsegs): dpas bud med shin tu sdug cing mdzes pa/ gzugs kyi mtshan khyad par du 'phags pa/ rin po che'i rgyan 'phreng dang ldan pa/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pas lha'i bu
53b4(dkon brtsegs): mo dang 'dra bar gyur pa/ sngon ma mthong ba dag tu bsgyur nas/ sems can de dag gis ji ltar sred cing rjes su chags pa dang / shin du mngon par zhen par gyur pa ston par
53b5(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ / de dag gi nus pa dang sbyar nas thabs kyis 'dod chags kyi dug mda' dbyung ba'i ched du rang dbang du gyur pa'i mthus bud med kyi gzugs su bsgyur nas/ de'i mdun du snang
53b6(dkon brtsegs): bar byas nas chos bstan pa nyid kyis sems can de dag chos kyi dbyings rtogs par byas te mi snang bar gyur to/ / bud med gang zhig skyes pa dag la 'dod chags kyi sems skyes par gyur na/ byang
53b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas skyes pa'i lus bstan nas/ 'dod chags kyi dug mda' dbyung ba'i ched du chos bstan pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings la zhugs par byas nas mi snang bar byed do// glog
54a1(dkon brtsegs): thob 'dod chas kyi spyod pa nyi khri chig stong dang / spyod pa gzhan de dag kyang gtogs par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag byang chub sems dpas rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyi sgo
54a2(dkon brtsegs): mo bye ba stong phrag tshad med pa bskyed de/ sems can khong du chud par byas nas thams cad rnam par grol bar gyur kyang / bdag gis sems can la 'di lta bu'i chos bstan to snyam du sems
54a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang med la/ sems can rnam par grol bar gyur pa'ang mi dmigs so// glog thob 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho ma dros pa'i klu'i rgyal po ni las kyi mthu'i dbang gis de'i pho
54a4(dkon brtsegs): brang gi nang nas chu klung chen po bzhi byung nas/ sems can chu dang skam la gnas pa dag dbyar tsha ba'i dus kyi tshe bsil ba dang / rlan gyis me tog dang 'bras bu dag rgyas shing / 'bru
54a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'phel bar gyur nas sems can mang po shin tu bde bar byed kyang / klu'i rgyal po de bdag gis chu klung bzhi po 'di dag phyung ngo // dbyung bar bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'on
54a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang chu klung bzhi po dag rtag tu 'bab cing sems can rnams nye bar spyod par byed do/ / byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i dbang gis rtsol
54a7(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa'i ye shes kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan nas/ 'khor ba'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad bsal te/ lha dang mi rnams la 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba'i
54b1(dkon brtsegs): bde ba sbyin par byed kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis chos bstan to// bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi 'on kyang rang gi ngang gis snying rje chen po'i bsam
54b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas nas/ sems can rnams la so sor brtags te/ ci rigs par chos ston par byed do// gzhan yang glog thob 'di lta ste/ dper na brgya byin lha'i dbang po la
54b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mo khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod pa de dag/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i rang gi mthu'i dbang gis lus mang po bstan nas/ lha'i bu mo de dag de dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i bde ba yongs su
54b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par myong bas/ de dag so so nas 'di snyam du bdag gcig pu ni deng lha'i dbang po dang lhan cig rtses so snyam du sems kyang / yang dag par lha'i dbang po de la mngon par zhen par
54b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa ci'ang med do/ / byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du sems can gang yongs su bzla ba'i 'os su gyur pa de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par byed kyang / byang chub
54b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' la mngon par zhen par gyur pa med do/ / gzhan yang glog thob 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ri mthon po'i rtse la shar ba'i tshe/ 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu snang bar
54b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pas/ gang du snang bar byas pa'i gnas de dag tu kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu ston par byed kyang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor da ni kha
55a1(dkon brtsegs): dog gcig pa/ 'od gcig pa nyid de/ tha dad pa'i mtshan ma med do// byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du shes rab kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings sdud
55a2(dkon brtsegs): bar byas nas/ sems can gyi mngon par zhen pa'i ri'i rtse mo de dag tu shar ba na/ dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur cing / de dag gi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par byed kyang / chos
55a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings la gnyis su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid med do/ / glog thob 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags kyi spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis
55a4(dkon brtsegs): gter 'di thob par gyur na bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par sems can gyi mos pa sna tshogs ji lta ba bzhin du lus tshad med pa bstan nas/ tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston par byed kyang //
55a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid med do// gzhan yang glog thob 'di lta ste/ dper na gser yang dag pa ni mgar ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i mthu'i dbang gis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyan
55a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs su byas te/ mtshan nyid tha dad par gyur kyang / gser gyi rang bzhin la ni tha dad du gyur pa ci'ang med do// byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings shin tu legs par
55a7(dkon brtsegs): brtags nas/ sems can mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs ji lta ba bzhin du lus tshad med pa dag bstan nas/ tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ston par byed kyang / chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su gyur
55b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtshan nyid med do/ / 'di ni rtag par chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gser 'di lta bu thob par gyur na/ sems
55b2(dkon brtsegs): can gyi ched du rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas chos ston par byed pas/ de dag gis chos thos pa'i dbang gis 'phags pa'i nor phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyugs dang ldan par gyur pas/ 'khor
55b3(dkon brtsegs): paba'i rgud pa dag gtan du yongs su spong bar byed do/ / gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter ces bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di
55b4(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ sems can rnams ni nga rgyal dang mtshungs par ldan pa/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas pa/ bdag dang bdag gi mtshan ma la gnas pas/ yun ring po nas
55b5(dkon brtsegs): byams pa dang bzod pa ma bsgoms pa/ zhe sdang gi gdung bas rang gi sems bshig par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran par ma gyur pa/ zhe sdang gi gdug pas
55b6(dkon brtsegs): g.yogs pa/ chos nyid la rmongs par gyur pa yin yang byang chub sems dpa' ni zhe sdang mang ba'i sems can de dag la nam yang gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba skyed par mi byed kyi/ 'di snyam
55b7(dkon brtsegs): ma sems can 'di dag ni gti mug gis rmongs pas chos rnams gzod ma nyid nas rab tu dben zhing zhi ba/ dri ma dang rnyog pa med pa/ 'dum pa med pa/ rtsod pa med pa/ rab tu dben pa'i chos
56a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid la phyin ci log dang mtshungs par ldan par gyur pa'i dbang gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i zhe sdang dang / khon du 'dzin pa bskyed par gyur to snyam du sems pa kho nar zad
56a2(dkon brtsegs): do/ / de snyam du bsams nas kyang / snying rje chen po la gnas te/ rtag par bdag nyid 'gyod cing bshags par yang byed la/ gal te lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa zhig
56a3(dkon brtsegs): yod na'ang / zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can de dag 'dul bar 'dod pa'i phyir bzod pa la rab tu gnas par byed do// gal te zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can tshad med pa de dag phan tshun gcig pa gcig rgyab
56a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis phyogs shing / zhe sdang dang khon du 'dzin pa'i las yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang gis sbrul gdug pa ngan 'gro'i lus su ltung bar gyur pa dag la ni byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa la rab tu gnas
56a5(dkon brtsegs): pa des/ 'di ltar byams pa dang dran pa'i stobs kyis sems can de dag btul nas ngan 'gro'i rnam par smin pa len par 'gyur zhing / gdon mi za bar mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa
56a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas/ sems can gyi zhe sdang gi spyod pa yongs su bsal bar byed pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te
56a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can zhe sdang can dag mthong bar gyur na/ 'di snyam du chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yin na/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni zhe sdang gi rjes su 'brangs nas/
56b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ma yin pas rnam par rtog pa bskyed nas/ mnyam zhing rtsod pa med pa chos nyid 'di la zhe sdang gi bsam pa bskyed pas/ sems can 'di dag chos kyi dbyings nyid ma
56b2(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par gyur to/ / gal te sems can 'di dag chos nyid mthong bar gyur na ni/ gzhan dag la gnod sems bskyed par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ chos kyi dbyings nyid ma rtogs
56b3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ / de'i phyir zhe sdang skyes par 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' des zhe sdang mang ba'i sem can de dag la lhag par snying brtsa ba bskyed nas snying rje chen po la gnas te/
56b4(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi smon lam yang yongs su rdzogs par byed la/ rtsol ba med pa ye shes kyis sems can gyi zhe sdang gi spyod pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ chos kyi sgo mo rnam pa sna tshog
56b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par ston par byed kyang / bdag gis sems can gyi zhe sdang bsal ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam du mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
56b6(dkon brtsegs): dbyings kyi mtshan nyid shin tu legs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro/ / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid la gnas nas/ nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa
56b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bsal ba zhes bya'o/ / glog thob 'di lta ste/ dper na mun pa bsal nas snang ba 'thob par 'gyur yang / mun pa sel bar byed pa med de/ 'di ltar mun pa dang sdang ba'i ji
57a1(dkon brtsegs): bo nyid nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing dbyer med pa yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i ye shes de la brten nas//
57a2(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pas chos rab tu bstan te/ zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul zhing zhi bar byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la tha dad du gyur pa med do// glog thob
57a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar nas 'od kyis gang dang gang du snang bar byas pa de dag thams cad ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis bsdus pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems
57a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' yang zhe sdang gi spyod pa 'dul zhing bsal ba'i phyir ji tsam du tshig tu brjod pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo yin yang chos kyi dbyings la ni tha dad du gyur pa med de/ 'di ltar zhe sdang gi spyod pa
57a5(dkon brtsegs): nyi khri chig stong dang / spyod pa gzhan gtogs par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes yongs su grub pas sems can de dag gi zhe sdang gi spyod pa rnam
57a6(dkon brtsegs): pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su chos ston par byed kyang / bdag gis sems can la chos bstan to// ston to// ston par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa med de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
57a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par sems can gyi mos pa rnam pa sna
57b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi rjes su tshig 'bru dang / yi ge dang / brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang / zhe sdang spyod pa'i mtha' rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ byang chub sems/
57b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de'i shes rab dang spobs pa'ang gdugs par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i zhe sdang spyod pa'i
57b3(dkon brtsegs): gter ces bya'o/ / gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gti mug spyod pa'i gter ces bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ glog thob byang chub sems dpa'
57b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa 'di lta bu 'di ni shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po yin te/ 'di ltar sems can rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rjes su 'brang ba/ gzhan la gnod pa byed pa/ ma rig pa'i mngal gyi sgongs/
57b5(dkon brtsegs): kun tu dkris pas dar gyi srin bu bzhin du bdag nyid bcings pas chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i thabs med pa/ bya ba dag la legs par so sor mi rtog nga// bdag tu lta ba/ mngon par zhen pa/
57b6(dkon brtsegs): lam log par zhugs pa/ bul ba'i spyod pa la gnas pa/ nges par 'byung bar dga' ba yin pas/ 'di lta bu la sogs pas rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can dag gi ched du dang po sems bskyed
57b7(dkon brtsegs): pa nas sbyor ba chen po bskyed de/ ngal zhing sdug bsngal ba'ang med/ le lo'ang med par rkyen gang dang / mos pa gang dang / chos bstan pa ji lta bu zhig gis sems can 'di dag byang chub
58a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyod pa la btsud de/ rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi chos kyi dbyings legs par so sor brtags pas
58a2(dkon brtsegs): rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis snying rje chen po la gnas te/ sems can de dag chos kyi dbyings la rmongs par gyur par rig nas/ ci nus ci lcogs kyis chos bstan nas rab tu dul bar byed
58a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang bdag gis chos bstan to/ / ston to// ston par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa med do// 'on kyang de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba legs par so sor
58a4(dkon brtsegs): brtags nas rang gi ngang gis chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong du ma bstan to/ / sems can de dag gi ma rig pa'i las kyi 'du byed bsal nas rnam par grol ba 'thob par byed do// glog thob 'di lta ste/ dper na
58a5(dkon brtsegs): sman pa bzang po nad mang po gso ba la mkhas pa/ sngar sman dpyad rnams la shin tu goms par gyur pa ni nad kyi mtshan ma mthong ma thag tu/ sngags dang sman btang ba thams cad rab tu rtogs par gyur
58a6(dkon brtsegs): pas/ des gsos pas gang yang mi gsos pa med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings shin tu legs par rtogs pas/ rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis gti mug
58a7(dkon brtsegs): gi spyod pa bsags pa'i sems can de dag gi dbang po dang / rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong du ma bstan nas/ thams cad rab tu gsal bar rtogs par byed do// glog thob 'di
58b1(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gti mug spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu legs
58b2(dkon brtsegs): par so sor brtags nas/ gti mug spyod pa'i sems can de dag gi ched du bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par de dag gi rang bzhin dang / 'dun pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshig 'bru dang /
58b3(dkon brtsegs): yi ge dang / brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang / gti mug spyod pa'i mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang spobs
