58b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang gtugs par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i gti mug spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o// 'di gti mug gi
58b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa nyi khri chig stong dang / spyod pa gzhan gtogs par brgya khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang ba'i phyir chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong du rab tu phye nas/ yang dag par
58b6(dkon brtsegs): ston pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i gti mug spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o/ / gzhan yang klog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa'i
58b7(dkon brtsegs): gter ces bya ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu dag cing yongs su gsal ba dri ma med pa/ lam gyi bzhi mdor bzhag na/ gzugs brnyan
59a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams der snang zhing 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med kyang / me long gi dkyil 'khor de bdag ni gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'di dag ston par byed do zhes
59a2(dkon brtsegs): mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang me long gi dkyil 'khor de shin tu byi dor legs par byas na/ gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa thams cad rang gis rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// de
59a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings kyi me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu legs par byi dor byas pas/ rtsol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ sems can
59a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa bye brag ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong du ma rnam par phye ste bstan nas/ de dag thams cad rab tu rtogs shing rnam par grol ba thob par byas kyang / chos kyi
59a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma dang / sems can gyi mtshan ma skyed par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' des chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid shin tu legs par rtogs pa'i phyir dang /
59a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa bzhi po 'di dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pas de dag gi dbang po dang / rang bzhin du chos ston par byed kyang /
59a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings dang / sems can gyi khams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog par byed pas gnyis su 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid kyang med do// chos kyi dbyings dang / sems can gyi
59b1(dkon brtsegs): khams ji snyed pa de dag gnyis su med cing tha dad par bsal bar mthong ba'i phyir ro/ / glog thob 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma'ang med la/ rnam
59b2(dkon brtsegs): par gzhag pa'ang med do/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings shin tu legs par so sor brtags nas/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu 'jug par rtogs pa dang /
59b3(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed kyang / chos kyi dbyings la ni tha dad du gyur pa med do// glog thob cha mnyam pa
59b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa 'di la nyi khri chig stong yod pa dang / spyod pa gzhan gtogs par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpas so sor brtags nas/ thams cad bsal bar rtog
59b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sman pa mkhas pa nad dang / sman gtong ba rab tu shes pa bzhin du rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis chos rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed pa gang yin
59b6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi cha mnyam pa spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na/ sems
59b7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi ched du bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par de dag mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang / spyod pa de dag
60a1(dkon brtsegs): gi mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang spobs pa'ang gdugs par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
60a2(dkon brtsegs): dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o/ / // bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma//
60a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' des de lta bu'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas/ sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang / spyod pa dang / bsam pa'ang thabs mkhas
60a4(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu rtogs pas/ gal te 'dod chags mang ba'i sems can mthong bar gyur na/ de dag rab tu dul zhing de dag gi nad gso ba'i phyir/ so so'i skye bo dang mthun par 'dod//
60a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / khyim gyi so chis phun sum tshogs par ston par byed kyang / pad+ma bzhin du ma gos shing mngon par zhen par gyur pa
60a6(dkon brtsegs): med do/ / sems can gang gti mug cing blo dang mi ldan pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa mi shes pas/ 'di snyam du blo dang ldan pa su zhig so so'i skye bo dang tha mi//
60a7(dkon brtsegs): dad par 'dod pa rnams nyams su len par byed ces/ byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di ni byang chub spangs pa yin no snyam du sems par byed de/ sems can de lta bu de dag ni sems
60b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi gtsang ba'i phyir/ zhe sdang chen po skyes nas gus par mi 'gyur bas/ las de'i dbang gis lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og du sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung bar 'gyur yang / 'di
60b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar byang chub sems dpa' shin tu gsang bas gdul ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis kha na ma tho ba'i rnam pa yongs su zad nas/ gdon mi za ba'i mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa la rab tu bkod par byed do// glog
60b3(dkon brtsegs): thob 'di lta ste/ dper na me rab tu 'bar ba ni rtsa dang shing dang phrad par gyur pa na/ thams cad rab tu 'bar zhing me'i phung po nyid du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub
60b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' yang ye shes kyi me 'bar bar gyur pa na/ sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba ji snyed pa de dag byung
60b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig 'grogs shing thams cad rab tu 'bar nas/ shes rab nyid du mngon par 'grub pa 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos
60b6(dkon brtsegs): shes bya'o/ / gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ 'di lta ste/ rin po che sna bzhi las mngon par grub pa yin pas/ sems can
60b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang de'i rjes su kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid du gyur par byed de/ gal de bai nuR+Ya ri ngos su phyin na ni/ thams
61a1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang bai DUR+Ya'i kha dog gcig pa nyid du 'gyur bar byed do/ / gser gyi kha dog gi ngos su phyin na ni/ thams cad gser gyi kha dog nyid du 'gyur bar byed do// dngul
61a2(dkon brtsegs): dang chu shel gyi kha dog tu gyur pa'ang de bzhin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ma 'dres pa'i chos thob pas/ sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang //
61a3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba dang / mi dge ba ji snyed pa de dag byang chub sems dpa'i thad du phyin cing lhan cig 'grogs par gyur na/ thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes la 'jug pa nyid du gyur par byed kyang
61a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i sems mi gtsang zhing / rang gi sdig pa'i las kyi dbang gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / shin rje'i 'jig rten du lhung bar gyur pas/ 'di ltar byang chub sems
61a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i yon tan dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis kha na ma tho ba'i rnam par smin pa zad pa'i 'og tu gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur pa la
61a6(dkon brtsegs): dkod par byed do/ / glog thob sngon byung ba 'das pa bskal pa tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa na/ snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
61a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu 'dul ba/ kha lo sgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi
61b1(dkon brtsegs): ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i phung po yon tan gyi sgra zhe bya ba byung ste/ de'i tshe skye dgu rnams tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub par gyur te/ da ltar nga ji lta ba bzhin no// de'i tshe sems can
61b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug shin du che bas/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis zil gyis non pas/ pha ma dang / phu nu dang / grogs po'i yid dang 'gal bar
61b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi rjes su mi 'brang ba/ byas pa'i drin mi gzo ba/ rtag par gnod sems dang bcas pa/ g.yo sgyu dang rkun bu'i sems dang ldan pa// phan
61b4(dkon brtsegs): tshun gcig la gcig gnod pa byed pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la gus pa med pa/ ser snas zil gyis non pas yi dgas
61b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos spyod pa'i sems can de lta bu sha stag/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas par gyur pas ni shin tu gdul dka' bar gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'ang sngon gyi smon lam gyi
61b6(dkon brtsegs): mthus/ dus ngan pa de'i tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la nyin thos chen po'i tshogs ni nyi khri nyis
61b7(dkon brtsegs): stong mnga' bar gyur to/ / de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rgya cher byin pa zhes bya ba 'dzam bu gling la dbang ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la sems
62a1(dkon brtsegs): shin du dang bar gyur pa zhig yod pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par dbyar zla ba gsum spyan drangs te/ mchod pa rgya cher
62a2(dkon brtsegs): bshams nas mchod cing rim gro byas so/ / de'i tshe dge slong dri ma med pa zhes bya ba spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa/ chos ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pas 'khor mang po rnams nyan
62a3(dkon brtsegs): par spob/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la rtag par ngal ba med pa/ re ba med par chos ston pa/ mdog gsal zhing gsong por smra ba/ gzugs dang stobs
62a4(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa/ byad bzhin sdug cing mdzes pa/ sems can rnams kyis mthong bar mos shing / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar byed cing bsngags pa brjod
62a5(dkon brtsegs): pa zhig yod de/ dge slong gsar bu dag kyang rtag par dri ma med pa'i rjes su 'brang zhing / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'byung zhing 'jug pa dag la thogs pa med par gyur pas gos dang /
62a6(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kyang rim gro byas par gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor mang po de las dge slong phal cher lus kyi
62a7(dkon brtsegs): sdom pa dang / sems kyi shes rab sgom pa mi shes pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la gus pa med pa/ rtag par lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / bdag
62b1(dkon brtsegs): tu lta ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la skur pa 'debs pa/ rnam par g.yeng zhing gdul dka' ba/ dbang po rnams mi sdom pa/ chos bzhin ma yin pa la
62b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa/ dge slong gi tshul med par bdag nyid dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las thams cad log par zhugs pa sha stag gnas par gyur to//
62b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de dbyar 'das nas yongs su mya ngan 'das pa dang / rgyal po rgya cher byin pas tsan dan dmar pos sku zhugs la bzhin nas mchod pa byas te/ ring bsrel gyi
62b4(dkon brtsegs): mchod rten ngos bzhi kun tu tsan dan dmar po'i mu khyud kyis bskor ba/ pad+ma gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu brtsigs so// de'i tshe dge slong dri ma med pa ni bcom ldan
62b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das des mang du thos pa'i mchog tu lung bstan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos rgya cher spel te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang /
62b6(dkon brtsegs): grong rdal gang dang gang du song ba der/ sems can brgya stong tshad med pa snyed yongs su bdul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod par gyur te/ de'i tshe dge
62b7(dkon brtsegs): slong sdig can mang po rnal 'byor khong du ma chud pa/ rtag par phrag dog dang bcas pa/ bdud kyis bslus pa rnams rgyal po de ga la ba der dong ste/ 'di skad du rgyal pos bkur
63a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dge slong dri ma med pa ni rgyal po'i pho brang du 'byung zhing 'jug la thags thogs ma mchis te/ dge slong 'di 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang ma lags la/ dus ma
63a2(dkon brtsegs): lags par yang zas 'tshal te/ spos dang 'phreng ba dag gis kyang lus brgyan par bgyid pas yang dag par tshangs pa spyod pa ma lags pas/ mchod pa mdzad pa'i mi rigs
63a3(dkon brtsegs): so/ bdag cag ni don 'di'i slad du 'dir mchis nas rgyal po la gsol ba lags kyis/ slad kyis 'gyod par yang ma mdzad cig/ sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pa'i
63a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa la thugs mi ches pa'ang mi bskyed du gsol zhes smras so/ / de'i tshe bdud sdig can zhes bya ba zhig kyang bdag nyid dge slong gi gzugs su bsgyur nas rgyal po
63a5(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba der song ste snga ma bzhin du smras pa/ de'i tshe rgyal po rgya cher byin pa'ang yang nas yang du de skad smras pa thos nas/ 'di snyam du dge slong dri ma med pa ni rab tu brtson zhin blo dang ldan pas
63a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis bla mar bkur ba yin te/ dngos po 'di lta bu byed pa ni gnas med do snyam mo// de nas de'i tshe bdud kyi 'khor rnams par snang las lus phyed bstan nas rgyal po de la tshigs su
63a7(dkon brtsegs): bcad de smras pa/ / rgyal po bzo yi sgyu rtsal slobs// dus tshod dag la mkhas par gyis// rgyal po de ni ma shes na// mi rgyal rtags dang ldan ma yin// sangs rgyas nyan thos dgra bcom
63b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ / ye shes chen po ldan pa yi// tshig dag la ni mi rten par// ci yi phyir na chad par lta// dge slong rnams ni phan gradags phyir// khyod la bden tshig smra ba yin// chang
63b2(dkon brtsegs): smra ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i mi/ / yang dag tshangs spyod ma yin pas// de ni rgyal po'i pho brang du// btsun mo dag dang lhan cig rtse// rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yis//
63b3(dkon brtsegs): legs par rtogs la the tsom sol// rgyal pos dngos po 'di thos pas// sems la skrag cing mya ngan skyes// 'khor rnams dang ni lhan cig tu// myur zhing rings par pho brang dong //
63b4(dkon brtsegs): de tshe dri med po brang nang // chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa dang // bdag dang sems can med pa yi// dam pa'i don ni ston par byed// rgyal po dmag 'khor bcas pa rnams// thams
63b5(dkon brtsegs): cad bdud kyis bslus pa na/ / pho brang nang gi btsun mo rnams// dge slong yongs bskor mthong ba dang // zhe sdang glang chen myos pa bzhin// gshed ma dag la rab bsgo ba// dge slong
63b6(dkon brtsegs): nga yi btsun mo bslus/ / sdug bsngal chos kyis chad pas chod// blon po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// thams cad bdud kyis zin pas na// dge slong nyes pa med pa la/
63b7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis gnod pa bya bar bsams// gshed ma mtshon thogs 'ongs pa dang // dri med snying brtse mchi ma byung // rgyal pos khyod ni chos min na// ci yi phyir na mchi ma byung //
64a1(dkon brtsegs): dri med rgyal po la smras pa// dngos po 'di ni yid ches dka'// re zhig skad cig sdod cig dang // bdag la gsad pa'i dbang yod do// rgyal
64a2(dkon brtsegs): pos dge slong tshig thos nas/ / gshed ma dag la sdod cig bsgo// bden pa'i dngos po ci zhig yod// khyed kyis myur du smra ba'i rigs// lhag pa'i bsam pa ldan gyur
64a3(dkon brtsegs): cing / / snying rjes 'jig rten phan 'dogs pas// sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar te// bden pa'i tshig ni 'di skad smras// rgyal po chen pos mkhyen par mdzod// gal
64a4(dkon brtsegs): de yang dag nyes med na/ / sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos// mkha' la me tog char phob cig/ de skad tshig ni sbas ma thag/ sa chen rnam pa drug tu g.yos// mkha'
64a5(dkon brtsegs): la lha yi me tog babs/ / bdud 'khor mya ngan skyes par 'gyur// de tshe rgyal po dang ba skyes// rkang la phyag byas bzod par gsol// bdag ni dmyal bar lhung 'gyur na//
64a6(dkon brtsegs): mgon med bdag la stobs mdzod cig/ kyi hud sdig pa de phrad pas// gdug pa'i sems ni skyes par gyur// sdig pa'i grogs pa'i rjes 'brangs pas// mgon dang skyabs byed su
64a7(dkon brtsegs): yang med/ / ston pa chen po ma gtogs par// phyogs bcur bdag gi mgon byed med// bdag gis rgyal srid spangs nas ni// nam 'tsho'i bar du skyabs su mchi// dge slong
64b1(dkon brtsegs): des ni rgyal po dang / / g.yog 'khor bsam pa rig gyur nas// dam pa'i don ni rab tu bshad// rgyal pos thos nas dang ba thob// 'khor ni bye ba brgya stong dang // rgyal srid spangs nas
64b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung / / sbyangs pa'i sdom pa blangs pas na// gzhan gyis mgron gnyer yong mi len// de tshe rgyal po'i pho brang nang // btsun mo 'khor bcas brgyad khri rnams// dam pa'i don
64b3(dkon brtsegs): ni thos pas na/ / phyir mi ldog la gnas par gyur// rgyal pos sangs rgyas gsungs pa bzhin// kho ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bar// nyin mtshan rtag par sdig bshags kyang // 'on
64b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang sdig pa'i las ma zad/ / lo ni bye mang sdug bsngal myong // sdig zad de bzhin gshegs dang phrad// sngon ni skrag par byas pa'i rgyus// rnam smin lhag ma rtag par
64b5(dkon brtsegs): dman/ / mthar gyis rnal 'byor rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas bye ba stong mchod nas// so sor zhing khams gzhan dag tu// thams cad mngon par rdzogs sangs rgyas//
64b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kun kyang mtshan mthun par// yon tan grags pa zhes byar gyur// de tshe rgyal po rgya cher byin// dge slong byams bzod de la ni// gdug pa'i sems ni bskyed
64b7(dkon brtsegs): pas na/ / lo ni bye ba mang por yang // sngon gyi sdig las mngon gyur pas// ngu 'bod chen po lhung bar gyur// rnam smin de ni zad nas kyang // slar yang mi lus
65a1(dkon brtsegs): thob gyur te/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun spyan phrad// rtag tu bsnyen bkur rim gro byas// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag/ brgyad cu dag ni rim
65a2(dkon brtsegs): gro byas/ / de yi 'og tu sangs rgyas pa// de ni nga bdag nyid yin no// chos smra nyes pa med pa la// gnod pa byas pa'i dge slong ni// ma 'ongs mngon par 'tshang rgya ba// byang
65a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' byams pa yin/ / de tshe rgyal po pho brang nang // btsun mo 'khor ni brgyad khri rnams// shin tu dang bas dge rtsa bskyed// sangs rgyas tshad med rim gro byas// de ltar spyod pa
65a4(dkon brtsegs): rab bskyed nas/ / sems can phan gtags smon lam btab// sangs rgyas bye ba stong mchod nas// so sor mngon par 'tshang yang rgya// ngas deng khyod la bsgo ba ni// thams cad
65a5(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems ma skyed cig/ gang zhig byams bsgoms sangs rgyas bsngags// myur du byang chub chen po 'thob/ de lta bas na glog thob sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang / rang
65a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin dang / bsam pa dag la mi mkhas pa dag gis dus thams cad du gnod sems bskyed par mi bya'o// glog thob 'di lta ste/ dper na ri rnams kyi nang na ri rab mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin
65a7(dkon brtsegs): du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na/ mchog dang / gtso bo dang / bla na med par gyur pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na chu bo thams cad kyi nang na
65b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho chen po mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na mchog tu zab cing rgya che bar gyur pa yin no// gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper
65b2(dkon brtsegs): na rgyal po rnams kyi nang na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mchog dang / gtso bo dang / bla mar gyur pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na gong na med par
65b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa yin no/ / glog thob de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spyod pa'i sems dang
65b4(dkon brtsegs): sems las byung ba 'jug cing 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen cing se gol gtogs pa gcig la thams cad yongs su sdud par mdzad do/ / glog
65b5(dkon brtsegs): thob de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu mig dang ldan pas rtsol ba la mi ltos par rang gi lag mthil na skyu ru ra
65b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu gsal bar mthong zhing the tshom med pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa ji snyed pa dag rab tu mkhyen pas/ 'khor mang po'i nang
65b7(dkon brtsegs): du chos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston par mdzad do/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na/ 'dod chags kyi spyod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i
66a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdungs nas nyin mtshan du yid la byed cing / don med par dus las 'das par byed pa'ang ngas rab tu mkhyen cing gzigs
66a2(dkon brtsegs): so/ / 'dod chags kyi gdung ba'i lus dang ngag gi las rnam pa sna tshogs slong bar byed pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen cing gzigs so// zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can zhe sdang gi
66a3(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis non nas/ gcig la gcig zhe sdang gis phrag dog byed pa dang / gnod pa byas pa'i phyir mnar med pa'i gnas su ltung bar 'gyur ba dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen cing
66a4(dkon brtsegs): gzigs so/ / gti mug spyod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can rnams ma rig pa'i mun nag gi bsgribs shing rmongs pa'i mngon par zhen pa dang / log par lta ba'i
66a5(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'brang ba la mos par gyur pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen to/ / 'os su gyur pa dang / 'os su mi 'gyur ba dang / 'phel zhing rtsol ba dang bcas pa dang / ldog cing nyams par
66a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
66a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pas 'khor mang po'i nang du bzhugs nas/ sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag
66b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang rab tu mkhyen pas/ gal te dus la ma bab par rig par gyur na ni/ cang mi gsung zhing btang snyoms su bzhag nas sems can 'di dag ni chos la rmongs par gyur pas/ khong du
66b2(dkon brtsegs): chud par ma gyur to snyam du dgongs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbang po dang stobs khyad par 'phags pa phun sum tshogs shing / dus rab tu mkhyen pa'i phyir gdul ba'i 'os su gyur pa
66b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsam pa mchog tu gyur pa dang / bzod par nus pa'i 'os su gyur pa dang / tshig legs par nyan par gyur pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen te/ de ltar mkhyen par gyur nas kyang
66b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag yongs su sdud cing phan 'dogs par byed do/ / de lta bas na glog thob byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa yang dag pa'i gnas skabs su ma zhugs pa/ sems can rnams
66b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa legs par khong du ma chud pa dag gis khyim na gnas pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba'ang rung ste/ thams cad kun la smod cing gnod sems bskyed nas/ yun
66b6(dkon brtsegs): ring por bdag nyid la gnod par 'gyur bar mi bya'o/ / de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang po sems bskyed pa nas/ theg pa chen po la gnas pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi
66b7(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ / sems can gzhan dag sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byed par mthong na'ang gnod sems bskyed par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin
67a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas rtag tu sems can gang rnam par dkar zhing yongs su dag pa'i chos las cung zad cig nyan par gyur na/ rnams kyang yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro//
67a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes gsungs pas so// byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te 'dod chags spyod pa'i sems can mthong na/ sems can 'di dag 'dod chags kyi gdung bas bsregs par gyur pa'ang bdag gis nyes pa
67a3(dkon brtsegs): yin no snyam du sems so/ / zhe sdang dang gti mug gi gdung bas bsregs par gyur pa de dag mthong na'ang / 'di dag thams cad ni bdag gis nyes pa yin no snyam du sems so// de ci'i phyir
67a4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ bdag gis sems can thams cad na ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan par gyur pa de dag mthong bar gyur na/ sman yongs su btsal te/ thabs mkhas pas yongs su gso ba'i rigs pa las
67a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag sngon sems can gyi nad bsal bar yi dam bcas na/ deng yal bar dor ba 'di nyid bdag gi nyes pa yin no snyam du sems pas so// byang chub sems dpa' ni de lta bu'i bsam pa dang
67a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas bdag nyid kyi nyes pa la lta zhing / sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems skyed par byed do// gal te gsod pa 'am/ lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag gcod cing gtub pa zhig dang phrad
67a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na'ang / pha rol gnod pa byas pa de dag la lan bya'o snyam pa'i bsam pa med do// glog thob byang chub sems dpa' de ltar yang dag par sgom pa na/ 'das pa'i mi dge ba'i las ji snyed
67b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dag kyang gtan du zad cing / ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur la/ ma 'ongs pa'i mi dge ba rnams ni yang ldang bar mi 'gyur ro// glog thob sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa
67b2(dkon brtsegs): tshad med grangs med pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi yang ches snga rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs
67b3(dkon brtsegs): su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchog
67b4(dkon brtsegs): tudu skyes pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams ni 'od zer can zhes bya ba ste/ rgyal po'i grong khyer rab tu bde ba zhes bya ba'i tshal na bzhugs so// de'i tshe
67b5(dkon brtsegs): shan pa 'jigs su rung ba zhes bya ba khro gdum che zhing gsod pa la dga' ba/ bzod pa dang byams pa'i sems med pa/ lag pa khrag gis bskus pa mthong ba thams cad skrag par 'gyur
67b6(dkon brtsegs): ba zhig yod de/ de'i tshe shan pa des glang zhig khang pa'i nang du bcings te/ nang du zhugs nas gsod par byas pa las/ glang des de mthong nas shin tu skrag pas thag pa bcad de bros nas
67b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pa bzhugs pa'i tshal ga la ba der song ngo / / de'i tshe shan pa de'ang mtshon thogs nas phyi bzhin du bsnyags pas/ glang de skrag nas g.yang sa zab mo zhig
68a1(dkon brtsegs): tu lhung ba'i srog can mjug pa mdun zhig sdug bsngal bas sgra phyung ngo / / de'i tshe shan pas glung de mthong nas/ zhe sdang cher skyes te g.yang sa zab mo de nyid du zhug
68a2(dkon brtsegs): nas mtshon thogs te/ gsad par byas pa las mtshon ma btab pa'i bar skabs der// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pa tshal der 'khor mang po brgya
68a3(dkon brtsegs): stong tshad med pas yongs su bskor ba dag la/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/
68a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i rkyen kyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/
68a5(dkon brtsegs): sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / sme sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang //
68a6(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di dag thams cad ni sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig go zhes rgya cher rnam par
68a7(dkon brtsegs): phye ste ston par mdzad pas/ glog thob rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di la ma rig pa'ang 'du byed la mi sems mi rtog la/ 'du byed kyang ma rig pa la mi sems mi rtog go// de bzhin
68b1(dkon brtsegs): du skye ba'ang rga shi la mi sems mi rtog la/ rga shi'ang skye ba la mi sems mi rtog pas/ de ltar na chos thams cad ni rang bzhin dmigs su med pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa/ dran pa
68b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ bdag dang bdag gi ba med pa/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa/ phan tshun gcig gis gcig mi rig pa yin no// so so'i skye bo rnams 'di lta bu'i chos ma thob pa'i
68b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ gzugs ni bdag yin no// bdag ni gzugs rnams dang ldan no// gzugs ni bdag gi yin no zhes 'dzin par byed de/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
68b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i bar la'ang de bzhin no// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di'i dbang gis mi rtag pa la rtag par 'dzin par byed/ sdug bsngal la bde bar 'dzin par
68b5(dkon brtsegs): byed mi sdug pa la sdug pa nyid du 'dzin par byed/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'dzin cing phyin ci log bzhi skyed par byed do// phyin ci log tu lta ba'i phyir ma rig pas rmongs nas/ yang
68b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing / sems kyi rjes su mngon par zhen par gyur pas/ srid pa'i sred pa 'ching ba gcod par mi nus shing / 'khor ba'i 'khor bar rgyun mi 'chad
68b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'bor bar gyur pa yin no/ / mkhas pa dag ni chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid la shin tu legs par rtog par byed pa'i phyir bdag dang / gang zag dang / sems can zhes bya ba nas
69a1(dkon brtsegs): srog ces bya ba'i bar du cung zad tsam yang yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / nu ba dang / 'chi ba dang / gsod pa dang /
69a2(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa byed pa dag kyang mi dmigs so zhes gsungs pa dang // glog thob de'i tshe shan pa 'jigs su rung bas rgyang nas de bzhin gshegs pas chos bshad pa'i sgra thos nas go bar gyur pas
69a3(dkon brtsegs): de ma thag tu gsod pa'i sems nye bar zhi bar gyur nas mtshon cha spangs te g.yang sa nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das de ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
69a4(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos gtugs nas phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la
69a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung nas lam bsgrub par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rigs so// dge slong legs par 'ongs sam zhes gsungs ma thag tu/
69a6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dngos por bsgyur nas rdzogs par bsnyen par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pas/ de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ mthar gyis yongs
69a7(dkon brtsegs): su smin par mdzad cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams rgya cher yang dag par bstan pa 'jigs su rung bas thos pas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas/ sangs rgyas
69b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bstan pa las phyir mi ldog pa thob par gyur to/ / glang de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa des rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos kyi chog ston pa'i gsung sba shin du gya nom pa thos nas/ sems
69b2(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu dga' ba skyes pas/ shi 'phos pa'i 'og tu dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas su skyes nas/ byams pa dang phrad de yang dag pa'i dad pa dang ldan par gyur to// glog
69b3(dkon brtsegs): thob de ltar na sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ni shin tu zab pa dang / rnam par rig par dka' zhing / shes par dka' ba yin te/ de'i phyir glog thob byang chub sems dpa' gang gis
69b4(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar 'dod pas/ sems can gyi dbang po dang / spyod pa dag la shin tu mkhas par byas nas/ sems can thams
69b5(dkon brtsegs): cad la mnyam pa'i sems dang / thogs pa med pa'i sems la rab tu gnas te/ chos thams cad la rtag tu mngon par zhen pa med par bya'o// ci bdog pa'i rnams yongs su spangs
69b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsgrub par bya'o// bzod pa la gnas par bya'o// brtson 'grus bskyed par bya'o// bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag par bya'o//
69b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la so sor brtag par bya'o// glog thob byang chub sems dpa' gang chos drug po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par gyur na/ myur du bla na med
70a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen
70a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes la brten nas mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro/ / glog thob byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi gter gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpas
70a3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs shing / gzod ma nyid nas skye ba med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par mthong ba gang yin pa'o// byang chub sems
70a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni gzugs la mkhas pa thob pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
70a5(dkon brtsegs): chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o// don so so yang dag par rig pa
70a6(dkon brtsegs): ni/ gzugs kyi don rnams la thogs pa med par gyur pa'i phyir ro// gzugs kyi don gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don dam pa gang yin pa'o// don dam pa gang zhe na/ gzugs
70a7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su med pa gang yin pa ste/ don dam pa'i ye shes pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni/ don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni
70b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags nas/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o//
70b2(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs rnams la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi thabs mkhas pas nges pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'byed
70b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de ni/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi chos rnams sems can gyi dbang po ji lta ba
70b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rnam par phye ste ston par byed kyang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing / mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// byang chub
70b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni 'di lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ gzugs kyi chos la rmongs shing mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / 'dun pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtsol ba
70b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i ye shes kyis ci rigs par chos ston par byed kyang / chos kyi dbyings la mtshan nyid gnyis su gyur pa med de/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi bar la'ang de bzhin du
70b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par sbyar te/ glog thob 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi gter zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na/ spyod yul rnams
71a1(dkon brtsegs): la rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can de lta bu dag yongs su gdul bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ de dag gi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag re re la'ang bskal pa 'am/ bskal
71a2(dkon brtsegs): pa las lhag par tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs la mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang / de dag gi mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab la'ang
71a3(dkon brtsegs): 'grib pa med cing chos kyi dbyings dang mi 'bral bar gnyis su med cing dbyer med pa'i rjes su 'brang ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas chos thams
71a4(dkon brtsegs): cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pas 'thob pa'i chos kyi gter ces bya'o/ / chos kyi gter 'dis sems can dag la ci rigs par chos bstan nas/ zad mi shes pa'i chos kyi
71a5(dkon brtsegs): gter phun sum tshogs par gyur te/ 'khor ba'i rgud pa gtan du spong ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gter chen po dang / zad
71a6(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa'i gter dang / kun tu zad mi shes pa'i gter dang / mtha' med pa'i gter rnam pa lnga zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gter 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur na/
71a7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ tshegs chung ngus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
71b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / chos kyi gter bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' glog thob ni gzungs rab tu thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni glog gi 'o/
71b2(dkon brtsegs): zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// lha'i bu sum khri drug stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas bcom
71b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du rtsol ba ma mchis pa'i ye shes zhes gang gsung
71b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i don ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis dge ba'i chos rnams la/ lus dang sems kyi rjes su mthun pas dmigs shing
71b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de ni rtsol ba dang bcas pa zhes bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' gang lus dang sems rab tu dul bar gyur na/ dran pa med pa/ gnas pa med pa/
71b6(dkon brtsegs): rnal 'byor sgom pa'i mtshan ma dang bral bar gyur pa dang / de sngon gyi smon lam dang ye shes yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag mang po rnams
71b7(dkon brtsegs): su rnam pa sna tshogs su ston par byed kyang / chos kyi dbyings la g.yo ba med pa dang / rtag tu chos ston par byed pas chos kyi mtshan ma cung zad kyang med pa dang / bsdu ba'i
72a1(dkon brtsegs): dngos po bzhis sems can yongs su smin par byas kyang / sems can gang yongs su bzlas pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sbyangs kyang /
72a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yongs su dag pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / rtag par sangs rgyas rnams rjes su dran par byed kyang / gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du mi lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun
72a3(dkon brtsegs): tu rgyu bar byed kyang / chos kyi dbyings dang mi 'bral ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes shes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di lta bu'i
72a4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas kyang gang byas pa de dag la mngon par zhen pa'ang med do// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
72a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes 'di bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// brgya byin lha'i dbang po'ang sus
72a6(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi lha rnams dang bcas par steng gi bar snang las me tog man da ra ba dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par
72a7(dkon brtsegs): phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// lha'i rnga rnams kyang rang sgra byung bar gyur to// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i snang ba chen pos kyang kun tu snang bar byas te/ sems can gang la
72b1(dkon brtsegs): reg par gyur pa de'i lus kyang shin tu bsil bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' glog thob la bka' stsal pa/ glog thob 'das pa'i de bzhin
72b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang gnas 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu gsungs so/ / ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten
72b3(dkon brtsegs): du 'byung ba'i tshe'ang gnas 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu gsung bar 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na/ da ltar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
72b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad pa'i phyir 'od zer chen po skyed par mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos stan las langs te/ bla gos
72b5(dkon brtsegs): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
72b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ bdag gis ji ltar yongs su gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
72b7(dkon brtsegs): bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mi zad pa'i gter bstan pa zhes bya'o/ / chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes kyang bya ste/ khyod kyis de ltar ming yongs su gzung
73a1(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' glog thob dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / 'khor
73a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la yi rangs te/ mngon par bstod do// 'ab
73a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ mi zad pa'i gter bstan pa'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu pa rdzogs so// /
73a4(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ b+ha dra mA ya kar bya ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//
73a5(dkon brtsegs): bas po gcig pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
73a6(dkon brtsegs): 'da' rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par
73a7(dkon brtsegs): grags pa/ mngon par shes pa thob pa/ gzungs thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul thob pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thong ba lnga stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
73b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsan dan bzang po dang / byang chub sems
73b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha lo sgyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha lo sgyur ba chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpal
73b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzi brjid dang ldan zhing nga ro snyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
73b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po 'od bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi snying po dang /
73b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can kha lo sgyur ba dul ba dang ldan pa dang / byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams
73b6(dkon brtsegs): cad dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
73b7(dkon brtsegs): byin dang yang thabs cig go/ / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang yang thabs cig go// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang yang thabs cig go// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang
74a1(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po du mas kyang yongs su bskor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ni rgyal po
74a2(dkon brtsegs): khab kyi grong khyer chen po la rten cing bzhugs te/ rgyal po dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs kyi mi rnams kyis ni gus
74a3(dkon brtsegs): par byas/ bla mar byas/ bsnyen bkur byas mchod pa byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun
74a4(dkon brtsegs): gsos dang / sman zong ni brnyes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang / snyan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po ni mngon par 'phags te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
74a5(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skye bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang
74a6(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa ste/ thams cad ni mkhyen/ thams cad ni gzigs/ de bzhin gshegs
74a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs bcu dang ni ldan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ni ldan so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ni ldan sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang
74b1(dkon brtsegs): ni ldan/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang ni ldan/ spyan lnga dang ni ldan/ cho 'phrul yang brnyes te/ na
74b2(dkon brtsegs): rjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni brnyes so// bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
74b3(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer dang bcas pa/ grong rdal dang bcas pa/ sa dang bcas pa/ 'gro ba dang bcas pa/ ri rab dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa/ lha'i gnas dang
74b4(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa/ khor yug dang 'obs su bcas pa/ rtswa dang / shing dang / rir bcas pa 'di nam mkha' la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa bas lhag par skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyis 'dzin
74b5(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad do/ / yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po zhes bya ba bstan bcos la shin tu mkhas pa/ gsang sngags la shin tu mkhas pa/
74b6(dkon brtsegs): bzo dang rig pa la 'byams pa/ las kyi mtha' byas zin pa/ rab tu byed pa byas pa/ sgra grags pa/ yul ma ga d+ha na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma ji snyed pa de dag
74b7(dkon brtsegs): gi mchog tu grags pa/ phul du grags pa zhig gnas te/ des yul ma ga d+ha ril gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad 'dun par byas/ rmongs par byas mgo 'khor bar byas nas/
75a1(dkon brtsegs): ya mtshan gyi chos la bkod de/ bden pa mthong ba rnams dang / dad pa dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams ni ma
75a2(dkon brtsegs): gtogs so/ / des sgyu mas rmongs par byed pa'i rig pa'i stobs bskyed pas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa'ang lhag par rnyed do// sgyu ma mkhan bzang
75a3(dkon brtsegs): pos bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang / snyan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhag par mngon par 'phags te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
75a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
75a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa ste/ thams cad ni mkhyen/ thams cad ni gzigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ni ldan
75a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ni ldan/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ni ldan/ byams pa chen po dang
75a7(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang ni ldan/ spyan lnga dang ni ldan/ cho 'phrul yang brnyes te/ kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rjes su
75b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul ni brnyes/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni brnyes so// bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer dang bcas pa/ grong rdal dang bcas pa
75b2(dkon brtsegs): sa dang bcas pa/ 'gro ba dang bcas pa/ ri rab dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang 'ongs su brngas pa/ rtsa dang /
75b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rir bcas pa 'di nam mkha' la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa bas lhag par skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam la 'dzin par mdzad do zhes thos so// thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/
75b4(dkon brtsegs): yul ma ga d+ha ril gyi skye bo thams cad de dag gis 'dun par byas/ rmongs par byas/ mgo 'khor bar byas nas/ ya mtshan gyi chos la bkod de/ bram ze dang khyim bdag chen po
75b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bdag gi ming gis rab tu mgu bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de gcig pu da dung ma bgams/ rmongs param
75b6(dkon brtsegs): byas/ mgo 'khor bar ma byas kyis/ ma la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga la ba der 'gro bar bya'o// song nas kyang bkram par byas te/
75b7(dkon brtsegs): gal te rmongs pa'am/ mgo 'khor bar byas nus pa ldan/ de ldan yul ma ga d+ha thams cad bdag la gcig tu 'dul/ bdag gi rnyeng pa dang bkur sti'ing ches stobs dang ldan par 'gyuraro
76a1(dkon brtsegs): snyam mo/ / de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyal po'i khab kyi gro khyer chen po nas byung
76a2(dkon brtsegs): sde/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // song nas kyang sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma bye ba phrag 'bum pas lhag pa'i
76a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer 'bar ba/ zhal zla ba bye ba phrag 'bum pas lhag par dri ma med pa/ sku shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa/ mdzod spu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od dag pa ltar gsal
76a4(dkon brtsegs): ba/ spyan pad+ma dang ut+pa la sngon po kha bye ba lta bu'i bkrag yod pa/ spyi gtsug tshangs pas kyang bltar mi mthong ba/ 'khor gyi nang na gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu dang
76a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas chos ston pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang de'i sku de lta bu mthong / gsung gi 'phrin las de lta bu thos nas sems dang bar gyur cing de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la
76a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis 'di ci thams cad mkhyen la/ thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa zhig yin nam/ 'on te ma yin pa gam par byas/ gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos
76a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bgam pa'i bsam pas sang gi gdugs chod la spyan 'dren to zhes gsol to// 'di snyam du'ang sems te/ ci 'dis bdag gi sems/
76b1(dkon brtsegs): / shes sam/ 'on te mi shes shig su/ gal te shes na ni der 'ong bar mi 'thun ro// ji ste mi shes na ni des 'ong bar 'gyur rosnyam so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sum mkhan bzang ba
76b2(dkon brtsegs): gdul ba'i dbang du'ang mdzad/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i skye bo phal po che gdul ba'i dbang du'ang mdzad nas/ mkhyen bzhin du sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas
76b3(dkon brtsegs): te/ cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do// de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag rnam par mtho 'tsham pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa la/ 'dir khas len pa dang sbyar/
76b4(dkon brtsegs): na 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'ang ma yin la/ thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin no snyam nas/ de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/
76b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos ni sgyu ma'i
76b6(dkon brtsegs): za ma tog gis dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod snying las chung bar gyis shig dang / ngas
76b7(dkon brtsegs): yun ring po nas spyad pa bsgrubs pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dir dus mkhyen pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang mtho 'tsham par mi nus so//
77a1(dkon brtsegs): mo'u 'gal gyi bu gzhan yang 'dod chags ni mtho 'tsham par byed pa yin/ zhe sdang ni mtho 'tsham par byed pa yin/ gti mug ni mtho 'cham par byed pa yin na/
77a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa ya ngags nyal ba dang bcas te zad bral yongs su gyur/ gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can yin te/ des na de bzhin gshegs pa la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
77a3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyis kyang mtho 'tsham par mi nus so/ / mo'u 'gal gyi bu gzhan yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sgyu ma ni phyogs gcig pa yin pas/ sgyu ma yang dag pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs
77a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgyu ma ni yang dag pa yin te/ des na chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu sems can gyi khams su gdags par 'dogs pa ji snyed pa
77a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sgyu ma 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur kyang / de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro// stong gi char yang
77a6(dkon brtsegs): nye bar mi 'gro/ / bye ba 'bum gyi char yang/ grangs su'ang / char yang / bgrang bar yang / dper yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang
77a7(dkon brtsegs): pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par kun tu ston nus sam/ gsol pa/ ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin
77b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni bzhed na 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed brgyan cing / de thams cad kyang skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam la kun tu ston par mdzad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma ril gyis bstan
77b2(dkon brtsegs): par ni mi 'gyur ro/ / mo'u 'gal gyi bu phyogs bcu na rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang dag yod pa 'di lta ste/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor byed ces bya ba dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su gcod
77b3(dkon brtsegs): byed ces bya ba gang dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yongs su gcod par byed cing / yongs su bcad nas kyang 'jig par byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun tu 'thor
77b4(dkon brtsegs): byed dang / rnam par 'thor byed ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi bar na rgyu ba gang dag yin pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun nas yongs su 'jog pa zhes bya ba srid pa'i rtse mo na rgyu ba gang dag yin pa dang /
77b5(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang rnam par 'jig par byed na/ ri phal pa lta smos kyang ci dgos pa gang dag yin pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'bar byed
77b6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba sreg pa'i bskal pa'i tshe ldang zhing gang gis na me lce de dag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar 'phen par byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par sgrub byed ces bya ba gang gis sreg pa'i bskal pa'i
77b7(dkon brtsegs): me de zhi bar byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu tshim byed ces bya ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sprin gyi dra ba gcig gis kun tu khebs par byed pa dang /
78a1(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi dkyil 'khor chus 'debs zhes bya ba gang gis na/ sreg pa'i bskal pa'i tshe char 'bebs par byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor lhag par skems shes
78a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba gang gis na/ chus 'jig rten lhag par skems par byed pa yod do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu ngas rlung gi dkyil 'khor las brtsams te/ bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las
78a3(dkon brtsegs): lhag par chos bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor las brtsams te chos bstan pa las mtha' thug pa med do/ / mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma
78a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhan bzang pos rlung gi dkyil 'khor de dag gi nang du 'dug par nus sam/ gsol pa/ ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu nga ni rlung gi
78a5(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyi nang du spyod lam bzhis gnas par byed do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad yungs 'bru gcig gi nang du 'jog par mdzad/ 'jug
78a6(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad la/ yungs 'bru de'ang rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur zhing / yungs 'bru de'i nang du rlung gi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad kyang nye bar ston par mdzad la/
78a7(dkon brtsegs): rlung de dag phan tshun thug par yang mi 'gyur/ ltung bar yang mi 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal gyi bu nga ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid de lta bu dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang tshad med pa dang ldan no//
78b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ ngag
78b2(dkon brtsegs): mthun par tshig tu smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed de/ ston pa 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa/ 'di ltar mthu/
78b3(dkon brtsegs): che ba ni bdag cag gis legs par rnyed lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul 'di thos nas mos par bgyid cing / mos par bgyis nas kyang bla na med
78b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags so/ / de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po rgyal po'i khab kyi grong
78b5(dkon brtsegs): khyer chen po ga la ba der song ste/ de nyid kyi nub mo rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po mis gang ba'i phyogs gang na grong khyer thams cad kyi btsog dgu dang / mi mthun pa thams cad
78b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bab pa dang 'byung ba'i sa phyogs der 'khor gyi khyams chen po dar gyi lda ldi dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas brgyan pa/ gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/
78b7(dkon brtsegs): me tog bkram pa/ spos bzang po mchog gis bdugs pa/ steng du bla re brel pa zhig mngon par sprul to// 'khor gyi khyams de'i nang du'ang rin po che'i shing ljon pa me tog dang 'bras
79a1(dkon brtsegs): bur bcas pa brgya stong mngon par sprul to/ / rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyi drung du'ang seng ge'i khri ras bcos bu du mas g.yogs pa/ rin po
79a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mngon par sprul to/ / seng ge'i khri'i g.yas g.yon du'ang rin po che'i shing ljon pa me tog dang 'bras bur bcas pa bzhi bzhi mngon par sprul to//
79a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'ang mngon par sprul to// rim gro byed pa gos dkar po bgos pa/ rgyan thams
79a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis brgyan pa lnga brgya'ang mngon par sprul to/ / sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bkod pa de lta bu sprul ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la rgyal po chen po bzhi lus chen por sprul
79a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa ga la ba der song nas/ sku ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sang
79a6(dkon brtsegs): gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang / khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di mngon par sprul pa ni rnyed pa legs par
79a7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed do/ / bzang po gzhan yang kho bo cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa dang / khyod la btang ba'i phyir 'khor gyi
79b1(dkon brtsegs): khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu gnyis pa cung zhig ston par byed na/ kho bo cag la gnang bar gyis shig/ de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ rgyal po chen po
79b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi la gnang ba dang / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i 'khor gyi khyams de lta bu zhig mngon par sprul to// de nas yang
79b3(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu sum khri dang lhan cig bzang po'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa ga la ba der song nas/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po khyod
79b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di mngon par sprul
79b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ / bzang po kho bo cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa dang / khyod la btang ba'i phyir
79b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu gnyis pa cung zhig ston par byed na/ kho bo cag la gnang bar gyis shig/ de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ lha rnams
79b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang po brgya byin la gnang ba dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad par bya ba sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi khang bzangs rnam
80a1(dkon brtsegs): par rgyal byed dang / yongs 'du sa brtol bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'khor gyi khyams gcig mngon par sprul te/ 'khor gyi khyams des sgyu ma mkhan
80a2(dkon brtsegs): bzang po'i bkod pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bkod pa'ang mog mog por byas par gyur to// de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po 'di snyam du sems te/ d+ha'i bu 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang bcom
80a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la rim gro bya ba dang / mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson te lhags pa dang sbyar na/ sems can 'di ni tha mal pa ma yin pas/ bdag gis sems can mchog de
80a4(dkon brtsegs): lta bu la mtho btsams par gyur na mi rung gis/ bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag dor gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po sprul pa'i bya ba de dag 'dor bar byed/
80a5(dkon brtsegs): dag med par byed do// gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa thams cad kyis med par byed cing mi snang bar bya bar brgal kyang zhal zas dang / rim gro pa dang / 'khor gyi khyams kyi
80a6(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa dang / seng ge'i khri'ang de kho na bzhin du snang ste/ gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa thams cad kyis med par bya ma nus pa dang / de shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ 'di snyam
80a7(dkon brtsegs): du sems te/ bdag sngon chad ni 'dod na sgyu ma ston par yang byed/ 'dod na sgyu ma med par yang byed na/ da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du gnas kyi bkod pa byas pa med par byed ma nus so//
80b1(dkon brtsegs): snyas so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sems kyis rnam par rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad
80b2(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so/ / bzang po ji ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir gnas kyi bkod pa byas pa 'di med par bya ma nus pa de bzhin du/ bzang po gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la sems bskyed
80b3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'ga' tsam thob pa de dag gi sems bskyed pa de'ang med par mi 'gyur te/ de dag gi de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang
80b4(dkon brtsegs): po dga' mgu yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing yid bde bar gyur nas/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la gdugs tshod la bab pa skul bar byed do// bcom ldan 'das gdugs
80b5(dkon brtsegs): chod lags pa'i dus dang tshod la bab na/ da gdugs tshod la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sham thabs mnabs/ chos
80b6(dkon brtsegs): gos gsol/ lhung bzed thogs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dpal gshegs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs nas/ sgyu ma
80b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhan bzang po'i 'khor gyi khyams gal ba der gshegs te/ gang gis na snga ma mkhan bzang po'ang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gis sprul pa'i bkod pan bzhugs so snyam du shes/ rgyal po chen
81a1(dkon brtsegs): po bzhi'ang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag cag gis sprul pa'i bkod pa na bzhugs so snyam du shes/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gis
81a2(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa'i bkod pa na bzhugs so snyam du shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/ / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po de na gzhan mu stegs
81a3(dkon brtsegs): can dang / spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gang dag gis thos pa de dag ni ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ 'khor gyi khyams der song ste/ de ring dge sbyong go'u ta ma la
81a4(dkon brtsegs): mtho 'tsham pa blta bar bya'o snyam mo/ / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po de na dad pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni
81a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der dong nas/ de ring de bzhin gshegs pa la bgam pa'ang mnyan par bya/ cho 'phrul chen po'ang blta bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas sgyu ma mkhan
81a6(dkon brtsegs): bzang pos nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / khengs pa nges par bcom nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
81a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnam par mtho ba tsam pa'i bsam pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa 'dir gshegs su gsol ba gang lags pa'i nongs pa 'chags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang
81b1(dkon brtsegs): zhal zas sprul pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa sprul pa dang / seng ge'i khri sprul pa dang / 'khor gyi khyams sprul pa de la bdag 'di snyam du sems can mchog de lta bu de la bslus par
81b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur na mi rung gis/ bya ba 'di ma mchis par bgyi snyam ste shin tu spangs kyang ma mchis par ma btub/ gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa thams cad kyis kyang ma mchis
81b3(dkon brtsegs): par bkyi rngo ma thog nas/ zhal zas dang rim gro bgyid pa dang / seng ge'i khri dang / 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa'ang de kho na bzhin du gda' 'o// de skad ces gsol
81b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzang po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa'ang 'di lta ste/ las kyi sgyu mas
81b5(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa yin no/ / bzang po dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di'ang 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sgyu mas sprul pa yin te/ bzang po nga'ang 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi sgyu mas sprul pa yin no// bzang po stong gsum gyi stong
81b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang 'di lta ste/ sna tshogs mngon par 'grub par byed pa'i sgyu mas sprul pa yin no// bzang po chos thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ rkyen tshogs pa'i sgyu mas sprul pa
81b7(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / bzang po 'on kyang de'i dus la bab par shes na/ ji ltar sprul pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / bldag pa dag khyod kyis phul cig/ de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos
82a1(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa'i rim gro pa de dag dang / rgyal po chen po bzhidag dang / lha'i dbang po bcu byin 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lhan cig sprul pa'i bzab bdang / @#
82a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / myang ba dang / bldag pa des/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun yang dag par rim par byed do// de nas de'i tshe gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos tshigs su
82a3(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di smras so/ / sbyin pa 'di ni ci zhig 'dra// len par byed pa ci 'dra bar// de 'dra'i chos nyid thob 'gyur bar// yon ni rnam par sbyong gyur cig/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/
82a4(dkon brtsegs): gdan ni ji ltar bshams pa dang // de la gang dag bzhugs pa rnams// mi mnyam ma mchis mtshungs pa ste// mchod sbyin dge ba bla na med// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ rim gro byed pa'i
82a5(dkon brtsegs): sems gang dang / / len par byed pa'i sems gang dang // sbyin par byed pa ji lta bar// yon ni myur du sbyong bar shog/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ gtong med sbyin pa 'di btang ba//
82a6(dkon brtsegs): len pa med pa rnams kyis blangs// gang dag 'dir ni gshegs pa rnams// de dag yon sbyong byed pa yin// kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'di ni nam mkha'i sbyin pa ste// bsam gyis mi khyab
82a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis spyad/ / gang dag sems lus grol ba de// 'jig rten na ni yon sbyong mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od tog gis smras pa/ ji lta bur na sgyu ma'i mkhan// bzang pos bkod
82b1(dkon brtsegs): pa sprul byas pa/ / dngos kun de dang 'dra ba ste// byis pas de ni mi rtogs so// byang chub sems dpa' 'od bkod pas smras pa/ ji ltar gdun dang ljon shing dag/ du ma mngon par sprul
82b2(dkon brtsegs): byas pa/ / yid kyi sgyu ma lta bur stong // 'di la khyad par 'ga' yang med// byang chub sems dpa' seng ges smras pa/ seng ge'i sgra ni ma thos na// wa ni nags tshal nang na sgrogs
82b3(dkon brtsegs): de yis seng ge'i sgra thos nas/ / phyogs bcu dag tu 'bros par 'gyur// de bzhin sgyu mkhan bzang po yang // de bzhin gsheg pa ma mthong na// mu stegs nang du rgyal ba bas// bdag nyid
82b4(dkon brtsegs): / mchog ces sgrog par byed// bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa yi// sgyu mas sdu ma rdzogs byed pa// tshad mar gyur pa gsung na ni// de la bdud kyis gting mi dpogs// byang chub sem
82b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' seng ge'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ zhal zas 'di ni sprul pa ste// bsnyen bkur byed pa'ang sprul pa yin// spyod par byed pa'ang sprul pa ste// sbyin pa dge babla na med// byang chub
82b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' byams pas smras pa/ me ni mar dang til mar gyis// phyi phyir zhing ni rab tu mched// de bzhin bzang po'i sgyu ma yis// sangs rgyas sgyu ma nges par bstan// 'jam dpal gcon
82b7(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pas smras pa/ ji ltar 'di na sngon gnas pa/ thams cad byed pa med pa ltar// de bzhin chos rnams thams cad ni// sngon gyi mtha' nas rtag tu mnyam/ sa
83a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po shin du gdul ba'i dbang du mdzad nas/ khyim bdag gcig sprul te 'khor gyi khyams de'i nang du zhugs nas/ sgyu ma mkhan
83a2(dkon brtsegs): bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bzang po ci byed/ smras pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di gdugs tshod gsol bar byed do// des smras pa/ bzang po thong de skad ma zer/ de bzhin
83a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khab na gdugs tshod gsol zhing bzhugs so/ / sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs
83a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig du rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khab na gdugs tshod gsol bar mthong ngo / / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gnyis pa zhig mngon par sprul nas de nang du/
83a5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs te/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po ci byed/ smras pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di gdugs tshod gsol bar byed do// des smras pa/ thong de skad ma zer
83a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu kun tu rgyu'i srang na bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing bzhugs so/ / sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin
83a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu kun tu rgyu'i srang na bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba mthong ngo / / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gzhan zhig sprul te/ de nang du zhugs nas/
83b1(dkon brtsegs): ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po ci byed/ smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dir gdugs tshod gsol bar byed do// des smras pa/ bzang po thong de skad ma
83b2(dkon brtsegs): zer/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni 'tsho byed kyi skyed mos tshal na 'khor bzhi la chos ston cing bzhugs so// sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa 'tsho/
83b3(dkon brtsegs): byed kyi skyed mos tshal na 'khor bzhi la chos ston par mthong ngo // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sgyu ma mkhan bzang po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang
83b4(dkon brtsegs): po la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bzang po ci byed/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di gdugs tshod gsol bar byed do// des smras pa/ bzang po thong de skad ma zer/ de bzhin gshegs
83b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas na shing yongs 'du'i drung na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la chos ston cing bzhugs so/ / bzang pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sum cu rtsa gsum
83b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas na shing yongs 'du'i drung na chos ston par mthong ngo / / de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos shing ljon pa sprul pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi lo ma thams
83b7(dkon brtsegs): cad dang / me tog thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba mthong ngo // sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos seng ge'i
84a1(dkon brtsegs): khri sprul pa gang dag yin pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis seng ge'i khri sprul pa gang dag yin pa de thams cad la'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan
84a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis brgyan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba mthong ngo // rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ni rtsig pa'am/ khyim mam/ khang bzang ngam/ srang ngam/
84a3(dkon brtsegs): lam po che ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
84a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi spyan snga na'ang / sgyu ma mkhan bzang po bdag nyid phyag 'tshal nas nyes pa 'chags par mthong zhing / de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i mig lam na gang cung zad ci snang ba thams
84a5(dkon brtsegs): cad de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs pa gzhan cung zad kyang ma mthong nas/ de tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde bar gyur to// de dga' ba dang /

84b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs kyi rdzu 'phrul de la mos/ / bdag gis sngon bslabs sgyu ma'i sa ma lags// 'dzam bu'i gling na bdag 'dra med snyam na// de ring rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul 'di mthong na// 'di /
84b2(dkon brtsegs): yi grangs dang char yang ma spyod do// bdag gi sha yi mig gis gang mthong ba// thams cad rgyal ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku// chos kyi rgyal po la ni 'di dag zhus//

84b4(dkon brtsegs): par gzung ba 'di/ / kun tu spyan gyis bdag la bka' stsol cig/ de ring 'jig rten mgon la bag ma bgyis pa'i// nongs pa gang lags deng 'dir kun tu 'chag
84b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag sems can mchog la gus mi gnas/ / sems can de dag rgyal ba'i bde las nyams// bdag la lha dang brgya byin tshangs pa dang // 'khor 'dus gyur pa
84b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag kun gson cig/ sems can thams cad rab tu dgrol slad du// byang chub sems ni bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// bdag gis sems can thams cad mgron du

85a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'dra mthong gyur cing / / bde bar gshegs bka' yid 'ong ye shes dang // chags pa med pa'i spyod mchog thos nas ni// su zhig dag pa'i rgyu
85a2(dkon brtsegs): sems skyed mi bgyid/ / byang chub sems mkhas ji ltar spyad pa yi// byang chub lam ni bdag la bshad du gsol// gang la nyan thos rnams kyis mi dpogs pa'i//

85b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar shin tu nges par bsams yid dang / / nyon mongs bdud kyi 'ching bas mi thub lags// ji ltar dang ldan don ni sems bgyid cing // sems kyis sems can rnams ni

86b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bar ma yin sems dang ni/ / rnam shes yid kyis rab du phye ma yin// chos nyid gang yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// dus gsum stong zhing mtshan yang ma skyes pa/

86b6(dkon brtsegs): grol ye shes mthong zhing stobs dang ni/ / rgyal ba'i yon tan kun gyis mnyam pa yin// de dag stong don go 'phang gnas par mnyam// thams cad chags pa med pa'i chos nyid
86b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas/ / kun kyang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rnam par grol// de dag 'byung ba med par 'byung ba yin// bzang po rgyal ba gcig la mchod byed na// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la ni mchod
87a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ / 'di ltar de dgang yi chos dbyings dang // tha dad bya ba nam yang yod ma yin// de dag thams cad yon pa zhes sbyong bar mdzad// kun la
87a2(dkon brtsegs): phul ba'ang 'bras bu che bar 'gyur/ / de kun chos nyid dag pa mnyam pa brnyes// sangs rgyas rnams la tha dad bya ba'ang med// rgyal ba yang dag gang yin bshad bya yin/

87a5(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa med/ / des na bltar med ngo bo de dag snang // rnam par bltas na gnas pa yod ma yin// ji ltar bzang pos rgyal ba mthong ba dang // ji ltar phyogs su mngon par sprul

87b1(dkon brtsegs): ni brten nas shes/ / byed pa med cing byed pa po las 'das// ming du 'dzin pas stong par rab tu ston// gang gis rgyu dang byed po rkyen mi shes// des ni chags bral gyur pa
87b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyang shes/ / 'dod chags bral ba'i chos ni shes gyur na// des ni rnam dag mig gis sangs rgyas mthong // yang de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag brjod de bstan pa na/ sgyu ma

87b7(dkon brtsegs): khyams 'di rgyan gyis brgyan bzhin du dgung bdun du gnas shing mi gda' bar mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi khyam

88b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa dang / gnas yongs su dag pa dang / shes pa yo
88b7(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa dang / skye ba yongs su dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni gang la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting mi dpogs pa'i byang
89a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam gtan zlog pa dang / sems kyis rnam par 'byed pa dang / sems can rnams la snying
89a2(dkon brtsegs): rje che ba dang / spobs pa dang skad sna tshogs pa nyid de/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'phags pa'i spyod pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
89a3(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa na gnas pa dang / 'du 'ji la mi dga' ba dang / de na gnas nas sems can rnams la byams pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro bar shes pa ste/ bzhi
89a4(dkon brtsegs): po de dag yin no/ / bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sri zhu che zhing gus pa la gnas pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' lus dang srog
89a5(dkon brtsegs): la mi lta ba dang / sems rtag tu dga' ba dang / nga rgyal dang dregs pa spong ba dang / ji skad smra ba de bzhin du sgrub pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos
89a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang ldan na spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dus shes pa dang / chod shes pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / yang dag pa nyid de/ bzhi po de dag yin no//
89a7(dkon brtsegs): bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na the tsom med pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'gyod pa kun nas ldang ba rnam par gnon pa dang / mkhas pa dang shes rab chen po la bsnyen
89b1(dkon brtsegs): bkur byed pa dang / thos pa'i don sems pa dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng zhing / gleng ba gang yin pa'ang byams pas gleng gi/ skyon gcor byed pas ma yin pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no//
89b2(dkon brtsegs): bzang po byang chub sems dpa' phan yon bzhi po 'di dag mthong na/ thos pa tshol bar byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag dang gzhan gyi shes rab sbyong ba dang / phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa rnam
89b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi the tsom gcod pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa zad mi shes pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
89b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi mang du thos pa'i snying po yin no/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ thos nas chos bye brag tu shes pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no// thos nas bya ba ma yin pa mi byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po
89b5(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / thos nas gzhan la ston par byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no// thos nas don de nyid rnam par grol ba 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub la
89b6(dkon brtsegs): gtong bar byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin te/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' chos ston par byed pa'i phan yon yin te/ bzhi gang
89b7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ las byas nas zas la yongs su spyod pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams rnyed pa dang
90a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi phyogs mthu chung bar byed pa dang / chos 'dod pa'i lha rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing / de dag gis bsrungs pas bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa ste/
90a2(dkon brtsegs): bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ston par byed pa'i phan yon no// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na gzhan dag la chos ston par byed cing / 'di'i tshig gi/
90a3(dkon brtsegs): lam gzung bar 'os par yang 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / ngang tshul can bzang zhing mnyen pa dang / bdag nyid kyi chos sgrub pa ste/ bzhi po
90a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag yin no/ / bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shes kyi khe las 'byol zhing zang zing med par chos ston pa'ang yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba la 'jigs
90a5(dkon brtsegs): pa skyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang 'du 'dzi don du mi gnyer ba dang / pha rol rjes su srung ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po
90a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba dang / byas pa la lan du phan 'dogs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan yang byang chub yang
90a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par len du 'jug pa dang / las byas pa chud mi gzon pa dang / bdag nyid la byams pa ltar gzhan la yang byams pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i rtsal don du gnyer ba ste/ bzhi po
90b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sems can rnams la mdza' bshes mi phyed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bzod pa'i stobs kyi go bgos pa dang /
90b2(dkon brtsegs): lan du phan 'dogs par cung zad kyang re ba med pa dang / snying rje chen po mi 'dor ba dang / log par zhugs pa rnams mi spong ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na//
90b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la mdza' bshes mi phyed par 'gyur ro// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par bya ba'i grogs po yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyor ba
90b4(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / gang dag 'di'i byang chub nye bar rton par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no//
90b5(dkon brtsegs): bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi dge ba'i grogs po yin par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ theg pa dman pa ston pa dang / byang chub kyi
90b6(dkon brtsegs): sems la 'dun pa zlog par byed pa dang / gang dag bsten na mi dge ba'i chos 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos rnams las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi pa
90b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag yin no/ / bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang phrad par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dran pa rtse gcig pa dang /
