91a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa yang dang yang du sgrogs pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas
91a2(dkon brtsegs): smon lam 'debs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpas phan yon bzhi po 'di dag mthong na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar spro bar
91a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yon gnas mchog la mchod pa 'gyur ba dang / bdag mthong nas sems can gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin ga
91a4(dkon brtsegs): pa legs par mchod na byang chub kyi sems brtan par 'gyur ba dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa mngon sum du mthong na dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba
91a5(dkon brtsegs): stebazang po byang chub sems dpas phan yon bzhi po de dag mthong na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar spro bar 'gyur ro// bzang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas don gyi
91a6(dkon brtsegs): dbang bzhi mthong na bslab pa lhur len par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ngan 'gro las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / bde 'gro 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la gus
91a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang
91b1(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang / sems can thams cad la mnyam par sbyor ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rgol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa mnyam pa la mi skrag pa ste/
91b2(dkon brtsegs): bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
91b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ma yin pa mi spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi spong ba dang / lta ba bag la nyal ba dang bcas pa yang dag par 'joms pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni/
91b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du 'ji
91b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / sems kyi rnyog pa med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar rton pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs
91b6(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyes na byang chub kyi sems mngon du byed pa dang /
91b7(dkon brtsegs): nang du yang dag 'jog pa la sgrib pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dag la 'dris par byed pa dang / nyes pa la mi 'jug pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
92a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin no/ / bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems skye ba bzlog par bya ba yin te/ bzhi
92a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dag la ma mos pa dang / dgongs pa dag la mi dka' ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par 'du mi byed
92a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems skye ba bzlog par bya ba yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis nges par
92a4(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can 'ga'i don gyi phyir yang bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar thug par 'khor ba na 'khor bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa
92a5(dkon brtsegs): dang po yin no/ / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams kyi shes par bya zhing / de dag gi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma
92a6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa shes par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa gnyis pa yin no/ / bdag gis mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs shing dge ba'i
92a7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad dang ldan par byas nas/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ bdud gyi dpung pham par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
92b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa gsum pa yin no/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig gcig gis go bar byas te chos
92b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa bzhi pa yin te/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis nges par bsam pa yin no// bzang
92b3(dkon brtsegs): po chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud 'dul ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa dang / rdul bzhin du sbyor ba dang / chos thams
92b4(dkon brtsegs): cad la rnam par mi rtog pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad la mi gnas pa ste/ bzang po chos bzhi po de dag ni bdud 'dul ba yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
92b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi don sems pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gang zag med pa'i phyir chos rnams brten nas skye ba yin gyi/ chos 'ga' yang rgyu med par ni mi skye ba dang / brten nas skyes pa'i chos gang
92b6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang byang chub kyi phyir chud mi za ba ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don sems pa yin no// bzang po
92b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can rnams mi gtong ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sngon gyi smon lam mi 'dor ba dang / yongs su skyo ba bzod pa dang
93a1(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / / smra ba'i dngos pos sdud pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs
93a2(dkon brtsegs): su smin par byed pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / yongs su smin pa la chos ston pa yongs su gtong ba dang / dus dus su skul bas
93a3(dkon brtsegs): dran par byed pa yongs su gtong ba dang / bdag nyid kyi bde ba spangs nas/ gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ston pa dang yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems
93a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi yongs su smin par byed pa yin no/ / bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ ma bsdus pa sdud par byed pa la mi 'jigs pa yin te/ bzhi gang
93a5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu la'ang mos pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzhan gyi don byed par spro ba dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / nges pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
93a6(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad la don du gnyer ba med pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems
93a7(dkon brtsegs): can gyi spyod pa la 'jug pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa thob pa dang / ye shes thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin chen por gyur pa tshad med pa la 'jug pa dang / rnam pa
93b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid sgom zhing rnam par grol ba dang ma 'dres pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ thabs la
93b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems bskyed pa thams cad la byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ste/ tha na nyon mongs pa'i sems la'ang rung na/ dge ba'i
93b3(dkon brtsegs): sems la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa dang / sems can thams cad chos kyi snod nyid yin par lta ba dang / ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud pas chos thams cad log pa nyid du nges pa
93b4(dkon brtsegs): yin par lta ba dang / rnam par grol bar 'dod pas snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i 'du shes sgom par byed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos
93b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa sgom pa yin no// bzhi
93b6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab par bya'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad bsngal bar bya'o snyam du byams pa skom
93b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad bskul bar bya'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam du byams bsgom
94a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ bzang po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa sgom pa yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying
94a2(dkon brtsegs): rje yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ngan song du skyes pa rnams bde 'gro'i lam la dgod pa'i snying rje dang / sdig pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba'i snying rje dang / thag
94a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dman pa la mos pa rnams theg pa chen po yang dag par len du 'jug pa'i snying rje dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam pa'i snying rje ni bzhi pa yin te/ bzhi po
94a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag yin no/ / bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus dang sems yang ba dang / sgyu ma'i rang bzhin
94a5(dkon brtsegs): du rnam par 'byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la gus pa dang rim gro'i sems bskyed pa dang / zhi gnas la rtse gcig tu gyur pas rnam par g.yeng ba med pa yin no// bzang po byang
94a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ so so yang dag par rig pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la mi rton pa yin/ chos la rton pa yin gyi
94a7(dkon brtsegs): gang zag la mi rton pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa'i nges pa'i tshig dang / yi ge mi zad par shes nas chags pa med cing thogs pa med par ston pas ston par byed pa ste/ bzhi po
94b1(dkon brtsegs): dag yin no/ / bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gzungs 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mang du thos pas ngoms mi shes pa dang / mang du thos pa rnams
94b2(dkon brtsegs): la chos bzhin du gus par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / rtag tu gzhan dag la chos ston par brtson pa dang / tshig dang yi ge thams cad gtan la dbab pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs
94b3(dkon brtsegs): te gsungs pa la 'jug pa yin no/ / bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bzod pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang /
94b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dang / yongs su mi skyo ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ spobs pa dag pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos smra ba
94b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag gis bshad pa dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par chos nyan pa dang / thos pas khengs pa med pa dang / thos pa nyung ngu rnams
94b6(dkon brtsegs): la rnyas par mi byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsgyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang
94b7(dkon brtsegs): gti mug bskur ba dang / nyan thos las bsgyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas las bsgyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos la 'du shes bsgyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po
95a1(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don zab mo la sbyor ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar rtogs par byed pa
95a2(dkon brtsegs): dang dgongs pa rtogs par byed pa dang / bdag gi ngo bo nyid rtogs par byed pa dang / 'di ltar stong pa'i don du chos de dag thams cad don gcig par rtogs par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni
95a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don zab mo la sbyor ba yin no/ / bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ smon lam 'grub par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims
95a4(dkon brtsegs): dang bslab pa yongs su dag pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba dang / g.yo sgyu med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa la sems dbang byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems
95a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi smon lam 'grub par 'gyur ba'o/ / bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis 'phags shing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur
95a6(dkon brtsegs): tebazhi gang zhe na/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa gcig gi nang du pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan thams cad kyang sdud par byed pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems can gcig gi
95a7(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin rtogs pas/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can thams cad kyang shes pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas chos rnam par dag pa gcig gi tshul rtogs pas/ chos gzhan dag kyi
95b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa'ang shes pa dang / chos nyid yin pas sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig tu mos pa ste/ bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ pha rol
95b2(dkon brtsegs): du phyin pa thams cad kyis 'phags shing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa 'di bshad pa na/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po mi skye ba'i chos la
95b3(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa thob nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde bar gyur nas/ dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis shing ta la bdun srid tsam gyi steng gi
95b4(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' la 'phags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer grangs med dpag tu med pa bkye bas
95b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od zer des khyab par byas nas/ slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ chos
95b6(dkon brtsegs): gos phrag pa gcig du bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
95b7(dkon brtsegs): to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni rgyu ma mchis pa dang / rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de'i
96a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to/ / ye shes 'byung gnas gzi brjid gzhal yas shes rab grags// 'jig rten gsum du yon tan pha rol phyin brnyes
96a2(dkon brtsegs): grags/ / rgyal ba rang byung gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan pa// mi yi dbang pos de ni bdag la bka' stsal gsol// phyogs rnams na ni 'gro bar sems can ji snyed gnas// de dag kun
96a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams dang ni/ / dman dang mchog dang tha ma bar ma rgyu ldan mkhyen// ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa bdag la bstan du gsol// lha dang de bzhin zhugs 'bar sgra ni gang lags
96a4(dkon brtsegs): dang mi 'am ci dang mi dang brgya byin lha min dang / / mkha' lding lto 'phye tshangs pa'i sgra dang sgra gzhan rnams// sangs rgyas rdul bral gsung sgra'i char yang ga la spyod// 'od bzang
96a5(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma'i 'od dang nor bu'i 'od rnams dang / / brgya byin 'od dang tshangs pa'i 'od rnams ji snyed pa// ji ltar sangs rgyas 'od kyis khyab par gda' ba ltar// 'od rnams de dag thams cad rnam par
96a6(dkon brtsegs): gsal ma lags/ / sangs rgyas zhing de zab mo'i chos ni rjes su thob// stong pa bdag med sems can gang zag med mkhyen nas// yod dang med pa'i mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs
96a7(dkon brtsegs): nas su/ / dus gsum chu zla 'dra bar rab tu mkhyen pa'o// deng 'dir su zhig theg pa'i mchog la sems bdud de// su zhig sangs rgyas rigs dang chos kyi rigs la gnas// su
96b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig dkon mchog gsum po rgya cher skyed par bgyid/ / gang gi ched du 'dzum pa mdzad pa legs par gsungs// gal te rgyal ba nyan thos rnams la don ldan gsungs// de tshe bde gshes
96b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa zhabs kyi pus mor nub/ / gal te rkyen gyi theg pa gsung na phrag par nub// gang tshe sangs rgyas theg gsung de tshe spyi bor nub// ji ltar khyod kyis 'od zer 'bum snyed
96b3(dkon brtsegs): rab btang ba/ / bde bar gshegs kyi gtsug tu nub par gyur las na// phan mdzad lha yi lha ste phan pa mdzad pa po// 'dir ni sangs rgyas theg par lung ston dogs ma mchis
96b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyed kyis rigs kyi bu bzang po mthong ngam/ gsol pa
96b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ / bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu bzang po 'di bskal pa dgu khri nyis stong na/ bskal pa legs par sprul pa la/ 'jig rten gyi
96b6(dkon brtsegs): khams bkod pa chen por de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ kun
96b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba de ni 'byor par 'gyur/ sa
97a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / mi dang skye bo mang pos gang bar 'gyur zhing / lag mthil ltar mnyam pa dang /
97a2(dkon brtsegs): ka tsa lin de ltar reg na 'jam pa dang / me tog gi shing ljon pas brgyan pa dang / rol mo sna tshogs sgrogs pa dang / spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi
97a3(dkon brtsegs): 'chad par gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / da dan bsgreng bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo bza' ba dang btung ba ni dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi longs spyod
97a4(dkon brtsegs): lhultar bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub ste/ mi de dag gi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa ni de lta bur 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen po
97a5(dkon brtsegs): de rtag tu bkod pa thams cad nye bar ston par byed de/ des na 'jig rten gyi khams de bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes
97a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad kyang rgya chen po la mos pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag tu 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po'i tshe
97a7(dkon brtsegs): tshad ni lo khrir 'gyur ro/ / yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos lo bye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul
97b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyal po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de'i tshe yang / byang chub sems dpa' sgra rnam par grags pa 'di nga'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
97b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kun gyi khyab bdag ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgra rnam par grags pa lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'o// de
97b3(dkon brtsegs): nas rigs kyi bu bzang po bar snang de las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
97b4(dkon brtsegs): de slan chad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum phrag du ma dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// de bzhin
97b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin nyid las slar ma log pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / dbyer ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma tshang ba ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /
97b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi rtog pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / mngon par 'du bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid gsung ba bzhin du
97b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ad rgya ma mtshal/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ rigs kyi bu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjes su chos
98a1(dkon brtsegs): bam ci na/ khyod ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid gsung ba ltar khyod de skad smra/ bzang pos smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyang
98a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid thob pa yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa nyid du thugs su chud de/
98a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid dbyer med pa gang yin pa der kho bo'ang chud cing / ji ltar kho bo chung pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang chud la/ ji ltar sems can thams cad chud pa de bzhin du chos
98a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang chud pa'i phyir te/ btsun pa kun dka' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin no// btsun pa kun dga' bo gnyis su med pa ni gang na ku
98a5(dkon brtsegs): tu shes pa med pa nyid dang / yongs su shes pa med pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes yongs su shes pa'i shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas
98a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu bzang po ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mgo rmongs par bgyid pa ste/ sngon
98a7(dkon brtsegs): yang sgyu ma'i chos nyid kyis mgo rmongs par bgyis so/ / da yang shes rab dang ye shes kyis mgo rmongs par bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi spobs pa ni
98b1(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu lags pa'i slad du'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzang po khyod lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mgo rmongs par
98b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa bden nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar mgo rmongs pa mdzad pa de bzhin du bdag kyang mgo rmongs par bgyid lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
98b3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bdag med pa nyid kyis sems can du tha snyad btags te chos ston pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa nyid kyis gang zag tu chos ston pa 'di ni mgo rmongs par bgyid pa chen po
98b4(dkon brtsegs): lags pa'i slad du'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pas ni byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs nas/ chos 'ga' yang 'chi 'pho ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba ma gzigs mod kyi/ 'chi
98b5(dkon brtsegs): 'pho ba dang / 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i chos ston par yang mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par gsung ba bka' stsol ba lta lha dang bcas
98b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten gyi yul ga la lags/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod
98b7(dkon brtsegs): ji skad smra ba de kho na bzhin te/ 'di lta ste/ bdag med pa nyid kyis sems can du tha snyad btags te/ chos ston pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa nyid kyis gang zag
99a1(dkon brtsegs): tu chos ston pa 'di ni mgo rmongs pa chen po yin no/ / de bzhin gshegs pas ni byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs nas/ chos 'ga' yang 'chi 'pho ba'am
99a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba ma gzigs mod kyi/ 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i chos ston par yang mdzad de/ 'di la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 'am/ yongs
99a3(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir chos bstan pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang med do/ / de nas rigs kyi bu bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la rab tu 'byung bar gsol pa dang //
99a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod kyis rigs kyi bu bzang po rab tu phyung zhig/ de nas byams pas rigs kyi bu bzang po rab tu phyung
99a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bsnyen par byas so/ / rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni kha rog
99a6(dkon brtsegs): dang rtags dang / tshul gyis rab tu 'byung ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mtshan ma thams cad la'ang chags pa ma
99a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis la/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du khams gsum na'ang gnas na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rab tu byung ba lags so// yang de'i tshe bstan pa
99b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags lnga stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// dge slong nyis brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las
99b2(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par grol lo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i
99b3(dkon brtsegs): ming ci lags/ 'di'i ming ji skad ces gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ rim gyis byang chub
99b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar 'dod pa dang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi
99b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa bya bar 'dod pa des/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya// bklag par bya/ gzhan dag la'ang bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
99b6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo gang gis 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rab tu bstan pa des ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yin/
99b7(dkon brtsegs): des ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'ang byas pa yin no// kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /
100a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lkog shig/ kun chub par
100a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis shig/ kun dga' bo chos gang dag gis byang chub yang dag par 'byung ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di la'ang mang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni/ theg pa chen po 'di las
100a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu ston te/ des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub la yang dag par byung ba zhes bya'o// kun dga' bo khyod mos par bya'o// khong du chud par bya'o//
100a4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gleg bam du byed pa 'am/ lus la bsrel ba de'i lus la de bzhin gshegs pa yod pa yin na/ gang dag gis thos nas de bzhin nyid
100a5(dkon brtsegs): du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rigs kyi bu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sngon gyi dge pa'i
100a6(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba skul ba zhes bgyi lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa thams
100a7(dkon brtsegs): cad mngon sum du gyur pa'i slad du lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ rigs kyi bu bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
100b1(dkon brtsegs): bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
100b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya ste/ 'dus
100b3(dkon brtsegs): pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so/ / // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi nA mri tra dang / pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur
100b4(dkon brtsegs): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ shr-i ka bzhi brgya sum cu/ bam po gcig dang shr-i ka brgya sum cu'o// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya
100b5(dkon brtsegs): ma hA pra ti hAr+ya u pa de sho nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po/
100b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
100b7(dkon brtsegs): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas
101a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu ded dpon zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa'ang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ dug go/
101a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa cho 'phrul du zhig gis sems can rnams 'dul bar mdzad lags//
101a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu nga ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kun rjod pa'i
101a4(dkon brtsegs): cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lo// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul de gang zhe na/ thogs
101a5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i ye shes kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus gzigs pa gang yin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa mkhyen cing gzigs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum po
101a6(dkon brtsegs): dag la ma dad pa rnams dad par mdzad pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gang zag gang la da ltar byung ba na nyes par spyad pa'i gzhis
101a7(dkon brtsegs): ngan song dang / ngan 'gro gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba de kho na bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no zhes kun rjod par mdzad pa dang / gang zag de sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par blangs pa'i
101b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyus ngan song rnams las thar nas lha dang mi dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing theg pa gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / yang na nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ yang na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ yang na thas
101b2(dkon brtsegs): pa chen pos nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa ji snyed cig gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa ji lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan
101b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// mkhyen nas kyang de ni de kho na bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no zhes
101b4(dkon brtsegs): de kho na bzhin du kun rjod par mdzad pa dang / gang zag gang dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus 'dod pa'i khams rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i
101b5(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi skye mched gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ / theg pa gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa ji snyed cig gis
101b6(dkon brtsegs): nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa ji lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs
101b7(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu mkhyen to/ / mkhyen nas kyang de ni de kho na bzhin du kun rjod cing lung ston par mdzad pa dang / dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ dman pa 'am/ bar ma 'am/ mchog gam/
102a1(dkon brtsegs): tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mi 'da' ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin no// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes
102a2(dkon brtsegs): su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gang zhe na/ bslab pa bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir rjes su ston par mdzad pa gang yin pa ste/ 'di ni bya ba'o// 'di ni bya ba ma yin pa'o// 'di ni bsten par bya'o//
102a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni bsten par bya ba ma yin pa'o// 'di ni sgrub pa'o// 'di ni log par sgrub pa'o// chos 'di dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o// chos 'di dag ni rnam par byung ba'i cha
102a4(dkon brtsegs): dang mthun pa'o zhes de ltar yon tan thams cad yang dag par blang ba rjes su ston pa dang / mi dge ba thams cad spang ba rjes su ston pa dang / dge ba'i lam gyi tshogs thams cad blang ba rjes su ston/
102a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / lam 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o// lam 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o// lam 'di ni theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs
102a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'o zhes rjes su ston pa gang yin pa ste/ de dag ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrubs na gnas gang yin pa de rjes su thob par mi 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin/ skabs ma yin te/ de ni
102a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas med do/ / las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su khrid par byed do// las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams su khrid par byed do// las
102b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang dag par blangs na ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su khrid par byed do/ / las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni lha rnams su khrid par byed do// las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni mi rnams k
102b2(dkon brtsegs): hrid par byed do/ / de la gang dag mi dge ba spangs nas/ dge ba yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam du 'jug pa de dag ni lha dang mi rnams su skyes nas/ rim gyis
102b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / tshul de lta bu kha na mtho ba dang / rmongs pa med pa dang / rjes su ston par mdzad pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
102b4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gang zhe na/ gang dag rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dul ba'i sems can nga rgyal dang / rgyags padang /
102b5(dkon brtsegs): dregs pas bcom pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul kun tu ston pa mdza de/ di lta ste/ gcig tu gyur nas du mar 'gyur ro// du mar gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ro// snang bar gyur cing mi spang bar yang
102b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / rtsig pa la'ang thad kar 'gro'o// ra ba la'ang thad kar 'gro'o// ri la'ang mi thogs par thad kar 'gro'o// sa la'ang steng du 'byung ba dang byi'u rdul byed de/ dper na tshul bya ba bzhin
102b7(dkon brtsegs): chu la'ang mi nub par 'gro ste/ dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no// nam mkha' la'ang 'gro ste/ dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no// lus kyi stod nas me 'bar bar byed cing / lus kyi smang nas chu'i
103a1(dkon brtsegs): dran 'dab par byed do/ / lus kyi spad nas me 'brar bar byed cing / lus kyi spyod nas chu'i rgyun 'bab par byed do// nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul
103a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar mthu cheng/ 'di ltar gzi brjid che ba la'ang lag pas 'dzin cing kun tu nyug par byed do// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du'ang lus kyis dbang sgyur ro// stong gsum
103a3(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang kun tu 'bar bar ston te/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i khyad par cing nga ci lta bus sems can rnam
103a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par dag mngon par sgrub par byed de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yin no// lha'i bu nga ni cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems
103a5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams 'dul bar byed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul de dag ma lags pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa
103a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan ci zhig mnga' lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu yod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' snga
103a7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jam dpal cho 'phrul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang thos na/ zab mo la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi phyogs
103b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang shin tu tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di'ang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs la khyod spobs par gyis shig/
103b2(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na/ stong gsum gyi stong
103b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i chab kyi phung po gang lags pa de thams cad phyag gi khyor ba ya gcig tu stsal kyang chab kyi sems can rnams la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur te/ bcom
103b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la ni cho 'phrul 'di mnga' lags so/ / yang 'di ni cho 'phrul dam pa lags te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas brjod du ma mchis pa dang / yi ge ma mchis
103b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bsnyad du ma mchis pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / sgra ma mchis pa dang / dbyangs ma mchis
103b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / tshig gi lam ma mchis pa dang / rgyu mtshan ma mchis pa dang / mtshan nyid ma mchis pa dang / spyod pa ma mchis pa dang / rgyu ba ma mchis pa dang / kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang
103b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dus ma bgyis pa dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang / tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang / zhi ba dang /
104a1(dkon brtsegs): byang ba dang / phra ba dang / mthong bar dka' ba dang / brtag tu ma mchis pa dang / rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
104a2(dkon brtsegs): yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda dang / tha snyad kyi lam de dang de dag gis chos de gzhan dag la rnam par rig par mdzad pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so//
104a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis de'i gting mi rtogs shing dmigs pa dang / mtshan ma dang / yongs su rtog pa dang bcas pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze thams cad dngang zhing 'jug par mi 'gyur ba de'ang /
104a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zhal
104a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi sgor sbrul kyang / gling chen po bzhi'i sems can rnams dang / dgung zla dang / gdugs dag dang / 'khor yug rnams dang / ran dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnams
104a6(dkon brtsegs): la'ang sgrib par mi 'gyur ba dang / slar phyung ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod kyang sems can rnams kyis 'di ltar bdag cag yul gang du bkod pa dang / bdag cag yul gang nas bton pa'ang
104a7(dkon brtsegs): ma 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so// 'di cho 'phrul chen po dam pa lags te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas brjod du ma mchis pa dang /
104b1(dkon brtsegs): yi ge ma mchis pa dang / bskad du ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / mtshan mam mchis pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang /
104b2(dkon brtsegs): tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang / zhi ba dang / byang ba dang / phra ba dang / mthong bar dka' ba dang / brtag tu ma mchis pa dang / rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa'i bar
104b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda dang / tha snyad kyi lam de dang de dag gi chos de bstan pa de'ang / de bzhin gshegs
104b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang ldan pa'i cho 'phrul de dag thams cad ni mtshan ma'i dngos po dang bcas pa'i
104b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kun nas 'dren par mdzad pa lags so/ / 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags te/ 'di lta ste/ bdag ma mchis pa la bdag tu tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /
104b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can ma mchis pa la sems can du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / srog ma mchis pa la srog tu tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / gso ba ma mchis pa la gso bar tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / gang zag ma
104b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa la gang zag tu tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / shed las skyes ma mchis pa la shed las skyes su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / shed bu ma mchis pa la shed bur tha skad 'dogs pa dang / mang
105a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa la ming du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa la gzugs su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / tshor ba ma mchis pa la tshor bar tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /
105a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes ma mchis pa la 'du shes su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / 'du byed rnams ma mchis pa la 'du byed rnams su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa la rnam par shes par
105a3(dkon brtsegs): tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / phung po ma mchis pa la phung por tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / khams ma mchis pa la khams su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / skye mched ma mchis pa la skye mched du tha snyad 'dogs
105a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mig stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang mig ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / gzugs stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang gzugs ni 'di snyam du bdag
105a5(dkon brtsegs): stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang / mig gi rnam par shes pa ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / de bzhin
105a6(dkon brtsegs): du rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus dang / reg bya dang / lus kyi
105a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa dang / yid stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang yid ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / chos rnams stong ngo zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang / chos rnams ni 'di/
105b1(dkon brtsegs): / snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems te/ 'di
105b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar bems po dang / sems pa ma mchis pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag sems can gzhan dag dang /
105b3(dkon brtsegs): gang zag gzhan dag la yang dag par go bar mdzad pa gang lags pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni mig dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ gaT
105b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ rna ba dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ sgra dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan
105b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang ma lags/ sna dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ dri dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ lce dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ ro dang
105b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'ang ma lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ lus dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ reg bya dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa
105b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ yid dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ chos rnams dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'ang ma lags te/ de lta bu'i cho 'phrul
106a1(dkon brtsegs): de ni yul ma mchis pa'i cho 'phrul lags so/ / de ni yul dang bral ba'i cho 'phrul lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni lus dang ldan par blta ba ma lags/
106a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang ldan par blta ba ma lags te/ de'i slad du cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches par 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
106a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba ni phung po lnga po dag lags te/ phung po lnga po mi rtag pa de la byis pa rnams mngon par zhen cing / de dag gis phung po lnga po dag rtag par bzung ba'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du cho//
106a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches par 'gyur ba lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag rtag ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas nas/ de dag mi rtag go zhes bshad na 'jig
106a5(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so/ / 'jig rten phung po lnga po dag bde zhes bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na/ de dag sdug bsngal lo zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so// /
106a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag bdag ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na/ de dag bdag ma mchis so zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag
106a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na/ de dag mi sdug go zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag bdag gi zhes bgyi bar glo ba
106b1(dkon brtsegs): ches pa na/ de dag bdag po ma mchis so zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag yang dag pa zhes bgyi bar glo ba ches pas
106b2(dkon brtsegs): na de dag yang dag pa ma lags so zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags te/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches
106b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba lags so/ / cho 'phrul de la ni sems rangs par mi 'gyur lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so// cho 'phrul de ni mig du bgrang ba ma lags/ gzug
106b4(dkon brtsegs): su bgrang ba ma lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni mig dang gzugs kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa lags so// cho 'phrul de ni rna bar bgrang ba ma lags/ slar bgrang ba ma lags te/
106b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul de ni rna ba dang sgra'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa lags so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ cho 'phrul de ni yid du bgrang ba ma lags/ chos su bgrang ba ma lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni yid
106b6(dkon brtsegs): dang chos kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa lags so/ / cho 'phrul de ni shes pa'i spyod yul ma lags/ rangs par bgyid pa ma lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni rnam par rig par bgyi ba ma
106b7(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / stong pa nyid ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ stong pa nyid brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa
107a1(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ / smon pa ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ smon pa ma mchis pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// mngon par 'du bgyi ba
107a2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// skye ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ skye bo ma mchis
107a3(dkon brtsegs): pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ / 'byung ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// dngos po ma mchis pa ni/
107a4(dkon brtsegs): brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ dngos po ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// mtshan nyid ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni
107a5(dkon brtsegs): cho 'phrul lags so/ / 'gag pa ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// mya ngan las 'das pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/
107a6(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'di lta ste/ bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis pa dang / sems can du kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / byang chub la rlom sems ma
107a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ / 'di lta ste/ lus g.yo ba ma mchis pa dang / ngag brjod pa ma mchis pa dang / sems rgyu ba ma mchis pa'i
107b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gsum yongs sug pa'i tshul khrims de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ / 'di lta ste/ sred par sgro 'dogs pa ma mchis pa dang / sems skad cig tu 'jig pa dang / lus dang
107b2(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par mi rtog pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bzod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ / 'di lta ste/ brang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa'i
107b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ / 'di lta ste/ nang nye bar zhi ba dang / phyi rol du rgyu ba ma mchis pa dang / sems bsags pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum
107b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ / 'di lta ste/ ngar 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa dor ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba'i 'khor
107b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum yongs su dag pa'i shes rab de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ / chos thams cad ni rnam par bral ba ma mchis pa lags na/ de dag rnam par bral bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags
107b6(dkon brtsegs): so/ chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa lags na/ rang gi ngo bo dang bral bar bshad pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni dbyer ma mchis pa lags na/ yi ges kun du
107b7(dkon brtsegs): phye ste bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ / chos thams cad ni 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gro ba ma mchis pa lags na/ 'ong ba dang 'gro bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni
108a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba ma mchis pa lags na/ 'byung bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni mngon par rtogs pa gcig pa lags na/ 'bras bu rnam par dgod
108a2(dkon brtsegs): pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ / chos thams cad ni ro gcig pa lags na/ theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer ma mchis pa
108a3(dkon brtsegs): lags na/ chos thams cad rnam par dgod par bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// sangs rgyas thams cad ni sangs rgyas gcig pa lags na/ sangs rgyas dpag tu ma mchis par bshad pa
108a4(dkon brtsegs): ni cho 'phrul lags so/ / zhing thams cad ni zhing gcig pa lags na/ zhing sna tshogs bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// sems can thams cad ni sems can gcig pa lags na/ sems
108a5(dkon brtsegs): can gyi rim pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ / chos thams cad ni chos gcig pa lags na/ tha ma dang / mchog dang / bar mar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni/
108a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par bsgrubs pa ma mchis pa lags na/ rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa lags na/ gzhan la rnam
108a7(dkon brtsegs): par rig pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ / de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad spras pa'i don lo
108b1(dkon brtsegs): bos shes pa ltar na/ ji tsam du brjod pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni cho 'phrul yin no// 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos thams cad
108b2(dkon brtsegs): ni brjod du med pa yin pas/ de dag la brjod pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
108b3(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems skyes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ lha'i bu ded dpon la
108b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so/ / lha'i bu ci khyod cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di thos nas skrag par mi 'gyur ram/ lha'i bus smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu kho bo nyid kyang cho 'phrul yin na/ de la
108b5(dkon brtsegs): bo skrag par 'gyur du ci yod/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod ci las bsams te de skad spa/ lha'i bus smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni 'pho ba med pa yin na/ de la
108b6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos 'pho ba gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin no/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis kho bo lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ bdag nyid chen po
108b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di'ang thob pa'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa de ni sems par mi byed cing rnam par shes par mi byed do/ / de bas na sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba'ang sems par mi byed cing rnam par shes
109a1(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed de/ sems par mi byed cing rnam par shes par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du las rnams kyi las kyi rnang par
109a2(dkon brtsegs): srin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / klu rnams kyi klu'i yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// bsam gtan pa rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
109a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes gsungs pa de lta bu ste/ de lta bas na chos thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa de ni cho
109a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul chen po yin no/ / yang gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad du lha'i bu ci khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa gang yin pa de thos na skrag par mi 'gyur ram zhes zer ba ni/ btsun pa
109a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci de bzhin gshegs pas cho 'phrul bstan pa gang yin pa des nam mkha'i khams skrag par 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
109a6(dkon brtsegs): gal te de bzhin gshegs pas cho 'phrul bstan pa des nam mkha'i khams skrag par mi 'gyur na/ kho bo'ang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// smras pa/ lha'i bu ci khyod nam mkha' yin nam/ smras pa
109a7(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu kho bo nam mkha' yin no/ / smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci bcom ldan 'das kyis nang gi nam mkha'i
109b1(dkon brtsegs): khams su gsungs pa gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams su gsungs pa gang yin pa de nyid nam mkha'i khams ma yin nam/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de ni yin no// smras pa/
109b2(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin can yin no// sbas pa/ lha'i bu ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa bzhin du khyod nyid kyang ring por mi thogs
109b3(dkon brtsegs): par cho 'phrul de dag nyid nye bar ston par 'gyur ro/ / smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu cho 'phrul de dag ni nye bar bstan par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ cho 'phrul de dag ni yul thams
109b4(dkon brtsegs): cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu ded dpon
109b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di de lta bu ston pa las na/ 'dis ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis shing / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la'ang bsnyen bkur bgyis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
109b6(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ shA ra dwati'i bu lha'i bu ded dpon 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su smin par byas pa yin no//
109b7(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bskal pa mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi
110a1(dkon brtsegs): khams bde ba zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
110a2(dkon brtsegs): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to// shA ra dwa
110a3(dkon brtsegs): t i'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba de'ang 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can rnams bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gnas shing sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba'i sgra 'ga' tsam
110a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang rin po che sna bzhi gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel las grub cing / lag mthil ltar mnyam la/ ka tsa lin di'i gos ltar
110a5(dkon brtsegs): reg na 'jam zhing / mi khom pa dang ngan song rnams dang bral la/ lha dang mi rnams kyis kun du gang zhing / yid la bsams pa tsam gyis bza' ba dang btung ba dag 'byor la bde ba tshad
110a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang ldan pas na/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig ste/ brtson 'grus
110a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba/ shes rab kyi snang ba thob pa/ gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po thob pa/ spobs pa mi chod pa/ tshig thams cad rab tu 'byed cing ston pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/
110b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pas rnam par shes pa khong du chud pa/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa/ sems can
110b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la ji ltar rig pa bzhin du chos kyi sman sbyor ba la mkhas pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa/ gsol ba ma btab par sems
110b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang //
110b4(dkon brtsegs): ngo tsha shes pa dang / brtan pa dang / blo rgya mtsho rjes su zhugs pa/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / shes rab la
110b5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu gnas pa/ thabs mtha' yas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo ba la mkhas pa/ stobs dang / mi 'jig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pas
110b6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu zhugs pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pas rnam par rtse ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go// shA ra dwa
110b7(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de'i gsung rab la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i bkod
111a1(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po gling bzhi'i dbang phyug rin po che sna bdun dang ldan la mi'i dbang por gyur pa zhig byung bar gyur to// de'i bu
111a2(dkon brtsegs): stong du tshang bar gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de'ang
111a3(dkon brtsegs): btsun mo'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
111a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de'i sku tshe'i tshad dang / mi de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni lo dung phyur phrag bdun du gyur to// de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa bu stong dang lhan cig/
111a5(dkon brtsegs): btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu chos la dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang dang ba thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
111a6(dkon brtsegs): ri rab lta bu byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo 'bum tshang bar thugs la dgongs pa bzhin du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim cha dang / gdan dang / spun
111a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas so// rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa 'khor dang bcas pas rtag par rgyun du/ de bzhin gshegs
111b1(dkon brtsegs): pa de la mngon sum du nyin gcig mi 'chad par rang gi lag nas gus par phul zhing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos nyan pa la'ang 'jug par gyur to/ / de bu dang bcas/ btsun mo'i 'khor
111b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pas lo 'bum 'das kyang yang dang yang du sangs rgyas mthong zhing / yang dang yang du de la chos nyan pas rjes su dran pa bzhi thob par gyur to// bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes
111b3(dkon brtsegs): su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / sbyin pa dang ldan zhing byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ste/ rjes su dran pa bzhi po de
111b4(dkon brtsegs): dag thob par gyur to/ / de rjes su dran pa bzhi po de dag dang ldan pas nyin mtshan du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos yang dag par bgro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mthong ba dang
111b5(dkon brtsegs): bral bar ma gyur to/ / de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa bu dang bcas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa de chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das de
111b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de ga la ba der song ngo / / de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
111b7(dkon brtsegs): ri rab lta bu des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas rjes su gdams pa mdzad par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
112a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de la/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa des 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul de dag ma lags pa'i cho 'phrul dam
112a2(dkon brtsegs): pa gzhan mchis lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des/ rgyal
112a3(dkon brtsegs): po dge ba'i bkod pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rgyal po chen po cho 'phrul de dag ma yin pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan yang yod do// de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
112a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dang sems las byung ba gzugs can ma yin pa rnams bshad pa dang / sems dang sems las byung ba 'gags pa rnams bshad pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems dang sems las
112a5(dkon brtsegs): byung ba mi gnas pa rnams smos pa dang / ma skyes ma byung ba'i lam bshad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo ro gcig pa rnams la yan lag gsum du spos pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa gcig tu 'dus
112a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la bden pa bzhir yongs su brjod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam pa med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub la yongs su sgrub par byed pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
112a7(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams bshad pa dang / phyin ci log dang nyon mongs pas grub pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba
112b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i chos rnams la sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / byas pa med pa'i chos rnams la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /
112b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba med cing skad cig pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / lus dang sems dben pa'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / bsdus
112b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang rnam par g.yengs pa med pa'i chos rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / pha rol dang tshu rol med pa'i chos rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /
112b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhag pa dang bsal ba med pa'i chos rnams la thabs mkhas pa yod pa dang / skyob pa med pa dang rton pa med pa'i chos rnams la byams pa sgom pa dang / bya ba med pa dang gzhig pa med
112b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos rnams la snying rjes sbyor ba dang / dga' ba med pa'i chos rnams la dga' ba mngon par sgrub pa dang / gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams la btang snyoms sgom pa dang / shes
112b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang mthong ba med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i mig mngon par sgrub pa dang / thos pa med pa dang rnam par rig pa med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i rna ba mngon par sgrub pa dang
112b7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa dang sems dang rnam par bral ba'i chos rnams la pha rol gyi sems shes pa yod pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang bral ba'i chos rnams la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes
113a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yod pa dang / sems dang / lus dang / s+tha dang / brtson 'grus dang bral ba'i chos rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob pa dang / gnas pa med pa'i
113a2(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa dang / skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yang dag pa'i spong ba sgom pa dang / dbang po med pa'i chos rnams la dbang po bstan
113a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / stobs med pa dang nyam chung ba'i chos rnams la stobs yongs su rjod pa dang / nye bar zhi ba'i chos rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag bshad pa dang / khyad par med pa'i chos
113a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la lam smos pa dang / zhi ba'i mthar song ba'i chos rnams la zhi gnas skyed pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / rang bzhin
113a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa smos pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de dang /
113a6(dkon brtsegs): bu stong po de dag dang / btsun mo'i tshogs de dag la cho 'phrul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de nyid las brtsams te de lta de ltar chos bstan pa dang / srog chag
113a7(dkon brtsegs): brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ / rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa dang / de'i bu stong gis ni chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par
113b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ / de dag gis bzod pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang rang gi spobs pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab
113b2(dkon brtsegs): lnga bu de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na ni// lhun po'i rgyal po mdzes pa ltar// de bzhin dge 'dun dbus na ni// chos kyi rgyal po rnam par
113b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzes/ / ji ltar nyi ma 'char ba yis// mun pa thams cad sel ba ltar// de bzhin sangs rgyas mdzod spu yang // sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang bar bgyid// ji ltar zla ba nya ba yis//
113b4(dkon brtsegs): zla ba yongs rdzogs lhang de ltar// sangs rgyas chos rnams rdzogs pa yis// 'jig rten mgon yang lhang nge lags// ji ltar me tog pad+ma ni// chab kyi nang du mi gos ltar// de bzhin 'jig rten
113b5(dkon brtsegs): mgon po yang / / 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos lags// ji ltar seng ge ri dgas rgyal// nags na sgra skad sgrog pa ltar// de bzhin skyes bu seng ge yang // stong pa nyid kyi sgra skad sgrog/
113b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis sam yang na ma mchis dang // mchis dang ma mchis thams cad dang // mthar lta ba las rnam 'das pa// nges pa'i seng ga'i sgra zhes bgyi// skye ba 'am yang na 'jig pa'ang rung //
113b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag mtshan mar bstan mdzad cing // mi skye 'gag pa ma mchis pa// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// pha rol dang ni tshu rol dag/ de dag rnam par rtog par bstan// chos rnams
114a1(dkon brtsegs): kun la mi gnas pa/ / nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang ba// de gnyis mtshan nyid ma mchis te// shin tu dri ma ma mchis
114a2(dkon brtsegs): so/ / nges par seng ge'i sba zhes bgyi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ni// yongs su rtog las byung ba ste// rtog bral rnam rtog ma mchis pa// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes
114a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyi/ 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// de dag lam du gzhug pa ste// chos rnams shin tu gsog lags pa// nges par sang ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// skye dang 'chi dang 'khor
114a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ni/ phyin ci log las byung ba ste// mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med don// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// lha dang dmigs pa gnas lags te// de dag gis ni 'jig
114a5(dkon brtsegs): rten 'jug/ chos rnams stong par rab bshad pa// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// 'jig rten mgon pos cho 'phrul ni// gang dag ji snyed bstan mdzad pa// de dag thams cad bshad
114a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ / sems ni mnyam pa nyid slad du// rjes su mthun dang mi mthun pa'i// gang la'ang sems ni mi 'jug pa// de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags//
114a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad pa yi// zab cing zhi la mthun bgyid cing // de la rtsod par mi bgyid pa// de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags// mi dge thams cad ma gtogs pa// dge
114b1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la 'jug 'gyur zhing / / de la'ang gnas par mi bgyid pa// de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags// stong pa'i sgra dang sems can sba// de bzhin lta ba'i sgra dang ni// spya rnam
114b2(dkon brtsegs): kun la ma chags pa/ / de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags// sangs rgyas sgra dang nyon mongs sgra// rnam mang chos kyi sgra rnams dang // gang gi sgra la'ang mi rtog pa// de ni rjes
114b3(dkon brtsegs): mthun bzod pa lags/ / sbyin dang tshul khrims thos pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab dang // de bzhin kun la brtson bgyid pa// de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags//
114b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dag la sems mnyam zhing // byang chub sems ni mi spong la// byang chub lam ni ston bgyid pa// de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag
114b5(dkon brtsegs): la/ de 'dra'i chos ni bstan mdzad de// de la som nyi ma mchis pa// de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags// bdag kyang byang chub sangs rgyas shing // seng ge'i sgra skad bsgrags nas ni//
114b6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar 'dren pas bstan mdzad pa'i// cho 'phrul nges par bstan par bgyi// zhing 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste// bla med bsod nams zhing de la// bdag gi sa bon btab pas na// bdag
114b7(dkon brtsegs): ni slar ldog ma mchis lags/ / dog sa thams cad rdol 'gyur zhing // rgya mtsho'ang bas par 'gyur gda' yi// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bskrun pa yi// sa bon nams kyang chab mi 'tshal//
115a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi sems 'tshal cing // nam mkha' gzhal bar rngo thog gi/ byang chub tu ni bskrun pa'i sems// de yi bsod nams tshad ma mchis// bdag
115a2(dkon brtsegs): gi bsam pa ci 'dra ba'i/ / dbang du lha dang dri za dang // mi rnams gzhan dag ma mchis te// bcom ldan 'das nyid bdag gi dbang // 'dren pa bdag ni longs spyod dang // gzugs dang mtho ris mi
115a3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal gyi/ / mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni// ci 'dra de ltar bdag gyur cig/ byang chub la ni dmigs bgyis nas// bdag gis dgung lo 'bum du ni// ma chags sdang ba ma mchis
115a4(dkon brtsegs): par/ / bdag gis bde gshegs bsnyen bkur bgyis// bdag gi byis pa stong rnams dang // mchis brang yongs su smin bgyis pa// gang lags 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi// byang chub
115a5(dkon brtsegs): slad du spro bar mdzad/ / bdag gis bde gshegs legs mthong zhing // chos 'di legs par thos pa dang // byang chub la ni rtag dga' ba// bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed//
115a6(dkon brtsegs): zhig byang chub dga' bgyid pa// de ni chos la'ang rtag tu dga'// chos rnams spong bar mi bgyid pa// sems can kun la rtag dga' lags// de nas 'khor de nyid du
115a7(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba zhig 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis ni de bzhin gsheg
115b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i cho 'phrul de dang mthun par ma byas kyi/ mi mthun par byas pas na khyod ni gnas ma yin pa la gnas pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub ni chos kyi dbyings kyi
115b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas la gnas pas 'jug pa med pa'o/ / rgyal po chen po byang chub ni tshor ba thams cad med pas shes pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni blangs pa med cing
115b3(dkon brtsegs): dor ba med pas blang ba mang la dor ba med pa yin no/ / rgyal po chen po byang chub ni nam mkha'i khams la bris pa dang 'dra bas gzugs med pa/ kha dog med pa/ rtags med pa/ dbyibs
115b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin no/ / rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pas gnyen po med pa yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni chos thams cad dang mnyam pas thams cad kyi
115b5(dkon brtsegs): rjes su song ba yin no/ / rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas g.yo ba med pa yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas zhi ba'o//
115b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po byang chub ni bzhag pa dang bsal ba dang bral bas nye bar zhi ba'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mi mthun pa med pas lhag par g.yo ba med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni
115b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su grub pa med pas sems mnyam pa'o/ / rgyal po chen po byang chub ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pas sems can dang mtshungs pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rnam par rig pa'i mtshan 'ad
116a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pas skye ba med pas rab tu phye ba'o/ / rgyal po chen po ni byang chub ni sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral bas rnam par rig pa med pa'o//
116a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po byang chub ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas rgyu ba med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral bas spros pa med pa'o// rgyal
116a3(dkon brtsegs): po chen po byang chub ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pas stong pa'o/ / rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas mtshan ma med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni
116a4(dkon brtsegs): smon pa dang bral bas smon pa med pa'o/ / rgyal po chen po byang chub ni las kyi rnam par smin pa med pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan nyid gsum
116a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bral bas 'dus ma byas pa ste/ rgyal po chen po gang dag byang chub kyi mtshan nyid de lta bu dang / ngo bo nyid de lta bu la sgrub par byed pa dang / gang dag smon lam 'debs par byed pa dang /
116a6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag mngon par dga' bar byed pa dang / gang dag 'dod par byed pa de dag thams cad ni log par rtsol ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub ci 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
116a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang de 'dra ba yin pas na/ gang dag de ltar spyod pa de dag ni yang dag par spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// // bam po gnyis pa// // de nas rgyal po dge ba'i
116b1(dkon brtsegs): bkod pas/ chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid kyi spyod pa la spongs par gyis shig/
116b2(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces smras pa dang / chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad la rlom sems
116b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / tshul khrims kyi rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis tshul
116b4(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// bzod pas rlom sems su mi
116b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis tha ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / 'chab pa'i yongs su gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung ba thams cad 'byin par byed pa ni byang chub
116b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus brtan zhing 'bar ba dang / zhum pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'/
116b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa sgrub pa
117a1(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / shes rab kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyan pa'i shes rab kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba ni
117a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / gnyis dang bral ba'i btang snyoms mnyam pa nyid kyis tshangs pa'i gnas pa skyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// mngon
117a3(dkon brtsegs): par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mngon par shes pa skyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / don dang chos la nges par sems pa mnyam pa nyid kyis so so yang
117a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / chos kyi dbyings g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rton pa la mos pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
117a5(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / yang dag par skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis nges par sems pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sdud pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// /
117a6(dkon brtsegs): don mthun pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yang dag par 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis
117a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / nam mkha' yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / zhing yongs su dag
117b1(dkon brtsegs): pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyis
117b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi tshogs yang dag par sdud pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / lus dang / ngag dang / sems mnyam pa nyid kyis lus dang / ngag dang //
117b3(dkon brtsegs): sems brgyan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can thams cad la bdag med par mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad la ci zhig bya snyam du spro ba ni byang chub
117b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur mos pa mnyam pa nyid kyis 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// las
117b5(dkon brtsegs): dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la mos pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis legs par spyod pa'i las byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / chos sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa
117b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi go cha bgos pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / sdug bsngal skye ba med par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sdug bsngal
117b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / mdza' bshes dang mdza' bshes ma yin pa la sems skom pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mdza' ba brtan pa ni byang chub
118a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / lan la re ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la sbyor ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//
118a2(dkon brtsegs): thos pa dang sgrub pa mnyam pa nyid kyis thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa mnyam pa nyid kyis chos la slob dpon
118a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi dpe mkhyud med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / chos dben pa mnyam pa nyid kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod
118a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ / don dam pa'i bden pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bden pa'i shes pa yongs su tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can la shin tu 'dud pa
118a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis nga rgyal nges par bcom pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / yon tan thams cad yang dag par blangs pas rlom sems med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis
118a6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba yongs su tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas byang chub sems
118a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid kyi spyod pa de dag thos nas dka' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ gos dang
118b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyan ci gyon pa rnams kyis chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la mngon par bkab bo/ / bu stong po de dag gis kyang rang rang gi rgyan dag gis chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal
118b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan la bkab nas/ tshig 'di skad du gang bdag cag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dag rnyed pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa
118b3(dkon brtsegs): legs par rnyed do/ / sems can thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de lta bu dang / spobs pa de lta bu dag thob par gyur cig ces kyang smras so// de nas
118b4(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ gos dang rgyan tsam gyis mchod pa de ni mchod pa
118b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po ma yin gyi/ de las gzhan pa'i mchod pa khyad par du 'phags pa dag kyang yod kyis/ de dag khyod kyis sgrubs shig/ de'ang gang zhe na/ de nas de'i tshe chos smra ba'i dge
118b6(dkon brtsegs): skyong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / gang dag stong chen sems can de dag kun// byang chub phyir ni rab tu zhugs gyur cing // ma zhum sems kyis bskal pa
118b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par ni/ / bu dang chung ma'i sbyin pa byas pa bas// gang gis byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab pa dang // rab 'byung sems kyis gom pa
119a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig bor ba/ / de ni de bas bsod nams khyad par 'phags// gang dag sngan chad byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang // gang dag ma byon 'byung dang bzhugs pa
119a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams/ / de dag skyon mang khab ni ma spangs par// bla med byang chub zhi ba thob pa med// rab 'byung de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// rab tu bstod cing bsngags la
119a3(dkon brtsegs): bkur ba ste/ / gang zhig sangs rgyas kun la mchod 'dod pa// rgyal ba'i bstan la rab 'byung gzung bar gyis// gang zhig khyim gnas rin chen khyim brgyan pa'i// gang+gA'i bye snyed
119a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas zhing byin dang / / gang zhig rab 'byung nyin dang mtshan gcig tu// mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med sems byed na// gang zhig rab 'byung bag yod gyur pa yi// byang chub sems
119a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' byang chub nye ba dang / / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu bcom byas shing // dge ba'i phyogs kyang mi 'grib 'phel ba yin// rab 'byung de ni lam ngan spangs pa dang // lam gyi rjes mthun
119a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i skye bos bstod/ / de ni dge ba chud za ma yin zhing // de ni yongs su 'dzin pa spangs pa yin// khyim las grol ba nyon mongs mi 'phel zhing // nyon mongs rnam grol bdud
119a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'ching ba med/ / rnam grol sems ni byang chub spyad pa spyod// spyod pa dag pas byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas tshogs su bcad pa de dag
