119b1(dkon brtsegs): thos pa dang / / 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / longs spyod pa dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug de dag la mi lta bar gyur cing skyo la 'dod chags dang bral ba skyes par gyur te/ rab du byung ba la
119b2(dkon brtsegs): sems gzhol bar gnas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab
119b3(dkon brtsegs): tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu des bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po rab tu byung ba ni dgag pa med
119b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ sems can thams cad la'ang bar du mi gcod cing skabs yod do// khyim na gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa'i nang na gnas pa yin gyis/ gal te 'dod na ngas khyod la gdams shing rjes
119b5(dkon brtsegs): su bstan gyis/ khyod kyis kyang btams shing rjes su bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das des rab du 'byung ba'i skabs phye ba dang / rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas
119b6(dkon brtsegs): bu stong po de dag la smras pa/ khyed cag las rgyal srid sgrub pa dang / sems can rnams chos yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa la spo ba su yod/ de dag thams cad kyis smras pa/ yab bdag
119b7(dkon brtsegs): cag kyang dad pas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung lags kyis/ bdag cag mi dor bar gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te khyed cag thams cad rab tu byung na gling bzhi pa'i
120a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad rab tu chud zos par 'gyur gyis/ khyed cag las gang sems can rnams la brtan pa'i snying rje chen po
120a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par 'gyur ba des rgyal srid sbubs la/ sems can rnams la chos yang dag par 'dzin du chug cig/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag gi nang nas/ rgyal bu gzhon
120a3(dkon brtsegs): nu snying rje cher sems shes bya ba des rang gi pha de dang / rgan rabs de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rab 'byung yon tan du ma bsags pa zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs
120a4(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi/ / de lta lags kyang snying rjer gyur pas na// 'gro la phan phyir rgyal srid bdag gis bsgrub// ji srid 'tsho bar bdag ni tshangs spyod cing // gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa blang bar bgyi// /
120a5(dkon brtsegs): me tog rnams dang dri dang byug pa dang // de bzhin chang yang myang bar mi bgyi'o// lus la rgyan rnams kyang ni mi thogs shing // mchil lham mi 'tshal rin chen gtsug pud min// khri rkang gser las
120a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyis par mi nyal zhing / / rgyal po'i rkyen gyi gos kyang mi 'tshal lo// sil snyan glu dbyangs sgra la mi dga' zhing // rma bya ngang pa'i sgra la'ang dga' mi bgyid// skye bos mdun bdar bud med gnas spong
120a7(dkon brtsegs): shing / gcig pu mal na mchis nyal rlung mi g.yab// bdag ni gling nas gling du mchi bgyi zhing // dge ba bcu rnams rab tu bshad par bgyi// khyim na gnas pa'i nongs pa bstan bgyi zhing // rab tu
120b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i bsngags pa'ang brjod par bgyi/ / gzugs dang longs spyod dbang phyug dregs pa yis// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun bgrod mi bgyi// byang chub sems ni bskyud par mi bgyi zhing /
120b2(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu yid 'byung srid gsum spyad par bgyi// sbyin dang snyan smra don spyod don mthun pas// sems can bsdu ba la ni brtson bgyi zhing // bla med theg chen dam pa 'di la yang // srog chags
120b3(dkon brtsegs): bye ba mang po yongs smin bgyi/ / chos don mnyan cing bshad par bgyi slad du// nyin mo dus gsum mtshan mo dus gsum du// ri rab lta bu'i spyan sngar nyer mchi zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa la
120b4(dkon brtsegs): ni mchod pa'ang bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu des/ rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems la legs so zhe bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so//
120b5(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa'i chos kyi yon tan des na/ khyim par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rab du byung ba dang yon tan mtshungs pa yin no// khyod kyi snying rje chen po des na rab
120b6(dkon brtsegs): tu byung ba'i yon tan bsgrub pa'ang sgrub par byed pa yin no/ / de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems rgyal srid la bzhag nas/ bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba dang /
120b7(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur to// de dag rab tu byung nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa des cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di nyid kyis de lta de ltar btams
121a1(dkon brtsegs): shing rjes su bstan pas/ de dag gis ring po ma thogs par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed par gyur to// gzungs dang / dran pa dang / chos mnyan pa'i shes
121a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang bskyed par gyur to/ / rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems kyang rgyal srid la dbang bskur nas/ zla ba nya'o cog na gling chen po bzhi po dag tu rjes su ston par byed de/ ci nas kyang
121a3(dkon brtsegs): srog chags dung phyur phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur to//
121a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab du byung nas thag pa chen po 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
121a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag tu gyur to/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis ji tsam du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sems can rnams kyi rten du gyur cing
121a6(dkon brtsegs): dad pa bskyed par gyur pa'i gsung rab de la ltos/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig
121a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ lha'i bu ded dpon 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po
121b1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyid dang
121b2(dkon brtsegs): yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya
121b3(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de'i bu stong tham par gyur pa de dag gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/
121b4(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid kyi sangs rgyas stong po de dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de'i bu stong tham par gyur to// shA ra dwa
121b5(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems shes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de
121b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems shes bya bar gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa rnams ni/
121b7(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pa dang shes bzhin gyi spyod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par byung ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi tshul dang ldan pa'i gtam
122a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags sum khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so//
122a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod ni lha'i bu ded dpon 'di dang lhan cig tu yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa
122a3(dkon brtsegs): dang sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam
122a4(dkon brtsegs): yan lag brgyad pa'i tshig bla dgas yin la/ lam ni 'dus byas yin gyi/ kho bo ni 'dus ma byas su gtogs pa yin pas/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no//
122a5(dkon brtsegs): ban pA shwa ra dwa ti'i butshangs par rjod pa zhes bya ba don spyod pa'i mtshan ni yinaHoM bA ni sna pa med pa dang rab tu sdod pa med pa yin te/ de'i phyir la Ta ni yun ring po nas tshangs par
122a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin no/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su sbyor ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni gnyis su sbyor ba'ang ma yin la/ gnyis su med par sbyor ba'ang ma yin te/
122a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po yin gyi/ kho bo ni gnyen pos rab tu phye ba ma yin
122b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang /
122b2(dkon brtsegs): chos las 'byol ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos las 'byol ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par
122b3(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa ma yin no/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba ma
122b4(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad yin gyi/ khos
122b5(dkon brtsegs): ni dge ba dang sdig pa la nges par sbyor ba mi byed de/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni nyan thos dang rang
122b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa thob pa yin gyi/ kho bo ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa thob pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun
122b7(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni 'khor ba las 'byol ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni 'khor ba las 'byol ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no//
123a1(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam du 'gro ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni mya ngan las 'da' ba don du gnyer ba ma yin te/ de
123a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du 'jam dpal khyod ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no zhes zer
123a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ni btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ni bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhes na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs med cing bstan du med pa yin pas/
123a4(dkon brtsegs): de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshor ba med cing tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin
123a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni 'du shes med cing 'du shes kyi mdud pa thams cad dang bral ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'du byed rnams med
123a6(dkon brtsegs): cing 'dus ma byas brnyes pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par shes pa med cing yid gnas pa med pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen
123a7(dkon brtsegs): bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni mig dang gzugs kyi yul ma yin zhing stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshes
123b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni rna ba dang sgra'i yul ma yin zhing mtshan ma med pa'i mu yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sna dang dri'i yul ma yin zhing gnyis dang bral
123b2(dkon brtsegs): ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lce dang ro'i yul ma yin zhing rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya
123b3(dkon brtsegs): par mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang reg bya'i yul ma yin zhing thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gsheg
123b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni yid dang chos kyi yul ma yin zhing chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin nyid la gnas pa yin
123b5(dkon brtsegs): pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mthun par zhugs pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
123b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyis rab tu phye ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni chen po stong pa nyid la zhugs pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur
123b7(dkon brtsegs): bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni spros pa thams cad yang dag par
124a1(dkon brtsegs): chad pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni dmigs pa med pa la bzhugs pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya//
124a2(dkon brtsegs): bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni khams gsum na mi
124a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni zag pa med pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
124a4(dkon brtsegs): ni 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhi zhing rab tu zhi la nye bar zhi ba yin pas/ de la
124a5(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid dang bral ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
124a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni kha dog dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs dang bral ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du ma smad cing kha na ma tho ba med
124a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni spyod lam thams cad la yang dag par mi gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus
124b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du skur pa gdab tu med cing nam mkha' la bris pa lta bu yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir
124b2(dkon brtsegs): ro/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du 'jam dpal khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no zhes zer ba la/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni 'jig tshogs rtsa ba ma
124b3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / phyin ci log bzhi rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / phung po
124b4(dkon brtsegs): lnga rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye mched drug rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i gnas bdun rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / log pa brgyad rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / kun nas mnar sems
124b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi dngos po dgu rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / sems can gyi gnas dgu rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// btsun pa shA ra tA
124b6(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam la mngon par zhen pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rig pa dang rnam par grol ba la yongs su rtog pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa dang / lhag
124b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / bden pa bzhi po dag la yongs su rtog pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / dbang po lngar 'du
125a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug la dmigs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / byang chub kyi lam bdun la spro 'dogs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'phags
125a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la lta ba skyed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mi slob pa'i chos bcu la
125a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ / phung po'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud rtsa ba ma yin/
125a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / lha'i bu'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa/ gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// sgrib pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / chod pa dang kun nas ldang ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'gyod pa rtsa ba ma
125a5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ / bdag tu lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / sems can du lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / srog tu lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / gso ba dang gang zag tu la
125a6(dkon brtsegs): brtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ / 'byung bar lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'jig par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / chang par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par lta ba
125a7(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ / tshul bzhin ma yin pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'du byed rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes
125b1(dkon brtsegs): partsa ba ma yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye mched drug rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / reg pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / tshor brtsa ba ma yin pa dang / sred pa rtsub ma
125b2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / len pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / srid pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rga shi rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / nad dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi
125b3(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// 'dod pa'i khams rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / gzugs kyi khams rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / gzugs med
125b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ / sbyin pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rdul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang /
125b5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btam snyoms kyis
125b6(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'dod pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems
125b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi 'dor ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par
126a1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i rtsa ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i rtsa ba dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gdong ba'i rtsa ba dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i
126a2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba dang / tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad yang dag par len pa'i rtsa ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'ang mi 'dod pa'i rtsa ba dang / bzod pa
126a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / nges pa'i rtsa ba dang / bdag dang gzhan la'ang mi gnod pa'i rtsa ba dang / brtan pa'i brtson 'grus chen po rtsom pa'i rtsa ba dang / dman pa'i chos yang dag par
126a4(dkon brtsegs): mi sdud pa'i rtsa ba dang / bsam gtan gyi rtsa ba dang / bsam gtan gyi ro myang bar mi byed pa'i rtsa ba dang / shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang / gtang snyoms kyang ma yin pa'i rtsa ba dang /
126a5(dkon brtsegs): thabs kyi rtsa ba dang / thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pa'i rtsa ba dang
126a6(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// lus dang / ngag dang /
126a7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rgyan gyi rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// gzungs kyi shes pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// spobs pa mi mchod
126b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ / mngon par shes pa dang rig pa thob pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//
126b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba byin gyis rlob pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa
126b3(dkon brtsegs): dang lan gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su skor ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
126b4(dkon brtsegs): don gyi gzhi rnam par nges par bstan pa gsum po 'di bshad pa na/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ bcom
126b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mngon par gtor nas/ tshig 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa
126b6(dkon brtsegs): der ni de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis byung ba yin par rig par bya'o/ / sems can gang dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag
126b7(dkon brtsegs): ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no/ / de dag gis ni bdud kyi las thams cad bkag pa yin no// de dag ni theg pa chen po la snang ba thob pa yin no zhes kyang smras so//
127a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des smras pa la rjes su thugs rangs pa mdzad nas/ lha'i bu ded dpon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
127a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gang dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bshad pa de thos nas mos par 'gyur ba de'ang cho 'phrul chen po yin te/ de dag ni de las gzhan pa'i cho 'phrul rnams kyis skrag par mi
127a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la mi rtag par bshad pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa rnams la sdug bsngal
127a4(dkon brtsegs): bar bshad pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa rnams la bdag med par bshad pa dang / sdug par 'du shes pa rnams la mi sdug par bshad pa dang / dngos por 'du shes pa rnams la
127a5(dkon brtsegs): dngos po med par bshad pa dang / lta bar 'du shes pa rnams la stong par bshad pa dang / mtshan mar 'du shes pa rnams la mtshan ma med par bshad pa dang / khams gsum par 'du
127a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa rnams la smon pa med par bshad pa dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin par 'du shes pa rnams la lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral bar bshad pa de ni 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa chen po
127a7(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ gang dag de la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni yang dag par dul ba yin pas na/ yang dag par dul ba rnams ni gang la'ang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// ngo ci'i phyir se na/ de gang las sbas
127b1(dkon brtsegs): pa gyur ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ ngar 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa de dag des yongs su ma bzung bas/ yongs su ma bzung ba la rten med pa dang /
127b2(dkon brtsegs): rten med pa la g.yo ba med pa dang / g.yo ba med pa la 'gul ba med pa dang / 'gul ba med pa la blang ba med pa dang / blang ba med pa la dor ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa la 'dzin
127b3(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / 'dzin pa med pa la mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa la phyin ci log med pa dang / phyin ci log med pa la log pa nyid med pa dang / log pa
127b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang bral ba ni yang dag par sgrub pa yin pa dang / yang dag par bsgrub pa ni yang dag par lta ba yin pa dang / yang dag par lta ba ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dag yin pa
127b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa la rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang / sems rnam par mi g.yeng ba la gnas pa med pa dang / sems mi gnas pa la gnas med pa dang /
127b6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi gnas med pa la rnam par shes pa'i gnas med pa dang / rnam par rig pa med pa la brtag cing bsal ba med pa dang / brtag cing bsal ba dang bral bas dmigs pa spangs pa dang /
127b7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa med par gnas pa la sgrib pa med pa dang / sgrib pa med par gnas pa la rlom sems med pa dang / gang gi tshe rlom sems med pa de'i tshe lhag par rlom pa med pa dang / gang gi tshe lhag par
128a1(dkon brtsegs): rlom pa med pa de'i tshe bdag dang gzhan du mthong ba med pa dang / mthong ba med pa la yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / yongs su gdung ba med pa la sgyid lug med/
128a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sgyid lug pa med pa la nyon mongs pa'i rgyu med pa dang / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i sems la bsal ba snang ba dang / bsal ba thob pas ye shes mthong ba dang / ye shes
128a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba la gnas pa'i sems kyi shes pa rgya che ba dang / sems kyi shes pa rgya chen po la gnas pa la bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa dang / bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom pa la sgrib pa
128a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa mngon du 'gyur ba dang / sgrib pa med pa la gnas pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu gang byas pa med cing skye ba med pa'i chos rnams la chos
128a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi go rims kyi mtshams sbyar ba de ltar ston pa de'ang cho 'phrul chen po yin no/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras
128a6(dkon brtsegs): so/ / kho bo cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la ci dang ci 'dri ba de dang de nyid kyi tshig gi mtshams las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang ngo // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa
128a7(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du sgrub par byed do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni mi zad pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar
128b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de bzhin du ston par byed do/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bem po ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rjod par byed do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos
128b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par 'jog par byed do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni mthong ba med pa ste/ de
128b3(dkon brtsegs): dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par 'god par byed do/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni btang snyoms pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du 'chad par byed do//
128b4(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos de dag ni gang nas kyang ma blangs gang du'ang ma khrid pa ste/ de dag ni bsags pa'ang ma yin/ spungs pa'ang ma yin no// de dag ni bshad kyang rung ma
128b5(dkon brtsegs): bshad kyang rung ste/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid de mi 'dor ba yin no// sems can thams cad kyi yi ge 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa'i yi ge 'byung ba
128b6(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa'i yig de dag thams cad ni lus las kyang ma byung / sems las kyang ma byung ste/ rgyu dang rkyen nyid las byung ba yin no// ji ltar yi ge rnams la bsags pa med pa de bzhin du
128b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams la'ang bsags pa med do/ / ji ltar sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams la bsags pa med pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa thams cad
129a1(dkon brtsegs): la'ang bsags pa med do/ / ji ltar nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa thams cad la bsags pa med pa de bzhin du shes pa gang gis nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa'i shes
129a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de la'ang bsags pa med de/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni shes pas gang mi gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa de'ang cho 'phrul chen po yin no// de nas
129a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu ded dpon gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/
129a4(dkon brtsegs): wa bu sdug bsngal yangs su shes pa'i shes pa dang / grang ma yangs su spang ba la yongs su sngo ba med pa'i shes pa dang / kun 'drung dashes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par
129a5(dkon brtsegs): ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / skye ba dang 'byung ba shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / lam ngan pa rnam par bcad pa shes pa dang / rgyu shes pa dang / chud mi za ba
129a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / 'bras bu shes pa dang / mngon sum du bya ba spang ba shes pa dang / rkyen shes pa dang / tshogs bsags pa shes pa dang / bden pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
129a7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes la lta zhing thob par bya ba shes pa dang / rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'byung ba shes la mngon par zhen pa med pa shes pa dang / phung po shes pa dang / phung po'i bdud sra/
129b1(dkon brtsegs): bshes pa dang / khams shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa dang / skye mched shes pa dang / grong stong pa lta bur so sor rtog pa shes pa dang / sbyin pa shes pa dang /
129b2(dkon brtsegs): dus dang dus ma yin pa las mi 'da' ba shes pa dang / tshul khrims shes pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang / bzod pa shes pa dang /
129b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rjes su bsrung ba shes pa dang / brtson 'grus shes pa dang / legs pa bya ba'i las bya ba shes pa dang / bsam gtan shes pa dang / bsam gtan las ldog pa shes pa dang /
129b4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab shes pa dang / lta ba yongs su shes pa shes pa dang / thabs shes pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang / byams pa shes pa dang / sems can
129b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyab pa shes pa dang / snying rje shes pa dang / yongs su mi skyo ba shes pa dang / dga' ba shes pa dang / chos la dga' zhing rab tu dga' la mchog tu dga' ba shes pa dang /
129b6(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa shes pa dang / sems can gzhug pa shes pa dang / tha snyad shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes pa dang / gnas
129b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa la gnas pa shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba shes pa dang / mnyam pa nyid dang mi 'gal ba shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa shes pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par so so
130a1(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa shes pa dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang stobs shes pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang stobs
130a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa shes pa dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang stobs shes pa dang / chos thams cad mi brjed pa shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang
130a3(dkon brtsegs): po dang stobs shes pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang stobs shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin
130a4(dkon brtsegs): pa shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag shes pa dang / rang byung gi ye shes rjes su rtog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / lam ngan pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes
130a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / snying rje chen po la lhag par dmigs pa shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mi zad pa shes pa dang / skye ba med pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba'i
130a6(dkon brtsegs): chos la bzod pa thob pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa shes pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / chos
130a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'khor lo rab du skor ba shes pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dag par 'du ba shes pa dang / gtong
130b1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba shes pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba
130b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sdig pa thams cad mi bya ba shes pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po shes pa dang / rim pa rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang /
130b3(dkon brtsegs): thos pa'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang / tshogs thams cad kyis mi ngoms pa shes pa dang / sman thams cad shes pa dang / rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ba shes pa
130b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / gnas ma yin pa mi bya bar shes pa dang / stobs bcu shes pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg
130b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rjes su mthun pa shes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa shes pa dang / bar du gcod pa dang bar du gcod pa ma yin pa'i chos rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / 'das pa'i dus
130b6(dkon brtsegs): la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi gnas par shes pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / chos thams cad las yang dag par mi 'da'
130b7(dkon brtsegs): ba shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang rab tu gnas pa med pa shes pa dang / lus sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems
131a1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi lus la 'jug pa shes pa dang / ngag sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra rab tu dbye ba shes pa dang / yid sngon
131a2(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnam par g.yo ba rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i shes pa dang / sems can thams cad
131a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'khrul pa rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba shes pa dang /
131a4(dkon brtsegs): mi brjed pa'i shes pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can dran pa la 'jog pa shes pa dang / dgongs pa rab tu 'dzin pa shes pa dang / sems can le lo can
131a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gzung ba shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shes pa dang / gdul ba'i sems can 'dul ba rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / thabs shes pa dang / shes
131a6(dkon brtsegs): rab shes pa ste/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin te/ shes pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med pa 'thob bo// lha'i bus
131a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa de ni ngo mtshar
131b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de ni go chang mngon dang ldan pa'i yang dag par bsdu bar mi nus so/ / 'jam dpal gang de lta bu'i shes pa skyed par byed pa de'ang cho 'phrul chen po yin no//
131b2(dkon brtsegs): / bam po gsum pa ste tha ma// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' go cha legs par dgos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe
131b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis yong su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems can rnams la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' go cha legs par bgos pa yin no/ /
131b4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi gnas kyi rjes su 'jug pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// smras pa/
131b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu brtsam pa chen po nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa dang / ye shes chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pas sems
131b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu shes rab kyis gzung ba med pa'i chos la 'jug pa dang / thabs
131b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos thams cad yang dag par bsdus pas de'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya'o/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can dag pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang nyon mong
132a1(dkon brtsegs): bya d+hI rnams dang ldan sa gas shi sems can rnams rgyun na mongs pa / ra grus sa sm
132a2(dkon brtsegs): ras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can rnam par dag pa zhes bya/ sbas pa/ lha 'u 'di ltar sems can thams cad nges par 'drung ba'i lam rnam par spong bar byed pas de'i phyir sems ca
132a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pazhes s+ho/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpa ca byo dzin pa nas/ smras pa/ lha'i bu'adi lta las de la gnas nas sems can grangs med da pag tu med pa dag sa
132a4(dkon brtsegs): smin par byed pas de'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya'o/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar gdul ba'i sems can rnams shin tu
132a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba la rab tu 'god par byed pas de'i phyir rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya'o/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu ji tsam gyis/
132a6(dkon brtsegs): bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom zhing / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir srid pa len par byed pa de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba yin no// smras pa/
132a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thul par dka' ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar sngon dam bcas pa dang / sngon gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas nyan thos pa
132b1(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dag la 'dod par mi byed pa de lta bu ni thul bar dka' ba yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'phags pa yin/ smras pa/
132b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i shes rab dang thabs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir kun du snang ba de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems
132b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' mngon par 'phags pa yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yin/ sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gzung
132b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig gis sems can thams cad kyi nyes par smra ba zil gyis gnon par byed pa de lta bu ni smra ba yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na 'dul ba smra ba yin/ smras pa/
132b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gang gi tshe bdag tshul khrims la gnas la sems can thams cad kyi 'gyod pa dang kun nas ldang ba rnam par bsal ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa de lta bu ni 'dul ba smra ba yin no//
132b6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na don smra ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe chos thos pa thams cad la nan tan snying por byed cing don rjes su rtogs pa de lta bu ni don smra ba yin no//
132b7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gzhi phun su tshogs pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag
133a1(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrubs pa thams cad sems can rnams la stobs par byed pa de lta bu ni/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gzhi phun sum tshogs pa yin no//
133a2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' drang po yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe bdag gi nyes pa mi 'chab pa de lta bu ni drang po yin no// smras pa/ 'jam
133a3(dkon brtsegs): dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dam pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi gyi gyu can rnams la khong khro bar mi byed pa
133a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir dam pa yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na g.yo med pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe ji skad smras pa'i tshig las mi 'da' ba de lta bu ni g.yo med pa yin no// smras
133a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'ajam dpal ji ltar na sgyu med pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe ji ltar sems kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa de bzhin du tshig tu brjod pa de lta bu ni sku med pa yin no// smras pa
133a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na nga rgyal med pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la 'dud par byed cing mi dge ba mi byed pa de lta bu ni nga rgyal med pa yin no// smras pa
133a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin bdag yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe yongs su bsdus pa'i byang chub kyang gtong bar byed na/ dngos po gzhan dag lta spos kyang ci dgos pa'o//
133b1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe gang tshul khrims 'chal pa mthong na srog gi phyir yang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba yin no//
133b2(dkon brtsegs): sprasmras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na bzod pa sprul pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe gnod pa bzod cing gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na brtson
133b3(dkon brtsegs): 'grus dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang rnam par bsams na/ chos yang mi dmigs pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa yin/
133b4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i khams su phyis mi snang bar yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ gang shes rab kyis bya ba sgrub/
133b5(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byams pa la gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can gyi khams la stong pa nyid du rnam par lta ba yin no//
133b6(dkon brtsegs): spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na snying rje la gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur shes nas/ byang chub la brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yin no// smras pa
133b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na dga' ba la gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe thub cing zhi la rab tu zhi ba thob cing chos yongs su tshol ba la dga' bas mi ngoms pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam
134a1(dkon brtsegs): dpal ji ltar btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir 'jig rten na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams
134a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lus yongs su dag pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe yid las byung ba'i lus kyis sems
134a3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi lus dang mthun par ston pa yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na ngag yongs su dag pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can thams cad kyi sgra
134a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pas 'bras bu yod par chos ston pa yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na sems yongs su dag pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems gcig gis
134a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi sems rnams rab tu shes pa yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe
134a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs snang ba thams cad kyang mthong la/ gzugs dben par yang ston pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na lha'i rna ba thob pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sgra tham
134a7(dkon brtsegs): cad thos la sgra dben par yang ston pa yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na pha rol gyi sems la mkhas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems skyes pa zhig par gyur
134b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi sems kyi rgyun rab tu shes pa yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na sngon gyi gnas la mkhas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sngon gyi mtha'i mu rjes su dran
134b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing yang dag pa'i mtha' las kyang mi g.yo ba yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang bdud thams cad kyang ston la/
134b3(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi las rnams kyis kyang mi gos pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na 'dzul ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe ma dul ba rnams 'dul ba yin no// smras pa/
134b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na bsrungs pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu dbang po thams cad mi g.yeng ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na rnam par dul ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bugad
134b5(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe mi 'khrugs pa'i chos su gyur pa yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na zhi ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad kyis gdung ba med la/
134b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na dad pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs kyis
134b7(dkon brtsegs): phye'ang mi phyed pa yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams
135a1(dkon brtsegs): cad la byang chub rag las par mthong ba yin no/ / bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems
135a2(dkon brtsegs): skyes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so
135a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ming bshad pa de dang / skyes bu dam pa de dag gi yon tan de dag legs par smras te/
135a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yod do// lha'i bu ded dpon gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis sngon
135a5(dkon brtsegs): gyide bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur byas na/ khyod spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ma sprul pa'i sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sems dang sems
135a6(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba ji snyed 'gags pa de snyed do/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal sprul pa nyid la'ang sems dang sems las byung bdag med na ma sprul pa lta bu la ci smos/ smras pa/ lha'i bu
135a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ngo bo nyid de lta bu'i mtshan nyid yin la/ de dag la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang de lta bu yin no// spras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid
135b1(dkon brtsegs): cig nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ spras pa/ lha'i bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhig la khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid cig nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
135b2(dkon brtsegs): smad ces dris na/ tsaM de lan ljon par byed dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni cung zad kyang lan ldon par mi byed do// smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo'ang sprul pa de nyid kyi mtshan nyid
135b3(dkon brtsegs): yin pas na/ kho bos ji skad du kho bo yun ring po 'di tsam zhig nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do zhes lan gdab par bya/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na ci khyod ser sna can yin
135b4(dkon brtsegs): nam smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni ser sna can yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang yongs su
135b5(dkon brtsegs): mi gtong ba de sar sna can ma yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci zhig yongs su mi gtong / smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / sems can thams
135b6(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su mi gtong ba yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni ser sna can yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na khyod ni tshul khrims 'chal pa yin nam
135b7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni tshul khrims 'chal pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang tshul khrims 'chas
136a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de ngan song gsum po dag tu lhung ba yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no// smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo'ang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
136a2(dkon brtsegs): bsams bzhin du ngan song rnams su 'gro ste/ de'i phyir kho bo ni tshul khrims 'chal pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin nam/ smras
136a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gnod
136a4(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi sems dang ldan pa de rjes su 'chags pa med pa ma yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no// smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo'ang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / byis pa
136a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad la rjes su 'chags pa med de/ de'i phyir kho bo ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci
136a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod le lo can yin nam/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni le lo can yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu le lo
136a7(dkon brtsegs): can zhes bya ba ni gang lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis mi rtsom pa yin la/ kho bo'ang rtsom pa med cing brtul bar mi byed pa dang / len pa med pa dang / dor ba med pa yin te/
136b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir kho bo ni le lo can yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin nam/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni sems rnam par g.yeng
136b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi sems rnam par grol ba la mi gnas pa de sems rnam par g.yengs pa ma
136b3(dkon brtsegs): yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no// smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo'ang 'phags pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba la sems mi gnas pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya
136b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod shes rab 'chal pa yin nam/ smras pa/
136b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni shes rab 'chal pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang 'khor bas mi skrag cing / sems
136b6(dkon brtsegs): can rmongs pa rnams dang lhan cig na dga' ba de shes rab 'chal pa ma yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no// smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo'ang 'khor bas mi skrag cing de dag
136b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can rmongs pa rnams dang lhan cig na dga' ba yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni shes rab 'chal pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal
137a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag bsad pa gsod pa'i sems skyed pa rnams so// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams
137a2(dkon brtsegs): tede skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu bsad pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang / zhe snang dang / gti mug rnams te/ gang de dag gsod par byed pa de ni bsad pa gsod par byed pa yin pas
137a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni 'jig rten na sbyin gnas yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis bshad pa de lta bu ni 'jig rten gnas pa skrag par 'gyur ba yin no// smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te yang dag pa'i mtha'
137a4(dkon brtsegs): skrag par 'gyur na ni 'jig rten gnas pa'ang skrag par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang dag
137a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis bshad pa 'di spong bar 'gyur ba de dag gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de dag ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsamasate
137a6(dkon brtsegs): de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu pha rol gyi sgra nyan pa ma spangs par ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thob par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyon med par zhugs pa la ni yi ge'i 'jug pa med
137a7(dkon brtsegs): bas na/ gang dag mos par gyur pa de dag ni rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu rnam par
137b1(dkon brtsegs): grol ba ni yang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba med do/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ngam pa'i chos spong ba rnams ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin no// sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang dag na
137b2(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba de dag thams cad sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos bstan pa ni gnyen po med pa yin no// smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid dang /
137b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la ni gnyen po brjod par mi nus so// smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni ci zhig la gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid la
137b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ni sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can ma gtogs par stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems
137b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems can gyi khams kyi mtha' khong du chud pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar mthong zhing de la rtag pa dang / chad pa'i mtha' lta bar mi
137b6(dkon brtsegs): ltung ba de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams kyi mtha' khong du chud pa yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can gyi khams gang dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu sems
137b7(dkon brtsegs): can gyi khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi khams dang ldan pa yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings khams gang dang ldan pa yin/ spras pa/ lha'i bu nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi khams dang ldan pa
138a1(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam mkha'i khams gang dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i khams dang
138a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal yul gang sangs rgyas kyi yul yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu mig gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mig dang /
138a3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no// rna ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rna ba dang / sgra dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no//
138a4(dkon brtsegs): sna'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni sna dang / dri dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no// lce'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul
138a5(dkon brtsegs): ni lce dang / ro dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no// lus kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lus dang / reg bya dang / rnam par shes pa'i
138a6(dkon brtsegs): yul ma yin no/ / yid kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni yid dang / chos dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no// gzugs kyi yul ni sangs rgyas
138a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gzugs su rung ba'i yul ma yin no// tshor ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni myong ba'i yul ma yin no// 'du shes
138b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni kun tu g.yo ba'i yul ma yin no// 'du byed kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mngon par
138b2(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed pa'i yul ma yin no/ / rnam par shes pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rnam par rig pa'i yul ma yin no// ma rig pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi
138b3(dkon brtsegs): yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rgyu dang rkyen gyi yul ma yin no// rga shi'i bar dag gi yul sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i yul ma yin no//
138b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'dod chags so sor rnam par rig pa'i yul ma yin no// gzugs kyi khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul
138b5(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'i yul ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lta ba las rnam
138b6(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba'i yul ma yin no/ / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gnyis su sbyor ba'i yul ma yin no// 'dus byas kyi khams kyi
138b7(dkon brtsegs): yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mtshan nyid gsum dang ldan pa'i yul ma yin no// lha'i bu de ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ mtha' dang mtha' ma yin pa yul
139a1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i phyir yul der ni yul thams cad 'dus shing khong du chud pa yin no/ / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni yul de lta bur zhugs shing don gyi yul thams cad la rnam
139a2(dkon brtsegs): par spyod kyang bdud kyi yul thob pa'ang ma yin te/ des ni bdud kyi yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul yang mnyam zhing dben pa'i yul du mngon par rdzogs par khong du chud do// lha'i bu gang mnyam pa
139a3(dkon brtsegs): dang mi mnyam pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang / mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi 'da' ba 'di'ang cho 'phrul chen po yin no// de la mnyam pa nyid ni gang / mi mnyam pa nyid
139a4(dkon brtsegs): ni gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mnyam pa nyid yin no// gang dag mnyam pa nyid la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'
139a5(dkon brtsegs): ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang stong pa nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o/ / chos thams cad mtshan ma med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no// gang dag mnyam
139a6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang mtshan ma med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo'o// chos thams
139a7(dkon brtsegs): cad smon pa med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no/ / gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs
139b1(dkon brtsegs): su smin par byed kyang smon pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o/ / chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no// gang
139b2(dkon brtsegs): dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las
139b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi g.yo'o/ / chos thams cad skye ba med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'byung ba med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'gag pa med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar mnyam pa nyid
139b4(dkon brtsegs): dang dben par mnyam pa nyid dang / dngos po med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'gog par mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no//
139b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo ste/
139b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu de ltar mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa yin no// de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon
139b7(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams
140a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa bsam kyis mi khyab pa yin/ spras pa/ lha'i bu 'dod
140a2(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// zhe sdang gi spyod pa
140a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// gti mug gi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
140a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ shes rab kyi bya ba sgrub par byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// ser sna med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam
140a5(dkon brtsegs): kyispyod pa yin te/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ tshul khrims
140a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/ / gnod sems med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ bzod pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no//
140a7(dkon brtsegs): le lo med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// rnam par g.yeng ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub
140b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// 'chal pa'i shes rab med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
140b2(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// nyon mongs pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ nyon mongs pa med pas rlom sems
140b3(dkon brtsegs): su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/ / nang dang phyi'i dngos po yongs su gtong bas brtse ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// bu dang / bu mo dang / chung
140b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yongs su gtong bas mngon par dka' ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / 'dod pa'i yon tan la spyod pas rtag tu gnod sems kyi spyod pa ni byang chub sems
140b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sdud pas mi lta ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// lus dang srog la mi lta bas lta ba med pa'i spyod
140b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su gtong bas tsham chom med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// 'khor ba
140b7(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pas mi skrag pas 'jigs pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / sems can thams cad kyi khur sgrol bas khur chen po sgrol ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub
141a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / sngar dam bcas pa nyams su lon par byed pas phyir mi ldog pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// rjes
141a2(dkon brtsegs): su 'gyod pa med pas yid la gcags pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / theg pa thams cad zil gyis mnan pas mngon par 'phags pa'i spyod pa ni
141a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / yid dam ma zhig pas go cha rdo rje lta bu'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi sems
141a4(dkon brtsegs): la nges par sems pas rang gi sems la nges par sems pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / las byas pa chud mi za ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
141a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas tha dad pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// dgra thams cad nges par bcom
141a6(dkon brtsegs): pas dpa' ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / skal ba mnyam pa'i skye bo dang mthun par 'jug pas ma 'dres pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod
141a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ / gage ba dang sdang ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pas rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sangs rgyas blta ba dang /
141b1(dkon brtsegs): mnyan pa dang / bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba la mchog tu dga' bas dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
141b2(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyan par byed pas rgyan gyi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// mnyam pa dang
141b3(dkon brtsegs): mi mnyam pa'i gnyen por gyur pas zil gyis mi gnon pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / skye bo mkhas shing mdzangs pa rnams kyis rab du bsngags
141b4(dkon brtsegs): pas ngan pa ma yin pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / tshul bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa rnams shin tu nges par brtag pas mi brdzi ba'i spyod pa ni byang
141b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / khur blangs pa nyams su lon pas skyes bu dam pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// brtson 'grus
141b6(dkon brtsegs): brtan pos phyir mi ldog pas khyad par du 'gro ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par sdud pas chos spyod pa ni byang chub
141b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pas byas pa shes shing byas pa gzo ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//
142a1(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog gsum 'dri bar mi byed pas dkon mchog gi spyod pa ni byang chu sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sdud pa dang yongs su gcod pas shes
142a2(dkon brtsegs): rab dang thabs kyi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub
142a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
142a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa de ni legs par smras so// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag spyod pa de dang ma bral ba de dag ni de nyid kyis lung bstan pa yin no// /
142a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe nga spyod pa de dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me
142a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad kyis nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ der ngas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha'i bu gang spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams
142a7(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa de lta bu de dag rab tu 'byed par byed pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i
142b1(dkon brtsegs): bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das mi skye ba zhes bgyi ba ni ci lags/ 'jug pa gang gis ni byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa lags//
142b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu mi skye ba zhes bya ba de ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i mu'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig bla dgas yin te/ de ni sngon byung bar gyur la phyis ma byung bar gyur pa
142b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas ma byung ba nyid yin no// de ni sngon srid par gyur la phyis mi srid par gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas mi srid pa nyid yin no// de ni sngon skyes par gyur
142b4(dkon brtsegs): la phyis ma skyes par gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid yin no// de ni sngon mngon par 'dus byas pa yin la phyis mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ma yin te/ de ni gnod pa
142b5(dkon brtsegs): nas mngon par 'dus ma byas pa nyid yin no/ / de ni sngon yod par gyur la phyis med par gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas 'gyur ba med pa nyid yin no// de ni sngon gang zag tu
142b6(dkon brtsegs): bgrang bar gyur la phyis gang zag tu mi bgrang bar gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas stong pa nyid yin no// de ni sngon mtshan mar bgrang bar gyur la phyis mtshan mar mi bgrang bar gyur pa ma
142b7(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas mtshan ma med pa nyid yin no// gang gis de ltar rjes su rtogs pa dang / sems kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa la mngon par zhen pa med par rtogs pade
143a1(dkon brtsegs): ni mi skye ba zhes bya'o/ / de la bzod pa gang zhe na/ de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad la'ang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o// de dag
143a2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du zhing thams cad la'ang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/ / de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la'ang bzod pa
143a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/ / de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la'ang bzod
143a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/ / de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin chos thams cad la'ang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o// bzod pa de'ang skad cig pa yin te/ gang gis skad cig pa yin zhe na/
143a5(dkon brtsegs): skad cig pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no// stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no// mtshan ma med pa ni mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin no// ji ltar stong pa nyid
143a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no// ji ltar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
143a7(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par shes
143b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no/ / ji ltar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi kham
143b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang chos kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no/ / ji ltar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du skye mched thams
143b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang skye mched rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin te/ skad cig pa gang yin pa de ni ya ma brla yin no// ya ma brla gang yin pa de ni gsog yin no// gsog gang
143b4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni gsob yin no/ / gsob gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags med pa yin no// 'dod chags med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no// 'dod chags dang bral
143b5(dkon brtsegs): ba gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid med pa yin no/ / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa yin te/ de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / skad cig pa dang / ya ma brla dang //
143b6(dkon brtsegs): dben pa dang / gsog ces bya ste/ chos thams cad la de ltar bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o// bzod pa de'ang bzod pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin te/ de ltar mnyam pa nyid
143b7(dkon brtsegs): thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lung bstan pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa yin no// bzod pa de'ang dmigs pas rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ de la dmigs pa gang zhe na/
144a1(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe bdag dang bzod pa gnyis kar dmigs na de ni dmigs pa zhes bya'o// sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / bzod
144a2(dkon brtsegs): pa gnyis kar dmigs na de ni dmigs pa zhes bya'o/ / de la dmigs pa med pa gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe bdag dang bzod pa gnyis kar mi dmigs pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o//
144a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang bzod pa gnyis kar mi dmigs pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ phung po dang / khams
144a4(dkon brtsegs): dang skye mched rnams kyi chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid gtan med pa yin no/ / ngo bo nyid gtan med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa yin te/ ngo bo nyid
144a5(dkon brtsegs): de dang bzod pa de la gnyis su rjes su rtog par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ / lha'i bu bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa
144a6(dkon brtsegs): grangs med par spyod pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa yin no/ / bzod pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
144a7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ / 'jig rten 'di snang ba chen pos kyang khyab par gyur to// sil snyan brgya stong yang ma dkrol bar sgra 'khrol bar gyur to//
144b1(dkon brtsegs): me tog gi char pa dag kyang rab tu bab bo// srog chags bzhi khri nyis stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// byang chub
144b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dgu khri drug stong gis ni chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'dir ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mar me
144b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can du zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu'ang kun du snang bar gyur to/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// gang gi tshe sangs
144b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ chos nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer du ma kha dog sna tshogs kha dog 'bum phrag du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang /
144b5(dkon brtsegs): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod kha dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang
144b6(dkon brtsegs): bas khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ nyi ma dang zla ba dag gi 'od kyang zil gyis mnan nas yang phyir log te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas
144b7(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.ya
145a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du tshul dang 'dra ba'i
145a2(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ / thub pa ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad gyur pa// mi mnyam gzi brjid mnga' ba khyod la zhu// 'od kyi bkod pa mdzad pa khyod la zhu// rab rib nyon mongs
145a3(dkon brtsegs): spong ba khyod la zhu/ / bde gshegs ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa// gti mug tshogs rnams 'joms pa khyod la zhu// bdud dpung tha mar mdzad pa khyod la zhu// stobs bcu'i stobs
145a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa khyod la zhu/ / rgyal ba ci skad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa// sum cu rtsa gnyis yon tan mtshan brgyan pa// bde gshegs rab dga' bde ba mdzad pa po// gzugs kyi dam pa
145a5(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ba khyod la zhu/ / bcom ldan ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa// mkhyen pa mtha' yas yon tan bstod pa po// ye shes 'byung gnas 'gro ba shes mdzad pa// ye shes ljon shing
145a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa mchog la zhu/ / 'jig rten gsum grags grags pa mtha' yas pa// gsum rig dri gsum tha mar mdzad pa po// 'jig rten gsum rig rnam thar gsum mthar byon// ci yi
145a7(dkon brtsegs): slad du 'dzum pa bstan pa mdzad/ / sman pa dam pa skye rga mthar mdzad pa// bcom ldan zhabs la dra mchog 'khor lo mnga'// sred med sras po rdo rje mkhregs pa po// thub pa 'dzum
145b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad sbyor ba bka' stsal gsol/ / gang gis spyod pa de ni rnam sbyangs ma// gang 'dir bzod pa de dag yongs rdzogs sam// gang sems sangs rgyas yon tan des gyur tam/ rgyam
145b2(dkon brtsegs): slad du thub chen 'dzum pa mdzad/ / bde gshegs zla med rgyu zhig mi mnga' bar// bcom ldan 'dren pa 'dzum pa mi ston pas// de thos sems can glo ba rangs gyur gyis// tshangs pa'i
145b3(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs can legs par gsung dbyung gsol/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
145b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags bdun khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sum khrinyis
145b5(dkon brtsegs): stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / kun dga' bo gzhan yang khyod kyi lha'i bu ded dpon 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan
145b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo lha'i bu ded dpon 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag la bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod
145b7(dkon brtsegs): pa byas/ yongs su zhu ba byas/ yongs su dri ba byas shing / sems can dpag tu med pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go// kun dka'
146a1(dkon brtsegs): bo lha'i bu ded dpon 'di ni bskal pa grangs med pa sum brgya 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa zhes
146a2(dkon brtsegs): bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
146a3(dkon brtsegs): dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
146a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa de'ang rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/
146a5(dkon brtsegs): gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po las grub cing lag mthil ltar mnyam la/ rin po che'i dra ba sna tshog
146a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis mig mangs ris su kun nas bkab par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams der nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gi ming yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan mu stegs can spyod
146a7(dkon brtsegs): pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dag dang / bdud rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems can rnams kyi ming yang med cing mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi khom
146b1(dkon brtsegs): pa brgyad po dag kyang med la/ bza' ba dang btung ba dag kyang yid la bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na lta ba dang / 'khrul pa'i nyes pa
146b2(dkon brtsegs): dang sdug bsngal gyi sgra'ang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / sems can de dag gi longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa'ang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang
146b3(dkon brtsegs): nye bar spyod pa ci 'dra ba de lta bur 'gyur ro/ / sems can de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / phal cher
146b4(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de ni yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan
146b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcur 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang smon lam gyi dbang gis bar ma dor 'chi ba'i
146b6(dkon brtsegs): dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni dung phyur phrag drug dang / bye ba phrag gnyis su 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'
146b7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa dang / gang dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams yongs
147a1(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa der skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rgyal por
147a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/ de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor de nyid du lha'i bu spyan
147a3(dkon brtsegs): ras gzigs shes bya ba zhig 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man da ra ba dag gis mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
147a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag kyang gang gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe//
147a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa der skye zhing 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing
147a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o/ /
147a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo lha'i bu spyan ras gzigs 'di ni gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
147b1(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rgyal po'i 'od de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ 'di'ang der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lags mthong /
147b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa dpag tu med pa byas shing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das
147b3(dkon brtsegs): de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
147b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston
