147b5(dkon brtsegs): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'od ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo rgyal po legs mthong de'ang dus gzhan zhig na/ bu thu bo rgyal srid la bzhag nas/
147b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ byang chub
147b7(dkon brtsegs): s ems dpa' de la byang chub sems dpa' legs mthong 'di ni nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
148a1(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ lha'i bu
148a2(dkon brtsegs): ded dpon la 'di skad ces smras so/ / lha'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan tam/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu kho bo ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa lung
148a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa ltar lung bstan te/ da ltar gyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de lta bu yin pas/ de bzhin nyid de la ni 'phel ba'ang med la yongs su 'grib pa'ang med do//
148a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyi chos kyi rnam grang 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ shod cig/
148a5(dkon brtsegs): kun chub par gyis shig/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan pa dang bde ba rjes su yongs su gzung
148a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i
148a7(dkon brtsegs): ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/
148b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / rin po che thams cad kyi le'u zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ kun dka' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs bu mo gang dag
148b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / mos pa dang / mos nas kyang yi ger 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par
148b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ston par byed pa de dag ni bsod nams thams cad yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
148b4(dkon brtsegs): bo dang / lha'i bu ded dpon dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
148b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ cho 'phrul chen po
148b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa lha'i bu ded dpon gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so// // sh+lau ka dgu brgya bam po gsum mo// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzo na mi tra dang /
148b7(dkon brtsegs): su ren dra bo d+hi dang / lo tsa ba zhang ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mai tre ya ma hA sing
149a1(dkon brtsegs): ha nA da na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po/
149a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
149a3(dkon brtsegs): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras
149a4(dkon brtsegs): gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan
149a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/ / de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to//
149a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
149a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na bdag bcom ldan 'das de
149b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu ba lags so/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// /
149b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
149b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal bas legs
149b4(dkon brtsegs): par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar rnal 'byor du dkyi lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
149b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs legs so legs so// 'od srungs khyod 'di ltar skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye
149b6(dkon brtsegs): bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la
149b7(dkon brtsegs): don de lta bu yosas su 'dri bar sems pa ni'ang khyod legs so/ / 'od srungs de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// tshe dang ldan
150a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'od srungs chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces
150a2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to/ / 'od srungs 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas
150a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa dang / cho ga phun sum tshogs pa dang / spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa dang / kha na ma tho ba phra rab tsam dag
150a4(dkon brtsegs): la'ang 'jigs par lta ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs te bslab par bya'o// brkam chags med pa dang / tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / kha gsag med pa dang //
150a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhog slongs med pa dang / thob kyis 'jal ba med pa dang / rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa med pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa dang / khrel yod pa dang ldan pa dang / 'dzem
150a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan par bya'o/ / 'khor ba la yid skrag pa dang / nges par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / nges par 'byung ba la mngon par brtson pa dang / 'khor ba la rtag du yid skyo ba
150a7(dkon brtsegs): dang mya ngan las 'da' ba la phan yon du blta bar bya zhing / shing drung na 'dug kyang rung / ril 'dug kyang rung / gnas khang na 'dug kyang rung / phug na 'dug kyang rung // des
150b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las yid la bya ste/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa//
150b2(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gdung brgyud phun sum tshogs
150b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims kyis dpag tu med pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam
150b4(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas dpag tu med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis dpag tu med pa/ yon tan gyi tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / tshad
150b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa ldan pa/ bden pa gsungs pa/ yang dag pa gsungs pa/ ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du mdzad pa/ mi slu bar mdzad pa/ 'phags pa/ sman pa chen po/ zug rngu 'byin
150b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ma gsol bar/ bshes gnyen mdzad pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ ded dpon chen po yin te/ de ni chos mya ngan las 'das pa/ zab pa zab par snang ba/ zhi ba zhi bar ston
150b7(dkon brtsegs): pa stong pa/ sems can med pa/ 'khrul pa med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan ma yang dag par chad pa/ smon pa med pa/ smon pa dang bral ba/ spros pa med pa/ spros pa dang bral ba/
151a1(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ nye bar gtod pa/ dngos po dang bral ba/ dben pa dben pa dang bral ba/ dngos po med pa/ dngos pos ma/
151a2(dkon brtsegs): gos pa/ rgyu ba med pa/ rgyu ba yang dag par chad pa/ 'gro dang bral ba/ brjod du med pa/ brjod pa dang bral ba/ rlom sems med pa/ kun tu bstan pa/ rnyog pa med
151a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rnyog pa dang bral ba/ blang ba med pa/ dor ba med pa/ sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba/ sred pa yang dag par chad pa/ ston par mdzad pa/ yang dag par ston par mdzad pa yin no/
151a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes rnam pa las yid la bya'o// 'od srungs de la dge slong gcig pu dben par song ste nang du yang dag 'jogs la zhugs pas ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las yid la bya ste/
151a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis mi'i lus thob cing rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po'ang thob/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'ang mnyes par byas pas na/ bdag le lo byed pa dang /
151a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba sna tshogs kyi 'du 'dzis g.yen spyo zhing gnas pa ni bdag gi ma chi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag la 'bras bu ma thob pa kho nar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de lta bu'ang/
151a7(dkon brtsegs): yod la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na u dum+ba ra'i me tog ltar brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ de ltan bdag gis da ltar
151b1(dkon brtsegs): byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las yid la bya'o// 'od srungs de
151b2(dkon brtsegs): la dge slong gis ni khyod dang gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi rjes su bslab par bya ste/ 'od srungs 'di ltar khyod nga ma mthong ma thos par 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
151b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa de dag gi rjes su slob pa na rab tu byung ba ni/ 'od srungs chos 'dul ba 'di nyid la mdzes par gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du
151b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong zhing / mthong nas kyang nye bar 'ongs te/ rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gsol bar byed pa de dag gi rab tu byung ba ni/ de'i 'og tu'ang de
151b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas rjes su mkhyen to/ / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo don gyi dbang gnyis mthong bas ni/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar
151b6(dkon brtsegs): khas blang bar bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ tshe 'di la 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa na bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'od srungs de la
151b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu blun po kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gos ngur smrig dag bgos shing rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po khas blangs te/ bslab pa rnams
152a1(dkon brtsegs): khas blangs nas gnas khang du song ngam/ phug tu song ste/ sgo bcad nas 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag la rnam par rtog par byed cing / gnod sems kyi
152a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag dang / lhung bzed dang chos gos kyi rnam par rtog pa dgra dang / mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang slongs mo ster ba'i khyim gyi rnam
152a3(dkon brtsegs): par rtog pa dag la rnam par rtog par yang byed la/ de dag 'di snyam du'ang sems te/ bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mi mkhyen/ mi rig/ rnam par mi rtogs so snyam
152a4(dkon brtsegs): du'ang sems so/ / 'od srungs gang gi tshe dge slong gnas khang na 'dug kyang rung / phug na 'dug kyang rung / 'chags na 'dug kyang rung ste/ 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gam
152a5(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dag kam/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag gam/ mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag la rnam par rtog par byed pa de'i tshe/ gnas
152a6(dkon brtsegs): khang ngam/ phug gam/ 'chag sa de na lha gang dag gnyug mar gnas pa de dag gis/ dge slong de'i sems sems kyis shes nas/ de dag 'di snyam du dge slong 'di gang gi phyir legs
152a7(dkon brtsegs): par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung la/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa de lta bu dag la rnam par rtog par byed pa ni mi rigs so snyam nas yi mi rangs pa dang / sdug bsngal
152b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yi mi de par gyurate/ 'od srungs de lawa de dgal 'a cig ni sprul ba yang byed/ cig gis ni snong pa yin pa nas kyang du bsad de 'chad par yang byed /
152b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs ltos dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang / shes pa chung ngu dang ldan pa'i lha de dag gis kyang gzhan gyi sems shes na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
152b3(dkon brtsegs): grangs med pa nas legs par spyod pa spyad pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'od srungs de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mi mkhyen pa'am/ ma gzigs pa'am/ thugs su ma chud pa 'am/
152b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du ma mdzad pa ci'ang mi mnga' ste/ 'od srungs de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / dus las rnam par grol ba dang //

152b6(dkon brtsegs): chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bas bdag nyid la rag lus par shes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen la/ gang dag phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i
152b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang bdag gis sems thugs kyis mkhyen pas na/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs
153a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas dge sbyong gi chom rkun mi bya'o zhes bslab par bya'o/ / 'od srungs de la dge sbyong gi chom rkun gang zhe na/ bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong
153a2(dkon brtsegs): gi chom rkun yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'od srungs 'di la dge sbyong gi kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs la gnas shing/ de'ang tshul khrims 'chal pa dang sdig pa'i
153a3(dkon brtsegs): chos can yin par gyur na/ de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun dang po yin no// dben pa'i gnas su song ste gnas pa na/ mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag la rnam par rtog par byed na/

153a6(dkon brtsegs): par byed na/ de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun bzhi pa yin te/ 'od srungs bzhi po de dag ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun yin no// 'od srungs mi gtum pa/ brlang ba/ drag shul gyi las dang

153b1(dkon brtsegs): brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab pam/ khu tshur gyis bsnun te/ pham par byas nas/ nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu

154a5(dkon brtsegs): srungs mi gnyis pa ches gtum pa ches brlang ba/ ches drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/ ches nyams stobs dang ldan pa/ ches stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa gang la la

154b6(dkon brtsegs): tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du skyed de/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mi zad pa skyed pa yin no// 'od/

155a1(dkon brtsegs): brlang ba/ ches shin tu drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/ ches shin tu nyams stobs dang ldan pa/ ches shin tu stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung

155b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas/ gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid phyir mi 'ong ba yin par khas 'che bar byed cing / tha na bsod
155b2(dkon brtsegs): snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du skyed de/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mi bang
155b3(dkon brtsegs): pa skyed pa yin no/ / 'od srungs stong chung ngu phra mo'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mi gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod rnams lta zhog gi/ 'od srungs
155b4(dkon brtsegs): mi bzhi pa ches shin tu rab tu gtum pa/ ches shin tu rab tu brlang ba/ ches shin tu rab tu drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/ ches shin tu rab tu nyams stobs dang ldan pa/ ches
155b5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rab tu stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/ 'od srungs mi des stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
155b6(dkon brtsegs): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag
155b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dbyug pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis bdab bam/ khu tshur gyis bsnun te pham par byas nas/ nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod 'gron bu dang / gser dang
156a1(dkon brtsegs): nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs/
156a2(dkon brtsegs): dang khang khyim dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / stan gyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa dang /
156a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i bde ba'i yo byad ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/ 'od srungs 'di ji snyam du sems// gzhi de las mi de
156a4(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed snyam mam/ 'od srungs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang du skyed lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mang du skyed lags
156a5(dkon brtsegs): so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so so'i skye bo yin
156a6(dkon brtsegs): par shes bzhin du/ de rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas/ gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid dgra bcom pa yin par khas 'che bar
156a7(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / ci nas kyang gzhan dag gis dgra bcom pa yin par shes par bya'o snyam nas/ dgra bcom pa steng du 'byung ba ltar steng du 'byung bar byed/ dgra bcom pa'i dpe ston pa ltar
156b1(dkon brtsegs): dpe ston par yang byed la/ de la sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa de lta bu dang ldan pas tha na gzhan gyis byin pa'i dad pas byin pa bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na//
156b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du skyed de/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mi zad pa skyed pa yin no// 'od srungs de lta bas na gang stong
156b3(dkon brtsegs): gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad 'phrog par spro ba de ni/ sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa de lta bu des dad pas byin pa yongs su longs spyod
156b4(dkon brtsegs): par byed de/ 'od srungs ngas ni sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa de las gzhan pa rab tu byung ba'i chos shin tu tha chad cig shos gzhan ma mthong ngo // 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni nyan thos
156b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg pa pa rab tu byung ba'i sdig pa 'dod pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'dod pa dang / gzhan
156b6(dkon brtsegs): yang rgyal rigs kyi rigs dag 'dod pa dang / bram ze'i rigs dag 'dod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rab tu byung ba'i sdig pa 'dod pa yin no// gang du 'ga'
156b7(dkon brtsegs): zhig la smon par byed na/ cher na mya ngan las 'das pa la smon par byed na'ang / de'ang de'i sdig pa 'dod pa nyid yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas de la dgongs nas/ dge slong
157a1(dkon brtsegs): dag dA ni cher na phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'ang rung ste/ skad cig tsam skye ba la'ang bsngags pa mi brjod do zhes ston no//
157a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi dri ma ste/ rab tu byung bas de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du mi bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'jig tshogs la mngon par zhen pa dang /
157a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang / bslab pa las 'da' ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni dge sbyong gi dri ma yin te/ rab tu byung bas de
157a4(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad kyi thams cad du mi bya'o/ / 'od srungs dge sbyong dang bram ze 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa sdig pa 'dod pa med pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ drang po'i rang bzhin can/ g.yo
157a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ sgyu can ma yin pa/ khengs pa ma yin pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 'dod pa rnams kyi ched du ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
157a6(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas pas na/ 'od srungs de dag dbugs 'byin par byed par brjod par bya ste/ de thos na rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa dag dga' ba dang mgu bar 'gyur ro// 'od
157a7(dkon brtsegs): srungs rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las ldan
157b1(dkon brtsegs): par bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas pa bas ni yang dag par zhugs pa/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/ 'tsho ba
157b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa zhig gis sbyin pa po gang gis dad pas byin pa tha na chu snod gang tsam zhig bdag gir byas par gyur na/ de nyid de la bsod nams kyi phung po ches rgya cher 'gyur gyi/ gling
157b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas
157b4(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa bya ba de la ni de lta ma yin no/ / 'od srungs ji ltar mi blun po sdig pa 'dod pa dang ldan pa des gang gi drung nas chos gos sam/ bsod snyoms yongs su longs spyad pa de'i don ngo
157b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su nyams par byed pa de ltar ni dgra bo dang / gshed ma dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgras kyang yongs su nyams par byed mi nus so// 'od srungs bzhi po 'di
157b6(dkon brtsegs): dag ni rab tu byung ba'i nyon mongs pa cha phra ba rnams yin te/ rab tu byung ba nyon mongs pa cha phra ba de dag dang ldan na 'di lta ste/ dper na mda' 'phangs pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal
157b7(dkon brtsegs): pabar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog gi chos nyid dang ldan pa dang / sdom pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde thos nas tshul khrims kyi nyes pa
158a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byin par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dka' las 'das sam/ bslab pa las 'das na lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'chab par byed cing / rnam

158a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'jig rten rgyang 'phan pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni dge sbyong ltar bcos pa yin no// 'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni rab tu byung ba'i rgyags shing bag med pa

159a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la gtam 'di yongs su dris pas khyod la ci byas thong zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srungs gal te de bzhin gshegs pas mi

161a2(dkon brtsegs): ngas kyang de ltar shes te/ 'on kyang khyod las dpe'i spobs pa de lta bu thos na skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag kun du skyo ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur bas na/ ngas shes bzhin du khyod la dris pa yin

161b1(dkon brtsegs): ba de'i gan du mi la la zhig mchis nas/ 'di skad ces kye skyes bu kho bo'i gter 'di khyod la gtams kyis/ khyod kyis gter 'di legs par sba ba dang / legs par bsrung bar gyis shig/

161b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa'i bgyi ba de dang don de yongs su sgrub par rngo mi thog lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di 'khor 'di nyid du 'dus te/ mngon du

162a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dzin pa 'gyur/ rgyas par bgyid/
162a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang
162a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang
162a4(dkon brtsegs): bskur ba'i bu thu bo gang lags pa de ni/ rgyal po'i 'og tu rgyal sring bgyid du stsol bar 'gyur ba lags pas/ de ni rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de nyid mchis bzhin
162a5(dkon brtsegs): du'ang / rgyal srid la spro bar bgyid cing chos dang ldan par yang 'gyur la/ de 'di snyam du'ang sems lags te/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'di'i 'og tu ni
162a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis rgyal po bgyi'o snyam nas dbugs 'byin pa thob par yang 'gyur zhing / 'di ltar rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang dag lags pa de dag la'ang mngon par brtson par bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan
162a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di'ang 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid kyi rgyal srid chen po bgyid du stsol bar 'gyur ba
162b1(dkon brtsegs): lags pas/ 'dis ni dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrung ba la mngon par brtson par bgyi 'tshal lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnas brtan 'od/
162b2(dkon brtsegs): srungs chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs legs so legs so// ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser
162b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi mdog can brkyang nas/ bskul pa bye ba grangs med par dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyag 'jam pa/ mchog tu mnyen pa/ ka tsa lin di ka wAr rig na bde ba/
162b4(dkon brtsegs): skyegs kyi khu bas bsgos pa'i mdog 'dra ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i mgo bor bzhag ste byugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod phyi
162b5(dkon brtsegs): ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe na/ dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrung ba dang / yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / yongs
162b6(dkon brtsegs): su gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir spo bar gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
162b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pa'i spyi bor phyag g.yas pa gser gyi mdog can bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas skad cig de nyid la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lan gsum du rab tu
163a1(dkon brtsegs): g.yos te/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'phrul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ phun/
163a2(dkon brtsegs): tu rab tu ldeg cing / 'jig rten du snang ba chen po'ang byung bar gyur/ sa zla ba dang / bar snang la gnas pa dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems
163a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la/ 'phags pa byams pa khyod skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal
163a4(dkon brtsegs): po che'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrung ba dang / yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / yongs su gzung bar spro bar mdzod cig ces smras so//
163a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs te/ bcom
163a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can gcig gi don gyi slad du'ang
163a7(dkon brtsegs): slad ma'i mtha' mu'i bar du 'khor ba na 'khor bar yang spro lags na/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin
163b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di kun du bsrung ba dang rgyas par bgyi lags so/ /
163b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs ma thag tu/ de nas yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
163b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
163b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag ni su la'ang 'gran par mi bgyid/ nga rgyal mi bgyid lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba 'di dag
163b5(dkon brtsegs): ni skyes bu dam pa'i sug las lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas khur gang 'deg par bgyid pa'i khur de lta bu de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis 'deg par rngo mi thog/
163b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byams pa legs so legs so//
163b7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar nga'i spyan snga na khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir seng ge'i sgra 'di lta bu sgrogs par byed pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
164a1(dkon brtsegs): snyed dag gi spyan snga dag na'ang byang chub sems dpa' rnams seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa
164a2(dkon brtsegs): dang bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa
164a3(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpar mchid kyis 'che ba/ dge sbyong du mchid kyis 'che ba/ glen pa blun po rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'tshal ba/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti la gdub
164a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / mdza' bshes kyi sdum pa dang / slongs mo ster ba'i sdum pa la gdu ba/ bsod snyoms la sbyor bar brtson pa/ de dag gi nongs pa'i gnas bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/
164a5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag gis rgyu de dag thos na/ de dag rtogs pas myur ba myur bar gcod par bgyid cing / nongs pa de dag las bdag nyid srung bar bgyid
164a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag las kyang la la de de bzhin gshegs pas bdag mkhyen cing de bzhin gshegs pas bdag rtogs so// rab tu rtogs so zhes de
164a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la dang ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la
164b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ces bka' stsal to/ / byams pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gi nyes pa'i gnas gang yin pa cung zad
164b2(dkon brtsegs): tsam zhig bstan par bya ste/ byams pa de la phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa' khas 'che ba mang po 'byung ba de dag gi sdig pa 'dod pa gang yin pa de dag bshad
164b3(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ / byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba yin par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rnyed pa 'dod pa dang /
164b4(dkon brtsegs): bkur sti 'dod pa dang / g.yo byed pa dang / yang ba'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa yin te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpar
164b5(dkon brtsegs): khas 'che ba yin par rig par bya'o/ / byams pa de la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i rus lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba khyi'i chos kun tu spyod pa mang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ byam
164b6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di lta ste/ dper na khyi ni sngon lan 'ga' phyin pa'i khyim gzhan zhig tu khyi gzhan zhig rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong na/ khyim 'di ni bdag gi yin no snyam nas/ de la zugs par byed
164b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khren skad 'byin/ khro bas lta bar byed/ gnod sems kyis nyes pa skyed par byed de/ gzhan gyi khyim bdag gir byed cing bdag gi yin par 'du shes skyed par byed do// byams pa de bzhin du phyi/
165a1(dkon brtsegs): ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba khyi'i chos kun tu spyod pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang / gzhan gyi
165a2(dkon brtsegs): khyim dang gzhan gyi grong dag la bdag nyid kyi yin par 'du shes skyed par byed cing / bdag nyid kyi yin par 'du shes bskyed nas kyang yongs su 'dzin par byed de/ dge slong des sngon byin pa'i
165a3(dkon brtsegs): khyim der dge slong gzhan zhig 'os mthong na/ de khyim 'di ni bdag gi yin no snyam nas khro bas lta bar byed/ gnod sems skyed par byed/ 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang
165a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyed pa skyed par byed/ phan tshun dbyen gyi tshig smra bar byed/ tshig rtsub po rjod par byed/ gcig la gcig dge slong che ge mo zhes bya ba la nyes pa 'di lta bu yod do// dge slong ma che
165a5(dkon brtsegs): mo zhes bya ba la nyes pa 'di lta bu yod do zhes mi snyan pa rjod par byed cing / khyim bdag la'ang gal te khyod kho bo dang sten par 'dod na/ dge slong che ge mo zhig dang bsten par mi bya zhing / dge
165a6(dkon brtsegs): slong ma che ge mo zhig dang yang ma sten cig ces zer te/ de dag ni skyugs pa'i rgyur gyur pa ring du mi gnas pa smad par bya ba'i kha zas tsam gyi phyir bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skyed pa yin no//
165a7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni yi dgas kyi yon tan gyi chos kun tu spyod cing / dbul ba dang / sems dman pa dang / ser sna dang ldan pa dang / bdag nyid gso bar byed pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i
165b1(dkon brtsegs): ming gis byang chub sems dpa' yin par khas 'che bar byed cing / bdag nyid tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / sdig pa kun tu spyod pa yin bzhin
165b2(dkon brtsegs): du sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bsngags pa brjod cing / byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gzhan dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod nas zas dang
165b3(dkon brtsegs): gos sgrub par byed do/ / byams pa 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra bsgrag cing seng ge'i las rnams bya ba'i rigs pa/ wa'i sgra sgrogs shing wa'i las rnams byed pa dang / bdog pa thams cad
165b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gtong ba'i bsngags pa rjod par byed cing 'jig rten gyi zang zing yun mi ring ba yongs su gtong bar mi byed la/ ser snas zil gyis non cing yo byad kyi dri mas spags pa de dag gis gtong/
165b5(dkon brtsegs): ba phyi rol du bya ba dang / phan pa'i dngos po'i bsngags pa rjod par byed cing gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / khong khro ba'i nyes pa mang po byed pa dang / bzod pa'i bsngags pa rjod par
165b6(dkon brtsegs): bye cing / gcig tu gnod sems kyi sems su byed pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gi bsngags pa rjod par byed cing / sems can 'ga' yang sbyin pa 'am/ snyan par smra ba 'am/
165b7(dkon brtsegs): don spyod pa 'am/ don mthun pas sdud par mi byed pa de dag ji tsam du mi bzad par 'gyur ba la ltos/ de dag ni tshig tsam gyi dngos por 'gyur ba yin gyi/ de dag yon tan yang dag par blang
166a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang 'dres pa'i spyod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la mos pa'i rjes su slob par byed pa ni ma yin no// byams pa sngon byung ba 'das
166a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa dang / ches grangs med pa dang / ches shin tu grangs med pa dang / rgya che ba dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
166a3(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde
166a4(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shig 'jig rten du byung ste/
166a5(dkon brtsegs): byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang 'di lta ste/ dper na da ltar nga bzhin du snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa kho na'i 'jig rten du byung ngo // byams pa de'i tshe na dge slong brtson 'grus mos shes bya ba dran
166a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa/ rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ blo dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa chung ba/ chog shes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la nan tan byed pa zhig byung bar gyur te/ de grong dang / grong khyer
166a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / grong nal dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / yul 'khor de dag tu song ste phyin pa dang / chos ston par byed cing / rgyal po dang blon po chen po dag dang / skye bo phal po che gzhan dag gis kyang
166b1(dkon brtsegs): mo byas/ mchod pa byas/ bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ shes par byas/ yongs su shes par byas so// de khyim gang du zhugs shing / gang las tshig snyan pa dang / bdag
166b2(dkon brtsegs): la gus par nyan pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba thob par gyur pa'i khyim der ni/ de lan gnyis su 'gro bar sems skyed par mi byed do// de 'jungs pa dang / ma dad pa dang /
166b3(dkon brtsegs): log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i khyim gzhan dag tu song zhing de dag tu son pa na/ de la de dag 'ongs pa legs so zhes kyang mi zer/ de dag tshig snyan pa'ang mi rjod pa'i steng du de la khro
166b4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ gshe bar byed na'ang de bzod pa'i go bgos shing / snying rje chen po la gnas pas 'gro la/ khyim de dag tu yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing yid mi bde bar yang mi 'gyur ro// /
166b5(dkon brtsegs): byams pa byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos des khyim gang dag dad par byas pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na
166b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag gis dge slong gzhan dag gi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems de khyim de dag tu rang 'gro bar mi byed cing / 'gro bar sems
166b7(dkon brtsegs): skyed par yang mi byed mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag la phrag dog dang ser sna'i sems skyed par byed skam mam/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bde bar
167a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos de khyim gang dag nas
167a2(dkon brtsegs): tshig snyan pa dang / bdag la gus par nyan pa dang / bza' ba dang btung ba rnyed pa'i khyim de dag mngon par dad par byas shing / dge slong gzhan dag gi nye bar 'tsho bar byas nas de dag
167a3(dkon brtsegs): tu lan gnyis su 'jug par mi byed pa dang / 'jungs pa dang / ma dad pa dang / log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i khyim gang dag yin pa de dag dad par byed cing / de dag khro zhing gshe na'ang
167a4(dkon brtsegs): yong su gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba'i phan pa'i dngos po nyid dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid dang / 'dod pa chung ba nyid dang / chog shes pa nyid dang / des pa

167a6(dkon brtsegs): gos dang bsod snyoms kyi don du byed pa ni ma yin no/ / byams pa de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos shes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod yid gnyis
167a7(dkon brtsegs): dang the tsom za bar gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos shes bya bar gyur to// byams pa de lta bas na byang chub sems
167b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'dod pas ni byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos de'i rjes su bslab par yang bya/ de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun
167b2(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa dag gi rjes su'ang bslab par bya zhing / de dag gi chos kun tu spyad par yang bya'o// // bam po gnyis pa// byams pa yang phyi ma'i
167b3(dkon brtsegs): tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba'i dge slong kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms kyi don du khyim
167b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/ khyim pa rnams dad pa la dgod pa'i phyir ni ma yin te/ de dag ni gcig la gcig bsngags pa ma yin brjod pa dang / 'byed pa dang / rtsod pa'i rang bzhin
167b5(dkon brtsegs): can du 'gyur ro/ / de dag ni ji ltar gzhan dag gis ma rnyed pas yi rangs par 'gyur ba ltar bdag nyid kyis rnyed pas ni de lta ma yin la/ ji ltar gzhan dag gis rnyed pas yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba
167b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar bdag nyid kyis ma rnyed pas ni de lta ma yin no/ / byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bdag nyid kyi bde ba'i yo byad de dag thams cad la mi lta bar gzhan dag la sbyin par bya ba yin na/
167b7(dkon brtsegs): dag ji tsam du phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba la ltos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar des ni bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba bskyed par bya'o zhes snying rje chen po sngon du btang ba'i sems
168a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa'i phyir ro/ / byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag gcig la bu gcig pa sdug pa 'phangs pa yid du 'ong ba zhig bdog par gyur pa de/
168a2(dkon brtsegs): le lan 'ga' zhig gi phyir rgyal pos btson rar bcug par gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag de yid la byed pa'i sems ji lta bu dag gis rgyal po'i
168a3(dkon brtsegs): btson ra der 'jug par 'gyur snyam mam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
168a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar bu gcig pa de thar par bgyi ba'i bsam pas bdag gis bu gcig pa 'di btson ra 'di nas myur du thar par bgyi'o snyam nas/ bu gcig pa yid la bgyid pa kho na dag gis
168a5(dkon brtsegs): btson ra der 'jug par bgyid de/ thar pa yid la bgyid pa dag gis 'jug cing 'byung bar bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa ngas dpe de ni don shes par
168a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir brjod pa yin te/ 'dir don yang gang zhig yin par blta bar bya zhe na/ byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal po'i btson ra de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni 'khor ba'i btson ra blta bar bya'o//
168a7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpa' blta bar bya'o// byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na bu gcig pa de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni bya ba
168b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya ba blta bar bya'o/ / byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag de rgyu gzhan gyi phyir
168b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin zhing / ched ka gzhan gyi phyir ma yin gyi/ bu gcig pa de'i don du btson ra der 'jug par 'gyur ba ji lta ba de bzhin du ni byams pa byang chub sems dpas chos gos kyi ched dang / bsod snyom
168b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi ched du khyim rnams su 'gro bar mi bya'i/ 'di ltar sems can de dag nyid 'khor ba las yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya ba blta bar bya'o// byams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi
168b4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa/ sems ma bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni chos
168b5(dkon brtsegs): gos dang bsod snyoms kyi ched du me tog gi skyes dag dang / 'bras bu'i skyes dag dang / lo ma'i skyes dag dang / yo byad kyi skyes dag dang / byas pa'i lan gyi skyes dag gis khyim rnams
168b6(dkon brtsegs): su 'gro bar 'gyur bas/ byams pa dge slong gis ni me tog 'phreng rgud lta bur mi bya zhing / bran dang las mi lta bur yang mi bya'o// byams pa dge slong khyim rnams su'ang 'gro bar 'dod
168b7(dkon brtsegs): pas ni chos kyi skyes kyis 'gro bar bya ba ma gtogs par skyes gzhan bskur bar mi bya ste/ des ni mang du thos pa dang / gzhung la shin tu zhugs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa dang / brkam chags
169a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / kha bsag med pa dang / bdag gir bya ba med par bya zhing / chos la dka' ba bskyed nas khyim rnams su 'gro bar
169a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / khyim rnams su son nas kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod par bya ba dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang
169a3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya zhing chos kyi gtam bya ba'i sems ma gtogs par khang khyim gyi ched dam/ zhing las kyi ched dam/
169a4(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa'i ched dam/ reg pa bde ba'i gtam mam/ rgyal po'i gtam mam/ chom rkun gyi gtam mam/ grong gi gtam mam/ grong khyer gyi gtam mam/ ljongs kyi gtam
169a5(dkon brtsegs): mam bu'i gtam mam/ bu mo'i gtam mam/ gtam gzhan gyi skyes dag mi bya'o// byams pa gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna
169a6(dkon brtsegs): bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo zhig la byin pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i
169a7(dkon brtsegs): yo byad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsdus te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la byin par gyur na/ nor gyi phung po de tsam dang / bde ba'i yo byad de tsam gyis ni des rigs
169b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la snying brtse ba'am/ phan gdags par mi 'gyur gyi/ de tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam zhig nyan du bcug ste/ de'ang de'i rna ba'i rnam
169b2(dkon brtsegs): par rig par grags shing thos pa tsam kho nar zad kyi/ re zhig dad pa thob par ma gyur tu zin kyang de ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la rgyas pa dang / phan 'dogs pa dang /
169b3(dkon brtsegs): snying brtse ba ches shin tu mang du byed pa yin no// byams pa dge slong de dag khyim rnams su zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' spangs te/ 'jig rten pa'i gtam nye bar sbyor bar
169b4(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / ji tsam du don med pa chen pos khyim der mngon par rtson par byed pa la ltos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar gser ram/ dngul lam/ nor bu dag gam/
169b5(dkon brtsegs): rin po che dag gam/ mu tig dag gam/ bai DUR+Ya dag gam/ dung dag gam/ man shel dag gam/ byu ru dag gam/ bde ba'i yo byad gzhan dag gis ni sems can skye ba'i chos
169b6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams skye ba las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur/ sems can na ba'i chos can rnams kyang nad rnams las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur/ sems can rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang
169b7(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams kyang rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang //
170a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur gyi/ chos thos pas ni sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams kyang skye ba la/
170a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su thar bar 'gyur la/ sems can na ba'i chos can rnams kyang nad rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ sems can rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags
170a3(dkon brtsegs): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams kyang 'khrug pa las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de las dgongs te de bzhin
170a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'di skad ces/ stong chen 'jig rten khams ni gser dag gis// bkang ste gang la sbyin par byed pa ni// tshig bzhi'i tshogs su bcad pa gcig brjod pas//
170a5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar phan 'dogs de ltar 'gyur ma yin// phan 'dogs byed par 'dod pa gang zhig gis// 'jig rten gsum na sems can thams cad kyi// bde ba gang dag yod pa de dag
170a6(dkon brtsegs): kun sems can gcig la sbyin pa byas pa bas/ / gang gis de la sangs rgyas lus kyi ni// tshogs bzhi'i tshogs su bcad pa gcig bsgrags na// de ni shin tu phan 'dogs
170a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog yin te/ / des ni sdug bsngal dag las grol bar 'gyur// zhes ston to// byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag rin po che sna bdun
170b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis rab tu bkang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dbul bar phul ba bas ni snying rje chen po bskyed de/ sems can gcig la tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs su bcad pa gcig gis bsgras
170b2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi gang zhig gis gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi// 'jig rten khams mchog rin chen gang byas
170b3(dkon brtsegs): te/ dga' mchog sems kyis rgyal la phul ba dang // gang gis sems can gcig la tshogs bcad byin// rin chen byin pa shin tu rgyu chen des// tshogs bcad sbyin pa snying rjes
170b4(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs de la/ / char yang mi phong grangs su'ang ma yin na// gnyis sam gsum la bsam du ga la yod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang / byang chub sems
170b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag g.yas pa'i dkyil na bsod nams thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i rgyu mthun pas
170b6(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer mngon par grub pa yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na phyag g.yas pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kun tu yos
170b7(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad nas/ sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar bsgrub par mdzad cing / zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ gos 'dod
171a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la ni gos/ rin po che 'dod pa rnams la ni rin po che rnams dang / gang ci 'dod pa de la sbyin par yang spyod mod kyi/ de tsam gyis sems can de dag
171a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thog ma dang tha ma med pa nas/ chu srin 'dzin khri'i sdug bsngal chen po de las thar par mi 'gyur bas/ byams pa nga ni 'jig rten pa'i bde ba'i yo byad de lta bu dag rnam par
171a3(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba chos rin po che yang dag par ston par mdzad de/ de thos na sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gtan du nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// byams pa de
171a4(dkon brtsegs): lta bas na khyod kyis kyang nga'i rjes su bslab par bya zhing / khyed zang zing la gdu bar mi bya'i/ khyed chos la gdu bar bya'o// byams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha
171a5(dkon brtsegs): ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe na/ byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni ltung ba lhag par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing lus ma
171a6(dkon brtsegs): bsdams pa dang / ngag ma bsdams pa dang / yid ma bsdams pas sdig pa'i las lhag par spyad nas kyang nyes pa bshags pa tsam gyis dag par 'gyur bar sems kyis phyin chad sdom
171a7(dkon brtsegs): par yang mi byed la/ byin chad yang dag par bsdams pa'i phyir sdom par yang mi byed do// ngas ni sngon byas pa'i sdig pa'i las zad par bya ba'i phyir phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam
171b1(dkon brtsegs): grangs bstan pa yin na/ de la mi blun po de dag ni lhag par lhung ba mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas na/ nyes pa bshags shing sbyang ba tsam kyis dag par 'gyur bar sems shing / ljin/
171b2(dkon brtsegs): chad sdom par ni mi byed do// byams pa gzhan yang ngas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi las yongs su bsal ba byas pas na/ mi dge
171b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las chung ngus ni byang chub sems dpa' sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ dbul por skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag
171b4(dkon brtsegs): tu'ang ltung bar mi nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpas ni myur du med par bya zhing 'dzem dog dang ldan pa dang / bslab par 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta
171b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rtag tu yid skyo ba dang / srid par 'gro ba'i skye ba'i gnas thams cad la yid skrag par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bdag rgal
171b6(dkon brtsegs): nas khyed cag thams cad bsgral bar bya'o/ / grol nas dgrol bar bya'o// dbugs phyin nas dbugs dbyung bar bya'o// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas yongs su mya ngan
171b7(dkon brtsegs): las bzla bar bya'o zhes sems can thams cad nye bar gzung ba'i phyir te/ byams pa ngas ni lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong /
172a1(dkon brtsegs): dang bram ze dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na/ byang chub sems dpa'i las ji snyed pa dang / khur ji snyed pa dang / dgos
172a2(dkon brtsegs): ba ji snyed pa dang / don bya ba ji snyed pa dang / bya ba ji snyed pa de snyed ni sems can 'ga' la'ang ma mthong ngo // byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong
172a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brag dang / ri dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / nags tshal dang bcas pa 'di mi la la zhig gis spyi bo 'am/ phrag pa'i steng du bzhag ste 'di skad ces
172a4(dkon brtsegs): kye skyes bu khyod kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brag dang / ri dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / nags tshal dang bcas pa 'di bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las
172a5(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'am/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du gdeg par bya zhing / gzhag par mi bya/ ngal bso bar mi bya'o zhes kyang bsgo bar gyur na/ byam
172a6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de'i khur de che ba dang / spro ba mthu dang ldan pa dang / mthu stobs mthu dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus mthu dang ldan pa yin snyam mam/ byams pas gsol
172a7(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom ldan 'das mthu dang ldan pa lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa mthu dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod mos par bya/ khyod
172b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ byams pa de bas kyang gang zhig gis kye sems can rnams ngas khyed cag mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la dgod par bya'o zhes/ sems can thams
172b2(dkon brtsegs): cad nye bar bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i khur dang / spro ba dang / mthu stobs dang / brtson 'grus ches stobs dang ldan par blta bar bya'o// byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na mi
172b3(dkon brtsegs): la la zhig gi las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las ji tsam pa de tsam du gyur la/ des sems can thams cad kyi las de
172b4(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang se gol gtogs pa tsam gcig gis yongs su sgrub par byed cing / las kyi mtha' 'ga' tsam yang yongs su nyams par ma gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de'i
172b5(dkon brtsegs): las de stobs dang ldan pa yin snyam mam/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags te/ bcom ldan 'das stobs dang
172b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa stobs dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya
172b7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gang gis 'di skad du bdag gis sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las dgrol bar bya'o zhes tshig tu brjod na/ las su bya bar byed pa
173a1(dkon brtsegs): de ches stobs dang ldan pa yin no/ / byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na khyim bdag la la zhig la bu gcig pa sdug pa/ 'phangs pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ mthong na
173a2(dkon brtsegs): mi mthun pa med pa zhig bdog par gyur la/ khyim bdag de nyes pa 'ga' zhig gi le lan gyis bu gcig pa dang chung ma dang bcas/ las byed pa dang zho shas 'tsho ba rnams dang bcas/ nor dang /
173a3(dkon brtsegs): dbyig dang / yo byad thams cad dang bcas te/ rgyal po'i pho brang du bkug par gyur cing / de nas rgyal po des khyim bdag de la 'di skad du/ kA ye khyim bdag khyod 'di nas dpag tshad
173a4(dkon brtsegs): 'bum gyi pha rol na/ grong khyer che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig yod par don 'di'i phyir zhag bdun gyis phyin par song la/ cha khyer te phyir yang zhag bdun gyis nga'i drung du phyin par shog cig dang /
173a5(dkon brtsegs): de lta na ngas khyod kyi bu gcig pa 'di dang / chung ma 'di dang / 'khor 'di dag thams cad dang / nor dang / dbyig dang / yo byad 'di dag thams cad kyang khyod la phyir sbyin par bya/
173a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing gzhan yang khyod la rgyal srid phyed kyi sbyin pa'ang lhag par sbyin par bya'o// gal te khyod song nas grong khyer de nas cha blangs te nyin mtshan bdun gyi phyir ma 'ongs na khyod la cung zad kyang
173a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par mi bya ba'i steng du khyod bu gcig pa dang bcas/ chung ma dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas te chad pas gcad pa dang / srog dang bral zhing gsad par bya'o zhes bsgo bar gyur na/
173b1(dkon brtsegs): byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyim bdag de de skad bsgo na bdag 'phangs pa dang ldan pa dang / bu 'phangs pa dang ldan pa dang / chung ma 'phangs pa dang ldan pa dang / 'khor
173b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phangs pa dang ldan pa dang / nor 'phangs pa dang ldan pas stobs dang ldan pa'i rtsom pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa'i mgyogs pas grong khyer der 'gro bar 'gyur snyam mam/ byams
173b3(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'chal ba ltar na/ de ni don
173b4(dkon brtsegs): de yongs su ma grub kyi bar du sems rnam par g.yeng bar mi bgyid/ zas kyi 'du shes skyed par mi bgyid/ rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sems skyed par mi bgyid lags so// de ci'i
173b5(dkon brtsegs): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de'i slad rol gyi dngos po gzhan dag lta zhog lags kyi/ bdag nyid 'phangs pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
173b6(dkon brtsegs): byams pa gal te sems can thams cad de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa chen po dang ldan par gyur kyang / sems can de dag thams cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus
173b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /
174a1(dkon brtsegs): dpe dang / rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ni rgyun phyogs su dad pa'i sems can thams cad
174a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyun las bzlog pa g.yo ba med pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god par byed pa'i phyir/ byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na mi 'di tsam du stobs dang ldan pa/ 'di tsam du

174a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad chu klung chen po'i rgyun gang dang gang dag nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs par gyur pa'i chu klung chen po'i rgyun de dag nyid nas chu'i mtha' phyir bzlog nas/ rgyun las bzlog thabs
174a5(dkon brtsegs): kho nar mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang du phab par gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba dang / brtson 'grus che ba yin snyamams

174a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ de bas kyang gang dag lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad kyi don du snying rje chen po kun tu bskyed nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
174b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ nan tan gyis mdzes par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag sangs rgyas yod do// chos
174b2(dkon brtsegs): yod do/ / dge 'dun yod do// legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yod do zhes nges par rtog par byed pa de dag ches shin tu
174b3(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa dang / zhe sdang gi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa dang /
174b4(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag mdza' bshes dang / gros grog dang / nye du
174b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgan rabs rnams la mi lta bar spangs shing / longs spyod chung ngu dang longs spyod chen po'i tshogs rnams kyang yongs su spangs nas kyang / legs par gsungs pa'i chos
174b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba dad pas rab tu 'byung ba'i sems kyis khyim gyi gnas nas gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang
174b7(dkon brtsegs): dag gos ngur smrig dag bgos te/ legs par gsungs pa'i 'dul ba la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par legs pa kho nar rab tu 'byung bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dag
175a1(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar che ba yin no/ / de bas kyang gang dag de ltar rab tu byung nas/ gdams pa ngag la nan tan gyis mdzes par byed pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi
175a2(dkon brtsegs): ltar bcas pa dag la slob par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag 'du 'dzi'i gtam la 'jigs par lta zhing dben par 'dod pas
