175a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes mos par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag chos zab mo rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob pa de dag ches
175a5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag mngon sum du byas nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su
175a6(dkon brtsegs): thob par byed pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du rjes su thob par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di
175a7(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad cing dang ba dang / rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po dang / 'bras bu thob pa de ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa rin
175b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro/ / byams pa de la yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba legs
175b2(dkon brtsegs): par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i las spangs te// byis pa'i las la rab tu gnas pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ byams pa de
175b3(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las gang zhe na/ nyi shu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las yin te/ de dag yongs su ma rdzogs na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying
175b4(dkon brtsegs): por 'gro bar mi nus so/ / nyi shu gang zhe na/ ser sna'i sems tshar gcad par bya ba dang / gtong ba chen po spel bar bya ba dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /
175b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / gnod sems dang tha ba'i skyon rnam par spang bar bya ba dang / bzod pa'i stobs la gnas par bya ba dang / le lo'i sems rnam par
175b6(dkon brtsegs): gnon par bya ba dang / brtson 'grus chen po brtsam par bya ba dang / brjed ngas pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / dran pa dang blo gros kyis bsam gtan rnams la mi rten par bsam gtan du
175b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / zab mo la bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad spang bar bya ba dang / mtshan ma med pas gnas
176a1(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba dang / smon pa dang bral bar bya ba dang / smon pa med pa'i yul yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su myi gtang bar
176a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / rnying rje chen pos zin par bya bya dang / na thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dka' ba'i sems yid la mi bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing nem nu
176a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang mad ches par bya ba ste/ byams pa kye+e chu bo de dgu ni byang du sems dpa' rnams rmyilas yin te/ las de dag yongs su ma rdzogs na byang chub sems dpa 'byung chub kyi zhing
176a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar mi nus so/ / byams pa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang dub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa'i dam pa' ba yin te/ bzhi ga zhen/ bdag nyid kyi bde ba spong ba dang / chos
176a5(dkon brtsegs): ngoms mi shes pa dang / chos yongs su tshol bas bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o// sems can rnams 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa
176a6(dkon brtsegs): mas par ba rgyug/ sems can gyi khams dang med pa rnams tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du gsug par byamo zhes yang dag pa 'ang ma bca' /
176a7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag par dam bca' ba yin no// byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na mi ldan mkhas la/ gsang sngags la mkhas shing dus dang /
176b1(dkon brtsegs): rtsi la mkhas pa gnyis shig yod par gyur la/ de gnyis las mi gcig gis skye bo phal po che'i mdun du ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes bskyed par bya ba'i phyir drug za bar byed cing / zos nas kyang yan
176b2(dkon brtsegs): lag dang nying lag rnams shig shig por gyur pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar gyur pa las/ yang gsang sngags sngon du btang ba'i sman za bar byed cing / de gsang sngags yang dag pa dang /
176b3(dkon brtsegs): sman des drug gi nyes pa de dag dang bral bar gyur la/ de nas mi des dus gzhan gyi chen spyan de ma rnyed cing gnyen po ma rnyed pas dug des shi bar gyur la/ de nas mi cig shos des 'di skad
176b4(dkon brtsegs): ces smras te/ kho bos ni sman gyis dug zhi bar byed nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo la ni ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes mi dgos/ yan lag dang nying lag shig shig por 'gyur ba mi dgos
176b5(dkon brtsegs): pas dug kyang mi za sman yang mi 'thung ngo zhes zer ba de bzhin du/ byams pa phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu
176b6(dkon brtsegs): byung ba kha cig de dag 'di skad ces sdig pa'i las ni nyes pa bshags pas ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro zhes zer zhing / de dag sdig pa mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas nas/ yang bshags
176b7(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o zhes ltung ba lhag par 'byin par byed cing / phyis sdom pa 'dzin par ni mi byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni 'chi ba'i chos can yin no zhes nga smra ste/ 'chi ba'ang gang zhe na/ 'di
177a1(dkon brtsegs): / lta ste/ dper na dug za ba'i mi de dang 'dra bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ log par ldang ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin no// byams pa byang chub sems
177a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni 'di skad ces bdag cag la ni dug kyang mi dgos/ sman yang mi dgos kyis/ bdag cag ni 'das pa'i
177a3(dkon brtsegs): dus na sdig pa'i las byas pa zad par bya ba dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba na mngon par 'du mi bya ba ma gtogs par sdig pa'i las kyang mngon par 'du mi bya zhing ltung ba'ang
177a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar mi bya la/ bshags par yang mi bya'o zhes zer te/ byams pa 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la dug ces bya ba de ni/ 'di lta ste/ bslab pa'i gzhi ji ltar
177a5(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa dag las 'da' bar byed pa yin pas/ khyed cag gis ni dug bza' bar mi bya'o// byams pa bzhi po 'di dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
177a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gcod par byed pa'i chos rnams yin te/ de dag ni nyan thos kyis kyang bya ba ma yin na/ byang chub sems dpas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bzhi
177a7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ byas pa mi gzo ba nyid dang / g.yo la rten pa nyid dang / rdzun gyi tshig smra ba nyid dang / bslab pa las 'da' bar byed pa nyid yin te/ bzhi po de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/
177b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gcod par byed pa'i chos rnams yin te/ de dag ni nyan thos kyis kyang bya ba ma yin na/ byang chub sems dpas lta smos kyang
177b2(dkon brtsegs): ci dgos/ byams pa byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po 'di dag las dpag tshad brgyar 'byol bar bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang /
177b3(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag dang / 'du 'dzi'i gnas dang / gnas gang na gnas pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gzhan zhig kyang 'dug par gyur la/ gal te de dang
177b4(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig tu mgu ba dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skyes la/ 'thab pa med pa dang ldan pa dang / rtsod pa med pa dang ldan par gnas na ni/ des der gnas par bya'i//
177b5(dkon brtsegs): gal te de de la tha na tha ba dang zhe sdang gi sems gcig tsam zhig skyed par byed na'ang des de nas dpag tshad brgyar 'byol bar bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpas ni byang chub sems dpa' la thab
177b6(dkon brtsegs): dang zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ / byams pa byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can gang ji
177b7(dkon brtsegs): snyed pa de dag thams cad spyos sam/ brgyad dam/ dbyig pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab par gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems
178a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' des sems can de ji snyed cig la spyos pa 'am/ brgyad pa 'am/ dbyig pas brdegs pa'am/ mtshon gyis btab pa'i gzhi de las sdig pa dang / spras
178a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / nyams pa mang po skyed par 'gyur snyam mam/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gcig gcig la spyos sam/ brgyad dam/ dbyig pas brdegs
178a3(dkon brtsegs): sam mtshon gyis btab na'ang bsod nams ma lags pa mang du skyed lags na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa thams cad lta la
178a4(dkon brtsegs): smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni sems can 'ga' zhig tsam la'ang tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang / gnod sems bskyed par
178a5(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyi ba'i slad du'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa
178a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad la spros sam/ brgyad dam/ dbyig pas brdegs sam/ mtshon
178a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis btab pa gang yin pa des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig la tha na tha ba dang zhe sdang gi sems gcig tsam zhig skyes par gyur pa de tsam du byang chub sems dpa' de smas pa dang nyams
178b1(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' cig shos de la tha ba dang zhe sdang gi sems skyed par byed na/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub yongs
178b2(dkon brtsegs): su mi gtong ba zhig na/ sems ji snyed bskyed pa de snyed kho na'i bskal par byang chub kyi phyir yang go cha 'go bar bya dgos so// byams pa 'dri lta ste/ dper na lhagani kyi ga nyid kyis
178b3(dkon brtsegs): gcod par byed pa ma gtogs par bong ba 'am/ shing ngam/ rtswas gcod par mi nus pa de bzhin du/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang byang chub sems dpa
178b4(dkon brtsegs): cig shos la tha ba dang zhe sdang gi sems bskyed pas zad par byed pa ma gtogs par gzhan gyis zad par mi 'gyur te/ byams pa de lta bas na khyed cag gcig gis gcig la zhe
178b5(dkon brtsegs): sa dang bcas pa dang / gcig la gcig gus pa dang bcas pas gnas par bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya zhing / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la'ang ston pa'i 'du
178b6(dkon brtsegs): shes bskyed par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdagan
178b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la'ang zhes dang bcas pa dang / gus pa dang bcas pas gnas par bgyid lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta la smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i
179a1(dkon brtsegs): skad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gnod sems la dpa' bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bzod pa'i stobs dang mthu phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang /
179a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni g.yo la rten par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gzhan gyi khyim la lhag
179a3(dkon brtsegs): par chags par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bdag gir 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zang zing lhur len/
179a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni chos lhur len par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zas dang gos lhur len par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni pha'i nor yongs su tshol bar bgyid pa
179a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bcom ldan 'das bdag ni phrag dog dang ser snas kun nas dkris par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni gzhan gyi 'byor pa dag la yid dga' ba dang / gtong ba phun sum tshogs par bgyid
179a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dge sbyong gi ming lhur len par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni dge sbyong gi yon tan dag la slob par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni smra ba lhur
179a7(dkon brtsegs): len par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sgrub pa snying por bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rnyed pa dang bkur sti la lhag par chags par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni don nyung ba dang / bgyi ba nyung
179b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su tshol bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zang zing gis bsgos pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis grong dang grong khyer du 'jug par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag
179b2(dkon brtsegs): ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yid la bgyid pa la mngon par brtson pas grong dang grong khyer du 'jug par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos gos dang bsod snyoms kyi slad du tshul
179b3(dkon brtsegs): 'chos par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni tshul 'chos pa ma mchis pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs bzhis chog shes par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byis pa'i spyod pa la slob par mi
179b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa la slob par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gzhan dag gi bgyis pa dang / ma bgyis pa dag la so sor rtog par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag
179b5(dkon brtsegs): ni bdag nyid dul ba dang zhi bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pas gnas par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ltung ba 'ga' yang gleng bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni ngag gi las kyi 'thal
179b6(dkon brtsegs): sdom par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bslab pa thag ring du mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni so sor thar pa la slob par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sangs rgyas dang /
179b7(dkon brtsegs): chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pas 'tsho bar sems par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rjod cing de la dga' ba'i sems bskyed par bgyid pa dang / bdag ni chos kyi
180a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa rjod cing chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa la gnas par bgyid pa dang / bdag ni dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa rjod cing phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la rten
180a2(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gzhan gyis mthong ba skyed pa'i slad du/ tshul 'chos pas mchi ma 'byin par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma 'byin
180a3(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bgyi ba sna tshogs kyi 'du 'dzis spags te gnas par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni chos yongs su tshol ba la mngon par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan
180a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag ni 'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba la dga' bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la dga' bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sogs 'jog
180a5(dkon brtsegs): gi zas dang ldan par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni tshul 'chos pa ma mchis par kun tu spyod par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gnas dang yul gcig yongs su 'dzin par mi bgyid kyi//
180a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni ri dgas ltar kun tu rgyu bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsod nyams la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su tshol ba la
180a7(dkon brtsegs): brtson par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis nyal bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson
180b1(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'du 'dzi'i spyod yul la brtson par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni dben pa la dga' bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yon
180b2(dkon brtsegs): tan cung zad tsam gyis chog shes par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni yon tan yongs su tshol bas ngoms mi 'tshal bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni khyi'i chos rnams la kun du spyod
180b3(dkon brtsegs): par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni cung zad ba shes pa dang ldan par mi bgyid kyi bdag ni mdza' bshes shin tu brtan par
180b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bgyid pa mi gzo ba mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bgyis pa gzo ba dang / bgyis pa tshor bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sbyin pa'i la
180b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis mdza' bshes su mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pas mdza' bshes su bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pa bcos mar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lhag
180b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pa brtan par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dman pa la mos par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa lhur blang ba rgya chen po la mos par
180b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa ma mchis pa dang / bslab pa la gus pa ma mchis par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la
181a1(dkon brtsegs): gus pa dang bcas pa dang / bslab pa la gus pa dang bcas par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems kyang gzhan la/ smra ba'ang gzhan pa
181a2(dkon brtsegs): lce gnyis su mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni tshul 'chos pa'i byang chub sems dpar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lhag pa'i
181a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / bdag nyid dul ba dang zhi ba la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni nga rgyal gyis nga rgyal skyed par mi bgyid kyi/
181a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni gdol pa'i bu dang 'dra bar nga rgyal nges par 'joms par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chags pa dang bcas pas bsod snyoms yongs su longs spyod par mi bgyid
181a5(dkon brtsegs): kyibadag ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / dad pas stsal ba la lci ba'i 'du shes su bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa'i rnam par rtog pa
181a6(dkon brtsegs): yid la bgyid pa sngon du btang bas gdugs pas ma thag kho nar mchis nyal ba dang / rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi bar gyis non par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su
181a7(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub par bgyi ba'i slad du rtag tu brtson zhing sbyor bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gang zag tu lta ba la rten par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni stong pa nyid la gnas par bgyid pa dang
181b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rnam par rtog pa dang 'khrul par smra bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa la gnas par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lus kyi tshul 'chos
181b2(dkon brtsegs): par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zang zing gis bsgos pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis
181b3(dkon brtsegs): chos ston par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems kyis chos ston par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zang zing gi sbyin pas mdza' bshes su mi bgyid kyi/ bdag
181b4(dkon brtsegs): ni chos kyi sbyin pas mdza' bshes su bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bdag dang gzhan la yongs su gdung bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bdag la sman pa dang / gzhan la sman pa'i
181b5(dkon brtsegs): slad du sgrub par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dgon par gnas pa la tshul 'chos par mi bgyid/ bsod snyoms la tshul 'chos par mi bgyid/ phyag dar khrod la tshul 'chos par
181b6(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyid de/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis yang dag par blangs te gnas par bgyid cing / de'ang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcang pa
181b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la rten pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ / de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la legs so zhes bya ba
182a1(dkon brtsegs): byin te/ byams pa legs so legs so// khyod ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa de ltar seng ge'i sgra 'di sgrog par byed pa ni/ khyod sngon
182a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / chos de dag dang yon tan de dag la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yin te/ legs so legs so// byang chub sems dpa'
182a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po byams pas seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de nas dge slong lnga brgya stan las langs te dong ngo // de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos
182a4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ / dge sbyong chen po dag khyed cag yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam brjod pa'i tshe stan las langs te gar 'dong / de skad ces smras pa dang /
182a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po la/ dge slong lnga brgya po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas yo byad
182a6(dkon brtsegs): bsnyungs pa'i gtam de lta bu bstan pa'i gnas de dag ni srid par dka' ba lags pas/ bdag cag 'di snyam du bdag cag ni yo byad bsnyungs pa'i yon tan de dag bdag cag la yang dag par
182a7(dkon brtsegs): mi snang bas bdag phyir khyim du 'dong gor ma chag go/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dad pas byin pa ni reg par dka' zhing sbyang bar dka' ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa'i slad du'o//
182b1(dkon brtsegs): / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so// gang dag dad pas byin pa la yongs su longs spyod par
182b2(dkon brtsegs): spo ba dag gis ni de ltar 'dzem pa dang ldan pa dang / 'gyod pa dang ldan par bya ste/ nyin gcig la lan brgya rab tu byung ba phyir spangs pa ni bla'i/ tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pas dad pas byin
182b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la longs spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das
182b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis dad pas stsal ba ji ltar rjes su gnang bar mdzad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ngas ni rig pa dang grol ba la dad pas byin pa rjes su gnang ngo // de
182b5(dkon brtsegs): nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag sbyor cig/ rtsol cig/ 'bod cig/ sangs rgyas
182b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba ni rnyed par dka' ba yin gyis/ khyed cag rab tu byung ba ni rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/ khyed cag rab tu 'byung ba las phyir ma ldog cig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
182b7(dkon brtsegs): la dge slong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal bdag cag gis ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis dzas
183a1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar sbyor ba dang / 'bad pa dang / rtsol bar byed pa na/ chos 'ga' yang sbyor bar mi byed/ chos 'ga' yang 'byed par mi byed pa dang / chos 'ga' yang
183a2(dkon brtsegs): skyed par mi byed/ chos 'ga' yang 'gog par mi byed pa dang / chos 'ga' yang thob par mi byed/ chos 'ga' yang spong bar mi byed pa dang / chos 'ga' yang 'bri bar mi byed/ chos
183a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' yang 'phel bar mi byed pa de ltar sbyor bar gyis shig/ dge slong gang de ltar sbyor ba de ni chos 'ga' yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// gang chos 'ga' yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de ni gar
183a4(dkon brtsegs): yang mi 'gro/ / gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo // gang la 'gro ba med pa de la ni 'ong ba'ang 'ga' yang med do// de ni 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med pa'i dge slong zhes bya ste/ gang du'ang rten pa'ang
183a5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ mi rten pa'ang ma yin no// bsten pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya po de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom
183a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la/ gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma de la byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa ji snyed cig/
183a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs gang dag sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing lhag pa'i bsam pa nyam chung ste/ zas dang gos lhur len pa'i
183b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dag ni mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang
183b2(dkon brtsegs): po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du/ gnas gang dag dang / spyod pa gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa nyam chung ba dang / tshul 'chos pa lags par
183b3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag legs par bshad du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gnas de dag thos na/ byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa
183b4(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa gang dag lags pa de dag nyid kyang srung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po la
183b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / 'od srungs phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma de la/ byang chub sems dpas gang dag sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing lhag pa'i bsam pa nyam
183b6(dkon brtsegs): chung ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
183b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / mar me'i sbyin pa dag gis mchod pa'i las la brtson par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs ngas ni shes pa dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
184a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir mchod pa bshad pa yin na/ mi blun po de dag ni de la brtson par 'gyur te/ 'od srungs ngas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi
184a2(dkon brtsegs): mdun du dge slong dag khyed cag ni bdag nyid dul ba dang zhi bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pas gnas par gyis shig/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa dag yod na de dag ni nga'i sku
184a3(dkon brtsegs): gdung rnams la sku gdung gi mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro zhes de skad gsungs na/ 'od srungs mi blun po de dag rnal 'byor kyang spangs/ spong ba'ang spangs/ lung nod pa'ang spangs
184a4(dkon brtsegs): kha ton bya ba'ang spangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi mchod pa'i las la brtson par 'gyur zhing / de dag la brten nas 'tsho bar sems par byed pa de dag la ltos/ 'od srung
184a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chu'i phung po nas bzung ste/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug pa'i bar du 'bru mar gyis yongs su bkang ste/
184a6(dkon brtsegs): mar me'i snying po ri rab tsam btsugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir mar me bus pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa
184a7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa cig shos kyis mkhan po 'am/ slob dpon gyi drung nas tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig lung mnos te/ kha ton byed cing gom pa bdun 'dod
184b1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa gang yin pa de/ de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ma
184b2(dkon brtsegs): tog dang / bdug pa dang / phye ma dang / spos kyis rab tu bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lo 'bum gyi bar du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum phul ba
184b3(dkon brtsegs): bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'jigs shing skrag pa gzhan zhig khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs shing sems can gyi don mngon par sgrub pa na/ dgon pa la mngon
184b4(dkon brtsegs): par phyogs te gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa gang yin pa de/ de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyal ka'i ched dam/
184b5(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa'i ched du de skad gsungs pa ma yin grang snyam na/ 'od srungs khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni nga la mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro// 'od srungs sngon
184b6(dkon brtsegs): byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa dang / ches grangs med pa dang / ches shin tu grangs med pa dang / rgya che ba dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpag
184b7(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa dag byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog sna tshogs shes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/
185a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shig 'jig rten du byung ste/
185a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i nyan thos rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po ni bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu gyur to// 'od srungs de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi pa'i 'khor
185a3(dkon brtsegs): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po zhig byung bar gyur te/ 'od srungs rgyal po mu khyud de la bu dpa' ba/ rdul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan
185a4(dkon brtsegs): pa pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong yod par gyur to/ / 'od srungs rgyal po mu khyud de'i bu sdong po de dag gi rjes la de'i dang bar chos shes bya ba dang / chos bzang zhes bya ba'i khye'u gnyis
185a5(dkon brtsegs): shig rdzus te skyes par gyur te/ 'od srungs rgyal po mu khyud des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong rdzogs kyi bar du
185a6(dkon brtsegs): las gzhan mi byed par khyim gyi yid la byed pa thams cad spangs te/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis
185a7(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la'ang zhag bdun bdun 'das shing chos gos yid du 'ong ba gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang phul lo// gang dang gang dag ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de
185b1(dkon brtsegs): dag la kha zas kyi rnam pa yid du 'ong ba de lta de lta bu dag kyang phul lo/ / gang dang gang dag ji lta ji lta bu 'dod pa de dang de dag gi gtsug lag khang yid du 'ong ba de lta de lta bu dag kyang rtsig tu bcug go//
185b2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong re re la'ang 'chags sa dang / skyed mos tshal dang / bsnyen bkur ba bdun bdun dang / ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas dag kyang phul lo// 'od srungs 'di ltar rgyal po mu khyud des
185b3(dkon brtsegs): khang bzangs kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad brgyad cu yod pa/ ngos bzhi khang mig can shin tu 'brel ba bkra ba/ blta na sdug la legs par byas pa/ shin tu zin par byas pa// 'jul
185b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi srad bus yongs su sbyangs pa byas pa dag kyang byed du bcug ste/ gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de khang bzangs de dag na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ 'khrul
185b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi srad bu de dag gi shugs kyis khang bzangs de dag gi steng nas me tog kha dog rnam pa du ma'i char dag kyang 'bab bo/ / me tog de dag gis khang bzangs de dag pus mo nub tsam du gang ba
185b6(dkon brtsegs): yang gyur to/ / 'od srungs de ltar rgyal po mu khyud des de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong rdzogs kyi bar du yon tan bkod pa bsam
185b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa dag dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas so// 'od srungs de nas lo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag 'das pa'i
186a1(dkon brtsegs): phyi de nyin par de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad lags pa'i 'og tu/ khye'u chos dang chos bzang gnyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad dang
186a2(dkon brtsegs): bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog sna tshogs de'i spyan sngar btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la yid kyis zhu ba
186a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces yongs su zhus so/ / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po mu khyud 'dis yun ring po 'di srid du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa rnam pa mang po 'di lta bu thams cad zil gyis gnon cing yongs
186a4(dkon brtsegs): su gtugs te gnas par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa dang / bsod nams dang / longs spyod dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan zhig mchis lags sam/ 'od srungs de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis
186a5(dkon brtsegs): gtugs mthag tu de nas skad cig de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rab tu g.yos shing 'jig rten du sa g.yos pa chen po'ang byung bar gyur to/ / 'od srungs
186a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i bsnyen bkur ba thub dka' zhes bya ba zhig yod par gyur pa gang yin pa de stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu
186a7(dkon brtsegs): gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin
186b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du dogs cher g.yos pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ ci'i slad du na khye'u 'di
186b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs par gyur lags/ 'od srungs de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des bsnyen bkur ba
186b3(dkon brtsegs): thub dka' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu gtam de lta bu yongs su zhus pas khyod la ci bya/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas khye'u 'di gnyis kyi lhag pa'i bsam
186b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta bu dang / zab mo la bzod pa sgom pa ji lta bu dang / snying rje chen po ji lta bus de bzhin gshegs ba'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs pa'i gnas de bshad par gyur na/ lha dang

186b6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos chen po rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa mchog sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba la bka' stsal pa/ sred med kyi bu khyod longs la khye'u 'di slong ste/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu ston cig/ 'od srungs
186b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas dge slong sred med kyi bu des/ de las khye'u gcig lag pa g.yas pas blangs la/ khye'u cig shos lag pa g.yon pas blangs te/ gyen du 'phang ngo snyam na gdeg par ma nus so//
187a1(dkon brtsegs): des yang rgya cher mthu dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / spro ba dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po yang dag par bstan cing gyen du 'phang ngo snyam na/ tha
187a2(dkon brtsegs): na de gnyis skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang bskyod pa'am/ bsgul bar ma nus so// 'od srungs de ltar des khye'u de gnyis shin tu gyen du 'phang bar bskyod pa na/ stong gsum gyi/

187b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs las yongs su nyams pa'am/ cig tu ma gyur lags grang / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di bdag gis khye'u skyes nas
187b2(dkon brtsegs): ring po ma lags pa byis pa'i gzugs su mchis pa/ lus bong chung ngu 'di gnyis kyis dog sa la gtugs pa'ang bslang bar rngo ma thogs pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol
187b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me togs sna tshogs des dge slong sred med kyi bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sred med kyi bu khyod ni rang gi rdzu 'phrul
187b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi stobs las yongs su ma nyams mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas/ de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad
187b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis rnam par dkrug pa 'am/ bsam par bla ba ma yin te/ sred med kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad

188a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di gnyis bslang ba 'am/ bskul bar mi nus so// 'od srungs de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des tshigs de skad smras pa na/ 'khor de las
188a2(dkon brtsegs): srog chags 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa
188a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs shing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pa kho na yin yang / gang la nyan thos chen po 'di dag brdugs par byas te/ bkod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul
188a4(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu dang ldan pa de ni ngo mtshar te/ bdag cag gis kyang byin gyi rlabs de lta bu thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang thob par bya'o snyam du sems shing / de ltar yang dag par
