252a3(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do/ / byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' drug rngu bo 'di dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi shu las kyi sgrib pa chung zhing las kyi sgrib pa phra ba lnga brgya pa mtha' ma la skye bar
252a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rigs chen po sna tshogs dag tu mkhas pa/ khong bzo ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa/ sems mnyen
252a5(dkon brtsegs): pa phan pa'i dngos po phun sum tshogs pa/ snying rje che ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ dge ba mi spyoms pa/ yon tan sbed pa/ spyod pa brtan pa dag tu 'gyur ro// de dag rigs
252a6(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs las rab tu byung nas/ bskal pa grangs med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrubs pa 'di kun tu srung zhing 'dzin par byed de/ lus dang srog dang yang bsngos nas
252a7(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa dang / nags khrod dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal la rten cing rnyed pa dang bkur sti mi 'dod par 'gyur te/ rtag tu brtson zhing rab tu brtson la/ sems can gyi spyo ba la 'jug pa la
252b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa/ gsang sngags dang bstan bcos la mkhas pa/ mgo smos pas go ba/ lhag mthong la mkhas pa/ spobs pa chags pa med pa dag tu 'gyur ro// gzungs mi zad pa thob pa
252b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor bzhi po dag la chos ston cing / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde
252b3(dkon brtsegs): dang lung du bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes
252b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang / gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i sde'i mdo dag la spobs par 'gyur ro// der byang chub sems dpa' thabs
252b5(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa nyi shu po gang yin pa de dag slob dpon gyi lung rjod cing / mkhan po'i lung rjod par 'gyur te/ slob dpon che ge mo zhig dang / mkhan po che ge mo zhig las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
252b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis kun chub par byas so zhes rjod cing / skyes bu dam pa de dag gi sems kun nas dkris te 'dug par mi 'gyur ro// der byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mi mkhas pa 'byung bar
252b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ dge ba mi spyoms pas gnas shing / spobs pa de la mi lta bar skye bo mang po dag shes par byed de/ de dag gi dam pa'i chos 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro// 'di skad
253a1(dkon brtsegs): du'ang 'phya bar byed de/ khyed ni rang gi spobs pas chos ston par byed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ni ma yin no// chos 'di ni khyed kyi rang dgar byas pa ma yin no//
253a2(dkon brtsegs): khyed kyis chos gang bstan pa ni rang bzor gzhung du byas pa yin gyis/ khyed kyi 'di la ni gus par bya ba'ang med/ ri mor bya ba'ang med do zhes zer te/ der sems can mang po dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
253a3(dkon brtsegs): spong bar byed de/ de skad smras pas/ skye bo mang po 'dun pa las zlog par 'gyur ro// 'di skad du'ang dge slong de dag ni sbyin pa la sogs pa zang zing kun tu spyod pa yin gyi/ mdo las 'byung ba
253a4(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dul ba las 'byung ba'i chos mi ston to/ / 'di ni chos ma yin gyis/ 'di la ri mo bya ba ma skyed cig ces zer te/ skyes bu blun po de dag gis ni legs par smras pa gang ci'ang rung ba de dag
253a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin par de ltar mi shes so/ / de dag gis bdud kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis dge slong chos 'dzin pa de dag gi chos de spangs pas chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ba'i las mngon par
253a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed do/ / chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pas/ log par ltung bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byams pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos kun tu srung
253a7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dod pas thabs la mkhas par bya ste/ ci nas sems can mos pa tha dad pa de dag gi khong khro ba'i sems mi skye bar kun tu bsrung bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/
253b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar lnga brgya pa mtha' ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe/ byang chub sem
253b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' shes rab 'chal pa de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ spobs pa'ang tshol la/ spobs pa la mos par yang mi bgyid pa dang / gzungs tshol la/ dge slong chos 'dzin pa rnams kyi chos la'ang
253b3(dkon brtsegs): sun 'byin par bgyid pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na mi la la zhig gis chab mig gam/ khron pa 'am/ mtsho las chab 'tshal bar 'tshal la/ des der sla tsa
253b4(dkon brtsegs): bor te/ sla tsa bor nas chab 'tshal bar bsam te/ de'i sna'i dbang pos chab de mnams nas/ bdag nyid kyis nongs par glo bar ma chud de/ 'di ltar kye ma chu 'di ni mnam mo zhes chab
253b5(dkon brtsegs): la skyon 'dogs par sems so/ / bcom ldan 'das de la sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos kyi tshul 'di la spob pa'i dge slong chos smra ba gang lags pa dag ni chab mig gam/ khron pa 'am/ 'tsho
253b6(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba de bzhin du blta bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'dra lnga brgya ba mtha' ma la byang chub sems dpa' 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams ni ji ltar byis pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi chab mig gam/ khron pa 'am
253b7(dkon brtsegs): mtsho'i nang du sla tsa bor nas chab 'tshal bar 'tshal la/ de chab la skyon 'dogs pa bzhin te/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can de dag chos smra ba de dag dang / chos la'ang sun 'byin
254a1(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid de/ sun phyung nas kyang de dag nyid las chos kyi ro 'tshal bar sems te/ bdag nyid kyis nongs par glo bar ma chud nas/ rna ba'i dbang po skyon dang ldan
254a2(dkon brtsegs): pas dge slong chos 'dzin pa de dag la bsting zhing khyad du gsod la/ 'di skad du 'di ltar dge slong chos smra ba 'di dag ni nyes pa mang pos sun byung ba yin no zhes mchi ste/ dge slong
254a3(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba de dag gi chos kyi rol sun 'byin cing / 'khrul pa tshol te/ skyo nas 'dor zhing mchi bar sems legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub
254a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ / byams pa legs so legs so// ji ltar yang 'khrul pa mi tshol zhing skyon thams cad dang bral ba khyod kyis
254a5(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa 'di'i dpe de legs par smras so/ / byams pa gzhan yang rgyu bzhis na spobs pa thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs par rig par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di
254a6(dkon brtsegs): la spobs pa don dang ldan pa yin gyi/ don dang mi ldan pa ma yin pa dang / chos dang ldan pa yin gyi/ chos dang mi ldan pa ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa zad par byed pa yin gyi/ zho
254a7(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa 'phel bar byed pa ma yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan dang phan yon ston pa yin gyi/ 'khor ba'i nyes pa 'phel bar byed pa ma yin pa ste/ byams pa rgya
254b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ spobs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gsungs par rig par bya'o// byams pa dge slong ngam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma
254b2(dkon brtsegs): gang su'ang rung ste/ rgyu bzhi po 'di dag spobs pas spobs sam/ spobs par 'gyur yang rung ste/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang dag gis/ de dag la
254b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas su 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing / ston par 'du shes bskyed par byas nas/ dam pa'i chos mnyan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa legs par smras pa gang ci'ang rung ba
254b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ / byams pa de la gang zag la sdang ba'i phyir 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no zhes spobs pa bzhi po de dag
254b5(dkon brtsegs): spong zhing de dag la ma gus pa skyed par byed pa des ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i spobs pa thams cad spangs pa yin te/ chos spangs nas chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ba'i las mngon
254b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'du byed pas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / byams pa de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ba'i las las yongs su grol bar
254b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas gang zag la sdang ba'i phyir chos la sdang bar mi bya'o/ / byams pa spongs pa bzhi po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis spangs pa yin te/ byams pa bzhi gang zhe na/ spobs pa
255a1(dkon brtsegs): don med pa yin gyi/ don dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / chos dang mi ldan pa yin gyi/ chos dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa 'phel bar byed pa yin gyi/ nyon mong
255a2(dkon brtsegs): pa zad pa ma yin pa dang / 'khor ba'i nyes pa 'phel bar byed pa yin gyi/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan dang phan yon mi ston pa ste/ byams pa spobs pa bzhi po de dag ni sangs rgyas
255a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis spangs shing ma gnang ba yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
255a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das gal te 'khor ba 'phel bar bgyid pa'i spobs pa sangs rgyas kyis ma gnang ba lags na/ byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon
255a5(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan 'dogs pa lags par bstan cing / 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa'ang bka' stsal pa 'di ji lta zhig lags te/ bcom ldan
255a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das spobs pa 'di sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa ma lags par mi 'gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
255a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub kyi yan lags yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ nyon mongs pa phan 'dogs pa yin par ngas bstan cing / 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa bstan pa gang yin pa de don
255b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa yin nam/ 'on te don dang ldan pa ma yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par smra bas smra bar bgyid na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag yod
255b2(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ nyon mongs pa la dga' ba ni don dang ldan pa lags shing / chos dang ldan pa lags shes mchi na/ yang dag par smra bas smra ba lags so// bka' stsal pa/
255b3(dkon brtsegs): byams pa de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ nyon mongs pa phan 'dogs par gyur par bstan pa dang //
255b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa ni/ legs par smras pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa don gang la
255b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dbang phyug thabs la mkhas pa rnams kyis dbang bya ba dang / gang na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yod pa ma yin pa de ni nyon mongs par blta bar
255b6(dkon brtsegs): mi bya ste/ nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa ma yin no// byams pa de lta mod kyi nyon mongs pa gzhan dag la phan par mi 'gyur pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs pa'i don du mi 'gyur ba
255b7(dkon brtsegs): dang don dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu'i rgyu yang mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de la ni byang chub sems dpas lus dang sreg dang yang bsngo bar bya'i/ nyon mongs pa de'i dbang du
256a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar ni mi bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa'i nyon mongs pa bstan pa'ang gzhan yin la/ byang chub
256a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' stobs bskyed pa ma yin pa'i sa la chags pa rnams kyi'ang gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
256a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang las kyi sgrib pa mngon par
256a4(dkon brtsegs): 'du mi bgyid par 'tshal ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa spang par 'tshal ba dang / ma snad cing ma smas la bde bar yongs su thar par 'tshal bas lnga brgya pa mtha' ma la byang chub sems
256a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la mos par bgyi'o/ / the tsom ma mchis pa mang bar bgyi'o// gzhan gyi 'khrul pa mi tshol ba dang / phan yon yongs su gzung ba dang / snying po btsal bar bgyi'o//
256a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams la the tshom med pa mang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa byang chub sems
256a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' shes rab spyod pa rnams kyi spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyir ro/ / byams pa dper na rkun du zhugs pa ni so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa'ang snang la/ byis pa so so'i skye ra
256b1(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa dag gis kyang gos par mi 'gyur te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gang dag gis byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams log par lhung bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i 'dod chags
256b2(dkon brtsegs): dang zhe sdang dang / ga'i mug de dag nyid kyis rgyun du zhugs pa log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar 'jig tshogs yongs su rtogs pa'i phyir te/ byams pa de bzhin du byang
256b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' shes rab spyod pa rnams ni bag chags ma spangs pa'i phyir chags shing sdang la/ rmongs par gyur du zin kyang / de dag gi sa'ang gzhan la/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams
256b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sa'ang gzhan no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gi bag la nyal ni sems la kun nas dkris shing 'dug pa gang gis byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
256b5(dkon brtsegs): rdul zhing / nges 'byung ba la mi mkhas pa rnams dang mnyam par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab spyod pa rnams ni nyes
256b6(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad kyi nang na lci ba byung du zin kyang / shes rab kyi stobs kyis rdul du rlog par byed de/ de'i rgyus log par lhung bar yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// byams pa dper na me'i phung po 'bar
256b7(dkon brtsegs): ba la ni shing gi tshogs chen pos bsnan na/ ji lta ji ltar bsnan pa de lta de ltar de phyir zhing cher 'bar bar 'gyur gyi/ me shi bar mi 'gyur ro// byams pa de bzhin du byang chub sems
257a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' shes rab spyod pa'i shes rab kyi me 'bar bde la nA/ nyon mongs pa'i len pa ji lta ji ltar bstan pa de lta de ltar de'i shes rab kyi ma 'bar bar 'gyur gyi/
257a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing zad par mi 'gyur ro// byams pa de bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spyod pa rnams kyi spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun par
257a3(dkon brtsegs): rig par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das las dang
257a4(dkon brtsegs): po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa thob par 'tshal bas/ chos gang dag ni yongs su spang bar bgyi/ chos gang dag ni kun tu
257a5(dkon brtsegs): bsten par bgyi/ chos gang dag yongs su spong zhing kun du sbyin par bgyid na/ shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa ma skye bar ni skye bar 'gyur la/ skyes pa'ang rnam par 'phel zhing yongs su 'grib
257a6(dkon brtsegs): pa mi 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa byang
257a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' las dang po pas khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba dang / shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti yongs su spang ba dang / rnyed pa dang
257b1(dkon brtsegs): bkur sti'i nyes pa mthong bar bya'o/ / 'du 'jil dga' ba yongs su spang ba dang / 'du 'jil dga' ba'i nyes pa mthong bar bya'o// smra ba la dga' ba yongs su spang ba dang / smra ba la dga'
257b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nyes pa mthong bar bya'o/ / gnyid la dga' ba yongs su spang ba dang / gnyid la dka' ba'i nyes pa mthong bar bya'o// las la dga' ba yongs su spang ba dang / las la dga' ba'i nyes
257b3(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong bar bya'o/ / spros pa la dga' ba yongs su spang ba dang / spros pa la dga' ba'i nyes pa mthong bar bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa yongs su spangs pa des
257b4(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dod pa chung ba bsgom par bya'o/ / 'du 'dzi la dga' ba yongs su spangs pas ni gcig pur dga' ba kun du bsten par bya'o// smra ba la dga' ba yongs su spangs pas ni don rtog pa
257b5(dkon brtsegs): kun tu bsten par bya'o/ / gnyid la dga' ba yongs su spangs pas ni nam gyi cha stod dang / nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal ba kun tu bsten par bya'o// las la dga' ba yongs su spangs pas ni
257b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la byams pa kun tu bsten par bya'o/ / byams pa las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba/ shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa rjes
257b7(dkon brtsegs): su thob par 'dod pas yongs su spang bar bya ba'i chos rnams ni yongs su spang bar bya'o/ / kun tu bsten par bya ba'i chos rnams ni kun tu bsten par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa ye shes
258a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang rkyen la rag las pa yin la/ mi shes pa'ang rkyen la rag las pa yin te/ de ni rkyen ma tshogs par thob par sla ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro//
258a2(dkon brtsegs): bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
258a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i skyon ji ltar mthong bar bgyi/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i nongs dmigs ni gang lags/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la brtags na 'dod pa chung ngu la dga' zhing
258a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi gdung bar 'gyur ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni 'dod chags skyed pa yin par brtag par bya'o//
258a5(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni dran pa 'joms par byed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pas khengs pa dang 'dud par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni gti mug/
258a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni bdag gi don sgrub pas khyim la ser sna byed pa dang / chags par byed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni g.yo skyed par brtag par byo'o
258a7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi yongs su spong bas ngo tsha med pa dang / khrel med pa skyed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma gnang bar
258b1(dkon brtsegs): brtag par bya'o/ / rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa skyed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni bla ma rnams la khyad du gsod par brtag par bya'o//
258b2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni bdud kyi phyogs su brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni gcig tu bag med pa'i rtsa ba yin par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phrog par
258b3(dkon brtsegs): brtag par bya'o/ / rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni glog dang / 'khor lo dang / lce 'bab pa lta bur brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni skrag pa mang pos spags par brtag par bya'o// rnyed
258b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bkur sti ni mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang slongs mo ster ba'i khyim la lta bar brtag par bya'o/ / rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni yid mi bde ba skyed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni blo//
258b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'khrul par byed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni sdig pa'i dngos por 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir mya ngan skyed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni dran pa nye bar
258b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa bzhi brjed par byed par brtag par bya'o/ / rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni dkar po'i chos nyam chung bar byed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi yongs su
258b7(dkon brtsegs): nyams par byed par brtag par bya'o/ / rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni pha rol gyi dad pa'i bar chad byed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni rdzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa nyams par byed
259a1(dkon brtsegs): par brtag par bya'o/ / rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni sngar bkur sti byed la phyis bkur sti mi byed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni mi mdza' ba dang gnas par
259a2(dkon brtsegs): byed par brtag par bya'o/ / rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni mdza' bo spong bar brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni pha rol 'drid pa'i phyir smad 'tshong ma dang 'dra bar brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa
259a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bkur sti ni bsam gtan dang tshad med pa yongs su spong bar brtag par bya'o/ / rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas da'/ gshin rje'i 'jig/
259a4(dkon brtsegs): rten du lhung bar byed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni lhas byin dang lhag spyod kyi cho ga dang mthun par brtag par bya'o// byams pa byang chub sems dpas rnyed pa bkur sti la
259a5(dkon brtsegs): nyes dmigs gang dag brtag par bya ba ni 'di lta bu 'di dag go/ / brtags nas kyang 'dod pa chung bar bya'i/ yongs su gdung bar ni mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa byang chub sem
259a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'dod pa chung ba la skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag med pa'i phyir te/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bar chad med pa yin/ khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dag yid mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin
259a7(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi rnams yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir gnas pas rjes su bsrung bar 'os pa yin/ ngan 'gro log par ltung ba thams cad kyis skrag pa med pa yin/ bsdigs pa dang bral bas
259b1(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis mi non pa yin/ bdud kyi yul las yongs su grol bas mi 'phrogs pa yin/ sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa yin/ lha dang mi rnams kyis mngon par 'dod par bya/
259b2(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ bsam gtan la goms par byed par gnas pas bsal ba yin/ g.yo dang sgyu spangs pa dang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la skyon du lta bas bag yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i rigs
259b3(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pas ji skad smra ba de bzhin byed pa yin/ mkhas pa rnams dang tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis 'dod pa yin te/ byams pa phan yon 'di lta bu 'di dag shes nas/
259b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mkhas pa rnyed pa dang bkur sti yongs su spangs pas/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad spang ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dod pa chung ba la
259b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas par bya zhing / 'dod pa chung ba la kun tu bsten par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
259b6(dkon brtsegs): byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas 'du 'dzil dka' ba'i skyon rnams ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ 'du 'ji la dga' ba'i skyon de dag ni gang
259b7(dkon brtsegs): lags/ byang chub sems dpas gang dag la brtags na gcig pur dka' ba la dga' zhing yongs su skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'du
260a1(dkon brtsegs): nyes dmigs ni nyi shu po 'di dag yin te/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di la lus kyis ma bsdams pa yin/ ngag gis ma bsdams pa yin/ yid kyis ma bsdams
260a2(dkon brtsegs): yin/ 'dod chags che ba yin/ zhe sdang che ba yin/ gti mug che ba yin/ 'jig rten pa'i gtam gyis kyang gos pa yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pas gtam las yongs su nyams pa
260a3(dkon brtsegs): yin/ chos la ma gus pa la rten pa yin/ chos yongs su spangs pa yin/ de la bdud kyis glags rnyed pa yin/ bag med pa la rten pa yin/ bag med pa dang ldan pa yin/ de rtog pa
260a4(dkon brtsegs): dang dpyod pa shas che ba yin/ mang du thos pa las yongs su nyams pa yin/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mi 'thob pa yin/ myur du tshangs par spyod par mi 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas
260a5(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba las yongs su nyams pa yin/ chos la dga' ba las yongs su nyams pa yin/ dge 'dun la dga' ba las yongs su nyams pa yin te/ byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni 'du
260a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzi la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs yin par rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la brtags na gcig pur dga' ba la dga' zhing yongs su skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ba yin no//
260a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang rab spangs nas/ rnal 'byor can ni 'du 'dzi mi gnas te/
260b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni de la gzhol zhing de la 'bab/ nyes pa des na dka' bar byed mi 'gyur/ rgod dang 'gyod dang de bzhin rnam rtog pa// 'di dag thams cad 'du 'dzi rnams las byung // snying po med
260b2(dkon brtsegs): nga'i 'du 'dzi su byed pa/ / de ni lang long spyod cing ma bsdams yin// byis pa dag ni 'jig rten smra la dga'// byis pa de dag mchog gi gtam las nyams// zhe sdang 'phel zhing
260b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam rtog shas kyang che/ / nyes pa des na de la mi chags so// rigs pa ma yin smra la dga' bskyed nas// dge slong thos pa rnam par 'phel mi byed// de lta bas na mi rigs smra spong
260b4(dkon brtsegs): la chos la rtag tu dga' ba thob par gyis/ / byang chub mngon par 'dod phyir nga yis ni// rang gi yan lag lan stong snyed du btang // chos nyan pas ni nga la ngoms med na//
260b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag chos nyan pa na skyo bar 'gyur// tshig bzhi pa yi tshogs su bcad pa'i phyir// nga ni chung ma bu la dga' ma gyur// rgyal srid dag dang longs spyod ngas spangs nas// mkhas pa
260b6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar chos ni nyan mi byed/ / rigs min sma dang dam pa min smra ba// rnam pa kun tu yongs su spang bar bya// bskal pa brgya phrag du mar gang dkon pa// chos kyi dam pa de la dga' skyed
260b7(dkon brtsegs): cig/ thar pa 'dod pa yon tan don gnyer bas// 'jig rten bya ba yongs su brtsal mi bya// gang zhig zas dang gos kyi don tsam 'dong // de ni mchog dang gtso bor bsngags pa yin/
261a1(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'dri zhing dge slong legs par 'ongs// stan yang gding gis tshur shog 'dug par gyis// mi yi rnyed pa rab dkon rnyed gyur gyis// gcig la gcig ni chos kyi ga
261a2(dkon brtsegs): yang bya/ / lung nod kha ton bya dang bsam gtan rnams// khyod kyi dkar po'i phyogs rnams 'phel gyur dam// gal te khyod ni 'dod na dri bar gyis// khyod la'ang bdag 'dri skabs ni dbyeng
261a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan yongs 'das nas/ / bstan pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba na// dge slong dag ni shin tu rgod cing khengs// dkon pa bor nas 'du 'dzi dga' bar 'gyur//
261a4(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang ni de bzhin zas ched du// nyin dang mtshan rnams su yang gtam byed la// byis pa dag ni gnyid log gyur na yang // lo tog skye ba'i rmi lam rmi bar 'gyur// byis pa
261a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di kun shes pa rab tu nyams/ / ngan song ngan 'gro gsum du gzhol 'gyur gyis// dga' ba dang ni mos pa bskyed nas kyang // bse ru lta bur rtag tu nags gnas kyis// yon tan 'dod/
261a6(dkon brtsegs): pa nags na gnas pa yis// pha rol dag gi skyon la brtag mi bya// bdag ni khyad par 'phags shing bdag mchog ces// de snyam du ni sems bskyed mi bya'o// rgyags 'di bag med kun
261a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi rtsa ba ste/ / dge slong dman la brnyas par yong mi bya// bskal pa gcig gis thar pa 'thob mi 'gyur// 'di ni bstan pa 'di la go rims yin// de ltas dge slong yon tan 'dod
261b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa/ / dpa' bos mi rigs brjod pa spangs nas kyang // dka' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ba yis// bse ru 'dra bar dgon par gnas par bya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
261b2(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar dkar po'i chos yongs su spong ba'i slad du/ 'du 'dzis nod
261b3(dkon brtsegs): pa mang po skyon chags shing / yon tan ma mchis la gnod pa dang ldan te/ 'du 'dzi'i nyon mongs pa 'phel bar bgyid cing / spyod pa bzang po ma lags pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/ bcom
261b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dge ba 'tshal ba su zhig gcig pur dga' ba la mngon par dga' bar mi bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas smra ba la dga' ba'i
261b5(dkon brtsegs): skyon rnams ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpas gang rtogs na/ don rnam par nges pa la dka' zhing don la rtog pas yongs su gdung bar yang mi 'gyur lags/ de skad
261b6(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa 'di la byang chub sems
261b7(dkon brtsegs): dpas smra ba la dga' ba'i nyis dmigs nyi shu yod par brtag par bya'o/ / nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di la dge slong smra ba la dga' ba ni mang du thos pas rgyags shing dregs
262a1(dkon brtsegs): pas gus pa med par 'gyur ba dang / rtsod pa'i smra ba lhur len pas phyogs la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba dang / nang du tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang bral bas
262a2(dkon brtsegs): dran pa brjed par 'gyur ba dang / lus dang sems shin du ma sbyangs pas shes bzhin med par spyod par 'gyur ba dang / chos la bzod pa las nyams pas khengs pa dang 'dud par
262a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongs su spangs pas sems kyi rgyud dmu rgod du 'gyur ba dang / smra ba'i skrag pas spags pas dus ma yin par smra bar 'gyur ba dang / 'phags
262a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes pa ma thob pas ma bsdams par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang klu rnams kyis mi bkur bar 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa rnams kyis brnyas par 'gyur ba dang
262a5(dkon brtsegs): lus mngon sum du gyur pa rnams kyis spyo bar 'gyur ba dang / bsgrub pa la mi gnas pas yid la gcags par 'gyur ba dang / the tsom ma spangs pas rab tu mi brtan par 'gyur ba/
262a6(dkon brtsegs): dang sgra lhur len pas thos pa dang bye brag phyed pa nyams par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul can yin pas 'dod pa'i yon tan la chags par 'gyur ba dang yang dag
262a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog par mi byed pas myur du chos spongab byed pa dang / gzhan yang gzhan rtsom pas mi brtan zhing rten med par 'gyur ba dang / sems yongs su ma dul bas
262b1(dkon brtsegs): bkur sti med pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi dbyings khong du ma chud pas gzhan gyi dring 'jom par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams yongs su ma shes pas nyon mongs pas dbang
262b2(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' smra ba la dga' zhing sgra lhur len la/ don la rtog pa dang bral ba'i nyes dmigs yin no//
262b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// thos pas rgyags nas gus par mi 'gyur te/ rnam par 'gyed pa'i smra ba rnams la chags//
262b4(dkon brtsegs): brjed par 'gyur zhing shes bzhin med par 'gyur// smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go// nang gi sems la shin tu ring bar 'gyur// lus dang sems kyang rab sbyangs ma
262b5(dkon brtsegs): yin 'gyur/ / khengs pa dang ni 'dud pa mang bar 'gyur// smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go// byis pa dam pa'i chos bsam rang du nyams// sems ni mi mnyen shin tu
262b6(dkon brtsegs): rtsub par 'gyur/ / zhi gnas lhag mthong dag dang rab tu ring // smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go// rtag du bla ma dag la gus pa med// sngags pa'i gtam dag la ni dga'
262b7(dkon brtsegs): ba skyed/ / snying po med la gnas shing shes rab nyams// smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ de ni lha tshogs rnams kyis mi bkur zhing // de tshe de la'ang 'dod pa mi skyed la// so/
263a1(dkon brtsegs): so yang dag rig las nyams 'gyur te// sA la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go// gang dag lus ni mngon sum mang yod pa// mkhas pa de dag gis na
263a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ / de yi srog ni don med 'gyur ba ste// spru la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ bdag ni bsgrub nyams da ni ci bya zhes// 'chi ba'i dus tshe byis pa mya ngan byed//
263a3(dkon brtsegs): gting rnyed ma gyur shin tu sdug bsngal 'gyur// smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ rtswa bskyod bzhin du 'gul zhing g.yo ba ste// de ni de ltar the tsom 'gyur du nges// de ni nam
263a4(dkon brtsegs): yang blo brtan mi 'gyur te/ / spru la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ gar la lta ba'i khrod na 'dug pa zhig/ dpa' bo gzhan gyi yon tan rjod pa bzhin// bdag nyid nan tan nyams par
263a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ste/ / spra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go// de yi sems ni rna ba'i rnam shes la// rab tu chags shing sgras rgyags shes rab nyams// log par sems shing lam ngan 'gro bar
263a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ de ni g.yo ldan yang zhing re chad 'gyur// phyi phyir zhing ni rnam par 'gyed pa rtsom// 'phags pa'i dam pa'i chos las rab tu ring // smra la
263a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ / mthu chung bsti stang gis ni dgar 'gyur te// mi shes ldan pa g.yo zhing 'gyur ba yin// spre'u ltar de yi sems ni g.yo bar 'gyur// smra la dga' ba'i nyes
263b1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag go/ / rang gi blo ni shes pas dman pa'i phyir// rmongs pa de ni gzhan gyi dring la 'jog/ de ni nyon mongs phyogs kyi dbang du 'gro// spru la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go// mig kyang
263b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul cing de bzhin rna ba 'khrul/ / sna yang 'khrul cing de bzhin lce yang 'khrul// lus kyang 'khrul cing yid kyang 'khrul par 'gyur// smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ yun ring
263b3(dkon brtsegs): ngus nas spru la dga' bas na/ / de ni bdag nyid dga' ba mi mthong ngo // tshig gang dka' ba mtha' yas 'thob 'gyur ba// tshig gcig tsam zhig bsam pa mchog yin no// bu ram shing
263b4(dkon brtsegs): shun snying po ci yang med/ / dga' bar bya ba'i ro ni nang na 'dug/ shun pa zos pa'i mis ni bu ram ro// zhim po rnyed par nus pa ma yin no// ji ltar shun pa de bzhin smra ba ste// ro lhu du ni
263b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di la don sems yin/ / de lta bas na smra la dka' spongs te// rtag tu bag yod byos la don soms shig/ smra ba'i nyes pa 'di 'dra rtogs gyur cing // don gyi yon tan mchog 'di shes
263b6(dkon brtsegs): nas ni/ / 'di na byang chub mkhas pa gang yin pa// des ni don bsam pa la dga' bar gyis// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
263b7(dkon brtsegs): byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar smra ba la dga' ba'i skyon rnams dang / don la sems pa'i yon tan rnams de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs
264a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' snying po 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni don bsam pa btang ste/ snying po ma mchis pa'i smra ba la
264a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar bgyid pa'i rngo mi thogs lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnyid kyi dga' bas dga' ba'i skyon ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ byang chub
264a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas ji ltar brtags na/ rmugs pa dang gnyis kyi nongs dmigs mthong nas/ brtson 'grus rtsom zhing yongs su skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
264a4(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa/ byams pa 'di la gnyid la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs ni rnam pa nyi shur brtag par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa la dga' zhing
264a5(dkon brtsegs): skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ / nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gnyid che ba ni rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non te/ le lo che bar 'gyur ba dang / lus sha che ba
264a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / mdog yongs su ma dag pa dang / de'i 'byung ba chen po rnams nad bzhis non par 'gyur ba dang / de'i me'i khams chung bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i kha zas legs par 'ju bar
264a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba dang / de'i lus la 'bras dang phol mig 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / le lo can du 'gyur ba dang / de'i gti mug gi dra ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i shes rab
264b1(dkon brtsegs): nyam chung bar 'gyur ba dang / de kha zas 'dod pa las yi ga 'chu bar 'gyur ba dang / de gti mug gi mun pa rab du 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / de la mi ma yin pa rnams bkur sti mi byed pa dang
264b2(dkon brtsegs): sems rdul bar 'gyur ba dang / mi ldang ba mang bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems bka la nyal gyis kun nas dkris shing 'dug par 'gyur ba dang / de'i dge ba'i chos la 'dun par mi 'gyur ba dang /
264b3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos thams cad las nyams par 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa zhum par gyur nas brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams kyi spyod pa la smod pa dang / 'khor gyi nang du song na brnyes par 'gyur ba ste/
264b4(dkon brtsegs): byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyid la dga' zhing / rmugs pa dang gnyid mang ba'i nyes dmigs yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na/ brtson 'grus
264b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsom pa la dga' zhing skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga'
264b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba/ / de yi lus ni sha che mkhregs ma yin// le lo de che blun zhing mthun mi byed// de yi mdog kyang dag par mi 'gyur ro// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// bad
264b7(dkon brtsegs): kan rlung dang de bzhin mkhris pa rnams/ / de dag de yi lu sa la shas cher 'gyur// de yi khams rnams rab tu 'khrug par 'gyur// gang zhig lugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba//
265a1(dkon brtsegs): zas nyes pas lto ni ma dag cing // lus kyang lcil zo mdog bde ma yin// de yi tshig kyang gsal bar mi 'gyur ro// gang zhig thugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/
265a2(dkon brtsegs): de yi lus la phol mig mang por 'gyur// de ni nyin dang mtshan du bde bar nyal// de la rma rnams mi bzad 'byung bar 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// le lo byad
265a3(dkon brtsegs): cing brtson 'grus yongs su nyams/ / de ni bde las nyams shing nor rnams 'gribs// de ni rtag tu zhan cing sems kyang rmongs// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// gti/
265a4(dkon brtsegs): mug dra ba chen po 'phel 'gyur zhing // de ni the tsom can de lta ba thob// de ni lta bar gyur pa mang bar 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// de yi shes rab shin du
265a5(dkon brtsegs): nyams chung 'gyur/ / de yi blo yang yongs su nyams par 'gyur// ye shes las ni rtag tu de nyams 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// mi shes le lo snyoms
265a6(dkon brtsegs): las shes rab 'chal/ / mi ma yin pa dag gis glags rnyed de// nags na gnas pa'i tshe ni 'tshe bar 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// sems kyang rtul zhing de yi
265a7(dkon brtsegs): dran pa rmongs/ / lung nod kha ton byed la de mi gnas// chos sman yang de ni rtag tu thogs// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dka' 'gyur ba// de yi nyon mongs kun nas ldang bar
265b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / rnam par 'khor zhing g.yo la rmongs pa dang // de yi sems ni rtag tu gdung bar 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// de yi bya ba mang po nyams shing
265b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gags/ / lus kyang gdungs shing yid kyang yongs su gdungs// bag la nyal ba 'phel bar des mi shes// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// de ni dge sems
265b3(dkon brtsegs): rtan tu mi 'dod de/ / de ni chos la 'dun pa skyed mi byed// phyir zhing chos ma yin la de dga' 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// de ni rmongs shing chos
265b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa nyams/ / byis pa yon tan kun las yongs su nyams// dkar po 'joms zhing mun par grol bar 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// 'jigs
265b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur zhing sems kyang rab tu zhum/ / de ni rtag par mchog tu dga' mi 'gyur// gnyid kyis non pa lus kyang lhod par 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur pa/
265b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid mi shes le lo can gyur nas// brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan la phrag dog byed// brtson 'grus ldan pa rnams la mi snyan smra// nyes pa 'di 'dra 'di dag rtogs byung na// mkhas
265b7(dkon brtsegs): pasu zhig rmugs gnyis dga' bar byed/ / shin tu gti mug lta ba mang po'i rgyu// don bzang dam chos yon tan chud gzon pa// gnyid 'di brtson 'grus 'phog par rdzogs gyur na/ #
266a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yon tan ldan pa su der dga'/ / sdug bsngal kun dang mun pa sel byed cing // ngan song yongs su spong ba'i gzhir gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'i
266a2(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus 'phags/ / gang yin de ni rtag tu bsten par gyis// 'jig rten 'di na bzo gang ci yod dang // 'jig rten 'das bzo gang dag ci yod pa// brtson 'grus brtsams la
266a3(dkon brtsegs): rnyed par mi dka' na/ / mkhas pa su dag brtson 'grus stobs kyis skyo// gang dag sangs rgyas byang chub zhugs gyur pa// de dag rmugs gnyid skyon rnams mthong nas ni// rtag tu brtson
266a4(dkon brtsegs): 'grus rtsom la gnas par byed/ / 'di ni nga yis de dag bskul byas yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di/
266a5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na spong bar mi bgyid cing / skyo bar mi bgyid pa de dag dang / brtson 'grus
266a6(dkon brtsegs): rtsom pa mi skyed pa de dag de tsam du rmongs par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' slob par 'tshal ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang
266a7(dkon brtsegs): d ag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba su zhig yang dag pa'i gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na le lo bgyid cing dge ba'i chos rnams skyed par bgyid
266b1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyi yon tan dang phan yon 'di lta bu thos na byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du su zhig brtson 'grus rtsom par mi bgyid de/ de bzhin gshegs
266b2(dkon brtsegs): pas gnyid la dga' ba'i nongs dmigs dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i phan yon 'di dag legs par bka' stsal lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
266b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' las la dga' ba 'jig rten pa'i skrag pas spags pa'i nongs dmigs ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpas gang dag la brtags na/ 'dod pa chung zhing bgyi ba nyung
266b4(dkon brtsegs): la dam pa'i chos btsal ba'i slad du rtag tu brtson zhing sbyor ba la gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sem
266b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen pos las la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs nyi shur brtag par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na/ 'dod pa chung zhing bya ba zhung la dam pa'i chos btsal ba'i phyir
266b6(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu brtson zhing sbyor ba la gnas par 'gyur ro/ / nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las la dga' ba 'jig rten pa'i las rnams la brtson par 'gyur pa dang /
266b7(dkon brtsegs): las ngan pa thams cad la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / lung nod pa dang kha ton la brtson pa dag gis brnyas par 'gyur ba dang / nang du yang dag 'jog la dga' ba rnams kyis smad par 'gyur
267a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'khor ba thog pa dang tha ma med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i las brtsams par 'gyur ba dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa rnams kyi yon sbyong bar mi byed/
267a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / de'i sems dngos por 'dzin pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / chags pa mang bar 'gyur ba dang / khyim so rnams la rgyun du sbyor bar 'gyur ba dang / dbang byed par mi 'gyur ba
267a3(dkon brtsegs): dang zlog byed kyi ngang tshul can yid smon pa mang po la rgyun du gnas pa dang / khyim gyi bya ba dag la brtson pa dang / de ro dag la shas cher 'dun cing chags pa bskyed pa dang
267a4(dkon brtsegs): len pa med par mi dga' ba dang / kun nas mnar sems mang ba las kyi sgrib pa rgyun du mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma la rton par 'gyur ba dang / de
267a5(dkon brtsegs): zas kyi rnam par rtog pas nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i bya ba dag rgyun du 'dri bar byed pa dang / mi rigs pa'i smra ba dag la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / zhal
267a6(dkon brtsegs): ta byed pa'i rgyags pas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dbang phyug gis tshar gcod par byed pa dang / pha rol gyi 'khrul pa rtog cing bdag gi 'khrul pa la mi rtog par 'gyur ba dang / don
267a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan zhing rnam par nges pa'i gtam dag la skyen par brnyes par 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i las la dga' zhing zhal ta byed pa'i skrag pas spags pa'i
267b1(dkon brtsegs): nyes dmigs yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na 'dod pa chung zhing bya ba zhung bar 'gyur la/ 'jig rten pa'i bya ba spangs nas/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba la brtsod
267b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// de ni las ngan dag la gnas 'gyur zhing // las mchog dag las
267b3(dkon brtsegs): de ni rgyang yang ring / / 'dir ni rnyed pa che las ring bar 'gyur// rnam par chags sems nyes pa 'di dag yin// dge slong lung nod kha ton dka' rnams kyis// de la brnyas shing 'dod
267b4(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed la/ / bsams gtan byed pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur// rtag tu las gnas skyon ni 'di dag yin// 'khor ba'i las la mngon par brtson pa dang // thar pa las ni rgyang
267b5(dkon brtsegs): ring bcings par gnas/ / de ni yul 'khor zas la mi rigs spyod// nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'i yin// rtag tu dngos po dag ni len par byed// yongs su 'dzin pa med la
267b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' mi skyed/ / nor med nor ni don du gnyer bar byed// nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'i yin// khyim du rgyu ba dag ni chags par 'gyur// 'du 'dzi dga' bas thams cad 'jigs pa
267b7(dkon brtsegs): byed/ gzeb kyi nang du bya bcug bzhin du 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'i yin// khyim pa'i las la de rtag mya ngan byed// yongs su gdungs par gyur kyang yid mi 'byul//
268a1(dkon brtsegs): nams kyang tshig ni btsun par mi 'gyur te// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// bla mas bskul na dka' blo mi bde zhing // rjes su bstan pa mthun
268a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzin mi byed/ / de ni myur du tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// khyim na gnas pa'i las rnams rtag sems pas// de ni rtag
268a3(dkon brtsegs): du 'dod par 'gyur ba ste/ / bsam gtan dang ni spong ba de mi byed// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// de yi 'dod chags shas ni che bar skye// de ni ro bro rnams la
268a4(dkon brtsegs): chags shing zhe na/ / de ni ngan ngon tsam gyis dgar mi 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// de ni 'khor phal chen dgar 'gyur te/ de nyams na ni shin tu sdug
268a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal 'gyur/ / de ni bong bu bzhin du lang long 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// de sems rtag tu gnod sems ldan par 'gyur// las rnams 'phel
268a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing zad par mi 'gyur te/ / srid pa'i 'khri shing dag gis dam du bcings// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// de ni rtag tu bla ma rnams mi bsten// phyogs 'dod khyim pa
268a7(dkon brtsegs): la ni sten par byed/ / tshul khrims gnas pa dag la'ang phrag dog byed// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// nyin dang mtshan du sems gzhan med par ni// zas dang gro
268b1(dkon brtsegs): la rgyun du sems par byed/ / de ni rtag tu yon tan 'dod ma yin// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// de ni 'jig rten pa yi bya ba 'dri// rigs pa min pa
268b2(dkon brtsegs): spang rnams la dga'/ / rigs pa'i spru la de ni dga' mi 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// sdom brtson rnams la de ni rtag du gshe// dbang phyug mchis
268b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag des tshar gcod/ / mi sdug las rnams mngon par 'du byed de// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// de ni rtag tu gzhan gyi skyon rtog cing // bdag la yod pa'i skyo
268b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams mi mthong la/ / yon tan ldan pa rnams la 'khrul pa tshol// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// byis pa de ni gzhan gyis myur du brnyes// de ni pha rol dag la
268b5(dkon brtsegs): chos ston tshe/ / blo nyams pas na mngon par shes mi 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// gnod gyur nyes pa 'di dag mthong nas ni// las ngan dag la su zhig
268b6(dkon brtsegs): dka' bar byed/ / dpa' bo dag ni rtag tu las mchog byed// byas pa gang yin chung ni gzon mi byed// lan stong brjod kyang tshig gcig mi 'dzin pa// de ni blo ngan dag gis spro ba yin/
268b7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig las ngan dag ni byed pa la// dam pa dag gis de ltar rtag tu spad// de lta bas na mkhas mis 'di rtag tu// las ngan dag ni rnam par spangs nas kyang // thub dbang rnams
269a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis rtag tu bsngags pa yi/ / bzang po'i las rnams gang yin de dag bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
269a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas/ las ngan pa rtsom pa de dag ni shes rab shin tu
269a3(dkon brtsegs): chung zhing / shes rab kyis dman par 'gyur pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di
269a4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / byams pa de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas/ las ngan
269a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rtsom pa de dag ni shes rab shin tu chung zhing / shes rab kyis dman par 'gyur ba yin no// byams pa gzhan yang khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o// byang
269a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' gang dag la sbyor ba med cing bsam gtan med la spong ba med cing 'don pa med pa dang / mang du thos pa yongs su tshol ba med pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la
269a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba ma yin no/ / byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni bsam gtan dang spong bas phye ba dang / ye shes kyis 'dus byas pa dang / ye shes kyis mnyam par gzhag pa dang //
269b1(dkon brtsegs): brtson pas phye ba yin gyi/ khyim pa'i las dang zhal ta byed pas phye ba ni ma yin te/ 'di ltar zhal ta byed pa'i las de ni mi rigs pa la sbyor ba rnams dang / 'du byed la mngon par
269b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i bya bas spags pa ste/ byang chub sems dpas de la 'dod pa bskyed par mi bya'o// byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtso
269b3(dkon brtsegs): pas rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bkang na/ des ni nga mnyes par byas pa ma yin/ ri mor byas pa ma yin/ bkur
269b4(dkon brtsegs): stir byas pa ma yin gyi/ / byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' tha na pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam
269b5(dkon brtsegs): kun chub par byed dam/ 'chad na des ni nga la bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
269b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang byang chub ni mang du thos pa las byung ba yin gyi/ dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa las byung ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro// byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal da byed pa la brtson pas/
269b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang kha ton byed pa la brtson pa zhal ta byed pa'i skrag pas sngags par byed pa na/ bsod nams 'dod pa des ni bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po chen po skyed par
270a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ las kyi sgrib pa'ang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi gsum po gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni shes rab las
270a2(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i phyir ro/ / byams pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' zhal byed pa la brtson pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang kha ton byed pa la brtson pa'i bar chad mi bya'o//
270a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzam bu'i gling 'di zhal ta byed pas yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i zhal ta byed pa de dag thams cad kyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang kha ton byed pa la brtson pa gcig la
270a4(dkon brtsegs): rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang kha ton byed pa la brtson pa 'dzam bu'i gling gang ba snyed kyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' nang du yang dag 'jog la brtson
270a5(dkon brtsegs): pa gcig la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o/ / de ltar byas na de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su yi rang ba dang gnang ba yin te/ de dag gi bsnyen bkur ni legs par byas pa yin no// gang zhig
270a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab spyod pa la mos nas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni tshad med par skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi las de ni dka' ba'i las
270a7(dkon brtsegs): dang bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags shing mngon par 'phags pa'i phyir ro// byams pa de lta bas na byang chub sems
270b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' mngon par brtson pa don du gnyer zhing brtson 'grus rtsom par 'dod pas shes rab la brtson par bya zhing / shes rab yongs su btsal ba la brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o//
270b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'du 'dzi la dga' ba dang /
270b3(dkon brtsegs): las la dga' ba rnams kyi nongs dmigs rnams ni bka' stsal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas spros pa la dga' ba'i nongs dmigs rnams ji ltar brtag par
270b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la brtags na nye bar zhi ba la gnas shing rtsod pa ma mchis par gnas par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa
270b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas spros pa la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs rnams mdor bsdu na nyi shu po 'di dag tu brtag par bya'o/ / rgyas par ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtha' yas par bstan te/
270b6(dkon brtsegs): mthar thug par yang mi 'gyur ro// nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' spros pa la dga' ba tshe 'di nyid la sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba mang bar gnas pa dang / bzod pa
270b7(dkon brtsegs): las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba dang / de'i mi mdza' ba rnams yi rangs par 'gyur ba dang / de la bdud kyang mgu bar 'gyur ba dang / de la bdud kyi 'khor yang dka' bar 'gyur
271a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / de'i dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes pa rnams med par 'gyur ba dang / 'thab pa dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / rtsod
271a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'gyed pa mang bar 'gyur ba dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ba dang / bag med par
271a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i lam rab tu 'dzin pa dang / de'i lce'i dbang po rtsub par 'gyur ba dang / de'i lung mnos pa'i chos rnams la legs par gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang / mdo sde lung ma mnos
271a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyis yongs su spangs par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po rnams dang myur du phrad par 'gyur ba
271a5(dkon brtsegs): dang dka' ba'i lam gyis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / rgun mi 'chad par yid du mi 'ong ba'i thos par 'gyur ba dang / gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der the tsom can du 'gyur
271a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / de la mi khom pa brgyad po dag nye bar 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu de'i dkar po'i phyogs la brtson pa la bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni spros pa la dka'
271a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nyes dmigs rnams mdor bsdus pa yin te/ de dag yongs su spang bar bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// /
271b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni tshe 'dir bde bar mi 'gyur te// bzod dang ring zhing khro ba'i phyogs la gnas// de yi dgra rnams dga' dar 'gyur ba ste// spos spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go// bdud rtsa
271b2(dkon brtsegs): de la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur/ / bdud kyi phyogs kyang de la dga' bar 'gyur// de yi dge ba'i chos skyes chud par 'gyur// spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go// de ni rnams
271b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang dge ba mi skyed de/ / 'chi kar tha dad rgyu la gnas pa dang / ngan song 'gro ba'i las ni byed par 'gyur// spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ mi mdzes pa dang blta na mi
271b4(dkon brtsegs): sdug dang / / de ni rtag tu rus rigs dma' bar 'gyur// de yi lce yi dbang po rtsub 'gyur te// spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go// lung mnos chos rnams legs par mi gnas
271b5(dkon brtsegs): shing / lung mnos ma byas mdo sde thos mi 'gyur// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang rnam par spong // spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go// sdig pa'i grogs po dag dang
271b6(dkon brtsegs): phrad par 'gyur/ / dka' ba'i theg pas rnam par dag 'gyur zhing // mi 'dod pa yi tshig rnams rgyun du thos// spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go// byis pa'i blo can de ni gar skyes der
271b7(dkon brtsegs): yin nam ma yin snyam du de rtog cing / / rtag tu des ni the tsom rnyed par 'gyur// spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ de ni mi khom brgyad dang ring mi 'gyur// de ni dal ba ldan pa'i mchog
272a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / de la gnod pa 'di dag rtag 'byung ste// spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ de yi dge ba dag la bar chad mang // bgegs su 'gyur bas myur du
272a2(dkon brtsegs): thob mi 'gyur/ / brtson dang ldan yang de la dgra rnams 'byung // spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ mkhas pas nyes 'di yang dag rig nas ni// spros pa thams cad
272a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spang bar bya/ / spros spyod dag ni gnod pa rnyed par sla// de lta bas na spros la gnas mi bya// gang na spros pa'am rtsod pa yod pa las// dpag tshad brgya yi pha rol 'gro/
272a4(dkon brtsegs): pa mchog/ gang na nyon mongs yod pa de dag tu// yud tsam zhig kyang gnas shing 'du mi bya// rab byung don 'dod yon tan 'dod pa rnams// sdang ba'i sems kyis rtsod par ma byed
272a5(dkon brtsegs): cig/ khyed la zhing med zhing blas tshong byar med// gang la nor phyir 'di dag 'byung ba spros// khyed la chung ma bu dang bu mo med// khyim dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyang yod ma yin// blun
272a6(dkon brtsegs): po bran mo med cing dbang phyug med/ / rab tu byung nas rtsod par ma byed cig/ zhi zhing rab tu zhi bas bsten pa yi// ngur smri ge gos rnams dad pas blangs nas ni// zhi zhing rab zhi nye
272a7(dkon brtsegs): bar zhi bas byos/ / spros pa rnam par spongs la bzod pa skyed// mi bzad sems ni sbrul gdug 'dra ba gsungs// spros la spyod pa sems can dmyal ba dang // dud 'gro gshin
272b1(dkon brtsegs): rje'i yul dang ring mi 'gyur/ / de lta bas na bzod dang brtson 'grus skyed// tshogs pa gzhig phyir spros par byed na ni// sdug bsngal gsod dang 'ching ba ci yang rung // sor bas/
272b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bsdig pa de dag ni// 'jig rten 'di ni gnas pa rnams la 'byung // tshogs par gyur la nyes pa 'di dag dkon// tshogs gyur pag la nyal ba 'phel ba med// tshogs gyur
272b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la dga' ba 'byung 'gyur na/ / mkhas pa su zhig tshogs pa skyed mi byed// glags tshol dag gis skyon rnams rnyed mi 'gyur// nams kyang 'khor rnams phyed par mi 'gyur te//
272b4(dkon brtsegs): de yi mdza' bshes dag kyang rgyun du 'byung // spros pa spangs pa'i phan yon de dag yin// theg pa'i stobs 'di yis ni dga' 'gyur zhing // las kyi sgrib pa ma lus byang nas ni//
272b5(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang bcas shing bzhon bcas bdud thul cig/ brtan pa gang yin des ni bzod pa skyed// spros pa rgyas pa la ni skyon mang chags// nyes pa de dag ngas ni bstan mi nus//
272b6(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu spros med bsngags pa mtha' yas 'gyur// su zhig don gnyer de ni bzod pa skyed// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
272b7(dkon brtsegs): po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kun nas nyon mongs pa de tsam du gleng nga ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs te/ ngo mtshar lags so//
273a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ci lnga brgya pa mtha' ma la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis tshig gi mchog 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na skyo bar 'gyur zhing / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
273a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'ang spong bar 'gyur lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ byams pa lnga brgya pa mtha' ma la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams tshig gi mchog 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na
273a3(dkon brtsegs): skyo bar 'gyur zhing / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa'ang spong bar 'byung ba de dag ni nyung ngo // byams pa gang dag sems kyi rgyud khengs par 'gyur zhing gus pa med pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal
273a4(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa dang / gcig la gcig the tsom za ba mang ba dag ni phal che ste/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde zab mo bstan pa'i yon tan dang phan yon zab pa dag lung
273a5(dkon brtsegs): nod par mi byed/ kha ton du mi byed/ 'chang bar mi byed/ kun chub par mi byed de/ de dag ni las kyi sgrib pa shas che bas/ yon tan de dag dang phan yon de dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur
273a6(dkon brtsegs): ro/ / de dag dad pa med pa des mdo sde de dag la the tsom za bar 'gyur te/ phyis kyang lung nod par mi byed/ 'chang bar mi byed/ kun chub par mi byed de/ de dag gi drung du bdud
273a7(dkon brtsegs): sdig can dge slong gi cha lugs su 'dug nas 'di skad du mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa yin te/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
273b1(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde 'di dag las yon tan dang phan yon bshad pa gang yin pa de dag khyed kyi 'di las mi 'byung zhing med pa'i phyir ro zhes mos pa zlog par byed do// de dag de ltar mos pa bzlog pas
273b2(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde zab mo dag mi 'dod cing the tsom du 'gyur te/ lung nod par mi byed// kha ton du mi byed de/ mi blun po de dag gis yon tan dang phan yon de dag thos na/ 'di ltar chos spong bar 'gyur
273b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa ni sbyang bar mi nus so snyam du mi sems so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas
273b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi yon tan de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa gang lags pa 'di dag las gang gis sems bskyed pa
273b5(dkon brtsegs): gang yang rung ba zhig yid la bgyid cing / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med yid la bgyid pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das sems bskyed pa de dag gang
273b6(dkon brtsegs): lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa sems bskyed pa
273b7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa de dag ni byis pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin/ skyes bu dam
274a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin te/ byams pa sems bskyed pa ni bcu po 'di dag yin no// bcug
274a2(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ byams pa 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la zhe 'gras pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar mi nus te/ sems can thams cad la byas
274a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / 'tshe ba yongs su spangs te/ sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sems bskyed pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos srung ba'i sems bskyed pa
274a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / zab mo'i bzod pa la nges par gyur pas dam pa'i chos la mngon par zhen pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur stis ma gos pas bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i sems
274a5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang / brjed pa med pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rin po cher sems bskyed pa dang / zhum pa med pas sems can thams cad la bla ma bzhin du gus pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /
274a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi yan lag la nges pas nyi tshe ba'i gtam gyi ro myang bar mi bya ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / ma 'dres pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sems bskyed pa dang mtshan ma yongs su spang
274a7(dkon brtsegs): te sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/ byams pa sems bskyed pa bcu po ni de dag yin te/ sems bskyed pa bcu po de dag las sems bskyed pa gang yang rung ba'i sems
274b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni sems bskyed pa de dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun
274b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das lhag pa'i bsam pa skul ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// de skad
274b3(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ kun dga' bo legs so legs so// kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis
274b4(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pa skul ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
274b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
274b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las lhag pa'i bsam pa skul ba'i le'u
274b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas
275a1(dkon brtsegs): brdzu tsam nus te gtan la @5/ oM@/ bam po gnyis so// rgyag mangs/ n+ta
275a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ri pri tsAnA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lags bzangs kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po// sangs rgyas
275a3(dkon brtsegs): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka'i gnas na/
275a4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzangs shes bya ba g.yog dang bcas te rgyal po'i khab kyi gro khyer chen po
275a5(dkon brtsegs): nas byung nas/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka'i gnas ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba la der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
275a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzangs kyis
275a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
275b1(dkon brtsegs): du dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems
275b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzangs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya 'i
275b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag rtag par rgyun du yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ / drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
275b4(dkon brtsegs): byin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ lag bzangs
275b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag rtag par rgyun du yong su rdzogs par bya'o/ / lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
275b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos kyis longs spyod rnams yongs su tshol gyi//
275b7(dkon brtsegs): chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no// mnyam pas yin gyi/ mi mnyam pas ni ma yin no// de srog chags gzhan dag dang / sems can gzhan rnams la gnod pa mi byed/ nyam nga ba mi
276a1(dkon brtsegs): byed par sbyin pa sbyin te/ brjod pa dang / s+tha dang / tshogs su bcad pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'dzem pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'jigs pa'i phyir ma yin/ lan du phan 'don
276a2(dkon brtsegs): su re ba'i phyir ma yin/ mtho ris kyi phyir ma yin/ tshul 'chos pa ma yin/ kha gsag byed pa ma yin/ brnyas pa ma yin no// sbyin gnas sam/ sbyin gnas ma yin pa 'am/ mngon
276a3(dkon brtsegs): par grags pa 'am/ mngon par grags pa ma yin pa 'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/ tshul khrims 'chal pa 'am/ 'dris pa'am/ ma 'dris pa 'am/ mdza' ba 'am/
276a4(dkon brtsegs): mi mdza' ba'ang rung ste/ bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gro byed/ mchod pa byed cing / 'dun pa drag po dang / dga' ba drag po dang / dad pa drag pos de nyung ngu bdog na'ang lung ngu
276a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin mang du bdog na'ang mang du sbyin/ ngan pa bdog na'ang ngan pa sbyin/ gya nom pa bdog na'ang gya nom pa sbyin no// lag bzangs ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong sbyin pa dang
276a6(dkon brtsegs): rlabs po che'i sems dang / rangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de bzhin du/ ka k+Sha ni tsam yang sbyin zhing rlabs po che'i sems dang / rangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin no// des zas 'dod
276a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la sems can thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla na med pa'i stobs kyis brtan pa thob par bya ba'i phyir zas sbyin no/ / skom 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyon
276b1(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa'i sgom pa thams cad bsal ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir sgom sbyin no/ / gos 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i gos
276b2(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba'i phyir gos sbyin no/ / bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med pa thob
276b3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir bzhon pa sbyin no/ / spos 'dod pa rnams la sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi dri bsung thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir spos sbyin no// me tog
276b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir me tog rnams sbyin no/ / phye ma 'dod pa rnams
276b5(dkon brtsegs): la ni sems can thams can nyes par spyod pa'i dri nga ba'i dri ma bzhom pa'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir phye ma sbyin no/ / byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad zhes pa med
276b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims dang / spyod pa'i byug pa thob par bya ba'i phyir drug ba sbyin no// gdugs 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i stobs
276b7(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba'i phyir gdugs sbyin no/ / lham 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i bde ba mngon par shes pa thob par bya ba'i phyir lham sbyin no// mal cha 'dod pa
277a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ni sems can thams cad lha dang / tshangs pa dang / 'phags pa'i gnas pa'i mal cha'i bde bar sbyar ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir mal cha sbyin no//
277a2(dkon brtsegs): stan 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad byang chub kyi snying por bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis mi phyed pa dpa' ba'i stan thob par bya ba'i phyir
277a3(dkon brtsegs): stan sbyin no/ / gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad skyabs dang / gnas dang / mgon dang / dpung gnyen du gyur pa'i lus thob par bya ba'i phyir gnas sbyin no// phru
277a4(dkon brtsegs): rtog dang / bum pa dang / 'tshogs chas 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad chos kyi rdzing lta bu'i lus thob par bya ba'i phyir/ phru rtog dang / bum pa dang / 'tshogs chas
277a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin no/ / sems can thams cad zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang
277a6(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun la dka' thub kyi nags tshal sbyin pa sbyin no/ / sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ mchod
277a7(dkon brtsegs): rten rnams la rgyan sbyin pa sbyin no/ / sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i spyan mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ mun khrod kyi mchod rten nam/ lam rnams la mar
277b1(dkon brtsegs): me sbyin pa sbyin no/ / sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i snyan mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa rnams sam/ chos la mchod pa
277b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams sam/ dge 'dun la mchod pa rnams la rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sbyin pa sbyin no// sems can thams cad cha byad dang / tshul khrims dang / spyod pa mdzes pa bla na med pa
277b3(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba'i phyir/ lhung bzed dang chos gos sbyin pa sbyin no// sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba ni sbyin pa'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir/ snod tshags sbyin pa sbyin no/
277b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad shes rab chen po'i tshogs yongs su bkang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir spyi gu dang / gnag tsha dang / glegs bu dang / chos kyi khri stan sbyin pa sbyin no//
277b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir/ na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad sbyin pa sbyin no// sems can thams cad byang chub rnam pa gsum gyi sa dang
277b6(dkon brtsegs): bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi sa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sa gzhi sbyin pa sbyin no// sems can thams cad slob dpon med pa'i dam pa'i chos mthon po thob par bya ba'i phyir/ mchod rten mthon
277b7(dkon brtsegs): po dang / sku gzugs mthon po byed do// bdog pa lta na sems can thams cad mngon par shes pa myur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ myur zhing yongs su nyon mongs par mgyur par sbyin pa sbyin no//
278a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad bar du gcod pa med par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/ rung ba sbyin gyi rung ba ma yin pa ni ma yin no// sems can thams cad
278a2(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa chen po yongs su mi 'chad pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ yongs su mi gcod pa yin no// sems can thams cad snying rje chen po mtshungs pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sem
278a3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la mnyam par sbyin pa sbyin no/ / sems can thams cad bdud dang mu stegs byed thams cad kyis tshar mi chod pa dang / gnod par mi nus pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par
278a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub par bya ba'i phyir/ gzhan la mi gnod par sbyin pa sbyin no// lag bzangs gal te byang chub sems dpa' la sbyin pa 'di dag sbyin du nor med cing 'byor pa med par gyur na/ de 'jig
278a5(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la sbyin pa mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa 'di dag sbyin par yid kyis 'dod cing smon la/ smon lam 'debs de/ lag bzangs byang
278a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de sbyin pa 'di dag sbyin pa'i nus pa dang ldan yang rung / nus pa dang mi ldan yang rung ste/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems can thams cad bdag gi bde
278a7(dkon brtsegs): bar sbyar ba nyid dang ldan pa dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cing 'bad pa med pa dang / 'dod pa med par brnag pa rnams thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du shin tu yongs su
278b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs shing bsam pa ma lus par yongs su rdzogs nas/ bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur bar bdag gi de bzang por gyur cig/ bdag gi de dge bar gyur cig ces de ltar yid kyis
278b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod cing smon la/ smon lam 'debs so// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la rin po che'i rgya mtsho'ang sbyin par 'dod cing smon la/ smon lam 'debs
278b3(dkon brtsegs): so/ / dbyig gi ri dang / gser gyi ri dang / gos kyi ri dang / yo byad thams cad kyi ri dang / bza' ba rgya mtsho dang / btung ba rgya mtsho dang / gnas legs par byas pa/ legs
278b4(dkon brtsegs): par gnas pa mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa dag kyang sbyin par 'dod cing smon la/ smon lam 'debs so// 'khor ba'i srid pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can
278b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong ba gang yin pa zang zing sbyin pa 'am/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa 'am/ chos sbyin
278b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ma lus pa de dag thams cad la tha na dus gsum du'ang mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang ngo / / gal te de la bslangs la nor sbyin mi nus na'ang / rang gi zas skal sbyin pa 'am/ grogs su
278b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba 'am/ kun tu btsal ba'i thabs kyang de la ston par 'gyur ro// chos kyi gdam gyis de'i 'dod pa sel bar byed do// de sbyin pa 'dod par gyur na'ang sbyin pa de sems can thams cad
279a1(dkon brtsegs): bskal ba dang / sems ca thams cad dkrol ba dang / sems can thams cad thugs dbyung ba dang / sems can thams cad songal mya ngan las bzla ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba
279a2(dkon brtsegs): dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// sbyin pa dag byin nas kyang sbyin pa de
279a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad bsgral pa dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang /
279a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// gal
279a5(dkon brtsegs): te sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong ba de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na/ de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du'ang chags
279a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ser sna dang / sbyin pas 'jigs pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang /
279a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par gtong ba la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na'ang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /
279b1(dkon brtsegs): sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub du sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi se mas rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsko
279b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi sbyin pa chen po dang / gtong ba chen po dang / rnam par gtong ba chen po grangs
279b3(dkon brtsegs): med cing dpag tu med pa yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la dam pa'i chos kyi char sbyin par 'dod pa dang / bdud rtsi'i
279b4(dkon brtsegs): dbyings kyi char sbyin par 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi char gtong bar 'dod pa dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi char gtong bar 'dod pa de ni sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam
279b5(dkon brtsegs): par gtong ba thams cad kyi nang na mchog yin no/ / de ni dam pa yin no// lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing / tshegs
279b6(dkon brtsegs): chung dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ni slong ba rnams kyis bslangs pa
279b7(dkon brtsegs): na/ yan lag dang nying lag gcod dam bcad nas slong ba rnams la sbyin par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag nyid kyi sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gyur ba dang / mi dge ba'i
280a1(dkon brtsegs): las chen po rgya che ba yongs su mi spong ba'i phyir ro/ / sems can gzhan gyi phyir ram/ sems can gzhan gyi ched la de rang gi yan lag dang nying lag yongs
280a2(dkon brtsegs): su mi gtong ba ni ma yin no/ / lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni slong bas bdog pa thams cad bslangs na/ pha ma la gnod pa byas shing spangs te/ sku
280a3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal bar byas/ bu dang / chung ma dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba la gnod pa byas shing spangs te/ sdug bsngal bar byas
280a4(dkon brtsegs): nas bdog pa thams cad slong ba rnams la sbyin par mi byed do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad la mtshungs par snying brtse ba yin te/ ji
280a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar pha ma la gnod pa mi byed cing mi spong la/ sdug bsngal bar yang mi byed pa dang / bu dang / rlung ma dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba la gnod
280a6(dkon brtsegs): pa mi byed cing mi spong ste/ sdug bsngal bar mi byed par sbyin pa'ang sbyin pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la mtshungs par gso ba byed do// de ni sems can gzhan gyi phyir ram/ sems
280a7(dkon brtsegs): can gzhan gyi ched la bdog pa thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'ang ma yin no/ / lag bzangs de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems can la gnod pa'i sbyin pa'i bsngags pa gsungs
280b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yan lag bcad pa lta la de ltar ga la 'gyur// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol
280b2(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni srog gi phyir yang srog chags gzhan dag dang / sems can gzhan rnams la mi rdeg mi gso/
280b3(dkon brtsegs): cing gsod pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do// srog gi phyir yang ma byin par mi len la/ ma byin par len du mi 'jug cing / ma byin par len pa la rjes su yi rang bar
280b4(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do/ / srog gi phyir yang 'dod pa la log par g.yem par mi byed la/ 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa byed du mi 'jug cing / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa la rjes su yi rang
280b5(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed do/ / srog gi phyir yang brdzun mi smra la/ brdzun zer du mi 'jug cing / brdzun smra ba la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do// srog gi phyir yang chang mi 'thung ba dang / chang 'thung
280b6(dkon brtsegs): du mi 'jug cing / chang 'thung ba la rje su yi rang bar mi byed do// de la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po de dag la ring du gnas shing brtan por gnas la/ dam por gnas te/ mi lhod par gnas
280b7(dkon brtsegs): shing sgrub bo/ / de bzhin du zhing rmed pa dang / zhing rmeng du 'jug pa dang / 'ching ba dang / 'ching du 'jug pa dang / go rar 'jug pa dang / go rar gzhug tu 'jug pa dang / rdeg
