281a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rdeg tu 'jug pa dang / gcod pa dang / gcod du 'jug pa dag spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar 'bad par byed do// de de ltar bslab pa'i gzhi
281a2(dkon brtsegs): lnga po dag la ring du gnas shing brtan por gnas la/ dam por gnas te/ mi lhod par gnas shing sgrub bo// de bzhin du phra ma'i tshig dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig 'khyal pa spang ba
281a3(dkon brtsegs): dang dor ba dang / bsal bar 'bad par byed do// de srog chags thams cad dang / sems can thams cad ni bdag gi pha ma ji lta ba bzhin no// bu gcig pa 'phangs pa ji lta ba bzhin/
281a4(dkon brtsegs): te/ ji ltar pa ma dang bu gcig pa 'phangs pa/ bdag la 'khu'ang slar 'khu bar mi bya la/ lag pa 'am/ bong ba 'am/ dbyug pa 'am/ ral gri'am/ mdas brdegs
281a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang slar brdeg par mi bya/ gsod kyang slar gsad par mi bya zhing / ji ltar pha ma dang bu gcig pa 'phangs pa/ 'khu'ang slar 'khu bar mi bya ba de bzhin du/ bdag srog chags
281a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang sems can thams cad kyis lag pa 'am/ bong ba 'am/ dbyig pa 'am/ ral gri'am/ mdas brdegs kyang slar brdegs par mi bya/ gsod kyang slar gsad par
281a7(dkon brtsegs): mi bya'o zhes de ltar slob bo/ / dper na pa 'am/ ma 'am/ bu gcig pa 'phangs pa yun ring por yul rgyu ste/ 'ongs pa mthong na dga' zhing yid bde bar 'gyur ba de
281b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' yang srog chags thams cad dang sems can thams cad mthong na dga' ba dang yid bde bar 'gyur ro// de'i srog gcod pa spangs pa'i tshul
281b2(dkon brtsegs): khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims srog gcod pa spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro/ / de'i ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob
281b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims ma byin par len pa spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro/ / de'i 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims
281b4(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyod pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro/ / de'i brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims brdzun du smra ba spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro//
281b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i chang 'thung ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims chang 'thung ba spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro// de'i zhing rmed pa dang zhing rmed du 'jug pa spangs pa'i
281b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i 'ching ba dang 'ching du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi
281b7(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa'i bcings pa thams cad gcad pa'i phyir ro/ / de'i go rar 'jug pa dang go rar gzhug tu 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba lnga dgag pa dang
282a1(dkon brtsegs): bsal ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i rdeg pa dang rdeg tu 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa
282a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i gcod pa dang gcod du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad lus dang / ngag dang / yid
282a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi las kun du bsrungs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i za ma'i tshig spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni g.yog nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po mi phyed pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshig drung
282a4(dkon brtsegs): po spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni yan lag lnga pa'i ngag gi lam dang ldan pa'i tshangs pa'i sgra skad thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i tshig bkyal pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni tshig gzung bar 'os
282a5(dkon brtsegs): pa thogs pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i 'chi bas 'jigs skrag pa yongs su skyob pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'ching dang /
282a6(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i 'jig par rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i gzhan gyi nor dang yo byad 'jig cing
282a7(dkon brtsegs): chud zab yongs su skyob pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nor bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i gzhan gyi bud med la 'dzin pa gtong bar byed
282b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang gtong bar byed du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni 'khrul pa med pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i 'gug pa gtong bar byed pa dang gtong bar byed du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni rang
282b2(dkon brtsegs): gi sems la dbang thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i 'ching ba 'grel pa dang 'grel du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por bdud kyi dmag dang / nyon mongs
282b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir ro/ / de'i khyim nas 'byung ba'i tshul khrims ni sems rnam par grol ba sgrib pa med par thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i brdeg pa 'chugs
282b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims ni mi 'jigs pa rnam pa bzhis 'jig pa yang dag par gzhom pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i gcod pa bzlog pa'i tshul khrims ni kun tu srung ba'i chos bzhi thob par
282b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i mi slu ba'i tshig smra ba'i tshul khrims ni dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis mi slu ba'i chos nyid
282b6(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i bye ba rnams kyi bsdums byed cing mdza' ba brtan par byed pa'i tshul khrims ni g.yog 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po mi phyed pa thob par bya/
282b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshig snyan pa dang 'jam por smra ba'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi rnar bde zhing snying du 'ong la bden pa'i tshig thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i kun tu mthun
283a1(dkon brtsegs): / pa smra ba'i tshul khrims ni tshar mi chod cing gzung bar 'os la/ 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi bsngags
283a2(dkon brtsegs): pab brjod pa'i tshul khrims ni 'phags pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge 'dun gyi g.yog 'khor chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
283a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams la dus gsum du yan
283a4(dkon brtsegs): lag lngas gtugs te/ phyag 'tshal ba byed pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por mi phyed cing / sra la shin tu brtan pa'i dad pa dang / brtson
283a5(dkon brtsegs): 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab mchog gi chos nyid dam pa lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten thams cad la rim
283a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i tshul khrims ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i dus gsum du chos kyi yon tan brjod pa smra ba'i tshul khrims ni chos kyi 'khor
283a7(dkon brtsegs): lo gnas med pa bla na med pa bskor ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i dus gsum du dge 'dun gyi yon tan brjod pa smra ba'i tshul khrims ni 'phags pa'i dge 'dun mi phyed pa'i g.yog 'khor chen po
283b1(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i dus gsum du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad la skyabs bla na med pa sbyin pa'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsu/
283b2(dkon brtsegs): du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dkon mchog gsum dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis stongs par mi 'gyur bar gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul khrims ni bde bar 'gyur bar
283b3(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu nges pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas thams cad la bskal par chos ston pa gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul khrims ni sa bcu
283b4(dkon brtsegs): pa chos kyi sprin thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i dus gsum du sdig pa thams cad so sor 'chags pa dang / sdig pa thams cad so sor 'dor ba dang / sdig pa thams cad la smod pa'i
283b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i dus gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i tshul
283b6(dkon brtsegs): khrims ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /
283b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gtogs pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad dang / sems can 'gro ba thams cad na gnas pa/ 'jig
284a1(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba'i tshul khrims ni
284a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi tshogs mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa bsags pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i dus gsum du rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon pa'i tshul khrims ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub
284a3(dkon brtsegs): thob par nges pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i dus gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par yongs su sngo ba'i tshul khrims ni gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i
284a4(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i pha ma dang / bla ma dang / rgan pa dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshul khrims ni zil gyis mi
284a5(dkon brtsegs): non pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / mgon med pa dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul khrims ni dris pa thams cad la mi skyo bar
284a6(dkon brtsegs): lan 'debs pa la mkhas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / me dang / chu dang / bgo skal la spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi nang du chud pa rnams yongs su
284a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyab cing grogs bya ba'i tshul khrims ni gnas dang / sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa chen po yongs su bsrung ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang // 'phagra
284b1(dkon brtsegs): ba nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rjes su bsngags pa'i tshul khrims ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bla na med pa thob par bya/
284b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// de'i pha rol gyi sems rjes su srung ba dang mthun pa'i lus kyi las kyi tshul khrims dang / pha rol gyi sems mngon par dga' ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur
284b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lus kyi las kyi tshul khrims dang / pha rol gyi sems rjes su srung ba dang mthun pa'i ngag gi las kyi tshul khrims dang / pha rol gyi sems mngon par dga' ba dang / yang dag par
284b4(dkon brtsegs): dka' bar 'gyur ba'i ngag gi las kyi tshul khrims ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol gyi mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de'i tshe 'di'i don dang / tshe rabs
284b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi don dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i don dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i don dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa'i don rnams la bag med pa dang / brjed pa rnams kyi dran pa
284b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par skyed pa'i tshul khrims dang / dran pa 'byung bar byed pa'i tshul khrims ni brjed pa med pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i chos nyan pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos
284b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos goms par byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos nye bar ston pa'i tshul khrims ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa yongs su
285a1(dkon brtsegs): bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ / de tshul khrims yang dag par len par 'dod pa dang / lhag par spyad par 'dod pa na'ang lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi
285a2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba de thams cad sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
285a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / lhag par spyod pa dang / yang dag par blang ba dag /
285a4(dkon brtsegs): lhag par spyod nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /
285a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// gal te tshul khrims de ma zhig pa dang / ma ral ba dang / 'dren ma ma yin par slob pa'i nus pa
285a6(dkon brtsegs): dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du'ang mi dge ba spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// dus dus su 'am/
285a7(dkon brtsegs): cung zad cung zad du'ang dge ba la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// srid pa gzhan du mur pa na'ang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /
285b1(dkon brtsegs): sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chung ngu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom par
285b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub du smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi dge ba'i tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dge ba'i tshul khrims la lhag par spyod pa grangs med
285b3(dkon brtsegs): cing dpag tu med pa yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi
285b4(dkon brtsegs): slob pa'i tshul khrims skyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa de ni dge ba'i
285b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dge ba'i tshul khrims la lhag par spyod pa'i mchog yin no// de ni dam pa yin no// lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/
285b6(dkon brtsegs): yid bde ba dang ldan zhing / tshegs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lag bzangs
285b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan dag gis rang gi lus kyi srog gcod dam/
286a1(dkon brtsegs): bdog pa thams cad 'phrog gam/ chungs 'phrog gam/ brdzun du smra ba 'am/ phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig bkyil pa smra ba 'am/ gshe ba'am/ gsod
286a2(dkon brtsegs): dam/ 'dzin tam/ rdeg gam/ gcod kyang slar gnod par mi byed cing / slar mi khro ste/ shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin par mi byed do// de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ bdag nyid
286a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis sngon gyi srid pa rnams dang / srid pa 'di la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las 'di dag byas shing bsags pa de dag gi 'bras bu ni 'di yin/ de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin te/ rang gi
286a4(dkon brtsegs): las kyi 'bras bu dang / rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa bdag gis myong ba la ci'i phyir gzhan la slar gnod par bya zhing / slar khro ba dang shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin par bya snyam du sems so// /
286a5(dkon brtsegs): lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gal te bdag gi srog gcod pa'am/ bdog pa thams cad 'phrog pa 'am/ chung ma 'phrog pa 'am/ brdzun
286a6(dkon brtsegs): du smra ba 'am/ phra ma 'am/ ngag rtsub po 'am/ tshig bkyil pa smra ba'am/ she ba 'am/ bsod pa 'am/ 'dzin pa 'am/ rdeg pa'am/ gcom pa'ang rung ste/ gzhan dag la
286a7(dkon brtsegs): slar gsod pa byas sam/ slar khro 'am/ shar gnyer zhing lon du bzung na/ slar gnod pa byas pa dang / slar khros pa dang / shar gnyer zhing khon du bzung ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba de'i sdug bsnga
286b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshor ba mi 'dod pa/ mi sdug pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba 'di bas bdag la las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / las kyi rgyu mthun pa brgya 'gyur ram/ stong gyur dam/ de bas lhag par mi 'dod
286b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i sdug bsngal gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag
286b3(dkon brtsegs): par slob ste/ srog yod pas srog gcod par 'gyur/ rdzas yod pas rdzas 'phrog par 'gyur/ rna ba'i dbang po yod pas brdzun du smra ba thos par 'gyur/ tshig phra ma dang / ngag rtsub
286b4(dkon brtsegs): po dang / tshig bkyal pa thos par 'gyur la/ lus yod pas lus 'dren pa dang / 'ching ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / rdeg pa dang / gcod par 'gyur te/ bdag nyid kyis sdug
286b5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gyi dngos po sdug bsngal gyi gzhi/ srog gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / lus blangs par gyur na/ ji ltar gzhan dag la slar gnod pa dang / slar khro ba dang / shar
286b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyer zhing khon du gzung bar bya snyam mo/ / lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dper na sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni sra ba skye
286b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni ngo bo nyid/ de ni chos nyid/ de ni rang bzhin no// chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni gsher ba/ me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni tsha ba/ rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid ni yang zhing g.yo dzaste/
287a1(dkon brtsegs): de ni ngo za nyid/ de ni chos nyid/ de ni rang bzhin no// de bzhin du srog thams cad kyang zad pa'i chos can/ 'god pa'i chos can/ 'gog pa'i chos can no// dbang
287a2(dkon brtsegs): po thams cad kyang sdug bsngal gyi chos can/ sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos can/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos can no// lus thams cad kyang sdug bsngal gyi chos/ sdug bsngal 'dus
287a3(dkon brtsegs): te reg pa'i chos/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos te/ de ni ngo bo nyid/ de ni chos nyid/ de ni rang bzhin yin na/ srog gi dbang po zad pa'i chos can/ 'god pa'i chos can/ 'gog pa'i
287a4(dkon brtsegs): chos can/ zad cing dengs la 'gog pa dang / dbang po drug po sdug bsngal gyi chos can/ sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos can/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos can rnams la sdug bsnga
287a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dus te reg pas ji ltar gzhan dag la slar gnod pa 'am/ slar khro ba 'am/ shar gnyer zhing khon du gzung bar bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni ngo bo nyid/ 'di ni chos nyid/ 'di ni
287a6(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin no snyam mo/ / lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ bdag gi ming dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
287a7(dkon brtsegs): yid kyang bdag med cing / bdag gi med pa yin la/ gzhan dag gi mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang bdag med cing / bdag gi med pa yin na
287b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa rig pa dag mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bdag med cing / bdag gi med pa la/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sA dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bdag
287b2(dkon brtsegs): med cing / bdag gi med pas ji ltar dga' ba 'am/ rjes su chags pa 'am/ yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba 'am/ rdeg pa 'am/ slar gnod par byed pa 'am/ slar khro ba 'am
287b3(dkon brtsegs): shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin par 'gyur snyam mo/ / lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ 'di lta ste/ mir skyes pa'i sdug bsngal ni
287b4(dkon brtsegs): nyung zhing chung gi/ yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal ni ches mi bzad la/ ches bzod par dka' ba yin/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang chas mi bzad
287b5(dkon brtsegs): cing bzod par dka' ba yin na/ bdag gis ji ltar sdug bsngal chung zhing nyung ba tsam gyi phyir/ gzhan dag la slar gnod pa dang shar gnyer zhing khon du gzung bar bya snyam mo//
287b6(dkon brtsegs): lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang bdag gcig pu'i don 'dod pa dang / bdag gcig pu la phan par 'dod pas gzhan dag la phyir gnod par byed
287b7(dkon brtsegs): cing phyir khro ste/ shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin pa de'ang mi rigs te cha ma yin na/ bdag 'jig rten thams cad kyi don 'dod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la phan par 'dod pa/ go cha chen po 'asrob/
288a1(dkon brtsegs): yi dam bcas pa chen pos yi dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po yongs su bskang bar 'dod pa lta la smos kyang
288a2(dkon brtsegs): ci dgos te/ mi bzod pa dang / phyir gnod pa byed pa dang / phyir khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin pas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag sogs pa dang / 'phel ba dang / yongs su
288a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par mi 'gyur gyi/ bzod pa dang / phyir gnod pa mi byed pa dang / phyir mi khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin pa mi byed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag sogs shing
288a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phel te/ yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro snyam mo// lag bzangs rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bskang bar 'dod pas mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal
288a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi reg pas reg kyang / gzhan dag la slar gnod par mi bya/ slar khro bar mi bya/ shar gnyer zhing khon du gzung bar mi bya na/ mi'i sdug bsngal gyis reg pas lta smos kyang cing dgos//
288a6(dkon brtsegs): de spyos sam/ rgyad bkag gam/ smad dam/ mi snyan pa byas kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs shin tu dri ma med cing dag la dkar ba
288a7(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/ / de drung bshal tam/ bcings sam/ bzung yang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / skad cig gcig la ma rig pa'i sgrib pa'i
288b1(dkon brtsegs): sgo nga'i sbubs gzhom pa'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/ / de brdegs kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba
288b2(dkon brtsegs): bzlog pa'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/ / de rna ba bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la dad par bya ba'i chos kyi rna ba bskyed pa'i phyir bzod cing
288b3(dkon brtsegs): dang du len to/ / de brdegs kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi yon tan mdzes shing bla na med pa la longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir
288b4(dkon brtsegs): bzod cing dang du len to/ / de rkang pa bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob par bya ba'i
288b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir bzod cing dang du len to/ / de lag pa bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba'i chos kyi lag pa brkyang ba
288b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/ / de yan lag thams cad bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi yan lag dang nyid
288b7(dkon brtsegs): lag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/ / de mig phyung yang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad shes bzhin gyi mig g.yung drung
289a1(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/ / de mgo bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi man
289a2(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/ / de bzod pa 'di dag dang ci mi snyam pa 'di dag mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang / yid la bya bar 'dod na'ang / sems can thams cad bsgral
289a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs
289a4(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/ / mngon sum du byed pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mngon sum du byas pa dang / yid la byas nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /
289a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i
289a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/ / gal te bzod pa 'di dag dang ci mi snyam pa 'di dag ma nyams pa dang / skyon med pa dang / 'dren ma ma yin par slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na/ de 'di
289a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zang du'ang mi bzod pa dang / ci mi snyam par mi byed pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad de// dus
289b1(dkon brtsegs): dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du'ang bzod pa dang / ci mi snyam pa la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// srid
289b2(dkon brtsegs): pa gzhan du gyur pa na'ang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi
289b3(dkon brtsegs): sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi bzod pa kun du spyod pa ba
289b4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa yang dag par sgrub pa dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med
289b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bzod pa skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i bzod pa skyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i bzod pa yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i bzod pa yang dag par
289b6(dkon brtsegs): skyed par 'dod pa de ni bzod pa kun tu spyod pa dge ba dang / bzod pa yang dag par sgrub pa de dge ba thams cad kyi mchog yin no// de ni dam pa yin no// lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems
289b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing / tshegs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngu myur du skyen par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// la
290a1(dkon brtsegs): bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang
290a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par slob ste/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med de/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re na'ang sems can mtha' yas so// de ltar sems can gyi tshogs
290a3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas mu med pa la mtha' yod pa ma yin/ mu yod pa ma yin te/ bdag ni sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de la phan pa'i phyir go cha bgos la/ sems can
290a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa la bde ba'i phyir go cha bgos na/ sems can thams cad la phan par dmigs pa mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dang / sems can thams cad la bde
290a5(dkon brtsegs): bar dmigs pa mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa dag bag med par gyur tam/ sems gzhan du gyur tam/ gnyid kyis log kyang nyin mtshan du sems kyi skad cig sam
290a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi skad cig la 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dag skye ba dang / byang chub kyi
290a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dag skye bas rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed dka' bar mi 'gyur na/ bdag gis 'dir sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba
290b1(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par 'gyur ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mthong / gzhi de las rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed mi dka' bar
290b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rjes su mthong bzhin du rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir nyams par bya snyam mo/ / lag bzangs gzhan yang
290b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang zhig sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i rga ba'i sdug bsngal gcig pu bsal ba dang / gzhes par 'dod pa
290b4(dkon brtsegs): de'ang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa 'phel la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/ gang zhig
290b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal bsal bar 'dod pa dang / sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang / mi sdug pa
290b6(dkon brtsegs): dang 'phrad pa'i sdug bsngal dang / 'dod pa mi 'byor pa'i sdug bsngal dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug
290b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal dang / grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang / tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bsal bar 'dod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo// las bzangs
291a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang zhig sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i sdug bsngal sems kyi skad cig
291a2(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa'i sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam dang 'brel ba bsal bar 'dod pa de'ang / sems kyi skad cig gcig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa 'phel la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
291a3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/ gang zhig ma 'ongs shing ma phyin pa'i bskal pa mtha' yas dpag tu med pa rnams su sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha'
291a4(dkon brtsegs): yas pa de'i skye ba'i sdug bsngal nas/ srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bar du bsal bar 'dod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems
291a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang zhig rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan nam nyan thos kyi yon tan 'dod pa de'ang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing
291a6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pa 'phel la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi yon tan mtha' yas shing / yon ngan

297b4(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms shing bsgrubs te/ nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu kha dog bzangs po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i
297b5(dkon brtsegs): skye mched gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs tshad med pa kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la
297b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po tshad med pa yid du 'ong ba rnams la mtshan
297b7(dkon brtsegs): mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po dang / dmar po dang /
298a1(dkon brtsegs): dkar po tshad med pa yid du 'ong ba rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa dang / bdun pa dang / brgyad pa la bsgrubs te
298a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas so/ / des sa 'di mtha' yas so zhes mtshan mar yid la byed pas zad par sar bsgrubs te gnas so// de chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po
298a3(dkon brtsegs): dang dkar po dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes mtshan mar yid la byed pas/ zad par chu dang / zad par ma dang / zad par rlung dang / zad par sngon po
298a4(dkon brtsegs): dang zad par ser po dang / zad par dmar po dang / zad par dkar po dang / zad par nam mkha' dang / zad par rnam par shes pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de snyoms par 'jug pa
298a5(dkon brtsegs): na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dmigs pa la sems nye bar 'dogs te/ snying rje chen po la dmigs pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la dmigs pa dang / dkon mchogs gsum
298a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi rigs mi 'chad par bya ba la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku dang rgyan la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung tshangs pa'i dbyangs la dmigs pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam la
298a7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la dmigs pa dang / 'jig rten rnam par sbyang bar bya ba la dmigs pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i bkod pa la dmigs
298b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gzhom pa la dmigs pa la sems nye bar 'dogs so// de bsam gtan byed pa
298b2(dkon brtsegs): na rnam par shes pa'i gnas bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan byed do/ / de sa'i khams la mi gnas/ chu'i khams la mi gnas/ me'i khams la mi gnas/ rlung gi khams la mi gnas//
298b3(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha'i khams la mi gnas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas/ 'jig rten 'di la mi gnas/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas par bsam gtan byed do// de ting nge 'dzin de la
298b4(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par 'jug pa bla na med pa thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan la gnas shing / bsam gtan la dga' 'o// de bsam gtan de dang ting nge 'dzin de la bsam gtan byed par 'dod
298b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / snyoms par 'jug par 'dod na'ang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
298b6(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// bsam gtan byed pa dang / bsam gtan byas pa dang / langs nas kyang sems can thams//
298b7(dkon brtsegs): cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par/
299a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// gal te bsam gtan de dang ting nge 'dzin de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na/ de 'di ltar yang dag par slob te/ dus dus su
299a2(dkon brtsegs): 'am cung zad cung zad du'ang sems rnam par g.yeng ba dang / ting nge 'dzin ma yin pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad
299a3(dkon brtsegs): du'ang sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dang / sems mnyam par gzhag par slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// srid pa gzhan du gyur
299a4(dkon brtsegs): pa na' la zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / / sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / bya
299a5(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi sems mnyam par gzhag pa dge ba dang / sems rtse gcig du bya ba
299a6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam par gzhag pa skyed
299a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i sems mnyam par gzhag pa skyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam par gzhag pa yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob
299b1(dkon brtsegs): sems mnyam par gzhag pa yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa de ni/ sems mnyam par gzhag pa dge ba dang / sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dge ba mtha' yas mu med pa yin no// lag
299b2(dkon brtsegs): bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing / tshegs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa
299b3(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ / lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni mdung
299b4(dkon brtsegs): thung dag gis bzlog kyang / gang zag gang dag thos pa mang ba/ thos pa 'dzin pa/ thos pa bsags pa/ don shes pa/ bshad pa shes pa/ dpyod pa can/ ji ltar thos pa'i don la
299b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rtog pa de dag la snyan cing sten te/ bsnyen bkur byed do// de thos pa'i ched dang / bshed pa'i ched dang / don gyi ched dang / don la yongs su brtag pa'i ched dang / slob dpon
299b6(dkon brtsegs): dang mkhan po la snyen bkur bya ba'i ched la grang ba'ang khyad du gsod/ tsha ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg pa
299b7(dkon brtsegs): dang gzhan gyis ngan du brjod pa/ ngan du spras shing ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam dang / lus kyi tshor ba drag pa/ rtsub pa/ mi bzad pa/ srog 'chad par 'gyur ba'ang khyad du gsod
300a1(dkon brtsegs): de chos rnams la rin po cher 'du shes nye bar gnas/ chos smra ba rnams la ni rin po che'i gter du 'du shes/ chos nyan pa rnams la ni dkon pa rnyed par 'du she/ chos
300a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa la ni don yod par srog phyogs par 'du shes/ chos kyi yon tan mang du byed pa la ni srog don yod par 'du shes/ chos la yongs su rtog pa la ni tshe rabs brgyar mig rnyed
300a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin la mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/ khams rnams kyang rab tu shes/ phung po rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang /
300a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / dus dang theg pa rnams dang / dge ba bsags pa'ang rab du shes so// khams rnams ji ltar rab tu shes she na/
300a5(dkon brtsegs): khams ni gnyis te/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas shes bya ba ste/ khams gnyis po de dag go/ 'dus byas kyi khams ni gang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams ni gang zhe na/ gang ci'ang rung ste/
300a6(dkon brtsegs): skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'gag pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams shes bya'o// gang ci'ang rung ste/ skye ba med pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa de ni 'dus ma byas kyi kham
300a7(dkon brtsegs): shes bya ste/ de ltar 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams rab tu shes so// gzhan yang khams gsum rab tu shes te/ dge ba'i khams dang / mi dge ba'i khams dang /
300b1(dkon brtsegs): lung du ma bstan pa'i khams te/ gsum po de dag go// dge ba'i khams ni gang / mi dge ba'i khams ni gang / lung du ma bstan pa'i khams ni gang zhe na/ gang ci'ang rung ste/ chags
300b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / chags pa med pa dang ldan pa dang / gang ci'ang rung ste/ zhe sdang med pa dang / zhe sdang med pa dang ldan pa dang / gang ci rang rung ste/ gti mug med pa dang / gti mug med pa
300b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa de ni dge ba'i khams shes bya'o/ / gang ci'ang rung ste/ chags pa dang / chags pa dang ldan pa dang / gang ci'ang rung ste/ zhe sdang ba dang / zhe sdang ba dang ldan pa dang / gang ci'ang
300b4(dkon brtsegs): rung ste/ gti mug dang / gti mug dang ldan pa de ni mi dge ba'i khams shes bya'o// de gnyis la ma gtogs pa ni lung du ma bstan pa nyid de/ de ltar khams gsum rab tu shes so//
300b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang khams gsum rab tu shes te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams so// 'dod
300b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams gang zhe na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang
300b7(dkon brtsegs): 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams te/ gang de dag la 'dun pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang ba dang / gti mug pa dang /
301a1(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis smon pa dang / smon lam 'debs pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa de ni 'dod pa'i khams shes bya'o// gzugs kyi khams gang she na/ tshangs rig kyi lha
301a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang /
301a3(dkon brtsegs): sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang dang / shin du mthong dang / 'og min gyi
301a4(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams te/ gang de dag la 'dun pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang ba dang / gti mug pa dang / yid kyis smon pa dang / smon lam 'debs pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa de ni gzugs
301a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams shes bya'o/ / gzugs med pa'i khams gang zhe na/ rnam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i
301a6(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/ gang de dag la 'dun pa dang /
301a7(dkon brtsegs): chags pa dang / zhe sdang ba dang / gti mug pa dang / yid kyis smon pa dang / smon lam 'debs pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs med pa'i khams
301b1(dkon brtsegs): shes bya ste/ de ltar khams gsum rab tu shes so// gzhan yang khams bzhi rab tu shes te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang /
301b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med pa'i khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams shes bya ba khams bzhi po de dag ste/ de ltar khams bzhi rab tu shes so// gzhan yang khams drug rab tu shes te/ drug
301b3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gnod sems kyi khams dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i khams dang / mngon par 'byung ba'i khams dang / gnod sems med pa'i khams dang / rnam
301b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshe ba me pa'i khams te/ khams drug po de dag rab tu shes so// gzhan yang khams drug rab tu shes de/ drug gang zhe na/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang
301b5(dkon brtsegs): me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams te/ khams drug po de dag rab du shes so// de la sa'i khams ni mi rtag pa/ mi brtan
301b6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba'o// sdug bsngal ba gang yin pa de bdag med pa'o// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung
301b7(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba'o// sdug bsngal
302a1(dkon brtsegs): ba gang yin pa de bdag med pa ste/ de ltar khams drug rab tu shes so// de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na//
302a2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba'i phung po dang / 'du shes kyi phung po dang / 'du byed kyi phung po dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste/ phung po lnga rab tu shes so// gzugs la
302a3(dkon brtsegs): lbu ba rdos pa lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / tshor ba la ni chu'i chu bur lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / 'du/
302a4(dkon brtsegs): shes la ni smig rgyu lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / 'du byed rnam la ni chu shing lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas
302a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rnam par shes pa la ni sgyu ma lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa de ltar phung po lnga la rab tu shes so// de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin
302a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/ nang gi skye mched drug rab tu shes te/ mig nang gi skye mched dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang gi skye mched
302a7(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba nang gi skye mched drug po de dag go/ / de la mig nang gi skye mched non pa'i chos can dang / rga ba'i chos can dang / 'chi ba'i chos can dang / bdag dang bdag gis stong pa dang / 'dod chags
302b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi me kun tu 'bar ba dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
302b2(dkon brtsegs): dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams kyis kun tu 'bar ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar bar rab tu shes so// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
302b3(dkon brtsegs): yid nang gi skye mched la'ang na ba'i chos can dang / rga ba'i chos can dang / 'chi ba'i chos can dang / bdag dang bdag gis stong pa dang / 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi ma dang /
302b4(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gi me kun tu 'bar ba dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug
302b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis kun du 'bar ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar bar rab tu shes te/ de ltar nang gi skye mched drug po dag rab tu shes so// gzhan yang phyi'i skye
302b6(dkon brtsegs): mched drug rab tu shes te/ mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba gzugs rnams phyi'i skye mched dang / rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba sgra rnams dang / snas rnam par shes par bya ba dri
302b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba ro rnams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes par bya ba reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba chos phyi'i skye mched rnams shes bya ba ste//
303a1(dkon brtsegs): skye mched drug po de dag go// de la mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba gzug phyi'i skye mched la skyabs med pa dang / mgon med pa dang / stobs med pa dang / nyam/
303a2(dkon brtsegs): chung ba ste/ de la rtag pa 'am/ brtan pa 'am/ ther zug pa 'am/ de bzhin nyid dam/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dam/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni gang yang med kyi/
303a3(dkon brtsegs): ma de ni yod/ sgyu mar byas pa de ni yod/ sems rmongs par byed pa de ni yod de gang ci'ang yod pa dang / de bzhin du rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba sgra rnams dang / snas rnam par shes
303a4(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba ro rnams dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba chos phyi'i skye mched la 'ang
303a5(dkon brtsegs): skyabs med pa dang / mgon med pa dang / stobs med pa dang / nyam chung ba ste/ de la rtag pa'am/ brtan pa 'am/ ther zug pa 'am/ de bzhin nyid dam/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid
303a6(dkon brtsegs): dam/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni gang yang med kyi/ sgyu ma de ni yod/ sgyu mar byas pa de ni yod/ sems rmongs par byed pa de ni yod de/ gang ci'ang yod pa'i phyir skye mched drug
303a7(dkon brtsegs): po de ltar rab tu shes so/ / de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rab tu shes so// bzhi gang zhe na/
303b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba 'phags pa'i
303b2(dkon brtsegs): bden pa bzhi po de dag go/ / phung po lnga rnams dang / khams drug po dag dang / nang gi skye mched drug po dang / phyi'i skye mched drug po dag gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal zhes
303b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ste/ sdug bsngal de ni mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / nad dang / 'bras dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa dang / bdag med pa dang / rab tu 'jig pa'i chos nyid du blta'o//
303b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam du mngon par zhen pa dang / bdag gi bdag ni 'di yin no snyam du bdag tu mngon par zhen pa dang / 'byung
303b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / gzugs can du 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / gzugs can ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'du shes can du 'gyur ro//
303b6(dkon brtsegs): snyam pa dang / 'du shes can ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'du shes can ma yin la/ 'du shes can ma yin pa'ang 'du shes can ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / phung po
303b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams bdag go snyam pa dang / phung po rnams las bdag gzhan no snyam pa dang / phung po rnams la bdag gi snyam pa dang / bdag la phung po rnams snyam pa dang / khams rnams dang /
304a1(dkon brtsegs): skye mched rnams 'dag go snyam pa dang / skye mched rnams las bdag gzhan no snyas pa dang / skye mched rnams la bdag go snyam pa dang / bdag la skye mched
304a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams so snyam pa dang / tshor ba bdag go snyam pa dang / tshor bar byed pa bdag go rnam pa dang / gzugs can chung ngu bdag go snyam pa dang / gzugs can ma yin pa chung ngu bdag ga
304a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa dang / gzugs can mtha' yas pa bdag go snyam pa dang / gzugs can ma yin pa mtha' yas pa bdag go snyam pa dang / bdag rtag go snyam pa dang / bdag mi rtag gi rnamapa
304a4(dkon brtsegs): da rtag kyang rtag la/ mi rtag kyang mi rtag go snyam pa dang / rtag pa'ang ma yin mi rtag pa'ang ma yin no snyam pa dang / bdag mtha' yod do snyam pa dang / bdag mtha' yod pas
304a5(dkon brtsegs): yin no snyam pa dang / mtha' yod kyang yod la mtha' med kyang med do snyam pa dang / mtha' yod pa'ang ma yin mtha' med pa'ang ma yin no snyam pa dang / de bzhin song ba shi nas 'byung bar
304a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'byung yang 'byung la mi 'byung yang mi 'byung ngo snyam pa dang / de bzhin song ba shi nas 'byung ba'ang ma yin/ mi 'byung ba'ang
304a7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no snyam pa dang / sreg de lus de yin snyam pa dang / srog kyang gzhan la lus kyang gzhan no snyam pa dang / sems can 'di gang nas 'ongs/ de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du
304b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar 'gyur snyam pa dang / sems can yod pa las chad de/ 'jig cing med par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / byed pa de myong ba de yin no snyam pa dang / byed pa'ang gzhan myong ba'ang gzhan no snyam
304b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bdag yod pas bdag gi yod par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / bdag gi yod pas bdag yod par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'di na bdag de lta bu 'am/ bdag gzhan du 'gyur ba zhig gam
304b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du 'gyur ba zhig gam/ gzhan du 'gyur ba zhig gam/ 'dir 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ de ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gzhan du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ 'dir bdag sngon
304b4(dkon brtsegs): byung ngam/ bdag da ltar byung ngam/ bdag gzhan du byung ngam snyam du de dag la bdag tu mngon par zhen te 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / sems kyi gnas
304b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / mngon par zhen pa dang / nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal ba dang / snyems pa dang / nga rgyal byed pa dang / bdag du smra ba'i len pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
304b6(dkon brtsegs): dang nga rgyal gang yin pa thams cad dang / lus sam/ ngag gas/ sems kyi las bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ mig yo
304b7(dkon brtsegs): bapar nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ 'dod par gtogs pa 'am/ gzugs su gtogs pa 'am/ gzugs med par gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa
305a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ / gang 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / gti mug zad pa dang / nga rgyal zad pa dang / bdag tu mngon par zhen pa spangs pa dang /
305a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu smra ba'i len pa spangs pa de ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang sdug bsngal la'ang sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba la'ang kun 'byung ba dang //
305a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa la 'ang 'gog pa dang / lam la 'ang lam du yid la byed pa dang / 'du byed rnams la nyes dmigs su lta zhing gnas pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la phan yon du lta
305a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing gnas pa dang / ji ltar mthong ba dang / byas pa la so sor rtog pa yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi
305a5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin de ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags
305a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bden pa zhes bya ste/ 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya'o// de 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag la dpyod cing rtog la/ khong du chud par byed cing rnam 'jig
305a7(dkon brtsegs): pa na/ 'dus byas kyi khams la ni mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par mthong ngo / 'dus ma byas kyi khams la ni skyabs dang / gnas dang /
305b1(dkon brtsegs): mgon dang / dpung gnyen du'ang mthong la/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams mngon sum du'ang mi byed do// de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag rab tu shes so//
305b2(dkon brtsegs): de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rab tu shes te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams dang
305b3(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs dang / ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa dang /
305b4(dkon brtsegs): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa dang / sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa dang / len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa dang / srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba dang / skye ba'i rkyen
305b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis rga shi ste/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi shes pa dang / mi mthong ba gang yin
305b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o/ / gang cung zad lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ mi g.yo bar
305b7(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ 'dod pa'i khams su nye bar 'gro ba'am/ gzugs kyi khams su nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ gzugs med pa'i khams su nye bar 'gro ba de dag ni 'du byed rnams
306a1(dkon brtsegs): shes bya'o/ / de las byung ba gang ci'ang rung / sems shes bya ba dang / yid ces bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// de las byung ba gang ci'ang rung
306a2(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems pa dang / reg pa dang / yid la byed pa de ni ming zhes bya'o// gang ci'ang rung ba lhan cig byung ba mer mer po'i gzugs dang / rdzus
306a3(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i gzugs dang / rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs de ni gzugs shes bya ste/ de gnyis ni ming dang gzugs shes bya'o// de las byung ba mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang /
306a4(dkon brtsegs): lce dang / lus dang / yid de ni skye mched drug ces bya'o// mig la brten cing gzugs la'ang brten te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba dang / gsum 'dus pa ni reg pa'o//
306a5(dkon brtsegs): rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos rnams la brten te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba dang / gsum 'dus pa ni reg pa ste/ de ni reg pa zhes bya'o//
306a6(dkon brtsegs): de las byung ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa de dag ni tshor ba gsum zhes bya'o// de las byung ba 'dod chags dang / chags pa dang /
306a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba de ni sred pa zhes bya'o// de las byung ba kun tu chags pa dang / lta ba dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / bdag tu smra ba de ni len pa zhes bya'o// de las byung ba gzugs dang /
306b1(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de ni srid pa zhes bya'o// gang srid pa de 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang mngon par 'grub pa de ni skye ba zhes bya'o// gang
306b2(dkon brtsegs): srid pa de 'gyur ba dang / 'jig pa dang / nye bar khrid pa de ni rga ba zhes bya'o// gang srid pa de 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'bral ba de ni 'chi ba zhes bya'o// de de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la
306b3(dkon brtsegs): dpyod cing yongs su rtog la khong du chud par byed cing / rnam par 'jig pa nas rlom sems su mi byed/ sas rlom sems su mi byed/ sa bdag gi snyam du rlom sems su mi byed
306b4(dkon brtsegs): do/ sa la mngon par dka' bar mi byed do// chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa la gcig pa dang / tha dad pa dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang /
306b5(dkon brtsegs): bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa rlom sems su mi byed/ mya ngan las 'das pas rlom sems su mi byed/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni bdag gi'o snyam du
306b6(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems su mi byed/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' bar mi byed do// de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mthong ba na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum
306b7(dkon brtsegs): po chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa khong du chud par byed cing rnam par 'jig go// de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mthong
307a1(dkon brtsegs): ba na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs
307a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag
307a3(dkon brtsegs): sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag/ rga shi 'gags pas rten cing 'brel
307a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung ba 'gag pa khong du chud par byed cing rnam par 'jig sde/ de de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'gog pa yang dag par rjes su mthong yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i
307a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa mngon sum du'ang mi byed de/ de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'gog pa rab tu shes so// de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su
307a6(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa na/ dus gsum rab tu shes te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'das pa'i dus dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus te/ de dag ni dus gsum rnams shes bya'o//
307a7(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed gang la la 'gags pa de ni 'das pa'i dus shes bya'o// 'du byed gang la la ma 'ongs shing ma skyes pa de ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus shes bya'o// 'du byed gang la la da ltar 'byung ba da sngar
307b1(dkon brtsegs): du gyur pa de ni da ltar byung ba'i dus shes bya'o/ / de 'das pa'i dus kyi bdag gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rjes su dran na/ smod cing gshung ste nges par spong ngo // ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bdag
307b2(dkon brtsegs): gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rdul tsam la'ang gcig du rnam par smin par mthong / mi sdug par rnam par smin par mthong / yid du mi 'ong bar rnam par smin par mthong / 'jigs par mthong
307b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing gnas so/ / da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi bdag gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba skye ba'i skabs mi 'byed de/ lus sdom pas bsdams/ ngag sdom pas bsdams/ yid sdom pas bsdams
307b4(dkon brtsegs): dbang po drug sdom pas bsdams so/ / de 'das pa'i dus kyi bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems la smon pa dang / byang chub kyi sen/
307b5(dkon brtsegs): la smon lam 'debs pa rjes su dran zhing 'dun pa drag po dang / dga' ba drag po dang / dad pa drag pos sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang /
307b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// ma 'ong/
307b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dus kyi bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub du smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa'ang 'dun pa drag po dang / dga' ba drag po dang //
308a1(dkon brtsegs): dad pa drag pos sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
308a2(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dod do// mos so// yid kyis smon to// da ltar byung ba'i bdag gi dge ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang / dge pa'i
308a3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rgyud kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams rud dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sang/
308a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ rtag par rgyun du mi 'dor ro// nyams par mi byed do// brjed par mi byed do// bag med par mi byed do// gang 'das pa'i phung
308a5(dkon brtsegs): po dang / khams dang / skye mched de ni 'das pa/ 'gags pa med pa/ yod pa ma yin pa ste/ de ni da ltar bdag med pa bdag gi med pa'o// gang ma 'ongs pa'i phung po dang / khams dang /
308a6(dkon brtsegs): skye mched de ni ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ yod pa ma yin pa ste// de ni da ltar bdag med pa/ bdag gi med pa'o// gang da ltar byung ba'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de ni mi gnas pa
308a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dug pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten ni skad cig las lhag par mi gnas pa'i phyir ro// skad cig la de'i skye ba'i dus kyang gzhan/ gnas pa'i dus kyang gzhan/ 'gag pa'i dus kyang
308b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gang yin pa'i skad cig de ni gnas med pa/ 'dug pa med pa'o// skad cig gi dus gang yin pa de ni nang dang phyi'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched do// nang dang phyi'i phung
308b2(dkon brtsegs): po dang / khams dang / skye mched gang yin pa de ni dus so// da ltar byung ba'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched gang yin pa de ni skad cig tsam yang mi gnas pa mi 'dug pa ste/
308b3(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas pa mi 'dug pa la ni bdag gam bdag gi ba med pa'o// de'ang gang gi tshe ma 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ yod pa ma yin no// bdag tu ma gyur cing
308b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gir ma gyur pa'o/ / gang gi tshe 'das te 'gags pa dang ma byung ste yod pa ma yin par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang bdag med pa dang / bdag gi med pa nyid du 'gyur ro// gang yang dus gsum
308b5(dkon brtsegs): dag tu bdag med cing bdag gi med pa de ni ma byung zhing yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir mkhas shing rig pa rnams kyis 'di ni bdag gi'o/ / 'di ni nga'o// bdag gi 'di ni yod do zhes bdag tu lta
308b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'os pa ma yin no/ / de srid pa thams cad dang / 'du byed thams cad la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang / spang ba'i 'du shes dang / 'gog
308b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'du shes can du gnas te/ 'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa'ang ma yin no// gang de ltar dus gsum rab tu shes pa de ni chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed
309a1(dkon brtsegs): cing yongs su rtog pa na/ theg pa gsum rab tu shes te/ gsum gang zhe na/ lha'i theg pa dang / tshangs pa'i theg pa dang / 'phags pa'i theg pa ste/ de dag ni theg
309a2(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum zhes bya'o/ / bsam gtan dang po ni lha'i theg pa ste/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'ang lha'i theg pa'o// byams pa ni tshangs pa'i theg pa ste/ snying rje
309a3(dkon brtsegs): dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyang tshangs pa'i theg pa'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang
309a4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i theg
309a5(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o/ / de dus dus su lha'i theg pa sgom ste/ sems can rnams kyang de la 'god/ dus dus su tshangs pa'i theg pa sgom ste/ sems can rnams kyang de la 'god/ dus dus su 'phags
309a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i theg pa sgom zhing / sems can rnams kyang de la 'god la/ rnam par grol ba 'phags pa mngon sum du'ang mi byed do// gzhan yang theg pa gsum rab tu shes te/
309a7(dkon brtsegs): gsum gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po ste/ de dag ni theg pa gsum zhes bya'o// mos pa dman pa dang / dbang po dman pa skad cig/
309b1(dkon brtsegs): tsam yang srid pa la mos par mi byed/ sred par mi byed kyi/ 'dor te skad cig de la de ma thag tu mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i phan yon mthong nas/ mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin
309b2(dkon brtsegs): du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag khong du chud pa dang / rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa dang / rtsol ba'i shas che ba de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa zhes bya'o// mos pa 'bring dang / dbang po
309b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bring dang / dben par dga' ba dang / rang gi don du lhur len pa dang / bsam gtan dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la gnas par brtson pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rab tu
309b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang / rang byang chub tu smon pa dang / rang byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa de ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa zhes bya'o// mos pa khyad par du 'phags pa/
309b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang po khyad par du 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen
309b6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bskang bar 'dod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su bskang bar 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi don du 'khor ba'i
309b7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal la mi lta ba dang / 'khor ba'i bde ba la'ang smod pa mang ba yin na/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la smod pa mang ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ tshul khrims dang spyod pa khyad par du
310a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa la rnam par gnas pa dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa can gyi mde lda rnams thog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / lung nod pa dang / yid la byed pa naH/
310a2(dkon brtsegs): la brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang yin pa de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin pa dang / de dag gi byin gyi rlabs bzhi po bden pa dang / gtong ba dang /
310a3(dkon brtsegs): nye bar zhi ba dang / shes rab la slob pa dang / shes bya thams cad nyan pa dang / len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / dpyod par dga' ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad
310a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang / rang gi don la mi lta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi don lhur len pa dang / stobs ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad theg pa gsum po dag la dgod par
310a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa dang / dgod par spro ba dang / bdag nyid kyang byang chub kyi theg pa la shin tu gnas pa dang / mi phyed pa dang / mi skyod pa dang / rdo rje lta bu'i sems dang / rtag par rgyun du byang chub
310a6(dkon brtsegs): tu smon cing / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa de ni theg pa chen po zhes bya ste/ de ltar theg pa gsum po dag rab tu shes so// de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang mang du byed cing
310a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rtog pa na/ dge ba'i thabs rab tudu shes te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa 'das pa dang /
310b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / chos thams cad dang / dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo zhes dmigs par byed do// de la phyag lan cig btsal ba na/
310b2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par phyag 'tshal bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do// de byang chub tu smon pa na sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems
310b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// de bzhin du kya
310b4(dkon brtsegs): su 'gro ba na'ang sems bskyed do/ / de 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / khrus byed pa dang / za ba dang / 'thung ba dang / zhing rmed pa dang / sa bon 'debs pa
310b5(dkon brtsegs): dang las thams cad byed pa na'ang mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par byang chub tu smon lam gdab par bya'o zhes sems bskyed do/ / mang du byed do// snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bsam
310b6(dkon brtsegs): gtan byed pa na'ang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya
310b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par byang chub tu smon lam gdab bo zhes sems bskyed do// mang du byed do// thams cad
311a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog dang / sems can thams cad gdul ba dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / 'jig rten thams/
311a2(dkon brtsegs): cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
311a3(dkon brtsegs): smon lam gdab bo zhes sems bskyed do/ / mang du byed do// de dge ba gang ci spyod kyang sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / ngan 'gro'i rgyud gcod pa dang / sdug bsngal thams
311a4(dkon brtsegs): cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// nyan thos kyi theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang /
311a5(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa rnams kyi nyan thos kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs
311a6(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/ / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yod
311a7(dkon brtsegs): su sngo bar byed do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams bskal par bzhugs pa dang / bskal par chos ston
311b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bskal par dge 'dun mthun par 'gyur bar yongs su sngo bar byed do// mtho ris kyi lam la dkod pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi lam la dgod pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la dgod pa
311b2(dkon brtsegs): 'am rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam la dgod pa 'am/ sbyin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa 'am/ snyan par smra bas rjes su 'jug pa 'am/ don spyod pas rjes su 'jug pa'am/ don mthun pas
311b3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'jug pa'am/ ji lta ji ltar gzhan dag dge ba'i phyogs yang dag par skyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba de'ang rab tu shes so// de chos kyi tshig 'di dag la nyin
311b4(dkon brtsegs): gcig bzhin du dus gsum du 'jug go/ yid la byed do// de 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten dag gi khams rnams thams cad na// yang dag bzhugs pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // chos dang dge
311b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dun byang chub sems dpa' la/ / gan 'gro mgo bos mtha' yas phyag kyang 'tshal// 'gro ba'i nang na yon tan mnyam med cing // mi mnyam pa yi yon tan 'byung gnas can// yon tan dpag
311b6(dkon brtsegs): med de dag thams cad la/ / bdag ni mgo bos mtha' yas skyabs su mchi// sangs rgyas dang ni chos dang tshogs rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'jig rten khams// gang yang
311b7(dkon brtsegs): ngabargya lam stongs par mi 'gyur bar/ / de ltar gsol ba mtha' yas rab tu 'debs// zhi ba'i chos ni rab tu ston mdzad cing // bskal pa ma lus rnams su bzhugs par yang // 'jig rtem pa
312a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun gyi bde gshegs la/ / mgo bos gsol ba mtha' yas rab tu 'debs// sngon dang 'di dang skad cig tsam yang rung // bdag gis sdig pa gang dang kang
312a2(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa/ / sdig pa de dag thams cad smad par bgyi// sdig pa thams cad bdag gis spang bar bgyi// skad cig tsam yang bdag gis dge ba 'di// ma lus par ni yang dag gzung bar bgyi/
312a3(dkon brtsegs): tshe yis ji tsam thub kyi bar du ni// dge ba kun la gnas par 'gyur bar 'tshal// sangs rgyas dag dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams// byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// 'jig
312a4(dkon brtsegs): rten 'dir ni byung dang byung gyur dang / / 'byung 'gyur rnams kyi dge ba thams cad dang // rgyal ba rnams dang 'phags pa thams cad kyi// tshul khrims dang ni ye shes ting 'dzin dang // rnam grol tshe
312a5(dkon brtsegs): dang chos rnams gang yin pa/ / de dag 'jig rten rnams la phan gyur cig/ 'gro ba lnga yi sems can thams cad dag/ byung dang byung gyur 'byung bar 'gyur rnams kyi// dge ba dag la bdag ni phyi
312a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhing / / mgo bos mtha' yas rjes su yi rang ngo // yon tan yang dag dge ba mtha' yas pa// de dag thams cad 'gro ba ma lus pas// sems can re re dang ni bdag nyid la'ang //
312a7(dkon brtsegs): yod par bdag ni smon lam mtha' yas 'debs// bdag gi dge ba dag ni 'das pa dang // ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar thams cad kyis// 'jig rten dag gi khams ni thams cad du//
312b1(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog gsum po rtag tu 'byung bar shog/ dkon mchog rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bskal par bzhugs pas 'phongs par ma gyur cig/ bar du gcod pa med
312b2(dkon brtsegs): par byang chub dang / pha rol phyin pa rnams ni rdzogs par shog/ sems can dag ni thams cad bde ba dang // 'jigs pa med cing ngan 'gro 'das pa dang // mi dge thams cad dang ni bral ba
312b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs gyur cig/ theg pa gsum po dag la ci rigs par// de dag la ni smon lam mthar phyin cing // tshe ring ba dang rnam par grol ba dang // khyad par
312b4(dkon brtsegs): can gyi don kun rdzogs par shog/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub smon lam 'debs pa na/ mtha' yas dpag tu med par rab tu 'debs// sems can thams cad dag gi sdug bsngal dang // nyon
312b5(dkon brtsegs): mongs dag ni nye bar zhi gyur cig/ chos dang ldan pa'i bya ba rnams kyi phyir// 'jig rten dag gi khams rnams thams cad kyi// rgyal ba kun dang byang chub sems dpa' la// rang gi lus ni
312b6(dkon brtsegs): nges par dbul bar bgyi/ / rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur bar du// ma 'ongs pa na smon lam mtha' yas ka dag/ skye dang skye bar dkon mchog gsum po la// bdag ni yongs su
312b7(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa bgyid par shog/ 'jig rten dag gi khams rnams thams cad kyi// dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems dpa' la// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i lha yi spos mchog dang // 'phreng ba mo
313a1(dkon brtsegs): dog rkun pos mchod byed shog/ lhun mnyam pa'i gser dang das dag dang // gos dang rin po che yi phung po dang // gzhal med 'ang bcus bzhon dang mal chad la
313a2(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba mtha' yas dag ni sbyin par shog/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa lam gyi rdzogs byed cing // skyabs dang lus dang pha 'drar gyur par shog/ bzod la dga' zhing tshul khrims gtsang ba dang //
313a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro la chos ni rab tu sngon gyur cig/ byang chub theg pa mchog ni rnyed pa dang // dkon mchog gsum phyir go cha sra ba bgo/ pha rol phyin pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing // sangs rgyas chos rnams
313a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs byed shog/ sdig pa kun dang bral zhing lus ngag dang // yid kyi las mtha' dge ba mchog gyur cig/ byang chub las ni mi ldog bdag 'gyur zhing // byang chub dga' dang
313a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpar gyur/ / srid dang srid par byang chub sems dpa' dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi dge ba kun la slob// bdag gi chos rnams de dag kun la yang // 'jig rten thams
313a6(dkon brtsegs): cad rab tu dgod par bgyi/ / de de ltar bdag dang gzhan dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rab tu shes so// de shes rab de dang ye shes de mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang / yid
313a7(dkon brtsegs): la bya bar 'dod pa na'ang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /
313b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// mngon sum du byed pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mngon sum du byas pa dang / yid la byas nas kyang /
313b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
313b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/ / gal te shes rab de dang ye shes de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na/ de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/
313b4(dkon brtsegs): dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du'ang 'chal pa'i shes rab dang / mi shes pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du'ang
313b5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang / ye shes de la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na'ang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing
313b6(dkon brtsegs): sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro/ / lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub du sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang
313b7(dkon brtsegs): chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub du smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi shes rab dge ba dang / ye shes dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
314a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i shes rab spyad par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i shes rab skyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med
314a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes rab yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i shes rab yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa de ni/ shes rab dge ba dang ye shes dge ba thams cad kyi mchog yin no// de ni dam
314a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ / lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
314a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog par 'tshang rgya'o// chos kyi
314a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag theg pa gsum dang mtho ris su skye ba'i don byas par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi de
314a6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang
314a7(dkon brtsegs): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon por bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las
314b1(dkon brtsegs): lag bzangs kyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa drug pa rdzogs so// / rgyu gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la dang / dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de la
314b2(dkon brtsegs): shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka brgya rtsa brgyad// // / rgya gar
314b3(dkon brtsegs): skad du/ Ar+ya sU ra da pa ri prits+tsha na ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa des pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po gcig pa/
314b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin
314b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ 'khor bzhi dang /
314b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dang / blon po dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / ljongs kyi mi rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas/ mchod par byas so// de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi
314b7(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer na/ grong khyer gyi mi dbul po nges pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/ chos la dad pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa/ dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa
315a1(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su gzung ba/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/ snying rje la gnas
315a2(dkon brtsegs): te/ yid yongs su skyo ba med pa/ dga' ba la gnas te/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa/ gtang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi bskyod pa/ bla na med pa
315a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pa/ thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / dbul por ming du
315a4(dkon brtsegs): chags pa zhig gnas te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa shin tu 'dod pa chung ba/ chog shes pa
315a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang ldan pa/ yid la 'khrug pa med pa/ rtag tu bzhin 'dzum pa/ gzhan gyi 'khrul pa dag la skyon du mi lta ba/ sems can thams cad kyi sems srung ba/
315a6(dkon brtsegs): brkam pa med pa/ shes bzhin du spyod pa/ chos shes shing dgang sla la gso sla ba/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/ g.yo med pa/ nga rgyal med pa/ bka' blo bde ba/ 'thun par
315a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa/ rtag tu gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ lag na shing lo'i snod thogs pa/ rtswa bting ba la nyal ba/ gos ngan pa gyon pa/ rnyed kyang mi len pa/ bzang yang rung
315b1(dkon brtsegs): ngan kyang rung bgo bsha' byas nas za ba/ dus gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba/ chos nyan par 'dod pa/ gtam sna tshogs byung ba la spobs pa dang ldan pa/ sems can
