315b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de mthong ngo / / mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ ci grong khyer gyi dbul po 'di yi dam la brtan nam/ mi brtan pa bdag gis brtag go snyam
315b3(dkon brtsegs): mo/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mi mang po mngon par sprul nas/ grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa la tshig ngan pa dag gi gshe zhing spyo bar byed de/ bong ba dang / drabyug
315b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mtshon cha dag kyang bstan na/ des pa de bzod pa'i stobs kyis dang du len par byed de/ mi 'khrug cing gnod sems mi skyed do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mi gzhan dag cig/
315b5(dkon brtsegs): tu sprul nas nges pa de'i mdun du bzhag ste/ nges pa de la dga' ba'i tshig gis kho bo cag ni khyod kyi don byed par 'dod pa yin gyis/ ji ste khyod 'dod pa lta na/ khyod la sdig pa'i dgra gang yin pa
315b6(dkon brtsegs): dag kho bo cag gis tshar gcad par bya'o zhes smras so/ / des pas smras pa/ grogs po dag thong / de skad ma zer cig/ gal te mi 'di dag gis kho bo'i lus dum bu brgyar dum bu dum bur gdubs
315b7(dkon brtsegs): su zin kyang / kho bo ni mi 'di dag la sdig pa'i sems mi spyad de/ grogs po dag 'jig rten dag ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i phyogs gnyis la gnas la/ de'i 'gro ba ni gnyis kho na ste/ dge ba
316a1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyi ni bde 'gro'o/ / mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi ni ngan 'gro'o// de bas na kho bo ni sems can pha rol tshig pa za bar byed pa'ang mi 'don na/ gtse ba lta ci smos/ de nas
316a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / sa bon tsha ba rnams kyi ni// 'bras bu tsha ba skye bar 'gyur// sa bon mngar ba rnams kyi ni// 'bras bu mngar ba skye bar 'gyur// dpe zlar byas
316a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di yis ni/ / sdig pa'i rnam smin tsha ba dang // dkar po'i 'bras bu mngar ba yang // mkhas pa'i mis ni shes par 'gyur// rtag tu lus dang ngag yid kyis// sdig pa rnam gsum
316a4(dkon brtsegs): mi bya zhing / / gzhan dag byed kyang mkhas pa yis// rjes su dga' bar mi bya'o// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyi// dkar po rnam gsum rtag tu bya// gang dag dge ba spyod byed pa//
316a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la yang yi rang bya// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dus gzhan zhig na/ nges pa la dbyig dang gser mang po bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so// nges pa'o//
316a6(dkon brtsegs): ni las khyer la byin pa byin cig/ bsod nams dag gyis shig/ gos dang rgyan dag kyang thogs shig/ khyod ngan cing dbul bas ci zhig bya// des pas smras pa/ grogs po sngon sems can
316a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pas 'dir dbul po zhes bya bar gyur to// de bas na kho bo ni ma byin par len pa byed par mi 'dod do// brgya byin gyis//
316b1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ nges pa khyod da ltar je bde bar 'tsho bar gyis shig/ 'jig rten pha rol bsam pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ nges pas smras pa/ grogs po gang tshe 'di ched cher 'dzin pa de ni byis pa'i chos
316b2(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi/ mkhas pa rnams ni tshe phyi mched cher 'dzin to// 'dod pas zil gyis non pa dang / zhe sdang gis zil gyis non pa dang / gti mug gis zil gyis non pa dang / 'dod chags kyis
316b3(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis non pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni brkam pa ma yin no// sogs 'jog ched cher 'dzin pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni sogs 'jog
316b4(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do/ / bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni bdag tu mi 'dzin cing yongs su 'dzin par mi byed do// lus dang srog la lta ba dag ni ma byin
316b5(dkon brtsegs): par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni lus dang srog la mi lta'o// ngoms mi shes shing chog mi shes pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni ngoms shes shing chog shes
316b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ / 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa yin no// las ma mthong ba dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa
316b7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni las mthong ba yin no/ / rnam par 'tshe ba ched cher 'dzin pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni rnam par mi 'tshe ba ched cher 'dzin to// byams pa'i sems med pa dag/
317a1(dkon brtsegs): ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni byams pa'i sems dang ldan no// phyin ci log bzhis sems bslad pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi// mkhas
317a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dag ni sems phyin ci ma log pa yin no/ / gzhan yang sem can dbul po gang yin pa de dag kho bos tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bshad kyis nyon cig/ bye ba phrag stong gter yod kyang //
317a3(dkon brtsegs): gang dag la ni gtong med pa// de dag 'jig rten 'dir dbul zhes// thos mang rnams kyis de skad bshad// gang la zan gcig med zhin du// de ni gtong la rab gnas na// de ni 'jig rten nor
317a4(dkon brtsegs): che zhes/ / yang dag gzigs pa rnams kyis bshad// gang la sdig med 'phags pa ni// rnam pa kun gyis mdzes pa yin// byis pa sdig pa byed pa ni// shin tu brgyan kyang mdzes ma yin//
317a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa dag gis spyod bla yi// byis pas bsngags pa de lta min// byis pa sdig pa bsngags par byed// mkhas pa dag ni sdig la smod// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dus
317a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan zhig na mi gzhan zhig sprul to/ / de nas mi des gser mang po khyer te/ nges pa la 'di skad ces smras so// kye nges pa gser khyer la kho bo mi gzhan zhig dang rtsod pa de la khyod gcig pus che bzhi
317a7(dkon brtsegs): bya bar kho bos byas kyis/ der kho bo'i tshe bzhi gyis shig/ nges pas smras pa/ grogs po thong / khyod de skad ma zer cig/ kho bo ni brdzun zer du mi 'dod do// kye grogs po brdzun du smra ni
317b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag la'ang slu zhing pha rol yang slu la/ 'phags pa'ang slu ba yin te/ grags pa nyams par byed pa dang / yid mi ches pa dang / yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa dang / brnyes par byed pa dang //
317b2(dkon brtsegs): sems yongs su gdung bar byed pa yin no// kye grogs po brdzun du smra ba ni kha mnam par byed pa dang / lus smad par byed pa dang / lha'i yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa yin no// kye grogs po brdzun
317b3(dkon brtsegs): du smra ba ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la rku ba dang / dran pa zhugs par byed pa dang / mtho ris kyi lam la sgrib pa yin no// kye grogs po brdzun du smra ba ni/ 'phags pa rnams kyis btsan par mi
317b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / yang dag par smra ba rnams kyi nang du tshig mi mdzes pa dang / mkhas pa rnams kyis spad pa dang / sdig pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba dang / brtul zhugs yongs su skong ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa dang /
317b5(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'gro thams cad kyi rtse bar gyur pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// brdzun du smra ba'i kha nas ni// rul ba'i dri yang mnam par
317b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / dgon pa ji ltar bcom pa bzhin// sngon gyi dkar rnams spong bar byed// rmongs pas bdag dang lha rnams dang // 'phags rnams yid kyang 'byung bar byed// mi ni gang zhig
317b7(dkon brtsegs): brdzun zer ba/ / de ni rtag tu dogs par 'gyur// brdzun du smra bar byed pa de// sdig pa kun gyi rtsa ba dang // dka' thub can gyi rtsa bcod dang // ngan 'gror 'gro ba zhes kyang bya// gal te 'dzam
318a1(dkon brtsegs): gling gang ba yi/ / gser dag khyod kyis byin na yang // kho bos chos ni bsrung ba'i phyir// rtag tu brdzun ni smra mi byed// de nas brgya byin gyis sprul pa'i mis//
318a2(dkon brtsegs): nges pa brdzun zer du gzhug ma nus nas song ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu mo nyi 'od dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs la 'di skad ces smras so// khyad
318a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis song la brtul zhugs dang dka' thub byed pa 'di/ ci 'dod pa la longs spyod pa zhig gam// 'o na de 'dod pa don du mi gnyer ba zhig yin pa rtogs shig/ de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo
318a4(dkon brtsegs): bde sogs dang / lha'i bu mo nyi 'od nam nangs nas phyogs gang na nges pa 'dug pa'i phyogs der song nas/ des pa la tshig snyan par smras te/ nges pa bzhengs/ bdag cag gnyis ni khyod
318a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags so/ / nges pa bdag cag gnyis kyi gzugs phun sum tshogs pa la gzigs/ sha tshugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / lus byugs pa dang / rgyu
318a6(dkon brtsegs): chas dang / lhab lhub dag la gzigs/ na tshod dang po'i lang tsho la bab pa la gzigs/ nges pa khyod kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid pa 'di 'dra ba bdag nyid kyi bsod nams phun sum tshogs
318a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la gzigs/ nges pas bltas nas smras pa/ khyed gnyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du zhugs pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur byed
318b1(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi/ lha dang mir zhugs pa dag gi ni ma yin no// khyed gnyis kyi lus ni sgyu ma dang rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur kho bos mthong ngo // khyed gnyis kyi gzugs ni lbu ba dang
318b2(dkon brtsegs): chu bur dang / sdig chu lta bur mthong ngo // khyed tsam dan gyi lde gus byugs pa ni lags pa rlon pa shas yog pa lta bur mthong ngo // khyed kyi rgyan dang lgab lbub ni mig slu ba'i sgyu ma byas
318b3(dkon brtsegs): pa lta bur mthong ngo / / khyed kyi lang tsho ni mi rtag pa dang 'gyur ba'i chos can du mthong ngo // bsod nams ma yin par mthong ba'i phyir khyed gnyis la kho bo ma chags so// khyed gnyis ni
318b4(dkon brtsegs): spre'u dang bud med kyi sems lta bur gyur pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur byed pa yin gyi/ / sems dran pas kun nas srung ba dag gi ni ma yin no// che zhe dag 'dod pa la rten pa ni mi sdug
318b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / 'dod pa la rten pa de ni dri nga ba'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni rul ba'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni shin tu sdug bsngal ba'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni bde ba thams cad yongs su 'grib
318b6(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa'o/ / 'dod pa la rten pa ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la rten pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni ngan 'gro na gnas pa'o//
318b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la rten pa ni 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dag la rten pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni mi mthun pa dang gor na gnas pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni phyin ci log skyed pa'o//
319a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la rten pa ni sred pa'i bkal nyal la gnas pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni rnam par rmongs shing shin tu rmongs la ku tu rmongs pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa/
319a2(dkon brtsegs): ni nye bar gzir cing rnam par gzir la kun tu gzir ba'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni kun du gdungs shing rnam par gdungs la yongs su gdungs pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni mi dge ba'i
319a3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'jug cing dge ba yongs su nyams par byed pa'o/ / 'dod pa la rten pa ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni dge ba'i sprin gyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa'o// 'dod pa
319a4(dkon brtsegs): la rten pa ni srin mo dang 'dris par byed pa dang / gzugs mi sdug pa dang 'dris par byed pa dang / sha za mo dang 'dris par byed pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni ba glang dang / bong bu dang /
319a5(dkon brtsegs): khyi dang / phag dang / rnga mo dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / lug dang / wa la rten pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa la rten pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni tshul
319a6(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong ba yongs su 'dor ba la rten pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni brtul zhugs dang dka' thub 'dor ba'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni shin du bag med pa'o//
319a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la rten pa ni nyon mongs pa shin du 'phel bar byed pa'o// 'dod pa la rten pa ni shin tu bar du gcod byed pa'o// de nas de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pas tshigs
319b1(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / 'dod pa mi rtag rtag tu sdud pa ste// shin du sdug bsngal bde ba 'jig par byed// rtag tu ngan song sa rnams khyim du gyur// sems rmongs
319b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dag gis rtag du bsten/ / 'thab rtsod can de mi bden mtshang du gyur// rtag tu 'gyed cing mi mthun go rar gnas// 'di dag phyin ci log skyed gzhi yin te// 'dod rten sreng
319b3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'phel byed bde ba med/ / rnam mongs rab mongs de bzhin kun du rmongs// 'dod rten rtag du gzir cing gnod paste// 'di ni kun gdungs rnam gdungs yongs su gdungs// hrI/
319b4(dkon brtsegs): par sbyor zhing dge ba chud gzon pa// 'di ni mi dge kun gyi rtsa ba ste// 'dod rten dper na sprin gyi dra ba 'dra// 'dod rten sha za mo dang srin mo dang // bud med gzugs mi sdug dang 'dris byed
319b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin/ / 'di ni ba glang bong bu rta dag dang // phag dang khyi dang wa dang rnga mo dang // glang chen lug rnams kyis kyang rten pa ste// 'dod pa skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis spangs// 'dod rten
319b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims thos dang gdong ba dang / / dkar thub brtul zhugs rnams ni 'joms pa ste// 'di la rtag tu bag med nyes pa 'phel// de phyir thar 'dod rtag tu bud med spong // gal te 'jig
319b7(dkon brtsegs): rten 'di dag khyed 'dra ba'i/ / mdangs ldan gzugs can dag gis gang gyur kyang // yon tan gnas pa kho bo'i sems gcig kyang // 'dod chag la ni rnams kyang rton mi 'gyur//
320a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs dang / lha'i bu mo nyi 'od song nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// des ni 'di na bud med rnams kyi
320a2(dkon brtsegs): skyon yang dag/ gang la de dag shin tu mthong bar dogs ma mchis// ji ltar de yi sems ni yul las log gyur pa// de ltar 'dod pa rnams la sems ni chags ma mchis//
320a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa'i thad du song nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ci zhig don gnyer nges pa chos spyod pa// brtul zhugs de ni
320a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa rnam dag smros/ / 'di yis nyi zla 'am yang na dbang po 'am// tshangs pa'am lha rgyal ci zhig khyod slong byed// nges pas smras pa/ nyi ma zla ba de bzhin brgya byin dang // tshangs
320a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang rgyal po'am 'di na gzhan dag kyang / / 'gro ba rgya chen gang yod de dag kun// gar byed lta bzhin mi rtag mi brtan na// mkhas pa su zhig de la dga' bar byed// gang la skye
320a6(dkon brtsegs): med na mang 'chi ba med/ / sdug dang mi sdug rnams dang phrad pa'ang med// 'gro ba grol mdzad sangs rgyas 'gyur bya zhes// de thob bya phyir sems kyi spyod pa nges// brgya byin gyis spras
320a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ phan byed khyod kyi tshig la rjes su yi rang ste// khyod kyis smon lam bdab pa legs par grub gyur cig/ bdud rnams sder bcas myur du nges par bcom nas ni// shAkya seng
320b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ltar byang chub thob gyur ci/ de nas grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pas dus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa zhig rnyed nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ nor
320b2(dkon brtsegs): bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i gling na mchog du gyur pa 'di bdag gis mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang yin pa de la sbyin kor ma chag go snyam nas de grong bar du song ste/ thams
320b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi nang na dbul po su yin pa de la rin po che 'di sbyin no zhes sgra bsgrags pa dang / dbul po mgon med pa phal po che der 'dus te/ bdag cag dbul po yin gyis/ bdag cag la
320b4(dkon brtsegs): byin cig ces 'dzer to/ / nges pas smras pa/ khyed ni dbul po ma yin gyi/ mnyan yod 'di na ches dbul po gzhan zhig yod kyi/ de la sbyin no// de dag gis smras pa/ gang
320b5(dkon brtsegs): yin/ des pas smras pa/ rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di yin no// de dag gis smras pa/ khyod de skad ma zer zhig/ rgyal po gsal rgyal ni phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yin gyi//
320b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag ni dbul zhing mgon med pa yin no// des pas smras pa/ nor mang gis ni ci zhig bya// rgya mtsho la ni rlung rnams bzhin// gang dag la ni chog med pa// ma bsdam
320b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag dbul po yin/ / gang dag 'dod pa rab 'phel zhing // yang yid ni skye 'gyur ba// rmongs pa de dag tshe 'di dang // pha rol tu yang dbul por 'gyur// de nas
321a1(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa skye bo phal po che de dag gis yongs su bskor cing nor bu rin po che de khyer nas/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi don bya ba'i sa ga la ba der
321a2(dkon brtsegs): song ngo / / de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag rigs dang ldan pa'i mchog lnga brgya tsam zhig g.yon chung ngu'i phyir bdog pa thams cad phrog pa so//
321a3(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pas nor bu rin po che de rgyal po la phul te/ rgyal po chen po nor bu rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa 'dzam bu gling thams cad rib bdag gis rnyed pa 'di
321a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang lags pa de la stsal to snyam mo// de la bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ khyod ni 'di
321a5(dkon brtsegs): na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po lags so snyam bgyid kyis/ kye nor bu rin po che 'di bzhes su gsol/ de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal yul yul por gyur cing ngo tsha bar
321a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa la 'di skad ces smras so// nges pa cing khyod pas kyang ches dbul lam/ nges pas smras pa/ lha de lta lags te bdag pas ches khyod
321a7(dkon brtsegs): dbul lags so/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ rnam grangs gang gis dbul/ nges pas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang gis 'dod pa rab mang rnam par 'phel zhing long/
321b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod dag gis chog ma 'tshal// gnod pa bgyid pa'i slad du rgyal srid 'khrug cing bdag nyid kyang ni 'dor bgyid pa// de ni 'di ni 'jig rten mi srung yon tan chung ngu dag la mchog tu 'dzin//
321b2(dkon brtsegs): de phyir 'di na de la rtag tu chos 'dod rnams ni dbul po lags par sems// gang zhig byams pa rab tu bsgoms te sems can rnams la tha ba ma mchis shing // rtag par rgyun du ngan ngon tsam gyis chog/
321b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzin cing 'dod pa ma mchis la// nyam thag mthong na rtag tu snying rje bgyid cing shar gnyer bgyid pa ma mchis pa// de ni phyug cing nor bzang shin tu nor che dad pa la sogs longs spyod gnas//
321b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig 'gro ba 'di na dbang phyug rgya chen ldan la chos srung mi bgyid dang // gang zhig 'di na skye bo dman zhing sdug bsngal gzir ba bzung nas chad pas gcod// gang zhig chung ma dag gis
321b5(dkon brtsegs): mdun bltas dga' zhing 'jig rten pha rol mi lta ba/ / de ni chos srung mi bgyid shin tu dbul zhing dman pa'i mi zhes rig par bgyid// dad pas bsams pa dri ma med cing rab brtan tshul
321b6(dkon brtsegs): khrims dgal yang dgu gnas/ / rtag tu ngom shes shing khrel yod zos pa 'dzin te gtong la dga' ba dang // shes rab kyi ni mthar phyin tho thos ldan zhing 'jig rten kun la lnga brgyad pa/
321b7(dkon brtsegs): dag rtag tu mi dbul thob cing chos 'dod rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa lags// gang dag longs spyod rnams la rab chags bde la dga' zhing gtong bam mchis la// lus dang srogs
322a1(dkon brtsegs): la snying por 'dzin cing rtag par snying po don du mi gnyer dang / / gang dag glang chen myos pa lta bur rtag tu yid myos rnam par rgyu ba dang // lhan cig gang dag dran pa
322a2(dkon brtsegs): mchis de dag dbul ba nyid ni thob pa lags/ / gang dag dkon mchog gsum po dri ma med la gus pa shin tu che ba dang // lus dang srog dang nor rnams las ni rtag tu snying po sgrub pa'i
322a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa dag/ rtag tu mi brkam sdang bar mi bgyid glan pa ma lags rab tu rgyags ma mchis// lha gcig gang dag chos kyis brgyan pa de dag nor che skyes bu dam pa lags// lha gcig
322a4(dkon brtsegs): ma ni rtag tu nags kyi sman spun skam po bsregs pas chog ma 'tshal/ / lha gcig 'di na rgya mtsho chu klung rnams kyi chu 'dzin pas kyang chog ma 'tshal// 'di na nyi ma zla ba 'di dag mkha' la mthar
322a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis rgyu bas chog ma 'tshal/ / rgyal po brkam phyir rtag tu longs spyod dag gis chog mi mkhyen pas rlag par 'gyur// zhugs ni gum par gyur pas rtswa mang dag gis slar yang 'bar bar yongs
322a6(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyid/ / de bzhin mkhas pas shes rab chog par mi 'dzin nyon mongs rnams kyis 'bar mi bgyid// chu yi thigs pa bzhin du rgyal srid dag kyang mi brtag 'jig par rab phyogs na//
322a7(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa'i rtsa bar gyur cing dge ba 'joms pa'i rgyal srid de ni su zhig 'tshal/ de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal sems 'khrugs nas/ grong khyer gyi dngul po nges pa la 'di
322b1(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so/ / nges pa de ltar nga ni dbul la/ khyod ni phyug par khyod la dbang su yod/ nges pas smras pa/ lha de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
322b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mnyan yod 'di nyid na bzhugs pa khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ngas mthong yang mthong ngo // nges pas smras pa/ lha de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mig
322b3(dkon brtsegs): tu gyur cing tshad mar gyur pa ste/ de ni bdag gi dpang lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ song la de bzhin gshegs pa de spyan drongs shig dang / des ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du
322b4(dkon brtsegs): ngas gzung bar bya'o/ / nges pas smras pa/ ston pa de la ngan bu 'am// pho nya gzhan gtang 'os ma lags// 'dir ni bdag gis bsam bgyis na// de mkhyen
322b5(dkon brtsegs): nas ni gshegs par 'gyur/ / 'jig rten 'di'am pha rol la// de ni mi mkhyen cang mi mnga'// thugs kyis bsam pa mkhyen nas kyang // 'dren pa de ni gshegs par 'gyur//
322b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas// de la nga rgyal skyo mi mnga'// sems can rnams la legs dgongs pas// shin rab tu'ang gshegs 'gyur gyis// rgyal chen bdag gis
322b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa la/ / da ni legs par thugs ches mdzod// gang gis ston pa 'dir gshegs pa'i// bden pa'i byin brlab bgyi bar 'tshal// me tog spos dang me tog 'phreng // rgyal mtshan
323a1(dkon brtsegs): gdugs dang byug pa dang / / sil snyan sta gon mdzod cig dang // 'dren pa de ni gshegs par 'gyur// des pas thal mo sbyar nas kyang // phrag pa gcig tu
323a2(dkon brtsegs): gos gzar 'dug/ pus mo sa la btsugs byas nas// 'di skad du ni tshig kyang smras// kun mkhyen bden pa gang gis su// bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen ce na// bden pa'i tshig ni
323a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di nyid kyir/ / thub pa bdag gi mdun du bzhugs// de nas tshig 'di smras nas kyang // sa ni rab tu g.yos par gyur// sa gzhi rnam par brtol nas ni// de bzhin
323a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa byung bar gyur/ / rdzu 'phrul dag dang ldan pa yi// nyan thos lnga brgyas yongs su bskor// brgya phrag bcu gnyis snyed dag gi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang
323a5(dkon brtsegs): ni/ skyong ba dang ni lha klu dang // brgya byin tshangs pas mdun gyis bsdus// de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul mthong nas ni// de tshe 'jig rten ngo mtshar 'dzin// rgyal po dpung bcas blon po
323a6(dkon brtsegs): bcas/ / ston pa'i zhabs la 'dud par byed// der ni srog chags stong dag gis// ston pa la ni mchod pa byas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod byas nas// byang chub don
323a7(dkon brtsegs): du yid btud do/ / de nas grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba
323b1(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag mnyan yod 'di ni 'khyam zhing mchis mchis pa las/ nor bu rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa zhig rnyed nas
323b2(dkon brtsegs): de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/ mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang lags pa de la stsal to snyam nas/ de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/ rgyal po gsal
323b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal 'di ni thams cad kyi nang na ches dbul ba ste/ 'di ni pha rol gyi nor 'phrog par bgyid pas na/ ngoms ma 'tshal ba lags so// slar zhing don du gnyer bar bgyid pas
323b4(dkon brtsegs): na chog ma 'tshal ba lags so/ / gzhan gyi longs spyod dag gis ngoms ma 'tshal ba lags so// sdug bsngal ba rnams la rnam par mtho 'tsham pa lags so// skyid pa
323b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams thal mar 'byin pa lags so/ / dbul po rnams rab tu phung bar bgyid pa lags so// phyug po rnams tshar gcod pa lags so// shin du rab tu myos pa lags so//
323b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i longs spyod rnams dang sred pas rnam par bcings pa lags so snyam nas/ de la bdag gis stsal na len par mi bgyid par 'di skad du de ltar nga ni dngul la/ khyod ni
323b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byor par khyod la dbang su yod ces kyang mchi'o/ / de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs snyoms pa/ ngo zlog gi spyod pa mi mnga' ba/ tha ba dang
324a1(dkon brtsegs): dri ma dang / khong khro ba mi mnga' ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di legs par lung bstan par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
324a2(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod ni tshe 'di'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi longs spyod gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang /
324a3(dkon brtsegs): sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang / bzhon pa dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod thob pa gang yin pa 'di dag gis bdag
324a4(dkon brtsegs): phyug go snyam du sems so/ / rgyal po chen po nges pa ni sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang / bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs
324a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bka' thub dang / bag yod pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa dang byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / bta ma
324a6(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dang ba dang / dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong ba dang / shes rab dang / ngo tsha shes
324a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / brtan pa dang / sdom pa gang yin pa de dag gis bdag phyug go snyam du sems so// rgyal po chen po khyod kyi 'og tu gtogs pa'i sems can ji
324b1(dkon brtsegs): snyed pa de dag 'di ltar khyod dang 'dra bar nor dang ldan par gyur kyang / de dag ni nges pas gom pa 'dun bor ba'i bar gyi tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka'
324b2(dkon brtsegs): thub dang / bag yod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas/ dpe'i bar du'ang mi bzod do// gsal rgyal gyis gsol pa/ bcom
324b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag gi yul na sems can yon tan gyi che ba nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag gnas pa ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
324b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yul na sems can yon tan gyi che ba nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag mang du gnas so// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis
324b5(dkon brtsegs): nges pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod kyis glengs pas kho bo'i nga rgyal nges bcom phyir// nges pa khyod ni kho bo'i ston pa gnyis pa ste// rgyal srid 'di kun khyod sbyin kho
324b6(dkon brtsegs): dpung dang bcas/ / khyod kyi slob ma yin gyis khyod kyis bdag slobs shika/ kho bo yun ring dag tu nga rgyal gyis kyang bsdus// sdig pa'i grogs po dag gis bskor cing bzung ba las
324b7(dkon brtsegs): nges pa khyod nyid las ni chos 'di thos pas na/ / rab tu bsdams te kho bos chos bzhin spyad par bya// khyim na gnas pa brgya phrag lnga po 'di dag ni// nor gyi ched du kho bos go ra
325a1(dkon brtsegs): bcug pa ste/ / kho bos thams cad gtang gis bde bar 'khod par gyis// phyin chad 'di 'dra ba dag kho bos yongs mi byed// lnga brgya btang bar gyur pa gang yin
325a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang / / nges pa la ni zhes legs par bskyed nas kyang // sems ni skyo bar gyur kyang ci la'ang mi lta bar// bde ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam btab// nga ni dbul po ma yin/
325a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni dbul po zhes// des pa khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa ste// nges pa la ni gang zhig dbul po zhes brjod pa// mi de rgyal po'i khrims dang 'gal bar byed pa yin//
325a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rigs kyi bu des pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das la blta bas chog
325a5(dkon brtsegs): ma 'tshal ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du ci nas 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don mchis par gyur pa de lta de ltar 'di dag la legs par chos bstan du gsol/ bcom
325a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nges pa rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ yid ches pa dang / dad pa dang / 'phangs
325a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzin pa dang / gus pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku
325b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong na/ bdag kyang 'di 'dra bar gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni slu bar mi mdzad pa'i phyir lhag pa'i
325b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa yongs su dag par sems skyed pa dang / sems can thams cad rton cing cher na rab tu grol bar bya ba'i phyir yang sems skyed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad
325b3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung bar yang sems de skyed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no// gzhan yang
325b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi ste/ gzugs dben par mthong ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben par mthong ba dang / khams bzhi nam mkha' dang 'dra bar
325b5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba dang / skye mched grong stong pa lta bur mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bdag med
325b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir bdag rnam par dag pa dang / sems can med pa'i phyir sems can rnam par dag pa dang / srog med pa'i phyir srog rnam par dag pa dang / gang zag med pa'i phyir gang zag
325b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ lha'i mig mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / shes
326a1(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi mig kun tu spyod pa dang / chos kyi mig gis so sor rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan rjes su rtogs par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag dang ldan na// de bzhin/
326a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ mi dmigs pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ding nge
326a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa'i phyir shes rab kyi phu po yongs su dag pa dang / de'i rnam par grol ba mthong ba'i phyir
326a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa ste/ nges pa rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no//
326a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dka' bar mdzad nas/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar 'khor dang bcas te bar snang la gshegs
326a6(dkon brtsegs): so/ de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ rigs kyi bu des pa la 'di skad ces smras so// nges pa khyod nam de bzhin gshegs pa la ltar 'gro ba de'i tshe kho bo la'ang
326a7(dkon brtsegs): sbron cig dang / kho bo'ang de bzhin gshegs pa la ltar 'gro'o// nges pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po de ltar 'gyi'o// bdag ni khyod bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po la
326b1(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa'i 'khor dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs su gshegs par 'tshal lo// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag gcig pu la phan pa'i phyir/
326b2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa ma lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'khor phal chen mdzes so// rgyal pos smras pa/ nges pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gang
326b3(dkon brtsegs): yin/ nges pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / gdul ba'i slad du sems can thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so//
326b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po gzhan yang theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i
326b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lags so/ / rgyal po chen po sems can g.yon can 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po phyir mi ldog par
326b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i 'dun pa drag po ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ / rgyal po chen po sems can ser sna can yongs su smin par bgyis par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i
326b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lags so/ / rgyal po chen po sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen
327a1(dkon brtsegs): po sems can gnod sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ / rgyal po chen po sems can la lo
327a2(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ / rgyal po chen po sems can sems rnam par g.yengs pa yongs su smin par bgyid
327a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ / rgyal po chen po sems can 'chal pa'i shes rab can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i shes rab ni byang chub sems
327a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i 'khor lags so/ / rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i byams pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po 'khor ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i
327a5(dkon brtsegs): snying rje ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ / rgyal po chen po chos kyi kun dka' la dga' zhing mos pa'i dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po rjes
327a6(dkon brtsegs): chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba'i btang snyoms ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bsdu
327a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ / rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs sogs pa ni byang chub
327b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ / rgyal po chen po bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'dal bar 'gyur ba'i stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
327b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ / rgyal po chen po tshig btsun par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / mi rtsub pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen
327b3(dkon brtsegs): po spobs pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i mi 'phya ba dang / 'thing slad mi bgyid pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po brjed ngas par mi 'gyur ba'i thos
327b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yo byad sogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ / rgyal po chen po thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur pa'i slad du slob dpon dang mkhan po la gus pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i
327b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lags so/ / rgyal po chen po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i thos pa 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa tham
327b6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ / rgyal po chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs
327b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/ / rgyal po chen po sems can ma dad pa dang bar 'gyur ba'i 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
328a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lags so/ / rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sgrub par 'gyur ba'i bag yod pa ni byang chu sems dpa'i 'khor lags so//
328a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal dka' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyed nas/ rgyal po la 'os pa'i ras bcos bu zung stong chos la dgab pa'i phyir des
328a3(dkon brtsegs): pa la byin no/ / des pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag la bkur sti dang mchod pa mdzad pas 'tshal to// gang gis bdag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gos ras rul ba'i dum bu brgya
328a4(dkon brtsegs): btsems pa bdag la mchis kyis/ bdag ni bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas shing yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i gos rnams mi 'tshal lo// rgyal po chen po dpyid kyi dus na ras rus
328a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dum bu'i gos 'di shing gi yal ga la bkal te dgung gcig gam/ dgung gnyis sam/ dgung bcu'am/ dgung brgyar mchis kyang / de la su'ang len pa ma mchis shing / de la su
328a6(dkon brtsegs): chags pa'i sems skyed pa ma mchis te/ bdag kyang dbor nas mi lta bar mchi ba'i dus de mchis so// rgyal po chen po bdag ni bdag gir 'dzin pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas
328a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gos rnams mi 'tshal lo/ / rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpas ni gang la bdag nyid kyang 'dod pa spong bar 'gyur zhing / gzhan yang 'dod pa'i sems skyed par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gos
328b1(dkon brtsegs): bcang bar bgyi'o/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ des pa gal te de ltar ras bcos bu zung 'di dag khyod mi len na kho bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rkang pas rdzis shig/ nges pas lha de bzhin du
328b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o zhes smras nas/ ras bcos bu zung de dag la rkang pas brdzis te song ngo // rgyal pos smras pa/ nges pa ras bcos bu zung khyod kyi rkang pa'i sman mar gyur pa 'di rnams ji ltar
328b3(dkon brtsegs): bya nges pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po sems can dbul po gcer bu gos ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag la stsol cig/ rgyal pos nges pa de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/ rgyal
328b4(dkon brtsegs): po'i mi rnams la bsgo ste/ de dag gis kyang ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du byas so// ras bcos bu zung de dag dbul po de dag gis bgos ma thag tu 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/ bdag
328b5(dkon brtsegs): cag gis nges pa la ji ltar lan blan par bya snyam pa las/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / dri ba'i smon lam gyi stobs kyis/ de dag gis bar snang las tshigs su bcad pa 'di
328b6(dkon brtsegs): dag thos so/ / 'dod pa bzhin du lan ni bla na bya ba// me tog dang ni spos dang byug pa dang // zas skom nor rnams kyis kyang mi nus te// byang chub sems kyis nges pa dga' bar 'gyur
328b7(dkon brtsegs): nges pa gos dang zas 'dod ma yin te/ / rnyed dang bkur sti grags pa 'dod ma yin// nges pa byang chub sems las chos 'dod de// byang chub sem gyis nges pa dga' ba ste/
329a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas dus gzhan zhig na rigs kyi bu des pa dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mdzan
329a2(dkon brtsegs): yod kyi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / srog chags brgya phrag mang po dag/ bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir dong ngo // de nas mnyan yod dang rgyal
329a3(dkon brtsegs): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar du lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'khor gyi khyams chen po bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ yangs shing mtho la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper
329a4(dkon brtsegs): na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba lta bu zhig sprul te/ dbus su shing yongs 'dus brtol sprul to// yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung du'ang / bcom ldan
329a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri bkra ba blta na sdug cing chu zheng gab pa la/ lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba mngon par sprul to// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stan drug khri dag
329a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang mngon par sprul to/ / lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs la sogs pa lha'i bu mo khri nyis stong yang me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byugs pa dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phyen
329a7(dkon brtsegs): dag khyer nas sil snyan dang lag rtob pa dag byed cing / nges pa'i g.yog bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri brgyan par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye
329b1(dkon brtsegs): bo'i tshogs chen po de dag 'ong bar thugs su chud nas/ gtsug lag khang nas byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing gdan bshabs pa la bzhugs so//
329b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pas lha'i bu mo nyi 'od la smras pa/ bzang mo tshur shog nges pa'i g.yog bya ba'i phyir rgyud kyi skra dang klu'i sgra dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshesas pa la
329b3(dkon brtsegs): mchod par bya'o/ / de nas lha'i bu mo nyi 'od kyi lha'i bu mo lnga brgya tsam dang thabs cig tu rgyud kyi skar sbyar ba'i tshigs su bcas pa dag gis bstod pa/ khyod kyis bskal pa brgyar ni sngan chad
329b4(dkon brtsegs): dka' thub spyad/ / khyod ni bsdu ba dag dang dul dang sbyin la dgyes// khyod kyi sku gsung thugs rnams yongs su dag pa ste// srid gsum 'jig rten bla ma la ni bdag phyag 'tshal// khyod ni
329b5(dkon brtsegs): tha ba mi mnga' bzod dang byams la dgyes/ / khyod ni brtson 'grus brtan dang stobs kyis pha rol gshegs// khyod ni bsam gtan blo dang tshul rnams snang la dgyes// dri ma gsum gyi nyes pa
329b6(dkon brtsegs): sel la bdag phyag 'tshal/ / khyod ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sel la dgyes// khyod kyi thugs ni zhi zhing snyoms la thugs rjer ldan// khyod ni yang dag gsung zhing dam pa'i don yang
329b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen/ / srid pa gsum po thar par mdzad la bdag phyag 'tshal// khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi the tsom sel bar mdzad// khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi skyon rnams mtha' dag sel// khyod
330a1(dkon brtsegs): ni mthong ba rnams la mchog tu dka' bar mdzad/ / bdag ni rgyal la srog gis skyabs su mchi bar bgyi// lha yi bu mo mchog ni 'dod chags chags gyur pa// gang
330a2(dkon brtsegs): gis mthong ba de yang chos la dga' bar 'gyur/ / dga' bas dran pa shin tu rgya chen thob 'gyur te// dga' bas sdug la 'dod pa'i dga' dang bral bar 'gyur// mtshan mchog sum cuH
330a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dag gi rgyan rnams kyis/ / legs par brgyan pa gsal ba'i yon tan mchog mnga' ba// gsung mchog mi yi dam pa gsung ni rnam par dka/ mtshungs pa med pa'i 'od
330a4(dkon brtsegs): mnga' khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ / 'phags pa 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gsar mdog phyag mthil sdug/ thub pa'i sku stod seng ge'i 'dra zhing glang chen stabs// sprin tshugs legs shing
330a5(dkon brtsegs): shang legs tshems snyoms thags bzang mdzes/ / dpal gyi snying po shAkya thub mchog khyod la 'dud// rgyal ba yon ngan brgya phrag dag gis rgyas gyur pa// bde gshegs shin tu dga' bskyed
330a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad bstod pa yi/ / bsod nams yon tan mtha' yas bsgrub pa gang lags pa// de yis 'dir ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas mnyam gyur cig/ de nas rigs kyi bu res
330a7(dkon brtsegs): pab skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag gis yongs su bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug
330b1(dkon brtsegs): go/ de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ rigs kyi bu nges pa la khri'u stan bzang po bdag nyid kyis byin te/ 'di la 'dug cig ces byas nas/ rigs kyi bu des pa khri'u stan bzang
330b2(dkon brtsegs): de la 'dug go/ / rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa'ang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas rang rang gi stan la 'khod do// de na rigs kyi bu gang dag gis
330b3(dkon brtsegs): nges pa sngon ma mthong ba de dag 'di skad du dbul po gos ngan pa gyon pa 'di la 'di lta bur mchod pa byed do zhes 'dzer to/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad
330b4(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so/ / grogs po dag 'di la brnyas par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di yon tan gyi che ba nyid ji snyed pa dang ldan pa de ni kho bo'i mngon sum du gyur to// grogs po dag khyed
330b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig sdod cig dang / rigs kyi bu 'di'i yon tan gyi bkod pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs kyi bu nges pas/ lha'i bu de dag gi bsam pa rtogs nas/ bcom
330b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i bkod pa'i thabs dang / ye shes kyi bkod pa'i thabs bcom ldan 'das
330b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku las 'od phyung ste/ 'od de nges pa'i lus la reg nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub
331a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ci 'dra ba de las 'bum gyur pas kyang ces lhag par gyur to/ / de nas sgra'i bu de dag ya mtshan du 'dzin par gyur te/ nges pa la me tog dag gis gdor to//
331a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyis bu nges pa la bka' stsal pa/ nges pa gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje lta bu'i mthu la gnas pa'i tshe 'ang / sems can
331a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dman par ston cing dman pa'i mthu la gnas kyang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mchog tu ston par byed pa 'di ni de'i kod pa yin no//
331a4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes la gnas kyang mi shes par ston cing / mi shes par ston kyang shes par snang ba 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no// ye shes ma thob pa rnams la'ang lus kyi spyod pa dang /
331a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod lam gyis dad pa skyed par byed cing / ye shes thob pa rnams la'ang spyod pa thams cad yang dag par ston pas/ rdzu 'phrul ston par byed pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no// rtag tu
331a6(dkon brtsegs): sems la dbang byed pas ngan cing dbul bar ston kyang / tshangs pas kyang mchod pa dang / mchog gi bkod pa la gnas kyang skye bo phal gyis kyang mchod pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no//
331a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can bsdu ba'i phyir ngan cing dbul bar yang ge bar sngon la/ sems can rnams la mngon par 'byung ba bskyed pa'i phyir longs spyod rgya chen po dang ldan yang mngon par 'byung bsngon
331b1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu nges pas rdza
331b2(dkon brtsegs): srid cig nas byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu nges pa ni sangs rgyas bye ba mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/
331b3(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pa/ bzod pa gsum thob pa/ spobs pa thob pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse bar byas pa/ sems can yong su smin par bya ba la mkhas pa ste/
331b4(dkon brtsegs): ngan cing dbul bas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dis ngan cing dbul ba 'dis sems can ji skad cig btul lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
331b5(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa/ kun dga' bo lha'i bu 'bum phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas te/ mi rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o// kun dka' bos gsol pa
331b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ji srid cig na ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa rnams ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/
331b7(dkon brtsegs): ni ji skad ces bgyi bzhig tu 'gyur lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems camangon la brtson dang 'artul
332a1(dkon brtsegs): zhugs brtan pa dang / zags pa rgya chen dag gi bsam pa khyab byas dang // byang chub yon tan gnas pa'i spyod pa ci 'dra ba// ngas ni khyod la bshad kyis kun dag khyod
332a2(dkon brtsegs): nyon cig/ 'di na rgyal la mchod mchog phyir ni gus byed cing // dam pa'i chos ni bsrung phyir rab tu brtson byed pa// nges pa yi ni spyod pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa// de dag 'dir ni bgrang bar nus par
332a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro/ / pha rol phyin pa 'di dag la ni legs par bslabs// mngon par shes pa dag gis sngan chad rtse bar byas// tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyi ni mtha' mar phyin par song // thabs pa
332a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'i spyod pa dag la legs par bslabs/ / 'dir ni de yis 'dus byas skyon rnams legs par mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub kyang ni mngon sum gyur par byas// 'dis ni sems can rdza
332a5(dkon brtsegs): lha ji ltar thar gyur pa'i/ / rnam par smin pa'i mtshan nyid la yang legs par bslabs// 'jigs pa med cing blo dang rtogs dang dran dang ldan// spobs pa dang ni gzungs rnams dang yang ldan
332a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ bdud kyi lcags rgya nyon mongs rdzab las nges byung zhing // sangs rgyas spyod yul don chen la ni rab tu gnas// 'jig rten chos rnams mang po dag gis ma gos la// chags pa la sogs
332a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis brag ltar yongs mi g.yos/ / su yi drung du mi 'gro ring du byed pa'ang min// nam mkha' lta bur bcings dang grol ba med pa yin// snyi rjes gnas shing sems can yongs su skyo ba med
332b1(dkon brtsegs): shin du bsdams shing nes nur can la byams sems ldan/ / sems can kun la bdag dang 'dra bar sdug par lta// skyon la mi lta 'khrul pa dag dang ldan pa yin// ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du
332b2(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa rnams la gnas/ / 'di ni ji skad sba ba bzhin du spyod pa byed// chos nyid la ni chos kyis tshul gyis legs par bslabs// stong pa nyid la mos shing gnyis las rnam par grol// brjod
332b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum thob skye ba'i spyod yul ma yin te/ / sangs rgyas tshul dang yon tan dag la rab tu gnas// 'di ni 'jig rten gang du rgyu ba byed pa na// der ni kye bo mang po rnam par grol bar byed// sangs
332b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi ni sras 'di gang du gnas pa der/ / de bzhin gshegs pas yul ni stongs pa ma yin te// de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten ma lus pas// ji ltar sangs rgyas bzhin du 'di la gus par gyis//
332b5(dkon brtsegs): nga ni mya ngan 'das nas nyams pa'i dus bab tshe// nges pa 'di ni sangs rgyas spyod pa spyad nas kyang // sngon chad gnas pa mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten khams// mi 'khrugs 'jig rten nyid du phyir yang
332b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar 'gyur/ / brtan po srog chags rnams la phan par bya ba dang // zhing gi 'byor pa dag ni yongs su btsal ba dang // byang chuchu ni sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir// bskal pa grangs med
332b7(dkon brtsegs): gsum du spyod pa spyod par byed/ / de yi 'og tu de ni skyob pa rgyal bar 'gyur// ming ni 'jig rten rgyal po dbang phyug ces kyang bya// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba yi// zhing dang '
333a1(dkon brtsegs): jig rten du ni mtshungs pa yin/ / 'jig rten khams de legs par sprul pa zhes bya ste// yon tan thams cad dang ni ldan par 'gyur ba yin// da mi tsha mi tshad ni lo khrir thub par
333a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / de yi dge 'dun shin tu mang ste bgrang las 'das// nyan thos theg pa can gyi dge 'dun nyung bar 'gyur// phal cher byang chub don du brtson pa byas nas su// de dag thams cad ye shes
333a3(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang rdzu 'phrul ldan/ / rnam par thar pa rnams dang ldan zhing 'jigs pa med// gcig tu nges par chos ni legs par bshad rnams kyis// 'jig rten khams der rtag tu sgra chen bsgrags par
333a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / de na bdud rnams med cing srid par chags pa med// de dag thams cad yang dag rig cing rnam par dag/ bde bar gshegs de yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur nas// lo ni brgyad cu dag las
333a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi lhag rnams su yang / / de yid dam pa'i chos ni rab tu spyod par 'gyur// de tshe de yi chos kyi tshul ni 'khrugs pa med// des pa de yis gang dag yongs su smin byas pa// de dag byang chub bla na med
333a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i don du spyod/ / shing der sems can gang dga' byung bar 'gyur ba rnams// de dag thams cad skyon rnams dang ni bral ba yin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu des pa'i lung bstan pa
333a7(dkon brtsegs): bshang ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum rgya stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ lha'i me tog dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / rgyan gyi char yang mngon par bab bo// thams
333b1(dkon brtsegs): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis kyang rang rang ni thos rnams rigs kyi bu ngas pa la bkang bo/ / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / bras ze brgya phrag mang po dag kyang rab tu byung /
333b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ nges pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu dbyung bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu des
333b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mgo bo la phyag gis byugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu des pa'i mgo bo la reg ma thag tu/ gos ngur smrig bgro shing dge slong du snang bar gyur to// de nas
333b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo snyigs ma lnga po dus kyi snyigs ma dang / sems can gyi snyigs ma dang / zhing gi snyigs ma
333b5(dkon brtsegs): dang tshe'i snyigs ma dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs pa'i dus su nga byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ der nges pas ji ltar 'dul ba las rnam pa gzhan gyis gdul bar mi bya'o//
333b6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo nga ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du sangs rgyas kyi 'dul bas sems can rnams 'dul bar mi byed kyi/ kun dga' bo nga ni ngan cing dbul ba dang / ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pas
333b7(dkon brtsegs): bsdigs pas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do/ / kun dka' bo gal te 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ngas sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis chos bstan cing / sangs rgyas kyi yul nye bar brtan
334a1(dkon brtsegs): du zin na/ sems can gcig kyang 'dul bar mi 'gyur la/ chos kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas na/ nga dang nges pa ji ltar 'dul bar
334a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang sems can gdul bar gyis shig/ kun dga' bo sems can dad pa can dang rtog pa mang ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos
334a3(dkon brtsegs): na dad pa rnyed cing de bzhin du sgrub par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' des bdang
334a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jin
334a5(dkon brtsegs): rten yi rang te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa des pas zhus
334a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde la sog
334a7(dkon brtsegs): bas bsgyur ci zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ / / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bI ra dad ta pa ri pri tsA nA ma ma hA yAn pU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
334b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sbyin gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gcig pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
334b2(dkon brtsegs): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba ra na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po tham
334b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zad pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cing shes pa/
334b4(dkon brtsegs): glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par
334b5(dkon brtsegs): / grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ mngon par shes pa/ mngon par shes pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtog pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan
334b6(dkon brtsegs): pa kun dga' bo'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe grong khyer chen po ma
334b7(dkon brtsegs): mod na/ khyim bdag dbar sbyin zhes bya ba phrug pa/ nor cheb/ bdag dbang ba mnga'/ nor dang yo byad mang ba/ nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba'i tshogs mang ba/
335a1(dkon brtsegs): glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / ra lug dang / ba glang mngab/ bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba mang ba/ dbyig dang /
335a2(dkon brtsegs): gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul mang 'a zhig gnas pa de/ khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam dang lhan ci

335a4(dkon brtsegs): bar dka'/ dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka'/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnyed par dka'/ rab tu 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/ dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par dka'

335b2(dkon brtsegs): bya zhes 'thun par 'dus te/ 'khod pa de dag thams cad de lta bu'i dpyod pa skyes nas/ bdag cag theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan las zla bar bya ba ni mchog yin gyi/ nyan
335b3(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi theg pas ni ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas ni ma yin no snyam mo// de nas khyim bdag dpa' sbyin/ khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag gis yongs su bskor

335b5(dkon brtsegs): der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
335b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du/ khyim bdag dpa' sbyin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag rnams khyed don gang gi phyir de

336a1(dkon brtsegs): las langs te/ bra gos phrag pa gcig tu gabar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar/
336a2(dkon brtsegs): ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dus gcig cig na/ bdag cag khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam gcig tu 'dus te mchis par gyur nas/

336b1(dkon brtsegs): grol ba rnyed par dka' na/ ci bdag cag nyan thos kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya 'am/ 'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sam/ 'on te theg pa chen po bla na med
336b2(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya zhes mchid bgyis so/ / bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe/ bdag cag thams cad 'di lta bu'i rtog pa skyes te/ bdag cag theg pa chen po bla na med pas yod

336b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ bde bar gshegs pa ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ ji ltar bsgrub/

337a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi thad du lhags pa khyed yang legs so// khyim bdag rnams de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid zu bzhig dang / byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
337a2(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas ji ltar bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar gnas par bya ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba ngas khyed la

337b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ sdig pa'i las rnams byed de/ de dag sdig pa'i las byas shing bsags pa des ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye'o// sems can thams cad

337b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de lus la chags par mi bya/ srog la chags

337b7(dkon brtsegs): bar yongs su gtang ba mang ba dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med par bya/ tshul khrims rnam pa gsum yongs su dag par tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas par bya/ sems can thams cad kyis nyes
338a1(dkon brtsegs): pa byas pa la dza mi snyam par 'bod pa dang / des pa phun sum tshogs par bya/ lus dang thog la mi lta bar 'artson 'grus kyig chachen po mgo par bya/ rnam par mi gas
338a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems rtse gcig du bya/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bur lta ba dang bral bar shes rab
338a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis rnam par dpyad pa la mkhas par bya/ des sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ sbyin pa sbyin par bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ tshul khrim
338a4(dkon brtsegs): bsrung bar bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ bzod pa bsgom par bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/ sems can thams
338a5(dkon brtsegs): cad yid la byas te/ bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ shes rab bsgom par bya/ sems can thams cad yid la

339a5(dkon brtsegs): rgol ba ltar dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos kyi bar chad byed pa dang / grong stong ltar bdag dang bral ba dang / rdza mkhan gyi snod ltar mthar 'jig pa dang / rngang ltar mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su

339b7(dkon brtsegs): sor brtag par bya'o/ / pha ma'i khu chu dang khrag 'dus pa las 'byung ste/ 'di la khu chu dang khrag ni lus kyi thog ma'i rgyu yin no// tha ma'i rgyu ni zas 'dzub la sogs pa ste/ kham gyis bca

344a1(dkon brtsegs): gshed ma mi mdza' 'dra yang byis pas gso// lus kyi ched du rig pa'i las kyang byed// de phyir de dag sdug bsngal tshor ba spyad// lus 'di rdo rje swA dz+ra
344a2(dkon brtsegs): sra ma yin/ / lus kyi ched du sdig pa ma byed cig/ 'chi bar rtogs nas bsod nams myur du byos// de bzhin sangs rgyas bstan la dad pa skyed// zas dang skom dang byug bgos rnams
344a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ lus 'di ji srid yun ring bsnyen bkur te// brtan par byas kyang 'jig par 'gyur yin na// 'di la 'bad pa don med ci phyir bya// bskal pa brgyar yang shin tu rnyed par dka'//
344a4(dkon brtsegs): thub pa 'byung 'di khyed kyis rnyed pa la// sangs rgyas bstan la de bzhin dad pa skyed// shin tu 'jigs pa'i ngan 'gror ma 'gro zhig/ lo stong bye bar su zhig 'tsho gyur pa// des kyang chags pa yod
344a5(dkon brtsegs): su spang bya na/ / su zhig lo brgya thub par mi 'gyur ba// de phyir dga' ba mi rnyed spyos ci dgos// ma bsdams mi rnams kha cig 'di skad du// mi rnyed shin tu dka' ba rnyed pa la// gzhon
344a6(dkon brtsegs): rtsed mo dag dang dga' bya zhing / / nor btsal bde ba myong bar bya zhes zer// nor tshol ba la bde ba ga la yod// bsrung ba'i phyir yang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// de phyir mkhas pas chaH
344a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs spangs la/ / ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes thob par byos// longs spyod sbru ma 'dra zhing rmi lam mtshungs// 'di dag byis pa'i skye bo 'drid pa yin// sad ci 'byung zhing skad cig 'dzi/
344b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// mkhas pa su zhig longs spyod sred pa skyed// sgyu ma 'dra zhing gar mkhan lha dang mtshungs// dri za'i grong khyer sna tshogs ci 'dra ba// longs spyod de dag 'di 'dra byis pa 'dri//
344b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar log pa tshol zhing byis pa 'khyam// sdug bsngal brgya yis longs spyod btsal btsal ba// lus la gnod pa mtshungs med bskyed byas nas// rgyal po'i mthu yis de dag phrogs
344b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa/ / de dag la ni mkhas gang dga' ba skyed// bu dang chung ma'i dbang du mi 'gyur bar// rgyal po nyes pa byung ba'i nor phrogs pa// nyes pa 'di 'dra de dag rig nas su// mkhas pa
344b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni khyim la sred mi skyed/ / rtag tu brnab cing longs spyod tshol byed pa// de ni pha dang ma la mi gus shing // bu dang chung ma la yang mi byams par// de dag rtag tu chags la 'jig par//
344b5(dkon brtsegs): byed// bdag gi longs spyod 'grib par 'gyur 'ong zhes// brnab mo byas gzo rnams kyang rnyed mi 'gyur// g.yo dang sgyus ni nor rnams tshol byed pa// brnab mo dag la mkhas pa yid mi rton//
344b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can brnab mo g.yo ldan 'drid pa nyid// yid gzhan sems la chog gis dga' bar byed// yid brtan kyang ni de la yid mi rton// 'on kyang bu 'drar sdug par ston par byed// sems can
344b7(dkon brtsegs): brnab mo 'jig rten gang rtsub/ / sman dang bstan bcos dag la mkhas ston ci // smad 'tshong lta bum tshig gis 'drid byed la// khong nas mi bde shin tu thub pa yin// brnab mo dag la mtha
345a1(dkon brtsegs): po rnams kyang med/ / nye du med cing snying slebs grogs kyang med// 'on kyang de dag nor phyir sten par byed// skye bo brnab la mkhas pa yid mi rton// brnab mo la
345a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod ched du bya min byed/ / shin tu mi bzad sems ni kun tu skyed// de phyir mkhas pas yang dag rtogs byas la// ngan ngon ci yang rung bas chog shes kyis// gser dang mu tig nor
345a3(dkon brtsegs): bu cu r+ya dang / / las dges de dag lbu ba las kyang 'byung // de dag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ma rtogs nas// de dag phyir ni 'thab cing rtsod par byed// byams pa zhes bya gang zhig 'dir 'byung //
345a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de ni 'byung ba'i tshe// sa 'di gser gyis rab tu gang bar 'gyur// de yi tshe na de ni ka las 'byung // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag slu ba ste// brdzun pa'i chos can
345a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul byed rmongs par byed/ / dper na sos ka'i nyi ma gung dus na// smig rgyu chur snang 'dod pa de bzhin no// bskal pa gcig lon nas ni 'jig rten 'di// nam mkha'i rang bzhin nam
345a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhar 'gyur bar 'ong / / lhun po dag kyang tshig cing rnam par 'jig/ de dag gang nas 'ongs shing gang du 'gro/ chu mig mtsheru dang rdzing dang rgya mtsho rnams// de dag med 'gyur ba ska ma 'gyur 'byung
345a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ / de bzhin 'dod pa gsog ste snying po med// mkhas pa gang dag de la dga' bar byed// mkhas pa lu shin rdza ma stobs ldan pa// de dag rtag tu khyim gyi tshum sa cho/
345b1(dkon brtsegs): ro myong bye ba su yod na// 'di dag ci phyir khyim ni spong mi byed// 'dren ma'i las kyis longs spyod tshol byed cing // bu dang de bzhin chung ma gso bar byed// shin du sdug bsngal gyur
345b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de dus na/ / bu dang chung ma skyabs su 'gyur ma yin// ji ltar sna tshogs las byas blangs pa bzhin// bu dang chung ma dag kyang 'dong par 'gyur// bdag nyid gcig pus sdug bsngal myong
345b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'ong / / de dag de tshe bdag gi skal mi len// mi ngan rnams kyis bde phyi de dag blangs// 'di ni de dag sdug bsngal mya ngan 'gyur// srid gsum 'jigs pa 'di na bshes kyang med// de
345b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin bu dang rung ma rtsa lag med/ / pha ma spun dang bu dang chung ma dang // bran dang nor dang rtsa lag tshogs kyi rnams// shi ba'i gshin phyir de dag 'gro ba med// las rnams rjes su 'brang zhing
345b5(dkon brtsegs): byis pa 'gro/ / las ni rjes su 'brang zhing mi kun 'dong // las kyi gnas pa'i 'jig rten rnams su rgyu// skye 'di las kyi bdag nyid rig gyur nas// mkhas pa dag ni dge ba'i las rnam
345b6(dkon brtsegs): byed/ / mnar med song che de dag skyabs min pas// pa ma spun dang snying sdug pu rnams dang // rtsa lag nye du snag gi gnyen mtshams dang // de dag tshad du mkhas pa sdig mi byed// las
345b7(dkon brtsegs): de yongs su zad pa ma gtogs par/ / rab tu mi bzad 'jigs la mi mi 'grol// de phyir sdig pas 'jigs pa'i mi rnams kyis// bsgoms te sdig pa yongs su ma bar bya// /
346a1(dkon brtsegs): ltar las rnams byas pa ma gtogs par// gshin rje dang ni gshin rje'i rang rta dang // mdzara' bshes dag dang rtsa lag tshogs dang na// pha ma thu dang chung sa
346a2(dkon brtsegs): srung mi byed/ / khyod kyis mi yi lus ni thob gyur la// thob nas sdig pa spang bar ma byas pas// kye ma da ltar sdug bsngal mi bzad myong // 'di ni mi dge'i las kyi rnam smin yin//
346a3(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rnam par smin la yid ma ches// khyod ni rang gi sems kyis mi dge byas// 'di la ngas ni ci yang ma lan zhes// de la chos rgyal gshin rje de skad smra// rang gis las byas
346a4(dkon brtsegs): rang la rnam par smin/ / rang gi las kyis khyod ni 'dir 'ongs kyis// ji ltar sngon chad mi 'dod las byas pa// sdug bsngal de ni nyid kyis myong bar gyis// de tshe pha ma rang gi chung ma rnams
346a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal nyen pa yongs su thar mi byed/ / legs pa'i las byas pas ni grol bar 'gyur// de ltas khyim ni yongs su spang bar bya// khu sgo dbyug pa lhung gi chad pa rnams// su zhig spong
346a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod zhi ba don gnyer bas/ / khyim la 'jigs par bgyis te snga byos la// 'jig rten mkhas pa'i bstan la chos spyod cig/ khyim ni rab 'bar sdug bsngal mang po'i rtsa// sems las byung ba
346a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis rtag du 'bar/ / ze mur 'obs 'dra 'jigs par byed pa la// mkhas pa su zhig de la sred pa skyed// khyim gnas bu dang chung ma'i mya ngan byed// khyim gnas de bzhin longs spyod mya ngan/
346b1(dkon brtsegs): byed// nyes pa 'di dang gzhan yang dpag med de// de ltas khyim ni yongs su bar bya// 'dren pa rnams kyi bstan la dka' byed pa// ma bdab ma rmongs bde dang yid 'de'i chu// rdzun/
346b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal mang po'i rtsa ba khyim 'di la// blun po dga' yi mkhas pa gzhar mi dka'// pags pa chu rgyus sha dang rus pa'i lus// 'di ni nga yi chung ma 'du shes bskyed// byis pa rmongs pa 'dod chags
346b3(dkon brtsegs): skyed par byed/ / bud med sgyu ma lta bur yong ma shes// shes rab ldan pas khyim gyi nyes rig nas// de phyir 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun spangs te// chos la sman gyi 'du shes bzhag byas nas// ma
346b4(dkon brtsegs): chags khyim nas myur du 'byung bar byed/ / de nas khyim bdag dpa' byin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
346b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ / de dag bzod pa thob nas mchog tu dga' ba dang mgu bar gyur te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// sangs rgyas chos la 'dod gyur nas// gang dag gis ni sems
346b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa/ / kye ma rnyed pa rnyed pa che// 'di ni rnyed pa kun gyi mchog/ byang chub sems ni dga' ba ste// sems can thams cad bde bgyid pa'i// sems 'dir su dag dga' bskyed pa//
346b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'tsho ba legs par 'tsho// sems can kun la phan bgyid pa'i// sems 'di gang dag bskyed gyur pa// de dag sems can thams cad dga'// de dag mthong nas dga' bar 'gyur//
347a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems la su dga' ba// de dag lus ni gser 'dra zhing // mtshan gyis shin tu sbas pa dang // 'jig rten snang ba byed par gyur// byang chub sems ni sems//
347a2(dkon brtsegs): che ste// sems kun nang na dge ba mchog/ yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs// nad kun rab tu zhi bar bgyid// sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams// byang chub sems ni 'ad
347a3(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyid/ / 'khor ba la ni mi rtog pa// byang chub sems kyis skyo bar 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang // de la gal te gzugs mchis na// nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang
347a4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ / de ni de bas lhag par 'gyur// gang+gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed kyi// sangs rgyas zhing rnams mi gang gis// rin chen dag gis rab bkang ste// 'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas//
347a5(dkon brtsegs): gang gis thal mo sbyar bgyis te// byang chub tu ni sems btud na// mchod pa 'di ni khyad par 'phags// de la mtha' ni ma mchis so// byang chub sems ni ci 'dra ba// drang srong mchog
347a6(dkon brtsegs): gis bstan mdzad pa/ / de 'dra'i mchod pa gzhan ma mchis// dpal yang gzhan ni mchis ma lags// sman gyi dam pa nad ma mchis// byang chub sems ni yon tan ldan// nad kun
347a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu zhi bar bgyid/ / sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid// mi gsum dag gis gdungs pa yi// sems can sdug bsngal mthong nas ni// bskal pa dpag tu med par spyod// mkhas nas/
347b1(dkon brtsegs): skyo bar yong mi 'gyur// gang dag byang chub spyad spyod pa// dpa' bo sman pa'i rgyal po 'dra// de dag sems can sdug bsngal skyob// smyo ba rtag tu rnam par spangs// dpa' bo sangs rgyas
347b2(dkon brtsegs): chos 'tshal ba/ / 'gro ba'i skye ba thams cad du// sems ni 'dor bar mi bgyid cing // de dag brtul zhugs de yang ston// sems 'di la ni gang dka' ba// shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog/ sangs
347b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ci 'dra de 'drar 'gyur/ / bdag cag rnyed pa legs par rnyed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom 'das rnams gang
347b4(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma byung ba 'di lta ste
347b5(dkon brtsegs): sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/ 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas su med pa dag khyab
347b6(dkon brtsegs): par byas nas/ sangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste/ nyi zla rnams kyi gzi brjid zad par byas nas slar lon/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
347b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la 'atsum te/
348a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par ni
348a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag

348a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag la gsungs/ / khyod kyis ci slad de ring 'dzum bstan gsungs// bka' mchid che ldan nor mchog sbyin mdzan pa// dbul por gyur pa nor dang ldan par mdzod// 'jig rten ljongs la myur du mig

348b1(dkon brtsegs): kun dka' bo khyim bdag 'di dag thams cad ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par

350b1(dkon brtsegs): bcad de spras pa/ khyod ni lha mo 'am dri za mo// sha za mo 'am srin mo 'am// ngas ni ji ltar gzung bar bya// nga yis dris par spros shig/ gang la mtshon gyis mi gnod pa'i/

350b7(dkon brtsegs): de spras pa/ bdag ni lha min dri za min// sha za mo min srin mo min// bdag ni btsun mo sngo bsangs can// 'jig rten mgon po'i nyan thos ma// lha khyod la ni snying brtse bas/
351a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sems ni mnyam bzhag gis// khyab bdag 'jig rten mgon po la// thugs ni rab tu dang bar mdzod// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// gang
351a2(dkon brtsegs): gis byams pa legs bsgoms te/ / byams la gnas pa'i skyes bu dang // bud med dag ni mi gsod gsungs// gang zhig lo tog smin pa la// ser ltar yang dag ji bzhin mkhyen//
351a3(dkon brtsegs): bud med rnams kyis gnod med pa// de yi bstan la bdag dga' lags// 'jig rten mgon po thams cad kyis// bud med rnams ni smad par gsungs// bud med rnams la mi lha/

351a5(dkon brtsegs): lags/ / bud med rnams la brten pa ni// kun nas bdud kyi zhags par gsungs// sdig pa rnams la chags pa ni// rkun 'jom dkrug pa'i shul dang 'dra// mi mkhas du
351a6(dkon brtsegs): med chags pa dang / / sdig pa'i las ni bgyid pa dang // ye shes spong bar 'tshal ba yis// sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror khrid// mkhas pa thar par 'tshal ba yis// bud
351a7(dkon brtsegs): med bsten par mi bgyi ste/ / zhugs bltams du ba ma mchis pa'i// dong du mchongs pa ming ngo lags// yid 'ong bka' mchid bgyis pa dang // bltas pas kyang ni 'ching bgyid
351b1(dkon brtsegs): cing / mi bzang dmyal bar lhung bas na// khyod ni bud med tshig ma gsan// bdag ni khro ba ma mchis te// bdag gi yid ni rab tu dang // khyab bdag 'jig rten mgon po la//
351b2(dkon brtsegs): thugs ni rab tu dang bar mdzod// rgyal po chen po bzhud mdzod de// khyod kyis rkang gnyis mchog gzigs la// de yis chos ni gang bstan pa// g.yel ma mchis par khyod kyis
351b3(dkon brtsegs): gson/ de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed/ btsun mo sngo bsangs can gyis bskul bas/ rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang // skye ba'o//

351b5(dkon brtsegs): po zhi pa/ thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang zhi gnas kyi mchog dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa/ bsam gtan dam pa rnams kyi pha rol tu gshegs pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon par 'phags pa/
351b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par rgyan pa/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang /
351b7(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /

352a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngon ma mthong ba'i rmad du byung ba zhig mthong ba/ bcom ldan 'das

352a6(dkon brtsegs): pas zil gyis non nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la tha ba dang zhe sdang gi sems kyang bskyed/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mchis brang sngo bsangs can bkum
352a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i slad du mda' ste'u ka nya rnga ma zhig 'phangs na/ de bar snang la 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched de/ 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur nas/ bzlog
352b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshul du slar log ste/ bdag gi g.yon rol logs su mchis par gyur cing / lus la ni ma phog nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mchis brang sngo bsangs can gyi
352b2(dkon brtsegs): sug pa rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ mchis drang sngo bsangs can la 'di skad du/ khyod lha mo zhig gam/ 'on te klu mo 'am/ dri za mo 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ srin mo 'am/

352b4(dkon brtsegs): srin mo'ang ma lags kyi/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i nyan thos mo lags te/ khyod nyid la snying brtse ba'i slad du/

352b7(dkon brtsegs): pa thob pa dang / de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / de ltar mthu che ba dang / de ltar dbang che bar grags pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
353a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas lnga spos kya tshe 'tshal snyam du sems par gyur lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di ltar byis pa la bu dang / 'di ltar rmongs pa dang / 'di ltar migs pa

355a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i srin bu dang 'dra ba/ snyings ma len pa/ 'dod pa la brkam pa/ khrel dang ngo tsha bor ba/ lha dang mi'i chos las nyams pa/ ngan par smad pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho/

357b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khogs pa/ gtugs la lus nyam chung zhing mig mi mthong ba dag la brnyas shing longs spyod med pa dang / nor med par byas nas/ rang gi khyim nas phyung ste skrod par byed do// rgyal po chen po 'di ltar pha ma

358a2(dkon brtsegs): des de'i tshe pha ma dag rang gi khyim nas phyung ste baspad nas/ gzhan gyi khyim nas blangs pa'i bud med la bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing bsti stang du byed// gces
358a3(dkon brtsegs): su byed/ rim gro byed la mchod par byed cing / yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed kyi/ pha ma la ni mi byed pa'i mi'i snying brtse ba med pa dang / mi lta ba dang / ngan pa'i sems dang ldan pa la

359a1(dkon brtsegs): bu dam pa ma yin pa'i las byed cing / log par lta ba la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ da ni dge ba dang mi dge ba gang yin zhes bdag gi don mi shes shing mi rtan pa yin pa

359b2(dkon brtsegs): chags pa'i mi rnams mang po dag/ de bzhin bde ba'i rgyu phyir 'dod pa rnams tshol ba// de dag gti mug rmongs pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ gang dag 'dod pa rnams kyi don du rtag tu ni//
