364a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams/ / rgyal ba'i bstan pa spangs nas ni// 'dod pa dman pa rnams sten pa// des ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dod pa rnams la chags myos nas// shin tu sdig pa'i las byas shing // tshul
364b1(dkon brtsegs): khrims can dag bslus byas nas/ / phyis ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// shes rab car gyis dal rnyed cing // de 'dra'i chos ni thos gyur nas// 'dod kun spangs nas 'di la ni// mkhas pa mngon byung rab byung //
364b2(dkon brtsegs): zhig/ rgyal po chen po skyes pa 'dod pa la rten pa rnams kyi skyon ni de dag yin te/ 'dod pa'i gzhi dang / 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa rnams ni/ sems can dmyar
364b3(dkon brtsegs): ba pa rnams kyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po chen po de lta bas na/ khyod kyis rtag par rgyun du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// khyod kyis lus su gtogs pa'i sems rjes su dran pa
364b4(dkon brtsegs): bsgom par bya'o/ / de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la de lta de ltar chos ston par mdzad de/ chos bstan pa des bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
364b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dra
364b6(dkon brtsegs): ji tsam du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skyes pa dang bud med rnams kyi skyon bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar de dag bka' stsal cing legs
364b7(dkon brtsegs): par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi ste/ mtshon cha spangs shing / dbyug pa spangs la
365a1(dkon brtsegs): ngo tsha mchis shing / srog chags 'byung po thams cad la snying rtse bar zhugs pa lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/
365a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas
365a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ bad sa'i rgyal
365a4(dkon brtsegs): po 'char byed kyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes
365a5(dkon brtsegs): sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ bam po gcig sh+lo kanyis brgya// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong
365a6(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu pa ste/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa/ bam po phyed do// // / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su ma ti dA ri ka pri ts+tsha na
365a7(dkon brtsegs): ma pa hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
365b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po la baban/ bya rgod kyi phung ba' ril dge slong ma nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshar
365b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ khyim bdag drag shul can gyi bu mo blo gros bzang mo zhes
365b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba btsas nas lo brgyad lon pa 'dra ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dag
365b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa zhig
365b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa de 'khor dang bcas par bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
365b6(dkon brtsegs): / la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gal te sbubs phye bdag gis ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
365b7(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis mchog/ 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa la// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang na// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yid la ci 'dod thams cad ni// bu mo khyod kyis dri bar gyis/
366a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun// ci 'dra khyod la bstan par bya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/
366a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gis su ni mdzes par 'gyur// gang gis nor ni che ba dang // mi phyed 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur// thub pas 'di ni bdag la gsungs// chos kyi rgyal po spyan sngar ni// gang gis rdzus te ste 'gyur
366a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing / / 'dab ma stong ldan pad+ma ba// mchis par yang ni gda' ba dang // zhing rnams bye ba dpag yas par// sangs rgyas phyag bgyir mchi ba yi// rdzu 'phrul pha rol phyin 'gyur ba'i// spyod pa rgyal
366a4(dkon brtsegs): bas lung bstan gsol/ / dgra zla ma mchis gang gis 'gyur// tshig kyang btsun par 'gyur ba dang // las kyi sgrib pa ma mchis dang // bdud kyi las kun ma mchis dang // 'chi ba'i dus ni bgyid pa na/
366a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // de las chos kyang nyan pa dang // sdug bsngal tshor ba myong mi 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bu mo blo gros
366a6(dkon brtsegs): bzang mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / bu mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so// bu mo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas
366a7(dkon brtsegs): bshad do/ / bu mo blo gros bzang mos/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
366b1(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mdzes par 'gyur te/ bzhi ga zhen/ 'di lta ste/ than dgra la'ang zo bar mi byed pa dang / byams pa la gnas pa dang / chos 'dod pa dang /
366b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ mdzes par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gnod pa'i rtsa ba khro ba 'phe/
366b3(dkon brtsegs): mi byed// byams la gnas par byed dang chos 'dod dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byas na ni// mdzes par 'gyur te blta bar 'os pa yin// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang
366b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan na/ nor che bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dus su sbyin pa dang / 'gyod pa med par sbyin pa dang / yid du 'ong ba sbyin pa dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med par sbyin pa ste/
366b5(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ nor che bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dus su byin dang 'gyod pa med pa dang // yid 'ong sbyin dang rnam smin mi re ba// dpa'
366b6(dkon brtsegs): bopo rnams ni las 'di byas pa na/ / rtag tu longs spyod chen po thob pa yin// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta /
366b7(dkon brtsegs): phra ma'i tshig spangs pa dang / sems can log par lta ba rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'jog par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i tshe dam pa'i chos srung ba dang
367a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'jog par byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ 'khor
367a2(dkon brtsegs): mi phyed par 'gyur ro/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ phra ma de bzhin log par lta ba spong // dam chos 'jig pa'i tshe na srung bar byed// sems can byang chub yang dag 'dzin 'jug na// 'khor rnams
367a3(dkon brtsegs): mi phyed phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ / bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad du/ rin po che chen po'i pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/
367a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phye ma 'am/ me tog ut+pa la 'am/ ku mu da 'am/ pad+ma dkar pos lag pa bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
367a5(dkon brtsegs): mchod rten la 'bul ba dang / gzhan dag la'ang gnod sems mi skyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa byed du 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang
367a6(dkon brtsegs): chub la nges pa rgya cher mos pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad du/ rin po che chen po'i pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar
367a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ phye ma me tog bkang ste 'bul ba dang // gnod sems spong zhing sku gzugs byed pa dang // mos pa rgya chen la ni gnas byed na// rgyal ba dag gi thad du/
367b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzus te ste// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan dag gi dge
367b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rtsa ba'i bar chad mi byed pa dang / gzhan dag chos nyan pa la bar chad mi byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la mar me 'bul ba dang / ting nge 'dzin sgom pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems

367b4(dkon brtsegs): gtan dag la mi smod dang / / rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag la mar me 'bul// ting 'dzin bsgoms pas de ni zhing du 'gro// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dgra zla med par 'gyur te/
367b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ g.yo med par dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la rten pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la ser sna mi byed pa dang / gzhan gyi rnyed pa la dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam
367b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bya ba dang / gnas pa thams cad la khong khro bar mi byed cing / mi snyan pa mi sgrogs pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ dgra zla med par 'gyur ro// de la 'di
367b7(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la de g.yo med// gzhan gyi rnyed pa dga' zhing ser sna med// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la mi smod na// rtag tu dgra zla med par spyod par 'gyur//
368a1(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshig btsun par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / mdza' bo dag la yod pa'i
368a2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin mi 'chab pa dang / klan ka mi tshol bar chos nyan pa dang / gzhan chos smra ba dag la 'phya sgyur mi byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ tshig btsun par 'gyur ro//

368a4(dkon brtsegs): mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ las kyi sgrib pa med par 'gyur zhing yongs su dag pa'ang myur du rtogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pa bsgrubs pas
368a5(dkon brtsegs): sdom pa gsum yang dag par len pa dang / mdo sde zab mo rnams mi spong ba dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'du shes bskyed pa dang / sems can thams
368a6(dkon brtsegs): cad la byams pa bsgom pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ las kyi sgrib pa med par 'gyur zhing yongs su dag pa'ang myur du rtogs par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces
368a7(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas sdom pa gsum la gnas// mdo sde zab mo rnams la rtag tu mos// sangs rgyas sras la thams cad mkhyen ltar lha// sems can rnams la byams pas las dag 'grur
368b1(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bdud kyi las med par 'gyur te/ ba ni gang zhe na/ 'di la ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang / sangs
368b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ bdud kyi las med par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
368b3(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la ni chos kyi tshul rtogs la// brtson 'grus gnas shing sangs rgyas rjes su dran// yongs su bsngo zhing bshags dang phyag 'tshal ba// de la bdud kyis glags ni rnyed mi 'gyur// bu mo byang chub
368b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mdun du sangs rgyas bzhugs shing / de las chos kyang nyan la sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan
368b5(dkon brtsegs): dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mos pa mang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa bkod pa sna tshogs nye bar sgrub pa dang / dkon mchog gsum mchod pa la brtson pa ste/
368b6(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mdun du sangs rgyas bzhugs shing / de las chos kyang nyan la sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad
368b7(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ de ni gzhan gyi bsam pa rdzogs byed cing // mos pa dang ni sbyin pa rgya che ba// mkhas pa de ni rtag tu sbyin par byed// de phyir de mdun de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs// de skad ces bka'
369a1(dkon brtsegs): stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i bsgrub pa ji skad/
369a2(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa 'di dag la bdag gis bslab par 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis bzhi pa bcu po ji skad du bka' stsal pa 'di dag las chos gcig gcig ma spyad na'ang / bdag gis de bzhin

369a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mo ru 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gis chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ba'i bden
369a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ lha'i me tog gi char 'bab par gyur cig/ ma dkrol bar yang sil snyan gyi sgra byung bar
369a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig ces byas so/ / de nas bu mo blo gros bzang mos de ltar bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs byas ma thag tu/ de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos
369b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i me tog gi char bab par gyur cing / ma dkrol bar lha'i sil snyan gyi sgra'ang byung bar gyur to// btsun pa po'u 'gal gyi bu bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis daltar de bzhin gshegs
369b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ji lta ba de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bdag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag la bdud

369b4(dkon brtsegs): cig/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de gsar gyi kha dog can du gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi
369b5(dkon brtsegs): bu chen po stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas
369b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas
369b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bu mo blo gros bzang mo la 'di skad ces smras so// blo gros bzang mo khyod chos gang la gnas te/ bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di byas/ blo gros bzang mos
370a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa ma mchis pas/ de la gnas par mi nus te/ 'di la dri ba ma mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bca/
370a2(dkon brtsegs): mo byang chub ces bya ba 'di gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub ces bgyi ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos kyi tshig bla dgas so// 'jam dpal gyis spras

370a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal dper na smig rgyu dang brag chas byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas kyang byang chub kyi phyir spyad do/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo khyod kyis ci las bas
370a6(dkon brtsegs): te de skad ces smras/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di la chos 'ga' la'ang bsam pa 'am/ bsam pa ma lags pa ma mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros
370a7(dkon brtsegs): bzang mo bsam pa de lta bu yin du zin na/ byis pa thams cad kyang byang chub tu 'gyur ro// blo gros bzang pos spras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du dgongs/ byis pa rnams kyang gzhan la/
370b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa rnams kyang gzhan te/ byang chub kyang gzhan par gzigs sam/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul du 'di ni dbyings gcig pa lags te/ blang ba ma mchis
370b2(dkon brtsegs): shing dor ba ma mchis la sgo btags pa ma mchis so/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mos bshad pa 'di'i don shes pa ji snyed cig yod/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa// 'jam
370b3(dkon brtsegs): dpal bshad pa 'di'i don 'tshal pa ni sgyu ma sprul pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba ji snyed mchis pa de snyed do/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo sprul pa nyid kyang med na/ de'i
370b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dang sems las byung ba lta ga la yod/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings ni mchis pa'ang ma lags/ ma mchis pa'ang ma lags te/ de bzhin gshegs
370b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang de dang 'dra'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bu mo blo gros bzang mo 'di ni zab
370b6(dkon brtsegs): mo'i bzod pa dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ bu mo blo gros bzang po yang dag par
370b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas/ bskal pa sum cu lon pa'i 'og tu gdod ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// khyod kyang bu mo blo gros bzang
371a1(dkon brtsegs): mo 'di nyid kyis mi skye ba'i chos la zhugs par byas so/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bu mo blo gros bzang mo la phyag byas nas/
371a2(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'di skad du bdag gis slob dpon yun ring po zhig na mthong ngo zhes kyang smras so// blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ma rtog cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni rnam
371a3(dkon brtsegs): par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci'i phyir slob dpon gyis bud med kyi lus las de dung bsgyur/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ni bud med do// 'di ni skyes
371a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o zhes bya ba de ni dmigs pa ste/ 'on kyang khyod kyis the tshom med pa bya'o// bden pa gang gis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
371a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas su 'gyur ba'i bden pa des bdag skyes par gyur cig/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la/ de'i bud med kyi dngos po mi snang bar gyur nas/ skyes par red de/
371a6(dkon brtsegs): chos gos ngur smrig gyon nas/ des 'di skad du bden pa gang gis bdag gis byang chub thob pa na/ dge slong tshur shog ces byas pas rab tu byung bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der
371a7(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan song gi ming yang med pa dang / bud med kyi skyon rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des bdag dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas
371b1(dkon brtsegs): lo sum cu lon pa'i spyod lam ci 'dra ba de lta bur gyur cig ces byas so/ / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang pos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la/ de dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo
371b2(dkon brtsegs): sum cu lon pa'i spyod lam ci 'dra ba de lta bur gyur to/ / 'jam dpal bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can rnams kyi lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur ba
371b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsams pas bza' ba dang btang ba 'grub par 'gyur te/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
371b4(dkon brtsegs): den ngan song gsum yongs su spangs par 'gyur ba dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa dang / rin po che'i dra bas yongs su bskor cing rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma dag gis rgyas la/ steng rin po che
371b5(dkon brtsegs): bla re bres te/ 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci 'dra ba kho na dang mnyam zhing mi lhag pa de lta bur 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des 'khor 'di gser gyi kha dog can du gyur cig ces byas
371b6(dkon brtsegs): so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang pos tshig de skad smras ma thag tu de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de gser gyi kha dog can du gyur to// de nas sa bla'i lha rnams
371b7(dkon brtsegs): kyilha'i lus kyis gcig nas gcig tu sba bsgrags shing skad kyis go bar byas te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
372a1(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa ni de lta bur 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jab dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bkar stsal pa/
372a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
372a3(dkon brtsegs): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan rin chen dpal gyi snying po zhe bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar
372a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ srog chags bye ba phrag sum cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa nyid la yang dag par
372a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas par gyur to/ / lha bye ba phrag brgyad cu ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// srog chags brgyad stong gis ni ye shes mngon par rtogs par gyur to//
372a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par 'dod pa lnga stong tsam yang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rtogs
372a7(dkon brtsegs): shing dge ba'i rtsa ba'i che ba nyid mthong nas/ de dag rang rang gi tha gos bcom ldan 'das kyi spru la gsol te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
372b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngos nas tshig 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces smras so// dge slong de dag gis dge ba'i
372b2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos ma thag tu bskal pa dgu bcu'i 'khor ba bsnyil te dor nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
372b3(dkon brtsegs): ldog par gnas par gyur to/ / de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan te/ 'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag ni bskal pacu gnyis na/ bskal pa dri ma med
372b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'od ces bya ba la/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzod par dka' ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du bskal pa gcig la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
372b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i rgyan ces bya bar thams cad ming 'thun par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
372b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la rdzu 'phrul chen po byed pa yin no// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu
372b7(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub 'dod pa gang gis bskal pa stong gi bar du thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad la/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris nas zla ba
373a1(dkon brtsegs): phyed kyi bar du lan re bklags na/ bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang mi phod/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang /

373a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i smon lam las byung ba'i mdo 'di lta bu 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ shod cig/ lhogs shig/ ston cig/ gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tu

373a6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyi chos kyi tshul thams cad med par mi 'gyur la/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di med par gyur na/ dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bas na mdo sde rin po che 'di lta bu

373b1(dkon brtsegs): 'grus brtsam par bya'o/ / 'di ni nga'i rjes su bstan pa yin no// phyis 'gyod par gyur ta ra/ 'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub 'dod pa langs bstan pa yin no/

374a1(dkon brtsegs): hen po mnyan yod na/ dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchog ces bya ba zhig gnas so// de nas dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchog mnyan yod nas byung nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/

377a1(dkon brtsegs): cad med cing mi dmigs so/ / gang ga'i mchog gang chos la mchog tu 'dzin pa med par tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de lta bu ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la tshangs

377a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su mi 'grol te/ de dag ni sdug bsngal gyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro zhes nga smra'o// gang
377a5(dkon brtsegs): ga'i mchog da ltar ram/ nga 'das pa'i phyi na'ang rung ste/ gang dag zab mo rgyud chad pa 'di lta bu'i chos ston pa de dag la/ mi gti mug pa dag gsod pa'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur te/ de ltar
377a6(dkon brtsegs): mi gti mug pa de dag log par zin pas bsad pa'i zhe sdang bskyed nas/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gang ga'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyud chad pa rgyud chad pa zhes bgyi
377a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ci'i slad du na rgyud chad pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang ga'i mchog chos 'di ni rgyud bcad pa 'am/ dbye ba 'am/ rnam par gzhig pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir rgyud
377b1(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas brtsa
377b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lha
377b3(dkon brtsegs): bu dag kyang byung nas/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bar byas te/ 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste//
377b4(dkon brtsegs): slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bla kos drag pa gcig tu gzar d+he/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsam
377b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par
377b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ngas mngon par shes te/ sa phyogs 'di
377b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa stong gis gang ga'i mchog ces bya ba kho na'i dge bsnyen ma sha stag las brtsams te chos kyi rnam grang 'di bshad do/ / dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad ni rab tu byung nas/
378a1(dkon brtsegs): phung po med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
378a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam
378a3(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di dri ma med pa zhes bya ste/ 'di dri ma med pa zhes bya bar zug zhig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na dge slong bdun brgya dang / dge slong ma bzhi brgya len pa med par zag pa rnam
378a4(dkon brtsegs): las sems rnam par grol lo/ / de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i me tog rnams dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma rnams mngon par sprul
378a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces 'di ltar grong khyer mnyan yod na dge bsnyen ma 'odi lta bu gnas la/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig smra'ang / de'i lus ngal ba
378a6(dkon brtsegs): yang mi 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar gang ga'i mchog 'di sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yun ring po nas dge ba spyad pa dang / yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad/
378a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to zhes smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin to// 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya'o
378b1(dkon brtsegs): byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ yun ring du tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchog
378b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen
378b3(dkon brtsegs): po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa gang ga'i mchog gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi
378b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ sh+lau ka brgya dang bcu'o//
378b5(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a sho ka dad ta byA ka ra Na na ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes
378b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ / bam po gcig go// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
378b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong thams cad kyang gzungs
379a1(dkon brtsegs): thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa bsgrubs pa la mkhas pa/ chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa/ stong pa nyid la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med/
379a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas pa/ smon pa med pa la gnas pa/ mi dmigs pa'i chos la gnas pa/ mi gnas par chos ston pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/
379a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' lhun po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes lhun po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen seng ge dang / byang chub
379a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' seng ge blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag bsgreng dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson dang
379a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu 'dzum zhing rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang po las 'das pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu gdung dang / byang chub sems
379a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rin chen sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen thogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkra ldan dang / byang
379a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' kha lo sgyur dang / byang chub sems dpa' la lo sgyur ba chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bden pa la dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang
379b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / skyes bu dpa pa brgyad la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas/
379b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' phug sbas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang po'i lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' chu lha'i lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros yangs pa dang /
379b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros khyad par can dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'phel dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//
379b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na gnas shing bzhugs pa la/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / rgyal po'i bka' la gtogs pa dang / blon po dang /
379b5(dkon brtsegs): sna chen po la gtogs pa dang / zhang lon gyi bu tsha dang / zhabs drung na 'khod pa dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis bsti stang du byas
379b6(dkon brtsegs): bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa 'di lta ste/ tshangs par spyod pa
379b7(dkon brtsegs): thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba rab tu ston
380a1(dkon brtsegs): to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa
380a2(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang /
380a3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yang nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po rnams snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ chos gos dang sham thabs bgos
380a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ lhung bzed thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// de nas nyan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por
380a5(dkon brtsegs): mthar chags su bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing / mthar gyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar 'khod do// yang de'i tshe rgyal
380a6(dkon brtsegs): pom skyes dgra'i pho brang na bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa zhes bya ba btsas nas lo bcu gnyis lon pa 'dra ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po
380a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub
380b1(dkon brtsegs): las phyir mi ldog pa de rang gi pha'i khang bzangs na khri gser gyi rkang pa can yod pa la 'dug par gyur to/ / de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong nas khri de las ma
380b2(dkon brtsegs): langs te/ bsur yang mi 'gro/ phyug kyang mi byed/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan yang mi 'ding / bsod snyoms kyang mi 'bul bar kha rog ste 'dug go// de nas rgyal po
380b3(dkon brtsegs): ma skyes dgras/ nyan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs zhes thos nas/ rang gyi khang bzangs kyi snga gang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag la mchog
380b4(dkon brtsegs): tu sdug par 'dzin pas/ mngon par dga' zhing stan yang bting ngo // rgyal po ma skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong bzhin du kha rog ste 'dug pa mthong
380b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
380b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i nyan thos chen po ste/ che ba nyid kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par
380b7(dkon brtsegs): kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa/ snying brtse ba can yin te/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i
381a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu bar khyod kyis mi shes sam/ ci na khyod kyis de dag mthong la/ mthong bzhin du khri las kyang mi ldang / bsu bar yang mi byed
381a2(dkon brtsegs): phyag kyang mi 'tshal/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms la'ang spyan mi 'dren/ dad pa dang gus pa'ang mi skyed par/ ci'i phyir ma gus pa ston cing kha rog ste 'dug/ khyod kyis don
381a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang ci zhig mthong / de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ rang gi pha rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so// yab 'di ji snyam du dgongs/ ci 'khor
381a4(dkon brtsegs): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rgyal phran la ldang ngam/ bsur mchi ba nam yang gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci
381a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha gzhan dag la ldang ngam/ bsur mchi 'am/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mes smras pa/ yab ci mi bajed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha gzhan dag
381a6(dkon brtsegs): la ldang ngam/ bsur mchi 'am/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci rgya mtsho chen po mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / nu mig dang / mtsho bran dang /
381a7(dkon brtsegs): lteng ka dang / khrom pa la phyag 'tshal ba gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos spras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci ri'i rgyal po ri rab ri nag po
381b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la 'dud pa 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar
381b2(dkon brtsegs): ma'i tshogs srin bu me khyer gyi 'od 'dod pa gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge wa la ldang ba
381b3(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ bsur mchi ba gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab de bzhin du su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
381b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags la/ dman pa la mos pa'i nyan thos wa lta bur gyur pa/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen
381b5(dkon brtsegs): po dang bral ba dag la dga' zhing ldang ba 'am/ bsur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ bkur sti bgyid/ yab chos kyi rgyal po chen po su zhig chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa
381b6(dkon brtsegs): bskor tam/ skor bar bgyid pa na/ nyan thos dman pa/ zhan pa/ zhum pa/ nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la dga' bas phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ 'dud par bgyid/ yab
381b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bdag po lha'i dbang po lta bu su zhig rnam par dag pa'i lha'i bdag po don du gnyer ba na/ dge ba chung ba'i lha lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ ldang /
382a1(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am/ bsur mchi bar bgyid/ yab mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lta bu su zhig 'jig rten na tshangs pa'i snga gang bla na med pa don du gnyer ba na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
382a2(dkon brtsegs): chung ba'i tshangs pa lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ ldang ba 'am/ bsur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab su zhig ye shes rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa/ mi mnyam pa
382a3(dkon brtsegs): dang mnyam pa'i chos rtogs pa 'chol ba na/ ba lang gyi rmig rjes kyi chu lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ ldang ba 'am/ bsur mchi ba 'am/ phyag
382a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab su zhig ri rab lta bu'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku don du nyer ba na/ yungs 'bru lta bu'i ting nge
382a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gyi stobs dang ldan pa'i nyan thos dag la ldang ba 'am/ bsur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ 'dud pa 'am/ 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ yab su zhig sangs rgyas bcom
382a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba nyid shes rab dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes dang / yon tan nyi ma dang zla ba'i snang ba dpag tu med pa lta bu thos nas/ srin bu me khyer gyi 'od lta bu'i
382a7(dkon brtsegs): rang gi rgyud la snang ba gnas pa/ gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dag gi rnam par grol ba la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su ma
382b1(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das kyang / nyan thos rnams la phyag mi 'tshal nA/ bzhugs bzhin du lta ci smos/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ su zhig zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor btang ste/ srin bu me khyed
382b2(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab gang nyan thos la rten pa ni nyan thos kyi sems dang gnas par 'gyur ro// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang sten na thams cad mkhyen pa rin/
382b3(dkon brtsegs): po che'i sems bskyed pa dang gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar khyod nyan thos 'di dag mthong bzhin
382b4(dkon brtsegs): du mi ldang zhing bsur mi 'gro la/ phyag mi 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur mi byed de/ 'di dag stan dang bsod snyoms la spyan mi 'dren pa ni/ bu mo khyod lhag pa'i nga rgyal can zhig go/
382b5(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ rang gi brgyal po ma skyes dgral 'di skad ces smras so// yab bdag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can ma lags so// de ci
382b6(dkon brtsegs): slad du zhe na/ yab khyod nyid grong khyer gyi dbul po rnams la mi bzhengs/ bsur mi bzhud/ stan mi 'ding ba lags na/ khyod nyid lhag pa'i nga rgyal can lags pa snyam bgyid
382b7(dkon brtsegs): do/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de dag ni nga dang mtshungs pa ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa ni/ nyan thos dang
383a1(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang mtshungs pa ma lags so/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nga rgyal dang dregs pa spangs te/ sem
383a2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar mi byed dam/ bu mos smras pa/ yab byang chub sems dpa' ni/ khon du 'dzin pa dang / tha ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod
383a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / nyes pa spang ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sems can thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo// yab nyan thos chen po 'di dag
383a4(dkon brtsegs): la ni khon du 'dzin pa dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / nyes pa spang ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du tha ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang /
383a5(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa bsal bar bgyi ba'ang ma mchis/ spang bar bgyid pa dang / dge ba 'phel bar bgyi ba'ang ma mchis te/ yab nyan thos thams cad la ni sangs rgyas 'bum gyis nyan thos
383a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul khrims ji snyed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa dang / shes rab ji snyed pas chos bstan du lags kyang / yab de dag la ni tshul khrims kyang ga las mchis/ ting nge 'dzin
383a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang ga las mchi/ shes rab kyang ga las mchi/ rnam par grol ba'ang ga las mchi/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'ang ga las mchi/ yab 'di lta ste/ dper na bum
383b1(dkon brtsegs): pa chab kyis bltams pa'i nang du char bab na/ de chab kyi thigs pa gcig kyang mi len la/ der gnas par yang mi 'gyur ro// yab de bzhin du nyan thos rnams la gal te sangs rgyas
383b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bum gyis chos bshad du lags kyang / de dag 'dzin par yang mi 'gyur la/ tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i
383b3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mthong ba'ang de dag la gnas par mi 'gyur zhing / rnam par 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur ro// yab 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu klung thams cad dang / char gyi
383b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyun thams cad 'dzin cing / der gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// yab byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya
383b5(dkon brtsegs): mtsho lta bu de dag kyang de bzhin te/ chos thams cad bstan pa'i chu thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing / chos bstan pa thams cad de la yang dag par gnas so// de ci'i slad du/
383b6(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi snod de ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du'o// de la 'di
383b7(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste/ ma skyes dgra yi bu mor gyur pa ni// mya ngan mang byin yon tan zi brjid brgyan// nyan thos lnga brgya dag ni lpags gyur kyang // de la phyag bya'i phyir ni dam langs/
384a1(dkon brtsegs): ma skyes dgra yis de la smras pa ni// bu mo don 'di nga las mnyan par gyis// khyod kyis nyan thos lnga brgya mthong bzhin du// phyag bya'i phyir ni ci phyir ldang mi byed// bu mo mya ngan//
384a2(dkon brtsegs): med kyis byin na re// nyan thos 'di dag bdag gis mthong ba na// ci phyir phyag 'tshal bsam pa mi skye ba// bdag mchis yab cig tshig ni gsan par gsol// dper na mi zhig rgya mtshor ma chi/
384a3(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang // rin chen 'byung khung nas ni mching bu blangs// de bzhin bdag ni nyan thos thams cad kyang // ye shes dbyings nas nyan thos blangs snyam bgyid// dper na rgyal po nor gyi dbang phyug
384a4(dkon brtsegs): po/ / sa bdag 'khor los sgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas// kar sha pa Na gcig tsam gsol na ni// de yis rgyal po bstan pa don ma mchis// gang gis 'khor los sgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas//
384a5(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag stong gsol ba bgyis na ni// des ni dbul mang nor dang ldan par bgyid// des ni rgyal po legs par bsten pa lags// kar sha pa Na slong ba'i mi bzhin du// gang zhig sangs rgyas
384a6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan mtha' yas rnams/ / thos nas theg pa dman la 'dod skyed pa// nyan thos kun la bdag ni de snyam bgyid// nor rnams sgrub bgyid mi ni ji lta ba// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de
384a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ste/ / rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po mnyes bgyis shing // byang chub reg nas sems can 'dul bar bgyid// dper na nad pa nad brgyas gzir rnams sman pa yis// grol bgyid de bzhin gzhan
384b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi sgra phyir 'brang ba yi/ / nyan thos nyon mongs rnams kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang // byang chub sems dpa' sman pa lta bus grol bar bgyid// sems can mang po grol bgyid sman pa btang
384b2(dkon brtsegs): nas ni/ / sos gyur sems can la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid// de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman par gnyer ba na// sos gyur nyan thos la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid// ji ltar nad pa sos
384b3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa thams cad la/ / sman pa dag gis gso bar nus par mi 'gyur ba// de bzhin nyan thos thams cad sos par gyur pa la// sangs rgyas sman pa dag gis gso bar mi spyod do// 'di
384b4(dkon brtsegs): na sman pa gang zhig bdag gis bdag nyid la/ / gso bar sems kyi sems can gzhan la ma lags te// de 'dra'i bdag nyid khengs par bgyid pa'i nga rgyal gyi// sman pa de dag la ni 'dod pa'i
384b5(dkon brtsegs): sems mi skyed/ / sman pa gang zhig snying rje bskyed nas bdag nyid ji lta bar// de bzhin pha rol rnams kyang nad las grol bgyid pa// de ni mchod par 'os shing bsngags par bgyi ba dang // 'jig
384b6(dkon brtsegs): rten kun gyis gdud par bgyi ba'i gnas kyang lags/ / gang gis ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas// bdag nyid grol par bgyid kyi sems can gzhan ma lags// de ni sman pa
384b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid grol bar bgyid pa ltar/ / mkhas pa dag gis mchod par bgyi ba'i gnas ma lags// gang gis ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas// sems can grangs med sdug bsngal
385a1(dkon brtsegs): dag las grol bgyid pa/ / de dag byang chub mchog la 'dun pa skyed pa ste// de ni 'jig rten kun gyis bsngags par bgyi ba lags// e ran nga yi shing sdong mdzes pa/
385a2(dkon brtsegs): ma lags la// de dag rnams kyi grib ma'ang yangs pa ma lags te// e ran de ye shing 'dra nyan thos thams cad kyi// rnam par grol ba'i grib ma nye bar bstan ma lags// tsan dan mchog gi/
385a3(dkon brtsegs): sdong chen dag ni tsha ba yis// gdungs pa'i skye bo rnams kyis nye bar bsten pa lags// de bzhin bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag gi don bgyid
385a4(dkon brtsegs): snyam/ / ba lang rmig rjes chu ni yangs ma lags// tsha bas gdungs pa zhi bar mi bgyid la// gang+gA'i klung ni sems can bye ba stong // tshim par bgyis nas rgya mtsho chen por mchi// ba lang rmig/
385a5(dkon brtsegs): rjes chu 'dra'i nyan thos kun// sems can kun gyi tsha bzhi mi bgyid// gang+gA'i klung 'dra'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems can mtha' yas chos kyis tshim par bgyid// ji ltar rin chen//
385a6(dkon brtsegs): char ni 'beb pa na// dbul po dag ni 'gron bu len par bgyid// gang zhig nor mang de dag blangs nas ni// sems can dbul po nor dang ldan par bgyid// de ltar sangs rgyas rin chen
385a7(dkon brtsegs): chos char 'bebs/ / nyan thos rnams ni dam chos rin chen las// chung ngu 'dzin te byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems can don slad mang du len par bgyid// ji ltar sems can
385b1(dkon brtsegs): / dag ni ri rab kyi// drung du mchis na gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur// ri bo gzhan la sems can rnams mchis na// gser gyi kha dog can du yong mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ri rab
385b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin/ / gang dag mthus ni lhar bcas skye dgu rnams// rnam grol mdog tu kha dog gcig tu 'gyur// nyan thos rnams kyi ye shes 'dod mi bgyid// yab cig ji ltar rtswa bran rtse mo yi// zil
385b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i thigs pas lo tog rgyas mi bgyid/ / rab tu khebs pa'i sprin gyis sa steng 'dir// nim par bgyid cing lo tog 'phel bar bgyid// nyan thos thams cad zil pa'i thigs pa bzhin//
385b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rab khebs sprin dang 'dra// snying rje mngon byas gang dag bsten na ni// stong gsum dam chos chu yis tshim par bgyid// ka ra bI ra'i me tog dri mchog min// des ni skyes
385b5(dkon brtsegs): pa bud med dga' mi 'gyur/ / tsam pa ka yi me tog dri la dga'// ut+pal bar shi ka yang de bzhin no// nyan thos ka ra bI ra'i dri bzhin te// de dag shes pas skye dgu dga' mi 'gyur// kun
385b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen dri can byang chub sems dpa' la/ / lha dang mi rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// gcig pu mchi ba de la mtshar ci mchis// gang zhig sems can mtha' yas khrid pa rmad// nyan thos mi
385b7(dkon brtsegs): reng gcig pu mchi ba bzhin/ / byang chub sems dpa' dag ni ded dpon 'dra// mgron zhig gzhan gyis sbal ba 'tshal ba dang // skye bo kun la stsol bgyid kun mgron bzhin// sgra 'brang nyan
386a1(dkon brtsegs): thos kun ni mgron dang 'dra/ / byang chub sems dpa' kun la mgron bgyid bzhin// gzings la brten pas chu bo chen po las// gzhan dag bskal par nus par mi 'gyur gyi/
386a2(dkon brtsegs): brtan bgyis gru yi mang du zhug na ni// sems can bye ba mang po sgrol bar bgyid// nyan thos gzings la rten pa lta bu ste// sems can gzhan dag sgrol bar ji ltar nus// rdzogs pa'i byang chub
386a3(dkon brtsegs): grur zhugs byang chub sems/ / sdug bsngal mtsho las sems can sgrol bar bgyid// ji ltar g.yul ngor bong bu zhon na ni// dgra las rgyal bar nus par mi 'gyur gyi// glang chen rta dang shing rta zhon
386a4(dkon brtsegs): na ni/ / g.yul du lhags pa'i dgra rnams choms par nus// nyan thos rnams ni bong bu zhon pa bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' glang chen zhon 'dra ste// sems can kun la phan dang bde slad du//
386a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag shing dbang drung du bdud kyang 'joms// ji ltar bar snang skar mas rgyas gyur kyang // de dag gis ni mtshan mo mdzes mi 'gyur// zla ba rab tu rgyas pa shar bas ni// mtshan mo mkha' la thig le
386a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du mdzes/ / yab cig nyan thos 'di dag skar ma 'dra// rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bzhin// gang dag sems can kun la sman slad du// ye shes shar bas skye bo snang bar bgyid//
386a7(dkon brtsegs): yab cig srin bu me khyer tshogs 'od kyis// las rnams la ni 'jug par mi nus kyi// 'dzam gling 'di na nyi ma'i 'od rnams kyis// byang ba sna tshogs brgya dag bgyid par 'gyur// nyan thos 'di dag
386b1(dkon brtsegs): srin bu me khyer 'dra/ / de dag shes 'od yang dag mthong mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnam grol nyi ma lta bu yi// shes rab ye shes kyis ni sems can 'grol// yab cig wa brgya dag gis skad phyung yang/
386b2(dkon brtsegs): ridags tshogs rnams 'drog par mi 'gyur gyi// seng ge'i skad kyis glang chen ri dgas dang // byar bcas rnams kyang phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur// yab cig de ltar nyan thos wa 'drar gzigs/
386b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag skad kyis bdud rnams skrag mi 'gyur// rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod spyad pas// bdud dang de bzhin bdud ris skrag par 'gyur// yab cig rgyu 'di bdag gis mthong bas na//
386b4(dkon brtsegs): theg pa dman pa dag la 'dod mi skyed// su zhig bla med byang chub spangs nas ni// theg pa dman la 'dod pa skyed par bgyi// gang dag byang chub dam pa yongs spangs nas// theg pa dman
386b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ / de dag 'tsho ngan rnyed pa thob ma gyur// de dag mir skyes pa ni nyes par mchi// gang dag lhar bcas 'jig rten sman slad du// byang chub mchog la 'dun pa skyed
386b6(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid/ / de dag legs 'tsho rnyed pa legs par rnyed// de dag mi lus thob po legs par mchis// gang dag lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // 'jig rten sman slad las bgyid yin kyang
386b7(dkon brtsegs): rton/ / gang dag rtag tu sems can sman slad brtson// de dag u dum pa ra'i me tog bzhin// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di dag
387a1(dkon brtsegs): thos nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma bu mo 'di spobs pa thogs pa med pa zhig na/
387a2(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa thob bam/ ma thob pa bdag gis 'di brtag par byar nges so snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// ci bu mo
387a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyud nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam/ smras pa/ ma yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam/ smras pa/ ma yin ro// bu mo khyod ci zhig
387a4(dkon brtsegs): don du nyer na/ 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par byed/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gal te bdag chos 'ga' zhig don du gnyer na ni/ bdag seng ge'i sgra ci'ang mi sgregs pa
387a5(dkon brtsegs): zhig na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar bdag ni chos gang yang don du mi gnyer te/ de'i phyir bdag seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci bu mo khyod theg pa la yang
387a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs sam zhes zer ba ni/ btsun pa shA ri'i bus chos gang mngon sum du byas pa'i chos de la ni/ ci nyan thos zhes bya ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs
387a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i theg pa rnam par gzhag pa yod dam/ gnas padan shA ri'i bus spras pa/ bu mo chos de la ni theg pa rnam par gnag pa med de// chos de ni 'di ltar mtshan nyid med
387b1(dkon brtsegs): par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/ / bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la don du gnyer ba ci zhig yod/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo chos de la ni don du gnyer ba ci'ang med do//
387b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas brnyan shA ri'i bus/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la bye brag ni ci yod/ tha dad du
387b3(dkon brtsegs): dbya ba ni ci yod/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang dben pa nyid la bye brag ni ci yod/ tha dad du dbye ba ni ci yod/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba
387b4(dkon brtsegs): ci'ang med do/ / bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang dben pa nyid la ji ltar bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci'ang med pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
387b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la'ang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba med do// btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' dang bla gab med pa la'ang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci
387b6(dkon brtsegs): med do/ / btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la'ang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci'ang med do// gnas brtan shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur
387b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo ci khyod de skad ces zer ba las na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam
388a1(dkon brtsegs): ni shin tu ches lhag pa zhig tu mthong la/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams ni shin tu dman par mthong ngam cin/ khyod nyan thos chen po rnams mthong na ldang bar yang mi byed/ phyag
388a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'tshal/ bsur yang mi 'gro/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms la'ang spyan 'dren par mi byed/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ gnas brtan mo
388a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na skar ma'i gzugs su gtogs pa ji snyed cig yod pa shes sam/
388a4(dkon brtsegs): mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ bu mo snyoms par zhugs na ni kho bos grangs shes kyi/ snyoms par ma zhugs na ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin
388a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas ni lan cig mnyam par bzhag pa nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
388a6(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'ang rab tu mkhyen na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi lta ci smos te/ btsun pa
388a7(dkon brtsegs): moru 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang nyan thos rnams kyi khyad par yin te/ 'di ni tha dad du dbye ba yin no// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ sangs
388b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing 'jig pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'chags pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po
388b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ ma 'ongs pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ da ltar bzhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes
388b3(dkon brtsegs): so/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ zhe sdang la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ gti mug la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod
388b4(dkon brtsegs): cha mnyam pa la spyod pa ni ji snyed ci yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can
388b5(dkon brtsegs): ni ji snyed cig yod/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so//
388b6(dkon brtsegs): bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba ni ji skad cig yod/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems
388b7(dkon brtsegs): can ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed
389a1(dkon brtsegs): cig yod/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ ma nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so//
389a2(dkon brtsegs): bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshegs pas ni de dag dang / gzhan yang de'i gong du gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyen na/
389a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can gzhan dag gi lta ci smos te/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla ma'i khyad par yin no// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa
389a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan gyis/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
389a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ shing ljon pa thams cad las can
389a6(dkon brtsegs): dan sbrul gyi snying po'i spos gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyab par 'gyur ba'i spos kyi ngad ldang ba yod pa der song zhig/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ bu mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing
389a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i ming yang da kho bos gdod thos na/ sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir ji ltar 'gro bar bya/ de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas khri de las ma langs bzhin tshig 'di skad ces smras
389b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed ma thag tu nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnod pa lta na/ bden pa dang
389b2(dkon brtsegs): bden pa'i tshig des de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer des bdag nyid dang / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ston par gyur cig/ tsan dan gyi dri de dag kyang
389b3(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos chen po 'di dag gis tshor bar gyur cig ces byas so/ / de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs des/ bcom ldan 'das de
389b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer gyis/ de nyid kyi tshe 'od gang gis nyan thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
389b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer de chos ston cing bzhugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od sku las bkye'o/ / chos bstan pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi mthus
389b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir thos so/ / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di khyab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer des kyang gsung
389b7(dkon brtsegs): gi yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i tshig gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po
390a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed ma thag tu nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bya rgod kyi phung po la/
390a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri tshor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tsan dad sbrul gyi snying po'i dri 'di ga las byung lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
390a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'dis nyan thos chen po rnams kyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags te
390a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas nyan thos chen po de dag la bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer byang chub sems dpa' sems
390a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams la chos ston cing bzhugs pa'ang bstan/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de'i tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par byas so//
390a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po mkhas pa su zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems
390a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po dag gi cho 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu dag mthong ngam/ thos na/ nyan thos dman pa/ zhan pa/ zhum pa/ nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan
390b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la ldang ba 'am/ bsur 'gro ba'am/ phyag 'tshal bar byed/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de ji tsam du thag ring ba shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras
390b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gal te khyed 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul can sha stag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dper na bu
390b3(dkon brtsegs): ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bdam bu'i tshal lam/ 'bras sA lu'i zhing bzhin du mtshams med par gang bar gyur nas/ de dag thams cad kyis bskal par brtsis kyang 'jig rten
390b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba de sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig 'das pa'i pha rol na 'dug pa bgrang ba'i thabs kyis rtogs par mi nus so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
390b5(dkon brtsegs): spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer gyis 'od de dag mi snang bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang mi snang bar mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/ bu mo mya ngan
390b6(dkon brtsegs): med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bu mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de sngon mthong ngam/ bu
390b7(dkon brtsegs): mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar nus sam/ de bzhin gshegs pas/ gang dag nga la gzugs su mthong // gang dag nga la sgrar shes pa// log
391a1(dkon brtsegs): pas spong bar zhugs pa ste/ / skye bo de dag nga mi mthong // sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid lta// 'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku// chos nyid shes par bya min pas// de ni rnam par shes mi
391a2(dkon brtsegs): nus/ / zhes ma gsungs sam/ btsun pa 'od srungs rin po gzhan yang bu mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa na
391a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngam zhes de skad zer ba ni/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong mod kyi/ sha'i mig gis ma yin te/ gzugs su ma yin no// lha'i mig gis ma yin te/
391a4(dkon brtsegs): tshor bar ma yin no// shes rab kyi mig gis ma yin te/ 'du shes su ma yin no// chos kyi mig gis ma yin te/ 'du byed du ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi mig gis ma yin te/ rnam par shes par ma
391a5(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / btsun pa 'od srungs chen po gzhan yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ dper na gnas brtan gyis ma rig pa dang srid pa la sred pa mthong ba bzhin no// btsun pa 'od srungs
391a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po gzhan yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ dper na gnas brtan gyis ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa mthong ba bzhin no// gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo
391a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar ma rig pa dang srid pa la sred pa dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa'i chos 'di gnyis ni med pa yin no// chos gang med pa de ni blta bar mi nus so// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa
391b1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po de de bzhin no// chos thams cad ni med pa yin te/ de dag ni blta bar mi nus so// 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ci sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang med dang / bu mos
391b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ gnas brtan sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang rung ste/ chos 'ga' zhig yongs su grub par 'dod dam/ 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni sa
391b3(dkon brtsegs): so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la'ang yongs su grub par mi 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lta ci smos/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po chos gang dag yongs su grub pa med pa'i
391b4(dkon brtsegs): chos de dag ci yod pa yin nam/ 'on te med pa yin/ 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo med pa de dag ni med pa yin no// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po de bas na/ chos thams cad ni
391b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa nyid do/ / med pa gang yin pa de dag la ni lta ba rnam par sbyang bar bya ba med do// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas la lta ba rnam par sbyang bar 'dod pas ni bdag
391b6(dkon brtsegs): la lta ba rnam par sbyang bar bya'o/ / 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag la lta ba ji ltar rnam par dag par 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po gang gi tshe bdag rang bzhin
391b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin med pa nyid du mos na/ de tsam gyis na bdag la lta ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag gi rang bzhin ci yin/
392a1(dkon brtsegs): bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po bdag gi rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid do// bdag gi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ bdag dben pa'ang yin no// rang bzhin med pa des bdag
392a2(dkon brtsegs): dben no/ / rang bzhin med pa des chos thams cad dben no// 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis su las chos thos na/ 'di ltar khyod kyi yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes par gyur/ bu mo
392a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i lta ba skye ba la ni rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis yod de/ gzhan gyi sgra dang / bdag nyid kyi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las 'byung ngo // zhes de skad gsungs so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun
392a4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'od srungs chen po gang dag gzhan gyi dring 'dzeg pa'i shes rab can de dag ni gzhan gyi sgra dang tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa las lta ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa 'od srungs chen po gang
392a5(dkon brtsegs): dag gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes rab can dag ni gzhan gyi sgra mi 'tshol lo/ / btsun pa 'od srungs chen po ji ltar na dge slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin/ 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/
392a6(dkon brtsegs): bu mo gang gi tshe dge slong ji skad thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la nye bar rtog par byed pa de ltar na dge slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems
392a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dang lhan cig gnas kyang sems can du 'du shes skyed par rmi/
392b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ni sngon gyi mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no// chos thams cad ni
392b2(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no/ / chos thams cad ni da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no zhes/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba de lta bus sbyor bar mi byed na/ de tsam gyis
392b3(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no/ / 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo chos de dag la dziltar sbyar bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po ji ltar de bzhin nyid
392b4(dkon brtsegs): la sbyor ba'ang med/ mi sbyor ba'ang med par mthong ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar mthong na chos thams cad mthong ba yin/ bu mos smras
392b5(dkon brtsegs): pa btsun pa 'od srungs chen po chos thams cad la gnyis su med par mthong la/ mi 'byed cing 'jig par yang mi byed na/ de ltar na chos thams cad mthong ba yin no// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po mthong
392b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de ni mthong ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ / 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen pos ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du ba

393a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad blta bar bya'o/ / gtam de skad du brjod pa'i skabs su gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu
393a2(dkon brtsegs): mo khyod kyi spobs pa 'di 'dra ba ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor rnyed pa las ni spobs par mi 'gyur gyi gang gis ci'ang ma
393a3(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa de spobs pa dang ldan zhing / gang gis nang ngam phyi rol ci'ang mi dmigs pa de spobs pa dang ldan pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo gang ma rnyed na spobs pa dang ldan pa yin/ bu
393a4(dkon brtsegs): mos smras pa/ gang gis bdag ma rnyed cing gzhan ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa ma
393a5(dkon brtsegs): yin/ zag pa med pa ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma
393a6(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa ma rnyed la/ so so'i skye bo'i chos mi dmigs shing / 'phags pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mi dmigs na/ btsun pa rab
393a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byor de ltar na gang gis cirang ma rnyed pa sobs pa dang ldan pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ji ltar spobs par 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gyis ji ltar chos thabs
393b1(dkon brtsegs): cad ma rnyed pa de bzhin du de spobs par 'gyur ro/ / chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang gis gnas brtan nyon mongs pa med pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid de ci brjod cing smrar rung ngam/ nyon
393b2(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa med pa de dang / chos kyi de bzhin nyid de la ci spobs pa ci'ang yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa dang de bzhin nyid ni bstan pa 'am/ brjod par mi nus so// bu

393b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bu mo mos so// bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ci brag cha la spobs pa ci'ang yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo de ni med de/ bu mo rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las sgra 'byung
393b6(dkon brtsegs): bar zad do/ / bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor brten nas sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa de la ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa ci'ang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang brten nas byung ba de la ni skye ba
393b7(dkon brtsegs): ci'ang med pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo chos thams cad ni brten nas 'byung ba'o// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bas na chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o// rab
394a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yin na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni 'das te gshegs
