394a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bstan du med ce na/ da ni bstan kyang rung ma bstan kyang rung dngos po ma yin te/ dngos po med pa dang brjod du med pa'i mtha' mi spong ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod ni khyim
394a6(dkon brtsegs): na gnas bzhin du 'di lta bu'i chos la gnas shing / 'di lta bu'i rnam pa dag ston pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni khyim/
394a7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba zhes gzung bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni bsam pas phye ba yin/ shes rab kyis bye ba yin/ ye shes kyis phye ba yin pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa rab 'byor/
394b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa khyod kyis shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis shod cig dang / kho bos mnyan to// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
394b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad dang ldan na khyim pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba zhes mi bya ste/ spyod lam gang dang gang gis gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ btsun
394b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir ro//
394b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa'i phyir byams pa la gnas pa'ang yin no// 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang / spyod pa dang bral ba'i phyir snying rje chen po la gnas pa'ang yin no//
394b5(dkon brtsegs): lus dang sro ka la mi lta ba'i phyir btang snyoms la gnas pa'ang yin no// yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa shin tu rdzogs pa'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa'ang yin no// lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'i//
394b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba'ang yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'chol ba la brtson pas chog mi shes pa'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa'ang yin no// bzod pa shin tu thob pa'i
394b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir ma bstan par shes pa'ang yin te/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na khyim pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba zhes mi bya ste/ spong lam gang
395a1(dkon brtsegs): dang gang gis gnas kyang thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ro/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras
395a2(dkon brtsegs): so/ / bu mo khyod ma la khri gser gyi rkang pa can la 'dug cing / stan shin du mtho ba la 'dug nas/ nyan thos chen po dag dang gtam zer ba de ni rung ba ma yin par gnas pa yin no// bu mo mi na bar stan mthon po
395a3(dkon brtsegs): la 'dug pa la stan dma' ba la 'dug pas chos bshad par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ci khyod kyis ma thos sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la 'di
395a4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa sgra gcan zin 'jig rten na gang dag ni rung ba yin/ 'jig rten na gang dag ni rung ba ma yin pa khyod kyis shes sam/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo kho bos shes
395a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la slob cing / bslab pa de las 'gal bar mi byed pa de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o// gang dag bslab pa de las 'gal bar byed pa de dag ni rung ba ma yin pa zhes
395a6(dkon brtsegs): bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin thong de skad ma zer cig/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la slob pa de dag ni rung ba ma yin pa'o//
395a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni rnyog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa sgra gcan zin rung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa rnams kyi tshig tha dgas
395b1(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de dag ni bslab pa las 'gal bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni bslab pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir te/ de dag ni phyir yang bslab par
395b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa ma yin pas de dag ni rung ba ma yin no/ / de dag khams gsum du phyir mi 'ong ba yin/ de dag ni bslab pa las yang dag par 'das pa yin te/ mi slob pa zhes bya'o// de ltar na de dag gi
395b3(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa ni mi dmigs te/ khams gsum pa btags pa tsam du shes so// de'i phyir de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o// sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo rung ba dang rung ba ma yin pa la tha dad du dbye ba
395b4(dkon brtsegs): ci zhig yod/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin 'di lta ste/ dper na gser dngul rgyan du byas pa dang / rgyan du ma byas pa la tha dad du dbye ba ci zhig yod/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/
395b5(dkon brtsegs): bu mo tha dad du dbye ba ci'ang med do// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin de bzhin du rung ba dang rung ba ma yin pa la'ang yi ge'i tha snyad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir tha dad du dbye ba ci'ang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe
395b6(dkon brtsegs): na/ chos thams cad ni ci dang yang bral ba'i phyir te/ rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin no// btsun pa sgra gcan zin yang 'di skad du stan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug ste chos nyan tam zhes
395b7(dkon brtsegs): ber ba la/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rtswa bting ba la 'dug kyang shin tu mtho ba la 'dug pa yin no// sgra gcan zin gyis spras pa/ rnam grangs gang gis khyod de skad sA/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun
396a1(dkon brtsegs): ba s+tha gcan zin 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpas gang la 'dug ste byang chub thob par gyur/ sgra gcan zin gyis spras pa/ rtsa bting ba la bzhugs nas byang chub
396a2(dkon brtsegs): thob bo/ / bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin ci byang chub sems dpa' rtsa bting ba la 'dug pa la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na tshangs pa'am/ brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten
396a3(dkon brtsegs): skyong ngam/ de las gzhan pa'i 'og min man chad kyi lha gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis lus btud de thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la gtug par byed dam/ sgra gcan zin gyis
396a4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bu mo de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin no// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang / dper na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
396a5(dkon brtsegs): po rtsa bting ba la 'dug kyang stan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug pa yin gyi/ nyan thos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pa ni de lta ma yin par rig par bya'o// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras
396a6(dkon brtsegs): bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bu mo btsun pa sgra gcan zin ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de nyid kyi sras yin te/ bslab pa 'dod pa rnams kyi ni mchog yin na/
396a7(dkon brtsegs): ci khyod kyis mi shes sam/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ yab thong zhig thong zhig/ 'di ltar btsun pa spa gcan zin/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i sras yin zhes ma
396b1(dkon brtsegs): gsungs shig/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can cod pan btag pa lta bus wa skyed par 'gyur ba nam yang gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no//
396b2(dkon brtsegs): bu mos smras pa/ yab de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsa la lta bus gshegs pa/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i zham ring ba ni nyan thos mdzes pa ma lags so// yab de bzhin
396b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sras gang yin zhes yang dag pa'i smra bas gang smran/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid yin no zhes de dag yang dag pa'i smra bas smra'o// yab de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su la
396b4(dkon brtsegs): len par 'tshal bas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ / gtam 'di brjod pa'i skabs su rgyal po sa skyes dgra'i btsun mo'i 'khor nas/ btsun mo nyi
396b5(dkon brtsegs): shus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / lha'i bu brgya tham pas kyang bu mo de'i seng ge'i sgra 'di thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
396b6(dkon brtsegs): / tshig 'di skad du bdag cag 'di rnams 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sras su khas len to zhes kyang smras so// lha'i bu de dag gis
396b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad lha'i me tog gis mngon par gtor to// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin
397a1(dkon brtsegs): pa khri gser gyi rkang pa can las babs te/ nyan thos chen po de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang / gnib pa dang /
397a2(dkon brtsegs): myang bar bya ba bsod pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byas te/ dad pa dang gus pas rang gi lag nas nyan thos chen po de dag tshim par byas nas/ 'di skad du btsun pa dag rang dgar slad dro bcom ldan 'das la
397a3(dkon brtsegs): chos nyan du bzhud cig/ btsun pa dag bdag kyang mchi bar 'tshal lo zhes kyang smras so// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa pha ma la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang / skye bo phal po ni
397a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang
397a5(dkon brtsegs): bcas pas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ gnas ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// nyan thos chen po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste/ bcom
397a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
397a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu bu mo 'dis ni thog ma nyid du byang chub don du gnyer ba na/ sangs
397b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyus bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis la dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed do/ / shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad dubu mo 'dis bud med kyi lus ma bsgyur/ bcom ldan 'das
397b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di'iji snyam du sems/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la bud med do snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta'o// byang chub sems dpa' dag ni sems can yongs su
397b3(dkon brtsegs): smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyis bdag nyid bud med kyi gzugs su ston to/ / de nas de'i tshe bu mo mya ngan med kyis byir pas bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs byas te/ bden pa'i byin
397b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi rlabs gang gis chos thams cad skyes pa'ang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin pa lta na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag skyes pa'i lus su gyur cig/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
397b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dis kyang mthong bar gyur cig/ tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu bud med kyi mtshan ma mi snang bar gyur te/ skyes pa'i mtshan ma byung bar gyur nas/ steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du
397b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa
397b7(dkon brtsegs): steng gi bar snang la 'phags pa khyod kyis mthong ngam/ shA ri'i bus gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
398a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'di ni bsgral pa grangs med pa bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
398a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa bcur gnas par 'gyur ro// de'i dge 'dun ni byang chub
398a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang bai DUR+Ya las grub pa/ rin po
398a4(dkon brtsegs): che sna bdun gyis bkra bar byas shing / mig mangs ris su bres pa/ rin po che'i pad+mas khebs pa dang / ngan song thams cad rnam par spangs par 'gyur ro// lha dang mi rnams kyi longs spyod dag
398a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang khyad par med de/ shA ri'i bu dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nye bar spyad pa dang / longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du mi rnams kyi'ang der de bzhin du 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems
398a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i ma/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo dam pa zla ba can zhes bya ba des thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dra
398a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di dgung zla dgur rum na bzung ba ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
398b1(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed par bgyi ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od de nyid du/ 'di'i 'og tu blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
398b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu sring mo zla ba can 'di khyod kyis mthong ngam/ shA ri'i bus
398b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rgyal po'i btsun mo zla ba can 'di ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
398b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur zhing / lha'i bu rin chen mchog ces bya bar 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ rgyal po
398b5(dkon brtsegs): dung zhes bya ba'i bu rgyal po gzhon nu mthong na dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la mchod pa byas te/ rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// des de bzhin gshegs pa
398b6(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i dam pa'i chos thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i bar du 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag
398b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang mnyes par byed cing mchod par 'gyur ro/ / de mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pas byang chub thob pa na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin ces bya bar
399a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa tshad med pa dag byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bu de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
399a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od zer ces bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo zla ba can gyis bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas/
399a3(dkon brtsegs): / tshim zhing mgu ste yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba phul te/ tshangs par spyod par rgyal pos gnang nas brlab pa'i gzhi dag bzung ngo //
399a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ lhas phul ba'i me tog man da ra ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor thams cad la gtor to// de na
399a5(dkon brtsegs): bar snang las bab te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshig 'di skad du bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gis byang chub thob pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
399a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po de dag thams cad rdzus te smre zhing / chos gos ngur smrig gyon la/ rin po che'i pad+ma dag la skyil mo krung bcas te skye bar 'gyur ba lta na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des dper na
399a7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam ji lta ba bzhin du bdag gnas par gyur cig ces smras so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas
399b1(dkon brtsegs): bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs byas ma thag tu dge slong gi spyod la pa dang ldan par snang bar gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ngan med kyis byin pas
399b2(dkon brtsegs): pabargyal po ma skyes dgral 'di skad ces smras so/ / yab 'di ltar chos thams cad ni bcos ma na// rnam par bsgrubs par nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / yongs su brtags pa las langs pa
399b3(dkon brtsegs): med bzhin du phyin ci log dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags so/ / rgyal po chen po gzigs shig dang / de ring kho na'i gdugs gcig la bu mo'i gzugs su rang gzigs/ khye'u'i gzugs
399b4(dkon brtsegs): su'ang khyod kyis gzigs/ da ni bdag la dge slong gi gzugs su'ang khyod kyis gzigs na/ 'di la gang yang dag pa'i gzugs lags/ rgyal po chen po de ltar na ya ma brla'i chos thams
399b5(dkon brtsegs): cad la/ 'di na kha cig lta ba'i kun nas dkri bas kun nas glags shing mchis te/ rang gi rgyud la mchis pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis yongs su sreg go/ yongs su bsregs pas chos 'dul ba
399b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ma 'tshal te/ 'gyod pa ma lags pa la 'gyod par sems so// rgyal po chen po de ltar na khyod kyis bag yod par mdzod la/ rgyal srid nyam nga ba na bzhugs bzhin du/ rtag tu bcom ldan
399b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi thad du bzhud cig dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khyod kyi yod pa ma yin pa phyin ci log las byung ba'i 'gyod pa sel bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po khyed ni bya ba mang zhing / byed
400a1(dkon brtsegs): pa mang ba lags kyis bzhud cig/ de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / btsun mo zla ba can dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das dang
400a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med kyis byin pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bgyi ba mang zhing
400a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa mang ba lags kyis/ bdag cag mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po da de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig ces bka' stsal nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra
400a4(dkon brtsegs): btsun mo zla ba can la sogs pa btsun mo'i 'khor chen po dag dang lhan cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por dong ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
400a5(dkon brtsegs): / dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun nub par gyis shig/ bzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston
400a6(dkon brtsegs): cig/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis bzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/
400a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba dang / mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig
400b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la'ang ston cig/ kun dga' bo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas/ gang gis chos kyi /

400b5(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so//

401a1(dkon brtsegs): mdo bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
401a2(dkon brtsegs): na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu
401a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/
401a4(dkon brtsegs): cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin

401a7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags pa'i blo gros dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu

402a6(dkon brtsegs): ma'i bu gang pos smras pa/ ci nas kyang gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa dang / 'tsho ba pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gang dag grong khyer na
