403a1(dkon brtsegs): skar khung dang / rtsig pa dang / snod dang / rgyad dang / shing dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / gos rnams las stong pa nyid kyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba
403a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / skye ba med pa'i sgra dang / dngos po med pa'i sgra dang / bdag med pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam
403a3(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong gis smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer na sems can rnams kyi las ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba gang yod pa de tshe 'di nyid la yang zhing chung ngu myong bar 'gyur ba
403a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod kyis smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag tham
403a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rin po me tog gis smras/ gang gis grong khyer na khyim tha
403a6(dkon brtsegs): cad du rin po ches gang ba'i gter rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas smras pa/ yang gis
403a7(dkon brtsegs): mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga po dag rnam par sel bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
403b1(dkon brtsegs): gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag bcings pa dang / gsad par bkri ba de dag thar pa dang / 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyang 'jigs pa med pa
403b2(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phan tshun du rig
403b3(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa'i dbyangs dang / byams pa'i sems kyis smra bar 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa'ang thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gom pa
403b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dor ba don yod kyis smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
403b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/ / de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnam pa lta bu'i gtam 'di rjod cing / mnyan yod kyi grong
403b6(dkon brtsegs): khyer chen por phyin to/ / yang de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa zhes bya ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
403b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ chos zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga po dag thob pa zhig yod de/ ba mo des lnga'i mig dag pa mi'i las 'das pas byang chub sems
404a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag mthong zhing / de dag lam gyi bar skabs su gtam ci brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang thos so// bu mo de'ang gzugs bzang ba
404a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ pha ma dang nang mi la byams pa/ btsas nas lo bcu gnyis lon pa ste/ de dpyid bla tha chung tshes brgyad skar ma
404a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal gyi nyin par pha mas dge mtshan dang bkra shis byed du gnang nas/ bram ze zho dang / rtsa ku sha dang / me tog dang / yam sreg shing dang / mar dang / bum pa thogs pa lnga brgyas
404a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskor te khrus bya bar khrid pa las/ bram ze de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bkra mi shis so snyam pa'i 'du
404a5(dkon brtsegs): shes kyis gnas par gyur to/ / de nas bram ze de dag gi nang nas bram ze ches bkres tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya ba des/ bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo dge slong dag
404a6(dkon brtsegs): mdun na 'khod pa ni bkra mi shis te/ de dag mthong na dgos pa 'am/ nor ram/ brtul zhugs sam/ mchod sbyin nam/ bkra shis kyang rung ste/ mi 'grub kyis grong khyer du sngar bzhud do
404a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'di dag chags med mchog tu dge shis pa// skye bo mang po'i sdig pa 'jig par byed// 'di dag
404b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag cing bden pazhi mthong / / dul la grol bar gyur cing mnyam par bzhag/ 'di dag rkang gnyis dam pa bsod nams zhing // 'di la yon phul mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di la yon phul
404b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu 'chi med 'thob/ / byin nas sems can ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// tshul khrims dang ni dul bar ldan pa yin// 'dod las brgal zhing sdig med re ba med// 'di dag sman pa mchog ste 'jig rten rgyu/
404b3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gzir ba'i srog chags thar par byed// sangs rgyas 'jig rten dag na chos kyi rje// de'i sras 'di dag rdul med nyon mongs med// 'di dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan yang mang // shes
404b4(dkon brtsegs): rab ldan mis 'di dag ji ltar spang / / 'di dag brtul zhugs spyad cing 'dod chags zhi// bkra shis gyur cing mkhas pa sbyin char phab// 'di dag rnams la bkur sti chung byas kyang // mi rnams chos
404b5(dkon brtsegs): dang de bzhin nor yang 'grub/ / 'di dag mtshan rnams yongs rdzogs dge shis ldan// 'di dag zhing mchog rnam dag sems dang ldan// bram ze 'di la su zhig dad byed pa// de ni bsod nams mang
404b6(dkon brtsegs): po skyed par 'gyur/ / de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas/ bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/ byis pa'i sems kyi dbang du ma bzhud cig/
404b7(dkon brtsegs): mchod sbyin dus 'dir dge slong ma gzigs shig/ ngur smrig gos can de bzhin mgo bregs pa// de dag don 'dod pas ni blta mi bgyi// yab dang yum yang dgyes par mi 'gyur zhing // bdag
405a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang mkhas pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur/ / khyod kyi mchod sbyin 'grub par mi 'gyur gyis// de bas dge slong rnams ni shin tu spongs// de nas bu mo dring med kyis byin pas
405a2(dkon brtsegs): bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/ yon tan ldan pa 'di dag ma gtogs par// pa dang mA yang kho mo'i skyabs ma yin// gnyen gyi tshogs dang nor dang lang mo min// 'di ga
405a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bar bying ba rnams kyi skyabs/ / bdag ni sangs rgyas dga' bas lus btang zhing // de bzhin srog dang longs spyod rnams kyang btang // dkon mchog gsum nyid skyabs yin ma gtogs par/
405a4(dkon brtsegs): kho mo'i skyabs rten sems can 'di na med/ de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas/ bu mo dri ma byed kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo btsas nas khyod kyi sngon sangs rgyas
405a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma gzigs/ sngon chos kyang ma gsan/ sngon dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur yang ma mdzad na/ khyod ci'i slad du sangs rgyas la dad par gyur/ bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa
405a6(dkon brtsegs): bram ze kho mo btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa na/ tsan dan gyi khang bzang kyi nang na gser gyi khri la bzhag pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu lnga brgya steng gi bar snang la 'ding ba kho mos mthong ste/ de dag rnam grangs du
405a7(dkon brtsegs): mas sangs rgyas kyi bsngags brjod/ chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags brjod pa kho mos thos so// de nas lha'i bu de dag gi nang nas gang gis sngon de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba gcig pu de
405b1(dkon brtsegs): la/ lha'i bu rnams kyis dris pa/ grogs po de bzhin gshegs pa ni ci 'dra ba zhig/ de ni ji ltar shes par bya/ de nas lnga'i bu des kho mo'i bsam pa shes nas/ lnga'i bu de dag kyang dad pa bskyed
405b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / de yi dbu skra dri med sdum zhing mdzes// gtsang 'jam g.yas su 'khyil ba'i ljang lo can// zhal mdog pad+ma 'dab margyas pa 'dra// blan pa na mo dmar khar
405b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa bzhin/ / de yi mdzod spu kha ba shel mdog bzang // smin mnams par nas 'khyil cing shin tu mdzes// de yis 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan te 'dug/ rgyal ba'i zhal yang shin tu mdzes par byed//
405b4(dkon brtsegs): mi dbang spyan mdzes 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra// sems stobs mi zhub tshems mnyam thags kyang bzang // de yi ljags che zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khebs// de yi zhal ni dri med rnam par mdzes// de yi gsung ni
405b5(dkon brtsegs): phan zhing snyan la ran/ / tshig rtsu ba spangs shing mi 'byed sdig pa med// skye bo dpag tu med pa dang mdzad cing // 'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba gsung yang sgrogs// de yi mgur ni dung dang mtshungs shing 'dra
405b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin mi dbang phyug gi sor mo ring / / de yi phyag ni glang chen sna dang 'dra// brang yangs dri med lte ba gzhol zhing zab// rta mchog lta bur mngoms kyi sba ba nub// de bzhin spu yi khung bu gser dang 'dra//
405b7(dkon brtsegs): brla yi dbyibs ni glang pori lag dang mtshungs// zhabs ni legs gnas byin pa e n+ya'i 'dra// thub pa'i dbang po bden gsung rgyags pa'i skyon dang bral// ngan las bcom pa rnams kyi
406a1(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i lbu ba 'jig/ 'khor gyi nang du dri ba bye ba dris byas kyang // 'khrul med skyon dang bral bas sems can kun tshom mdzad// gya gyu med drang tshig gis lus ni rim
406a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad cing / / mya ngan 'das pa bde mchog yid 'ong yang dag zhi// skye bo kun gyi yid 'ong mya ngan 'das ston cing // mtha' gnyis dag dang bral ba'i dbu ma'i lam yang ston// de ni rang gis/
406a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas gyur pa ste// bdag nyid brgal cing pha rol rnams kyang sgrol// 'gro ba'i skyo ba dang skyabs dang dge shis shing // 'jig rten kun la thugs brtse phan par mdzad// ston
406a4(dkon brtsegs): pab de yi yon tan 'di dag dang / / gzhan yang mtha' yas kho mos de ma brjod// thos nas lho rnams yid dga' dang gyur nas// rgyal ba la ni dang ba'i yid kyang sgom// de nas bu mo dri ma med
406a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/ bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze kho mo btsas nas zhag bdun lon nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnam
406a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i de lta bu dag thos so/ / mngon par dran te de tshun chad nam yang rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to// nam yang 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /
406a7(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog par ma byas so// mngon par dran te de tshun chad nam yang bal dga' ba 'am
406b1(dkon brtsegs): mal dka' 'am/ ming po la dga' ba'am/ spun la dga' ma/ nyesul dga' ba'am/ nor la dga' ba'am/ rgyan la dga' ba 'am/ gos la dga' ba 'am
406b2(dkon brtsegs): lus la dga' ba 'am/ srog la dga' ba 'am/ grong khyer la dga' ba 'am/ skye mched la dga' ba ma bskyed kyi/ bram ze gzhan du na sangs rgyas nyid rnam pas rjes su dran
406b3(dkon brtsegs): no/ / bram ze kho mos ni gsum sems la yid la bya ba yid la byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs gang na bzhugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang bshad
406b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de thams cad kho mos legs par yongs su bzung zhing / kho mos don tam chog 'bru las yi ge dang tshig gcig kyang chud zos par ma byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi
406b5(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba kho mos nam yang yid la ma byas par ma gyur to/ / kho mos nyin mtshan gang du'ang sangs rgyas ma mthong ba dang / chos ma thos pa dang / dge 'dun
406b6(dkon brtsegs): la bsnyen bkur ma byas par ma gyur to/ / bram ze kho mo ni sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya bas chog pa med do//
406b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas bram ze'i khye'u zhig la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod song la lo rgyus 'di rgyal po dang btsun mo la gsol cig/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u
407a1(dkon brtsegs): @/ de rings pa'i tshul du song ste/ ji ltar mthong ba'i lo rgyas thams cad rgyal po dang btsun pa la gsal to// bra mo drim med kyis byin pas kyang ji ltar zab pa tshungs
407a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha la sogs pa bram ze lnga brgya po de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod/ chos dang dge
407a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do/ / de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa shing rta las babs nas/ bram ze de dag dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag
407a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / nyan thos chen po de dag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gus pa dang bcas zhe sa dang bcas pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
407a5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// shA ri'i bu bud med ni
407a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab sor gnyis pa/ nyon mongs pa drag pa/ bag med pa mang ba/ dben pa la mos pa/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i dbang du mchi ba lags na
407a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ ci nas bdag gi yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ btsun pas de ltar bdag la chos legs
407b1(dkon brtsegs): par bstan du gsol/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis gtam byung ba 'di dang / tham tha' ra/ zas nas myur ba'i tshul gyis phyogs der phyin te/ des nyan thos
407b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag la phyag byas nas/ rang gi bu mo la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod na re kho bo nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to//
407b3(dkon brtsegs): nam yang dga' ba dang rtse ba dang ldan pa'i sems ma bskyed do zhes zer ba de ltar khyod bde ba dang yid bde ba la brtson da/ 'on te 'di ltar yid byung ba'i tshul gyis smra//
407b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ rang gi bu mo la tshogs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod kyi gzugs byed lnga phyi bu mo mtshungs shing 'dra// rgyan rnams kyis ni de nyid chas pa'i cha byad 'dzin//
407b5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar khyod ni nam yang gnyid kyis ma non pa// ci phyir bu mo khyod ni 'di 'dra'i yid byung gyur// khyod kyi rgyal srid rgyas shing shin tu legs par 'byor// ma ni rtag tu khyod kyi dbang du gyur pa
407b6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ / bu mo dga' ba de las ci 'dra gzhan yod na// de yis khyod kyi lus ni dga' ba rnyed ma gyur// sdug cing 'phangs la yid du 'ong ba ste// skye bo kun la dga' ba skyed yin na//
407b7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan brgya phrag du mas brgyan pa khyod// ci yi phyir na khyim 'dir dga' ba med// bu mo khyod kyis ci zhig thos gyur cing // ci zhig mthong na 'di ltar yid mi bde// yongs su nyams
408a1(dkon brtsegs): shing yid byung sems su gyur/ / khyod kyi 'dod pa ci 'dra la smos/ de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ rang gi brgyal phyogs tshul sa tshugs
408a2(dkon brtsegs): su bcad de smras pa/ yab cig phung po nyes dmigs snod rnams dang // khyim gyi skyon rnams thugs su mchud dam// 'khor ba'i gnas ni gar la wA dang mtshungs// 'tsho ba'i 'jig can mi
408a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas 'jig pa can/ / sbrul gdug nang na gnas pa'i khyim 'di la// gnyid dang 'dod pa'i 'dun pa ga la mchis// khams 'di dag ni gdug pa'i sbrul bzhi ste// sred pa sems
408a4(dkon brtsegs): bde ba ga la mchis/ / mi mdza' tshogs kyis rab tu gtses gyur cing // dgon par phyin la dga' ba ga la mchis// kun nas nyon mongs dgra yis yongs bskur ba/
408a5(dkon brtsegs): 'thob rgyal pos bka' stsol cig/ dug 'thungs pa la bde ba ga la mchis// gsad sar bkri la dga' ba ga la mchis// g.yang sa che 'dir su zhig yid don baN+Di
408a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'jig rten de dag mtshungs/ / blo ngan dag gis lus rnams bor ba ni// ri rab tsam gyi phung por gyur to zhes// de bzhin gshegs pas dper ni bka'
408a7(dkon brtsegs): byas slu ba'i chos la su yid rton/ / pha dang ma dang sdug dang ming po dang // bu dang rtsa lag gnyen grogs 'gro ba kun// 'dus byas thams cad me long gzugs ba na 'ang // 'a
408b1(dkon brtsegs): mi sdug gang la su yid con/ / gang tshe bdag gis rang byung rgyal ba mthong // de tshe sangs rgyas 'gyur sgrub sems kyang ste// byang chub sems dpa' bag med 'gyur ba ni// yab tsa/
408b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis ma mthong ma thos so// bdag ni mtshan rdzogs rgyal ba lta 'tshal 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos kyang thos// rgyal ba rgyal ba'i sras po 'di dag
408b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong / / yab cig ji ltar 'dod pa bsten par bgyi// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bu mo'i tshig thos nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas
408b4(dkon brtsegs): rang gi pha cang mi smra bar gyur par rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod la zhu ba zhus pa thugs brtse bar dgongs te lan gdab tu gsol
408b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar btsun pa shA ri'i bu ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci shes rab de 'dus byas lags sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas
408b6(dkon brtsegs): lags/ de gal te 'dus byas lags na/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'dus byas thams cad ni brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no zhes bka' stsal to// ci ste 'dus ma byas lags na/ 'dus
408b7(dkon brtsegs): ma byas la ni skye ba ma mchis so/ / gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la ni phrad pa ma mchis na/ phrad pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyis ji ltar 'dun pa sa ri bu shes rab chen po zhes bgyi/
409a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces spras so// shA ri'i
409a2(dkon brtsegs): bu bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo ni 'dus byas mi 'dri'o// bu mos ni skye ba med pa dris te/ da ni lan gdab par mi nus so// de
409a3(dkon brtsegs): nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
409a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci ste tshe dang ldan pa sems can du 'du shes pa la gnas te rdzu 'phrul ston tam/ 'on te chos su 'du shes pa la
409a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas te rdzu 'phrul ston/ gal te sems can du 'du shes pa la gnas te ston na/ sems can ni ma mchis pa ste/ de lta bas na rdzu 'phrul de'ang ma mchis par 'gyur
409a6(dkon brtsegs): ro/ / ci sti chos su 'dugs pa la gnas te ston na/ chos nyid ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'o// 'gyur ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de la ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis na/ rnam
409a7(dkon brtsegs): par mi rtog pas ji ltar tshe dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'byor par gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'ang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas byams ma'i bu gang pos
409b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ / mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo ni 'gyur ba mi
409b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dri'i/ bu mos ni 'gyur ba med pa dris te/ 'gyur ba med pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub yin pas/ de ni lan gdab par mi nus so//
409b3(dkon brtsegs): / de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa gang po ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos smra ba
409b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci tshe dang ldan pa dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos ston tam/ 'on te dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i chos ston/ gal te dmigs pa
409b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa'i chos ston na ni/ khyod byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni dmigs pa dang ces pa'i slad du ste/
409b6(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na btsun pa'ang byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi chos rnams dang ma bral ba lags so// ji ste dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i chos ston na ni/ chos smra ba nyid dngos
409b7(dkon brtsegs): po ma mchis par gyur te mi 'thad do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po'ang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/ gang po la 'di skad ces smras
410a1(dkon brtsegs): so/ / gang po bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pos smras pa/ bu mo ni kun rdzob mi 'dri'i bu mos ni don dam pa dris te/ de ni
410a2(dkon brtsegs): lan gdab par mi nus so/ / de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar btsun pa 'od srungs chen
410a3(dkon brtsegs): po ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par zhugs nas langs te gzhan dag la chos ston cing / gang dag las tha na gzar bu gang tsam gyi bsod snyoms yongs su blangs pa de dag thams
410a4(dkon brtsegs): cad mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhe na/ de ci btsun pas lus kyis sbyin pa sbyong ngam/ 'on te sems kyis sbyin pa sbyong/ gal te lus kyis sbyong na/ lus ni bems pa
410a5(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba ma mchis pa/ byed pa ma mchis pa ste/ rtsa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa'i chos lta bu mig yor dang mtshungs pas/ des kyang sbyong bar mi nus so// ci ste
410a6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis sbyong na/ sems ni sgyu ma lta bu gnas pa ma mchis pa ste/ des kyang sbyong bar mi nus so// ci ste lus dang sems kyi phyi rol gyis sbyong na/ de ni ma mchis pa
410a7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ ma mchis pas ji ltar sbyong bar bgyid/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po'ang cang mi smra bar gyur to// rab 'byor gyis spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po tha
410b1(dkon brtsegs): mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ni len pa mi 'dri'i/ bu mos ni len pa med pa dris shing / yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dri bas/ de ni lan gdab
410b2(dkon brtsegs): par mi nus so/ / de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar btsun pa rab 'byor ni/ bcom ldan 'das
410b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci nyon mongs pa med pa de dngos pos rab tu phye ba lags sam/ 'on te chos nyid kyis rab tu phye ba lags//
410b4(dkon brtsegs): gal te dngos pos rab tu phye ba lags na ni 'dus byas su 'gyur ro// ji ste chos nyid kyis rab tu phye ba lags na/ chos nyid ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'gag pa ma
410b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i mtshan nyid de/ skye ba ma mchis pa dang 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid gang lags pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do// mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid
410b6(dkon brtsegs): gang lags pa de ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'o/ / 'gyur ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni tha snyad ma mchis pa'o// tha snyad ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab
410b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang lags pa de ni bstan du ma mchis pa'o// bstan du ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// dngos po ma mchis
411a1(dkon brtsegs): pa gang lags pa de ni ma byung ba'o/ / ma byung ba gang lags pa de ni 'phags pa rnams pa ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor cang mi smra bar gyur to
411a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa nam grus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ rab
411a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'di la brjod du ci yang med// cang mi smra ba bde 'thob byed// spros pa med pa'i chos 'di dag/ bu mo yongs su 'dri bar byed// ji srid dngos po skye
411a4(dkon brtsegs): yod pa/ / de srid skyon gyis gos par 'gyur// chos kyi dbyings ni tha snyad med// 'di ni nyon mongs med pa'i tshul// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/
411a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa na ma grul 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa nam gru ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci sems la gnas te
411a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan mdzad dam/ 'on te sems ma mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad/ gal te sems la gnas te bsam gtad mdzad na/ sems ni brjod du ma mchis shing
411a7(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun btags pa lags na/ ci yang dag pa ma yin pa kun btags pa ma mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad/ ji ste sems ma
411b1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad na ni/ rtsa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / rdo la sogs pa byung ba dang / zhig pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ro// de
411b2(dkon brtsegs): ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni sems ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// tshe dang ldan pa nam gru'ang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/ tshe dang ldan
411b3(dkon brtsegs): pa nam gru la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ nam grus smras pa/ bu mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yongs su 'dri ste/
411b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni nyan thos rnams kyis bstan par mi nus so// bu mos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nam gru chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'ang gzhan la// nyan thos rnams kyi
411b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ang gzhan lags sam/ gal te chos kyi dbyings gzhan lags na ni tha dad du 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyid ni gnyis su ma mchis te/ de bas na de bzhin nyid dang gnyis ni bye brag
411b6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis na/ ci'i slad du tshe dang ldan pa nam gru de skad gsung / nam gru'ang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa ma
411b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gags pa la 'di skad ce smras so/ / 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i mig can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci lha'i mig gis
412a1(dkon brtsegs): dngos po gzigs sam/ 'on te dngos po ma mchis pa gzigs/ gal te dngos po gzigs na ni rtag par lta bar 'gyur ro// ji ste dngos po ma mchis pa
412a2(dkon brtsegs): gzigs na ni chad par lta bar 'gyur te/ de'ang mi rigs so// ma 'gags pa'ang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di
412a3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa/ bu mos ni shes rab kun tu 'dzem pa dris pas/ de ni lan
412a4(dkon brtsegs): gdab par mi nus so/ / de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod ni/ bcom
412a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci mang du thos pa nyid de don du blta 'am/ 'on te tshig 'brur blta/ gal te don du blta na/ don ni brjod du ma
412a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis shing bsnyad du ma mchis pa ste/ de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa ste/
412a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa de lta bu gang lags pa de ni bstan du ma mchis pa'o// ci ste tshig 'brur blta na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin no zhes
412b1(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pas/ de bas na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i mang du thos pa nyid ni rton pa ma lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'ang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal
412b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ kun dga' bos smras pa/ bu mo ni yi ge dang
412b3(dkon brtsegs): bral ba 'dri ste/ de ni smras tshim par byed par mi nus so// bu mo ni sems dang bral ba'i mnyam pa nyid 'dri ste/ slob pa rnams kyis ma yin na/ de ji ltar bstan par bya ste/ chos kyi
412b4(dkon brtsegs): mnga' bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu dgos so/ / de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal
412b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pas zab mo la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab pas khyod zab pa'am/ 'on
412b6(dkon brtsegs): te ngo bo nyid zab pas zab/ gal te rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab pas khyod zab na ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i chos gang yang ma mchis so// de ci'i slad
412b7(dkon brtsegs): du zhe na/ 'di ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni song ba ma lags/ 'ong ba ma lags te/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pas shes par bgyi ba ma lags/
413a1(dkon brtsegs): pa nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis shes par bgyi ba ma lags shing / gnyis su ma mchis la/ kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// ji ste ngo bo
413a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid zab pas zab na ni/ ngo bo nyid gang yang sus kyang brtag par mi nus so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pas kho bo zab bo// bu mo dri ma med
413a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pas smras pa/ 'jam dpal yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mtha' ma lags te/ de'i slad du rnam par shes pas 'tshal ba ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
413a4(dkon brtsegs): bu mo yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni dmigs su med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ 'jam dpal dmigs su ma mchis pa ni gang gi tshig bla/
413a5(dkon brtsegs): dgas kyang ma lags te/ dmigs su ma mchis pa ni tshig bla dgas las yang dag par 'das pa lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'di ji ltar gzhan dag la bstan par
413a6(dkon brtsegs): bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni bstan pa las yang dag par 'das pa lags te/ de ni brjod pas bstan par mi nus so// 'jam dpal
413a7(dkon brtsegs): yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ / de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di skad du/
413b1(dkon brtsegs): ci nas kyang grong khyer 'di na skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
413b2(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/ / zhes gsungs pa de ci de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi skur mthong bar mdzad dam/ 'on te chos kyi skur mthong
413b3(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad/ gal te gzugs kyi skur mthong bar mdzad na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni 'di skad du/ gang dag nga la gzugs su
413b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong / / gang dag nga la slar shes pa// 'dun pa 'dod chags ldan pa ste// skye bo de dag nga mi mthong // zhes gsungs so// ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi skur mthong bar
413b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad na/ chos kyi sku ni bstan du mi nus pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni mig gi rnam par shes pa las yang dag par 'das pa ste/
413b6(dkon brtsegs): blta bar mi nus pa'i slad du'o// mthong ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog gis smras pa/ mthong ba don yod bu mos dris pa'i lan thob
413b7(dkon brtsegs): cig/ mthong ba don yod kyis smras pa/ bu mo ni dngos po med pa 'dri ste/ de ni bstan par nus so// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ bdag ni dngos po 'am/ dngos po
414a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa mi 'dri'o/ / bstan pa slobs la de nas ston cig/ mthong ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas
414a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ring po che tog la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du/ gang gis grong khyer na khyim thams cad du rin po ches gang ba'i gter rnams 'byung
414a3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur pa rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/ / zhes gsungs pa de ci zang zing dang bcas pas phan 'dogs pa mdzad dam/ 'on te zang zing ma mchis pas
414a4(dkon brtsegs): ban 'dogs pa mdzad/ gal te zang zing dang bcas pas phan 'dags na no// byis pa so sa'i skye bo'i phan 'dogs pa dang bye brag ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad
414a5(dkon brtsegs): duzhe na/ 'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi dga' ba ni zang zing dang bcas pa'i slad du'o// ci ste zang zing ma mchis pas phan 'dogs pa mdzad na/ zang zing ma
414a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa ni bsgrub tu ma mchis pa lags so/ / rin po che tog kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' dran
414a7(dkon brtsegs): song spong la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du/ gang gis grong khyer 'di na sems can rnams kyi las ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba gang yod pa de tshe 'di
414b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid la yang zhing chung ngu myong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pas las ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du bstan
414b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ de ni khyod kyis bsam par mi spyod do// gal te spyod na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// ji ste bsam par mi spyod na/ mi mkhyen bzhin du mang po myong
414b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba'i las tshe 'di nyid la yang zhing chung ngu myong bar ji ltar mdzad de/ bdag po ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la bdag po rnyed par 'gyur ro// gal te de ltar mdzad na de bzhin gshegs
414b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro/ / ngan song spong gis smras pa/ kho bo ni smon lam gyi dbang gyis mang du myong bar 'gyur ba'i las nyung ngu myong bar 'gyur bar byed do// bu mos smras
414b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rigs kyis bu chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni smon lam gyi dbang gis bsgyur du mi nus lags so// gal te nus par gyur na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o zhes
414b6(dkon brtsegs): debazhin gshegs pa re re'i dgongs pa de/ smon lam gyi dbang gis ji ltar mi 'grub ste/ rnam grangs 'dis na smon lam gyi dbang gyis bsgyur bar mi nus par rig par bya'o// ngan song
414b7(dkon brtsegs): spong yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ / de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces smras so//
415a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu khyod 'di skad du/ gang gis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga po dag rnam par sel bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i
415a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ci ting nge 'dzin de bdag la rag las pa lags sam/ 'on te gzhan la rag las pa lags/ gal te bdag la rag las pa
415a3(dkon brtsegs): lags na ni/ mi 'pho ba'i chos can lags te/ ji ltar khyod snyoms par zhugs pas gzhan dag gi sgrib pa rnams rab tu zhi bar mdzad/ ci ste gzhan la rag las pa lags
415a4(dkon brtsegs): na ni/ ting nge 'dzin de khyod kyi ma lags so// gang khyod kyi ma lags pa des ni gzhan la phan par mdzad par mi spyod do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas
415a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bu mo kho bo'i sbyor ba 'di ni byams pa sngon du 'gro ba'o// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang
415a6(dkon brtsegs): byams pa la gnas pa lags na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na sems can rnams la sgrib pa rnams kyis gnod pa'ang mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam
415a7(dkon brtsegs): bar sel ba'ang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ / de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so//
415b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag bcings pa dang gsad par bkri ba de dag thar pa dang / 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyang 'jigs pa
415b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de/ ci khyod kyi sbyor ba 'di len pa dang bcas pa lags sam/ 'on te len pa ma mchis pa
415b3(dkon brtsegs): lags/ gal te sbyor ba de len pa dang bcas pa lags na ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang len pa dang bcas pa lags te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs par
415b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / de lta bas na de'ang mi rigs so// ji ste sbyor ba de len pa ma mchis par legs na ni/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa lags te/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa la ni nye bar bsgrub
415b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis so/ / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
415b6(dkon brtsegs): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras
415b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bu mo ni skye ba dang 'gag pa mi 'dri ste/ de ni lan gdab par mi nus so// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na skye ba ma mchis dang
416a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa ma mchis pa de ni dri ba ma mchis pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ bu mo gang na skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa
416a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni yi ge 'jug pa med do/ / bu mos smras pa/ 'jug pa ma mchis pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la ni mkhas pa dag yi ge dang 'jug pa mi ston te/ yi ge
416a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mi chags so/ / chags pa ma mchis pa ni chos kyi dbyings te/ de la ni rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du chags pa ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
416a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ / de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs
416a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu khyed kyis 'di skad du/ gang gis grong khyer na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phan tshun du tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs dang / byams pa'i sems kyis smra bar 'gyur ba dang /
416a6(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa'ang thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// zhes gsungs pa'i khyod kyi spobs pa nye bar bsgrub pa gang lags pa de ci rnam par rtog pas
416a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa lags sam/ 'on te rgyu ma mchis pa las byung ba lags/ gal te rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags na ni/ 'dus byas thams cad kyang rnam par rtog pas
416b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa lags te/ de lta bas na rnam par zhi bar mi 'gyur ro// ci ste rgyu ma mchis pa las byung ba lags na ni/ ma byung ba la sgro 'dogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
416b2(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa brtsegs kyis smras pa/ bu mo sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad spobs pa thob par gyur cig/ ces bya ba'i kho bo'i smon
416b3(dkon brtsegs): lam 'di ni dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste btab bo/ / bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sems bskyed pa gang gis smon lam btab pa'i sems bskyed
416b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de mchis sam/ 'on te ma mchis/ gal te mchis na ni rtag par lta ba lags so// ci ste ma mchis na chad par lta ba lags te/ de gsungs na ni khyod kyi gsung ba log pa
416b5(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor
416b6(dkon brtsegs): pa don yod la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang
416b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/ / zhes gsungs pa de ci byang chub de mchis pa zhes brjod par bgyi 'am
417a1(dkon brtsegs): 'on te ma mchis pa zhes brjod par bgyi/ gal te mchis na ni rtag pa ste/ yod pa'i mthar 'dzin pa lags so// ci ste ma mchis na ni chad pa ste/ med pa'i mthar
417a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa lags so/ / byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod kyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras
417a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ci ye shes de skye ba sa rab tu phye ba lags sam/ 'on te zhi bas rab tu phye ba lags/ gal te skye bas rab tu phye ba lags na ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa las byung ba
417a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas su 'gyur te/ shes pa de ni byis pa rnams kyi lags so// ci ste zhi bas rab tu phye ba lags na ni/ de la dmigs pa ma mchis so// gang la dmig pa ma mchis pa de
417a5(dkon brtsegs): la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o zhe 'am/ nyan thos so zhe'am/ rang sangs rgyas so zhe 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'o zhe 'am/ sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par rtog pa mi skye'o// de
417a6(dkon brtsegs): ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub ni rnam par mi rtog pa lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni byang chub la rnam par rtog ste/ mkhas pa rnams ni mi rtog pa'i slad du'o// byang
417a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//
417b1(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer du 'jug par mi bya'i grwar 'dong pa// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ deng bu mo drim med kyis byin pa las chos thos pa gang yin pa de ni mkhas pa'i zas yin pas chog
417b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ chos kyi zas bza' bar bya'o// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor gang na
417b3(dkon brtsegs): gdeg pa med pa dang / gzhag pa med pa de la khyod kyis ci zhig btsal bar sems btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong gi tshul ni spros pa ma mchis pa lags kyi spros pa la dag
417b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ni ma lags so/ / btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong gi chos ni gnas pa ma mchis pa/ gnas par mi bgyi ba lags te/ 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul ni mi 'khrugs pa lags so//
417b5(dkon brtsegs): / bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// de nas nyan thos chen po brgyad po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po de dag dang / bram
417b6(dkon brtsegs): ze lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / de las gzhan pa skye bo phal po che rnams/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin
417b7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin phra
418a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lan stong bskor ba byas te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal
418a2(dkon brtsegs): ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ ting 'dzin stobs ldan grags pa mtha' yas mnga'// 'jig rten mgon po bdud rtsi dga'
418a3(dkon brtsegs): stsol ba/ / mtshungs med ye shes bde gshegs khyod la zhu// byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar spyad pa spyod// ji ltar shing dbang drang bzhugs bdud rnams 'joms// ji ltar rir
418a4(dkon brtsegs): bcas sa rnams g.yo bar bgyid/ / grags pa mtha' yas ji ltar 'od zer gtong // byang chub spyod tshul legs par bshad du gsol// sangs rgyas nor gyi gzungs ni ji ltar
418a5(dkon brtsegs): 'thob/ / ting 'dzin zhi ba dam pa ji ltar sgom// mi yis rdzu 'phrul stobs ni ji ltar 'thob// sems can rin chen rnams kyi spyod pa gsungs// gang gis dran dang rtogs dang blo gros
418a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / spobs pa mdzes dang ldan par gang gis 'gyur// gang dang rab tu ldan na 'khor nang du// snyan cing shin tu mdzes pa smra bar bgyid// gang gis mi ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur//
418a7(dkon brtsegs): dri ma ma mchis lha yi mig kyang 'thob// lnga rna 'thob cing pha rol sems tshul rig/ rdzu 'phrul gyis ni zhing rnams brgyar yang ma ni// ji ltar sbyin pa gtong la brtson par 'gyur//
418b1(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu tshul khrims dag cing bzod la dgag/ ji ltar brtson 'grus bsam gtan mkhas par 'gyur// shes rab la yang ji ltar shin tu brtson// mngal gyi gnas ni ji ltar rnam
418b2(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas/ / pad+ma las ni rtag tu rdzus te skye// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar mchis par bgyid// bdag med stong pa nyid kyi sgra yang brjod// ji ltar de yid dga' dang mi
418b3(dkon brtsegs): dka' mtshungs/ / sred pa spangs shing tha ba zhe sdang spong // mtho bar mi sems dma' bar sems ma mchis// sems brtan g.yo ba ma mchis ri rab mtshungs// rnyed dang ma
418b4(dkon brtsegs): rnyed grags dang ma grags dang / / bstod dang smad dang bde dang sdug bsngal dang // ji ltar 'jig rten chos rnams zil mnan gnas// 'jig rten kun la zla ba lta bur spyod// nga
418b5(dkon brtsegs): yi ma mchis tshul 'chos g.yo ma mchis/ / ji ltar rdul bral nga rgyal rgyags pa spong // zhi dang rab tu zhi dang zhi gnas brtson// blo ldan ji ltar ye shes mchog tu 'gyur// chung ma
418b6(dkon brtsegs): bu nor mdza' la dga' ma mchis/ / ji ltar bas mtha'i mal la mngon par dga'// rtag tu bya dang mtshungs shing zla ba 'dra// ji ltar chos kyi nor la dga' zhing pos// nu//
418b7(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs shing sa 'dra rlung dang mtshungs// mkhas pa ji ltar me dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rtag tu ci yang ma mchis mi rtog lags// mnyam pa nyid la dga' zhing nam mkha'
419a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs/ / ji ltar rtag tu chos ni spong mi bgyid// bdag 'dor bgyid kyi chos mchog yong mi gtong // 'jig rten dag tu ston pa'i sems bskyed nas//
419a2(dkon brtsegs): ltar gnas te byang chub 'jug par bgyid// zhing gi bkod pa ji ltar gnas par 'gyur// dge 'dun dag par ji ltar 'gyur ba lags// ji ltar dus gsum du yang chos thos shing //
419a3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar tshe ring sems can bde bar 'gyur// rtag tu sred pa 'gog pa'i pha rol son// dgra bcom 'dul bar bden bzhi ji ltar mthong // sems can brgya dag byang chub 'jog bgyid
419a4(dkon brtsegs): par/ / spyod cing rtag tu dga' mos ji ltar 'gyur// gang gis shin tu mdzes par 'gyur// rdzus te skye bar gang gis 'gyur// longs spyod che dang shes rab che// kun mkhyen
419a5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par khong du chud/ / gang gis sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu thob// bsod nams kun la mkhas pa lags// spobs pa gang gis skye bar 'gyur//
419a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing ni ji ltar dag 'gyur lags// dge slong dge 'dun phun sum tshogs// gang du de yis smon btab pa// der ni ji ltar skye 'gyur lags// tshe rabs dran par ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar
419a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams dang mjal/ / bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// ngan 'gor mchi bar mi 'gyur lags// rnam par 'dren pa ji ltar na// mdog dang gzi brjid snyan grags 'thob/
419b1(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus rnams// ji ltar thub par mi 'gyur lags// ji ltar sangs rgyas chos dang yang // dge 'dun la ni skyabs su mchis// lus dang srog ni gtong bgyid
419b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ / de dag chos ni 'dor mi bgyid// byang chub spyad pa spyod bgyid cing // the tsom ma mchis ji ltar 'gyur// 'gyod pa thams cad spangs nas su// srog chags rnams la chos kyang sngon//
419b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod la mi mkhyen cang mi mnga'// thub chen khyod ni thams cad mkhyen// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang lags// go rims bzhin du bstan du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang /
419b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo legs so legs so// bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di lta bu 'dri bar
419b5(dkon brtsegs): sems pa ni khyod yang legs so/ / bu mo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/
419b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud 'dul bar byed de/ bzhi
419b7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog med pa dang / phra ma'i tshig yongs su spong ba dang / skye bo mang po dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i byams/
420a1(dkon brtsegs): pasgom pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bdud 'dul bar byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ phrag dog mi bya phram su mi bya/
420a2(dkon brtsegs): skye bo mang po dge ba rnams la sbyar// phyogs bcu rnams su byams pa bsgom byas na// bdud 'dir btul nas byang chub reg par 'gyur/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'
420a3(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa dag g.yo bar byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ji skad smra ba de bzhin byed pa dang / chos zab mo la mos pa dang / yi dmal
420a4(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa dang / skye bo mang po byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa dag g.yo bar
420a5(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// mkhas pa zab mo'i chos la bzod// yi dmal yang shin tu brtan// dkar po'i chos la 'dzud par byed// rdzogs
420a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub bla med la/ / skye bo mang po dga' bar byed// de ltar chos bzhi de dag gis// zhing rnams bye ba g.yo bar byed// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/
420a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas su med pa rnams su 'od zer dag gtong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mar me sbyin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sems can bag
420b1(dkon brtsegs): med par gyur cing mi khom par gyur pa rnams kyi gan du song ste chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la rin po che'i dra bas 'gebs pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'
420b2(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'od zer dag gtong ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mar me byin pas 'od ni rnam par 'dag
420b3(dkon brtsegs): zad pa'i dus na dam chos yongs su 'dzin/ / bag med gyur pa rnams la chos sbyin byed// mchod rten dag la rin chen dra ba 'bul// des na bye ba mtha' yas zhing 'gro zhing // byang chub sem
420b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'od zer gtong bar byed/ / reg nas sems can bde dang ldan par 'gyur// mkhas pa byang chub bla med don du gnyer// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan
420b5(dkon brtsegs): na/ gzungs 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgyan sna tshogs gtsang zhing dag pa sbyin pa dang / bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te 'dod pa rnams la sbyin pa dang / rgyun mi
420b6(dkon brtsegs): 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa rjod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mang du gnas pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzungs
420b7(dkon brtsegs): 'thob bo/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sna tshogs byin pas gzungs ni thob par 'gyur// slong ba rnams la bu mo brgyan te sbyin// rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas bsngags pa
421a1(dkon brtsegs): rjod/ / rgyal ba'i ye shes don du shes rab sgom// chos bzhi 'di dag gis ni gzungs thob 'gyur// bsal pa brgyar yang thos po chud mi za/ phyogs
421a2(dkon brtsegs): bcur de bzhin gshegs pa gang 'chad pa/ / de dag thams cad dran pa'i stobs kyis 'dzin/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ ting nge 'dzin 'thob
421a3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba la yid byung ba mang ba dang / gcig pur kun tu dga' zhing mgul mos pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / las kyi mtha' shin tu /
421a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mthar phyin pa yin te/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ srid pa'i 'gro ba kun la yid
421a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang byung / / bse ru lta bur gcig pur spyod la dga'// rtag tu shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin// de'i las rtag tu shin tu mthar yang phyin// rtag tu chos bzhi dag la zhugs
421a6(dkon brtsegs): nas su/ / byang chub spyod pa zhi ba myur 'tshol byed// byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin la gor 'thob// rgyal ba rnams kyi spyod yul byang chub rtogs// bu mo byang chub sems
421a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rdzu 'phrul 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yang ba dang / sems yang ba dang / chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / khams
421b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa nyid byin gyis rlob pa/ bu ma byang chub sems dpa' rnas pan zad dag dang wAn/ rdzu 'phrul 'thabag// de la 'diska ces rbAH/ sa
421b2(dkon brtsegs): lang ba dang sems pa de bzhin yang / / tshos rnams kun la gnas pa med pa nyid// rnam ma pa'i khams dang mtshungs shing u0f7f// 'das bzhi po dag rkye kyis rdzob par byed/
421b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'di dag nges par bstan byas na// tho ldan de yis rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas thob// skad cig gcig la zhing rnams stong du 'gro// sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po rnams kyang mthong /
421b4(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mdzes par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khro ba med de/ rtsod pa dang / za ba dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /
421b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'phyag par mngon par dga' ba dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom pas bsdams shing tshur shog legs par 'ongs so zhes rtag tu smra ba dang / chos smra ba
421b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la khro gnyer dang bral zhing zhe 'gras pa'i sems med pa yin te/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ mdzes par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
421b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la khro dang khon du 'dzin mi byed// nga rgyal rgyags dang tha ba zhe sdang bral// rtsod pa med la dga' zhing snyan par smra// gus par rgyal ba'i mchod rten 'phyag par byed// de ni tshul khrims
422a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag rtag tu srung / / de ni rtag tu legs par 'ongs zhes smra// chos smra rnams la de ni thab med// de yi sems ni rdo rje ri rab mtshungs/ braH
422a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa byed du 'jug pa dang / me tog
422a3(dkon brtsegs): ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis lag pa bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mngon par 'thor ba dang / phan pa'i dngos
422a4(dkon brtsegs): po mang zhing yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i ngang tshul can dang / gzhan dag gi skyon mi 'dzin pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir
422a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// sangs
422a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas sku gzugs pad+ma mchog bzhug byed du 'jug/ chu skyes me tog lag pa bkang ste 'bul bar byed// pha rol dag la dga' ba bskyed pa'i tshig kyang smra// dga' bar byed la mngon par
422a7(dkon brtsegs): brtson gyi skyon mi 'dzin/ / sems can kun la phan phyir bsod nams yongs su bsngo// thub mchog rnams kyi sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa shes// sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i yon tan 'di
422b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi bsten na de/ / rgyal ba mchog rnams drung du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ longs spyod chen por 'gyur te/ bzhi gang
422b2(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ brnyas pa med par sbyin pa'i tshul can dang / chags pa med par dngos po yongs su gtong ba dang / mos pa mang ba dang / lte bar gyur pa thams cad dang bral ba yin/
422b3(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ des pa brnyas pa med par sbyin pa sbyin par
422b4(dkon brtsegs): byed/ / de ni dngos po kun la rtag tu 'dzin pa med// rgyal ba'i ye shes mchog la mos pa bskyed byas na// de ni phyir zhing longs spyod chen po 'thob par 'gyur// dad dang ldan par
422b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing g.yo med sgyu yang med/ / pha rol dag gi skyon ni 'dzin par yong mi byed// lhag pa'i bsam pas gang gis lta ba drang gyur pa// des na de 'dir longs spyod bzang po rnams
422b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan/ / bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shes rab chen por 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos la ser sna mi byed pa dang / mi
422b7(dkon brtsegs): mthun par mi 'jug pas 'gyod pa sel ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gdams ngag ston pa dang / stong pa nyid sgom pa la mang du gnas pa ste
423a1(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ shes rab chen por 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mkhas pa nam yang ser sna yong mi byed/
423a2(dkon brtsegs): mi mthun 'jug pa med pas 'gyod pa sel// yang dag rab ldan gdams ngag ston par byed// rgyal ba'i spyod pa gang yin stong nyid sgom// chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na// rgya
423a3(dkon brtsegs): bas bzhed pa'i byang chub myur du 'thob/ / sangs rgyas rjes su bstan la bslabs byas nas// rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas de 'gyur ro// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos
423a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang ldan na/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lung nod pa dang / kha ton la brtson pa rnams lung gnod pa dang / gdams ngag brjed nas yun ring du lon te
423a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba 'debs pa la lung 'bog cing dran par byed pa dang / 'di ltar kun dga' ba'i tshig gis gzhan dag la dang ba nye bar sgrub pa dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las nges par 'byung ba
423a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir gzhan dag la chos ston pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba la mngon par brtson zhing ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma la mkhas pa ste/
423a7(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lung mnos kha ton brjed la dran par byed// gzhan la
423b1(dkon brtsegs): yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang sgrogs/ / skyo ba med par chos kyang rjod par byed// ting 'dzin sgom pa'i mtshan ma legs par 'dzin// ngas bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na// mthuchen ldanapa
423b2(dkon brtsegs): tsherabs dran par 'gyur/ / bskal pa stong phrag bsam yas rjes su dran// rnam par 'dren pa'i mchog nyid myur du 'thob/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang
423b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan na/ sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad pa 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos mi spong ba dang / srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i grogs po rnams
423b4(dkon brtsegs): dang mi sten pa dang / srog gi phyir yang chos smra ba la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'
423b5(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ / sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas byang chub gya tshom spong mi byed// chos smra ba la skur pa yong mi 'debs//
423b6(dkon brtsegs): des pa sdig pa'i grogs rnams rnam par spong // g.yel ba med par rtag tu sangs rgyas dran// chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na// bde gshegs rnams dang phrad pa des
423b7(dkon brtsegs): 'thob bo/ / bla med byang chub ma thob bar du yang // 'dren pa ga la bzhugs pa der de skye/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ skyes bu chen
424a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mtshan subacu rtsa gnyis bdu dka' / bzhi gang zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten ri
424a2(dkon brtsegs): p o che sngar gyis 'thor ba dang 'bru mar dri zhim po dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'khru bar byed pa dang me tog dang spos dang sil
424a3(dkon brtsegs): snyan sna tshogs 'bul ba dang yid du 'ong ba'i g.yog 'khor gyis mkhan po dang slob dpon la bsnyen bkur bya bas rim gro byed pa de/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
424a4(dkon brtsegs): po de dag dang ldan na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag 'thob bo/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mchod rten la ni spur gyis dbyeg rnams 'thor
424a5(dkon brtsegs): dri zhim 'bru mar rnams kyis mchod rten 'khru/ / spos dang me tog sil snyan sna tshogs 'bul// yid du 'ong bas mkhan po slob dpon bsten// de'i lus sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan
424a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan/ / rab tu mdzes shing yon tan kun dang ldan// gang gis shes rab mchog ldan rgyal mdzes pa// chos de dag gis skyes chen mtshan du 'gyur// bu so byang
424a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po dag 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ stan rgyu sna tshogs chos kyi stan du 'bul ba dang / gzhan la brgya
424b1(dkon brtsegs): stang byed pas mi skyo ba dang / chos smra ba la 'thab mo mi rgol ba dang / sems can rnams byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'
424b2(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po dag 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ stan rgyu sna tshogs chos kyi stan du 'bul// gzhan la bsti stang byed
424b3(dkon brtsegs): pas skyo ba med/ / chos smra ba la 'thab po yong mi rgol// sems can rnams ni byang chub 'dzin du 'jug/ 'di bzhis lus la dpe byad bzang po rnams// 'di na de yis rnyed pa dka' ba
424b4(dkon brtsegs): med/ / yon tan 'di dag rtag tu bsten byas na// byang chub sems dpa' 'di na brgyan par 'gyur/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ spobs pa
424b5(dkon brtsegs): 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'dzin pa dang / nyin mtshan du phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kha ton byed pa dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
424b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa skye ba med cing 'gag pa med par nges pa la mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas 'dzin pa dang / lus dang / srog dang
424b7(dkon brtsegs): yo byad rnams la mi lta ba na/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ spobs pa 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' snga snod ni/
425a1(dkon brtsegs): nyin mtshan rab tu 'don par byed// 'jig rten kun la mi mthun pa// skye ba med par rab tu sgrogs// mchog tu dga' ba rnyed gyur nas// sangs rgyas bstan pa
425a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par byed/ / lus dang srog la mi lta bar// de ni byang chub lta bar byed// bzhi po 'di dag bsten byas na// de yi spobs pa 'phel bar 'gyur// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
425a3(dkon brtsegs): kun/ / sna tshogs 'phreng 'dras tshim par byed// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'thob ste/ bzhi gang ni
425a4(dkon brtsegs): na/ phrag dog med pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / 'khor dang 'dre ba med pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag
425a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'thob po// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan gyi rnyed la nam yang phrag dog med// mthong nas dga' bar 'gyur te ser sna med//
425a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can kun la de yi sems kyang snyoms// 'khor dang 'dre bar de ni yong mi byed// chos bzhi 'dis ni zhing gi bkod 'thob cing // myur du byang chub mchog kyang thob par 'gyur//
425a7(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byed pa dang / mi mthun pa rnams
425b1(dkon brtsegs): sdums byed pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed du 'jug pas pan 'dogs pa dang / phra ma'i tshig yongs su spong ba ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na
425b2(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa 'thob bo/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan gyi 'khor ni nam yang yong mi 'byed// skye bo mi mthun pa dag 'dum par byed// lung nod kha ton byed la yang dag
425b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzud/ / pha rol dag la dbyen gyi tshig mi smra// chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na// dge 'dun rgya che rnam dag thob par 'gyur// de bas dge 'dun rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir// mkha
425b4(dkon brtsegs): pa sa chos bzhi rtag tu bsten par bya/ / bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du sems bskyed pa der skye ste/ bzhi gang zhe na//
425b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag gi shes kyi khe dang / rnyed pa la phrag dog mi skyed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po yongs su dag pa yongs su 'tshol ba dang / byang chub sems
425b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes skyed de/ tha na sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la'ang bsti stang byed pa dang / shes kyi khe'i phyir tshul 'chos pa med pa ste/ bu mo byang chub
425b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du sems bskyed pa der skye'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan la mchod pa mthong na phrag dog med/ pha rol phyin
426a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dag pa yongs su 'tshol/ / byang chub sems dpa' ston par rtag tu sems// shes khe bde ba'i don du tshul 'chos med// yon tan 'di dag rtag tu bsten byas na
426a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang de phrad 'gyur/ / zhing gang dag tu smon lam btab byas pa// 'dod pa bzhin du zhing der skye bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/
426a3(dkon brtsegs): bu mo dri ma med kyis byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar chos btags pa 'di dag bdag gis yang dag par blangs te/ gnas par ma bgyis na/
426a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'tsho zhing ga zhes la/ chos kyang ston pa de dag thams cad bslus par gyur cig/ de nas tshe
426a5(dkon brtsegs): nga ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi tha chen pos/ bu mo dro med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod 'di skad smra ba ni ngo mtshar te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems
426a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub dka' bar mi shes sam/ de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal
426a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chen po bangon pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji ltar da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs padag
426b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar btags pa'i chos 'di dag kyang yang dag par blangs te gnas par 'gyur zhe na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig nges stong
426b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur cig/ sems can gang la'ang gnod pa med pa gyur cig/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis
426b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar btags pa'i chos 'di dag yang dag par blangs te gnas par 'gyur zhe na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des lha'i me tog gi char mngon par bab par gyur
426b4(dkon brtsegs): cig/ ma dkrol bar sal snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong sgra 'byin par gyur cig/ bdag kyang bu med kyi lus las gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus su red cing / lo bcu drug lon pa 'dra bar
426b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig/ smon lam de skad btab cing bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di byas ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu
426b6(dkon brtsegs): g.yos/ ma dkrol bar sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gi sgra'ang byung / lha'i me tog gi char yang mngon par bab po// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa'ang bud med kyi lus mi snang ba gyur
426b7(dkon brtsegs): te/ skyes pa'i dbang po thob nas/ lo bcu drug lon pa tsam gyi gzhon nu 'dra bar snang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'di
427a1(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ngo mtshar che ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po
427a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rgyu 'di dag so sor yongs su rdzogs pas/ bu mo dri ma med
427a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pa 'di ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa/ 'di ltar mthu che ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu de de
427a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no/ / ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten dang
427a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin gnas yin te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs
427a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs
427a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ 'od des
427b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
427b2(dkon brtsegs): dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
427b3(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ lha dang tshangs pa'i sgra dang mi mjed bdag po'i sgra dang 'brug
427b4(dkon brtsegs): sgra dbyangs ldan pa/ / mgon po lha sgra yid 'ong ldan zhing 'dod chags zhe sdang zhi bar mdzad pa po// gti mug spong ba 'jig rten dag na dka' ba bzang po gzhal yas skyed mdzad pa/

427b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhar gnas shing lha yi me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char pa 'bebs/ / seng ges wa bam bgyis pa bzhin du khyod kyis mu stegs gzhan kun pham par mdzad// dpa' bo gang gi don du 'od
427b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi ltas 'di bstan pa mdzad pa bka' sum gsol/ / nyi zla bye ba stong gis 'od bkye ba dang glog dang nor bu rnams 'od dang // lha dang klu dang dri za gnod sbyin dag gi 'od rnams 'bar
428a1(dkon brtsegs): ba gang lags pa/ / shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas dge zhing dag pa'i 'od byung ba dang mjal gyur nas// 'od rnams thams cad mog mog por bgyis sangs rgyas 'od ni
428a2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu rnams su mdzes/ / khyod kyi smin mtshams bar gyi mdzod spu rab mdzes dkar zhing dri ma ma mchis bzang // 'bar zhing pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung dang me tog kun da 'dra bas phyogs
428a3(dkon brtsegs): gsal bgyid/ / thams cad mog mog bgyis nas gdugs kyis srin bu me khyer bzhin du rgyal ba mdzes// mi yi seng ge thub 'di gang gi don chen bzang por deng gyur bstan du gsol//
428a4(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di byin gyis brlabs
428a5(dkon brtsegs): gang gis bud med kyi dngos po gyur te/ skyes pa'i dbang po thob par gyur pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems
428a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag brgyad cur bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir spyad de/ bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag drug cur spyad

428b3(dkon brtsegs): ring du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir spyod spyod na/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis de'i tshe bud med kyi dngos po ma bsgyur/ byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pas smras

429a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang yongs su dris so/ / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag

429b1(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams mang du skyed do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgrub pa 'din byang chub thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
