430a6(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du rin po che'i gdugs dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa byin gyis brlabs te/ rin po che'i gdugs des stong gsum gyi stong
430a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khengs so/ / des yang nam mkha' de nyid la rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa byas nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la bstod cing
430b1(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal te/ bsti stang byas nas nam mkha' de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan stong bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i//
430b2(dkon brtsegs): lha la sogs pa bram ze lnga brgya po de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yang mthong / lung bstan pa de'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi
430b3(dkon brtsegs): rangs te rab tu dga' nas bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ sgra skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad
430b4(dkon brtsegs): de gsol pa/ gang dag sangs rgyas kus mchis dang // gang dag sangs rgyas chos slad du// blo ni shin tu nges gyur pa// de dag rnyed pa chen po rnyed// sngon chad sdig pa'i
430b5(dkon brtsegs): las bgyis pas/ bdag cag bram ze'i khyim du skyes// ston pa'i nyan thos mthong gyur na// bkra mi shis zhes tshig tu brjod// sangs rgyas sras dag mthong gyur na// bkra mi shis zhes
430b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa yi/ / tshig tu brjod pa gang mchis pa// btsun pa nongs pashags par bgyi// tshogs kyi rgyal po'i chog gyur pa// sangs rgyas gang dag ma mthong na// mi de dag gis nongs pa
430b7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed/ / de dag kha zas ngan pa 'tshal// dri med byin pas mchod byin slad// bdag cag mgron du bos gyur pa// ston pa'i nyan thos rnams mthong nas// ma gus pas ni sdod cing mchis// de la bdag cag
431a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis dris/ / khyod kyis 'dren pa gang na mthong // de smras btsas nas zhag bdun nas// kho mos sangs rgyas mtshan thos mchi// de mi sangs rgyas bsngags mang /
431a2(dkon brtsegs): ba// de bzhin gzhan du mi 'gyur brjod// de yi tshig thos bdag cag kun// byang chub mchog tu yang dag zhugs// bdag cag sngon gyi bsod nams dang // sangs rgyas zhes bgyi sgras bskul
431a3(dkon brtsegs): bas/ / shAkya seng ge'i zhabs la ni// phyag bgyi'i slad du lhags pa lags// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong phyag bgyis// chos kyi dam pa thos par 'gyur// rkang gnyis dam pa 'di
431a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas/ / bdag cag sdug bsngal kun las grol// skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis// chos gang bshad par mdzad pa rnams// sangs rgyas chos kyi don slad du// bdag cag de la slob
431a5(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid/ / sangs rgyas chos thob bgyid slad du// byang chub spyod pa thos gyur nas// bdag cag yang dag nan tan gyis// spyod pa de la bslab par bgyi// byang chub sems dpa'
431a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod gang dang / / lam dang sgo yang bstan pa la// nan tan gyis ni gnas par bgyi// 'jig rten rnams kyi mchod rten 'gyur// de dag lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas// thub pas de
431a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'dzum pa mdzad/ / thub chen lung bstan mdzad gsol zhes// sangs rgyas la ni kun dga' zhus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// zam ze lnga brgya 'di dag dang /
431b1(dkon brtsegs): bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de dang // de kun bskal pa gcig gi tshe// rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// sangs rgyas lnga brgya tham pa la// tshe rabs snga mar mchod byas pa// de nas phyin
431b2(dkon brtsegs): chad spyod tshe yang / / sangs rgyas bye ba mthong bar 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba brgyad cur ni// de dag ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// de dag bskal pa re re la'ang // sangs rgyas bye ba mthong
431b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ / de dag bskal pa gcig de la// rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog 'gyur te// 'od ces bya ba'i bskal gcig la// tshangs pa'i sgra zhes bya bar 'gyur// de la tshe tshad mtshungs
431b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ / bsal pa bye ba brgyad cu thub// zhing mtshungs dge 'dun mtshungs 'gyur te// dge slong bye ba brgyad cu yod// sems can rnams kyi don spyad cing // chos 'di la yang spyad byas
431b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ / de dag thams cad mthar gyis su// mya ngan 'das pa'i bathob/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsu
431b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bram ze de dag dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha rang
431b7(dkon brtsegs): mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi
432a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya ba las/ drim med kyis byin pas zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so// / rgya garaH
432a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhan po dzi ni mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes rjes bskur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu yod do//
432a3(dkon brtsegs): / rgya ga ra skad du/ Ar+ya gu Na rat+na sang ku su mi ta br-id tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod ska da du/ 'phags pa yon ta na r-i na chen me tog kun tu rgyas pas zhus
432a4(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal
432a5(dkon brtsegs): po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i rol dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag rab tu mang po rnams dang thabs cig tu
432a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ / de'i tshe 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grong khyer yangs pa'i li tsi byi gzhon nu yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya bzhig
432a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
432b1(dkon brtsegs): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba
432b2(dkon brtsegs): phulung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
432b3(dkon brtsegs): la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa
432b4(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa khyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa zhus shig dang /
432b5(dkon brtsegs): zhu ba de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pas/ bcom
432b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das da ltar na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de rnams kyi mtshan
432b7(dkon brtsegs): bzung na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag bzhugs lags sam/ de skad ces gsol
433a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skyed ces bka' stsal to// yon tan/
433a2(dkon brtsegs): rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa legs so legs so// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa khyod da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten
433a3(dkon brtsegs): la snying brtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di zhu bar sems pa ni/ yon tan rin chen me
433a4(dkon brtsegs): tog kun tu rgyas pa khyod yang legs so/ / de'i phyir yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan
433a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
433a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa shar phyogs na chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i 'jog rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
433a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ / bskal pa
433b1(dkon brtsegs): de na rgyas pa thams cad kun nas sdud pa zhes bya'o/ / de na sems can rnams kyi tshe ni dpag tu med do// bcom ldan 'das de'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor dpag tu med do//
433b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i
433b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can bskal pa stong phrag drug cu'i 'khor ba bsnyil bar byed do// tshe brjes nas kyang sgrib pa med par ston pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro//
433b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu rnams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par mdzad do// chos ston pa na bag tsha ba med par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad
433b5(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di rjod byed pa// de la yon tan 'di rnams myur du 'byung // de la de bas lhag pa gzhan yang 'byung // de la bla med byang chub dka'
433b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ / yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa lho phyogs na yon tan rin chen bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
433b7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen dpal bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ / bskal pa de ni yon tan
434a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa zhes bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen dpal bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po
434a2(dkon brtsegs): lta bu de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can tshe brjes ma thag tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
434a3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa'ang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / tshe brjes ma thag tu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang
434a4(dkon brtsegs): du smon lam 'debs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro/ / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
434a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di rjod byed pa// de la ting 'dzin bsam yas de skye zhing // sum cu
434a6(dkon brtsegs): rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan lus thob la/ de ni byang chub skye ba gcig thogs 'gyur// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa nub phyogs na mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad dang
434a7(dkon brtsegs): zathal ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bshum
434b1(dkon brtsegs): te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ / bskal pa de ni shAkya mngon par mdzes pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams
434b2(dkon brtsegs): cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// dug gis ma yin/ chus ma
434b3(dkon brtsegs): yin/ mes kyang 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// rdzus te skye bar yang 'gyur ro// tshe brjes ma thag tu'ang shugs brgya pa zhes bya ba'i gzung thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad
434b4(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di rjod byed pa// de la mi de'i lus mes mi 'chi zhing // mtshon gyis min la chus min dug gis min// de ni rdzus te skye ba kho nar 'gyur//
434b5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa byang phyogs na mun pa dang rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
434b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa yang dag par spyod pa'i blo zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ / bskal pa de ni grags pa chen po 'dzin pa zhes bya'o//
434b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa dpag med bkod pa yang dag par spyod pa'i blo de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
435a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo dang pa can ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad du rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob par
435a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur pa nas/ za na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du'ang
435a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / ngan song gsum po rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der ngan song du skyes pa'i sems
435a4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams yongs su thar par byed do/ / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di rjod
435a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ / de yi yon tan bgrang bar mi nus shing // de ni byang chub dam pa 'thob par the tsom med// de la the tsom med par gzungs skye'o// yon tan rin chen me tog
435a6(dkon brtsegs): kun du rgyas pa shar lho'i mtshams kyi phyogs na shin tu mdzes pa bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug
435a7(dkon brtsegs): stong bsgrags pa'i sgra skad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ / bskal pa de ni yon tan 'byung ba zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
435b1(dkon brtsegs): bapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jug stong bsgrags pa'i sgra skad kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe brjes ma thag tu mi 'jigs
435b2(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ro/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
435b3(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de lta bu thob par 'gyur ro// bud med kyi tshe brjes nas skyes pa'i lus rlob
435b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshan 'di 'dzin byed pa'i// byang chub sems dpas yon tan 'di dang gzhan// bsam gyis mi khyab rtag tu thob par
435b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas mang po mthong // yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs na bkod pa dpag tu med pa'i 'jog rten
435b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do// bskal pa
435b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni chos thams cad yang dag par skyed pa zhes bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser mchog 'od dpal de'i mtshan 'dzin
436a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de mtshan de thos pa des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba phrag dgu mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// sems can
436a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mchog tu 'gro bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ / rgyu gang gis na sems can thams cad mchog tu 'gro bar byed ces bya zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
436a3(dkon brtsegs): mo gang la la ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas chos ston par 'gyur zhing / de chos ston pa na ting nge 'dzin de'i chos nyid thob pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/
436a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid 'ong gi sangs rgyas kyi
436a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing nas sems can rnams gcig tu bde ba dang ldan zhing / sems can ngan song du skyes pa thams cad yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ de dag de nas yongs su grol nas lha dang mi'i lus thob par
436a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba bzhin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gser mchog 'od dpal gyi ni mtshan 'dzin pa/ de la gzi
436a7(dkon brtsegs): brjid dpal mdog stobs dbang po/ / tshe rabs kun tu rnyed par dka' ma yin// de la blo thogs med par mtha' yas 'gyur// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa
436b1(dkon brtsegs): nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs na sdig pa dang bral ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid kyi rgyal po rnam mang
436b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal snang zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ / bskal pa de ni khyim rgyas pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
436b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid kyi rgyal po rnam mang dpal snang de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe brjes ma thag tu spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa
436b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro/ / tshegs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gakod pa
436b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya cu'i chos ston pa'ang thos par 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang zhig rgyal ba de yi mtshan 'dzin pa
436b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dpag med pa sangs rgyas zhing du de/ / de ni tshe dpag med ldan chos shes 'gyur// skye gcig thogs pas byang chub rdzogs 'tshang rgya// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa byang
436b7(dkon brtsegs): shar mtshams kyi phyogs na mya ngan thams cad las rgal ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa bye ba grangs med par byang
437a1(dkon brtsegs): chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ / bskal pa de ni spobs pa bkod pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
437a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa bye ba grangs med par byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa
437a3(dkon brtsegs): can de ni che brjes ma thag tu rnam pa drug cu dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//
437a4(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sgra dbyangs yan lag drug cu phun tshogs ldan// de ni kun tu shes pa'ang pha rol phyin// rgyal ba bye ba brgyad cu mchod byed pa'i// bsod nams gang yin bsam yas des
437a5(dkon brtsegs): thob 'gyur/ / yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa steng gi phyogs na yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
437a6(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang po dang / nam mkha' nges par sgrogs pa bkod pa'i 'od ces bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do//
437a7(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa de ni tshad med len ces bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang po dang / nam mkha' nges par
437b1(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa bkod pa'i 'od de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang pa can de ni tshul khrims kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// ting
437b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang / shes rab kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba
437b3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ / ma nas sar yang thob par 'gyur ro// tshigs gzung bar 'om pa nyid kyang 'thob
437b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ / spobs pa bul ba med pa phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'bob par 'gyur ro// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
437b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / yi ge dang sgra'i brda'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro// rigs mngon po dang / rigs mthon po chen po'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro//
437b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa lnga'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skang
437b7(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshan mchog 'dzin byed pa// de ni yan lag brgyad dbyangs phun sum thob// de ni sangs rgyas bral bar yong mi skye/
438a1(dkon brtsegs): ma'i ma thogs byang chub 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/ yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa 'og gi phyogs na tha dad pa med pa nyid sa dga' ba'i 'jig rten
438a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od ces bya ba zhig da ltar
438a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/ / bskal pa de ni ye shes kun nas bsdus pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
438a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par 'khrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe brjes ma thag tu sangs rgyas yongs
438a5(dkon brtsegs): su 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / skye ba gcig gis thogs pas bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
438a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i chos bstan pa'ang thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas kyang thams cad kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas
438a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan 'dzin sangs rgyas bye ba phrag/ dgu bcu rnams kyis chos bstan thos 'gyur zhing // skye ba gcig thogs bla na med pa yi// byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
438b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'gyur/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun rgyas pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
438b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po yon tan rin chen thams cad dang ldan pa'i spobs pa'i skad kyis gzungs thob par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya cus bla na med pa yang dag
438b3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob bo/ / lha dang mi'i skye dgu sum khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
438b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa dang / thams
438b5(dkon brtsegs): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
438b6(dkon brtsegs): par bstod do/ / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pas zhus pa'i le'u
438b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+wA la ra ma dang / zhwa chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes/
439a1(dkon brtsegs): ske la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ sh+lau ka brgya bzhi bcu yod// rgya gar skad du/
439a2(dkon brtsegs): An+ta a ts+tshin+d+ra t+yA thAH bi Sha ya nir des/ nA ma ma hA lAn sU tha/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba
439a3(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po'i mdo/ / bam po dang po// // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
439a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yon na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong du tshang pa'i dge slong gi da
439a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / gnas
439a6(dkon brtsegs): gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang yang thabs cig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun gyis bltas nas chos
439a7(dkon brtsegs): ston to/ / yang de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/
439b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ngas khyod la bskul gyis/ khyod kyis chos
439b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i gtam las rtsoms te/ lha'i 'khor 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom
439b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag gis ci las brtsams te spobs par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul las rtsoms te
439b4(dkon brtsegs): spobs par gyis shig/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ gang mig gi yul ma lags pa dang / gzugs kyi yul ma lags pa dang / rna ba'i
439b5(dkon brtsegs): yul ma lags pa dang / sgra'i yul ma lags pa dang / sna'i yul ma lags pa dang / dri'i yul ma lags pa dang / lce'i yul ma lags pa dang / ro'i yul
439b6(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa dang / lus kyi yul ma lags pa dang / reg bya'i yul ma lags pa dang / yid kyi yul ma lags pa dang / chos kyi yul ma lags pa ste/
439b7(dkon brtsegs): de sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das yul khyad par ma mchis pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
440a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud par 'tshal bas/ khong du chud pa ma mchis pa'i tshul du sangs rgyas kyi yul de ltar khong du chud par bgyi'o//
440a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa'i yul ci lags/ bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal lta bar gyur pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa nyid ni ngas byang chub thob
440a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yul lo/ / mtshan ma mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir mtshan ma med pa ni yul lo// khams gsum pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir smon pa med pa ni yul lo// 'du byed mnyam pa
440a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi phyir mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni yul lo/ / 'dus byas mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / 'du byed pa med pa ni yul lo// gsol pa/
440a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis kyi yul gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sems med pa ni 'dus ma byas kyi yul lo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
440a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das sems ma mchis pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lags te/ de la brjod pa ma mchis lags so// brjod pa ma mchis pa la bstan pa ma mchis lags so// bstan pa ma
440a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa la mngon par brjod pa ma mchis lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das mngon par brjod pa ma mchis pa'i yul ni// sangs rgyas kyi yul lags so// bka' stsal pa//
440b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul gang du btsal bar bya// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las
440b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su btsal bar bgyi lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongs su rtogs pa ni
440b3(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma lag kyi/ gang 'di sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongs su rtogs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lags pa'i slad du'o//
440b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa'am ldog pa yod dam/ ci nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams
440b5(dkon brtsegs): las yongs su btsal/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'jug pa ma mchis ldog pa ma mchis lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gal te sangs
440b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi yul 'jug pa med cing ldog pa med na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ji ltar sems can tham cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las yongs su shes/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jug
440b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis shing ldog pa ma mchis pa de bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa de dag gi rang bzhin gang lags pa de'ang 'jug pa ma mchis shing ldog pa ma mchis lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyon mod pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu/ gsol pa
441a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de nyid nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yang gan
441a2(dkon brtsegs): du gyur la/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin yang gzhan zhig lags na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes kyang bstan par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/
441a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de nyid/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin lags te/ de ci slad du de bzhin gsheg pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon
441a4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes ston lags so/ / bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa nyid gang gis gnas pa shes sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
441a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lags so/ / bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa nyid gang gis gnas/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mnyam pa nyid gang la gnas nas
441a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug kun tu 'byung ba'i mnyam pa nyid des/ de bzhin gshegs pa gnas lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mnyam pa nyid
441a7(dkon brtsegs): gang la gnas te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug kun tu 'byung / gsol pa/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa rnams kyi mnyan
441b1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid des/ de bzhin gshegs pa gnas lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal tshe stong pa nyid la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yod das/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchi
441b2(dkon brtsegs): pa gang gis stong pa nyid mchis pa'i mchis pa des/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams mchis lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal yod pa gang gis stong pa nyid yod
441b3(dkon brtsegs): cing / yod pa gang gis 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams yod/ gsol pa/ yi ge dang / skad dang / sgra dang / brjod pa'i mchis pas/ stong pa nyid mchis lags so// yi
441b4(dkon brtsegs): ge dang / skad dang / sgra dang / brjod pa'i mchis pas/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams mchis lags so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du dge slong dag ma skyes pa dang
441b5(dkon brtsegs): ma byung ba dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni yod de/ dge slong dag ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang /
441b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni med pa ma yin no// dge slong dag gal te ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa med du zin na/ skyes
441b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / byung ba dang / byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus byas pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa 'di dag las 'byung bar gdagra par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ dge slong dag 'di ltar ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang /
442a1(dkon brtsegs): ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni yod de/ de'i phyir skyes pa dang / byung ba dang / byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus byas pa dang /
442a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du byed pa 'di dag las 'byung bar gdags so zhes bka' stsal pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das gal te stong pa nyid ma mchis su lags na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi/
442a3(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa 'di dag las 'byung bar gdags par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar stong pa nyid ni mchis te/ de'i slad du 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa
442a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams las 'byung bar gdags lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad bstan pa de de lta yin du zin na/ gang su dag stong pa nyid la gnas pa de dag
442a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la gnas par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor spyod pa gang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug las gud du
442a6(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid tshol ba de ni rnal 'byor la mi spyod pa lags te/ rnal 'byor ma lags pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug las gud du stong
442a7(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid btsal bar bgyi ba ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyid stong pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod 'dod chags dang bcas
442b1(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang bcas/ gti mug dang sacas pa yin nam/ 'on te 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba yin/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags
442b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / zhe sdang dang / kati mug rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de dang bdag mnyam pa ste/ gang mnyam pa nyid de ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa'ang ma lags/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang
442b3(dkon brtsegs): ma lags te/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'ang ma lags/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'ang ma lags/ gti mug dang bcas pa'ang ma lags/ gti mug dang bral ba'ang ma lags so// bcom ldan
442b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag bdag la 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral bar yang dag par rjes su lta zhing / pha rol la 'dod chags dang bcas pa dang /
442b5(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang / gti mug dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su lta ba de dag ni lta bar gyur pa gnyis la chags pa lags so// gnyis gang lags she na/ chad par lta ba dang / rtag par
442b6(dkon brtsegs): lta ba lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang bdag la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba dang / gti mug dang bral ba yang dag par rjes su lta ba de ni de dag gi chad par lta ba lags so//
442b7(dkon brtsegs): gang pha rol la 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su lta ba de ni de dag gi rtag par lta ba lags so// yang bcom ldan 'das yang dag par
443a1(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i dge slong ni pha rol dman pa dang / bdag khyad par du 'phags par yang dag par rjes su mi lta ba lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gang yang dag par
443a2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa de gang du zhugs pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang yang dag par zhugs pa de ni gang du'ang zhugs pa ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gang yang dag par zhugs pa

443a4(dkon brtsegs): lags/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus bgyis pa ni skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / gnas pa dang ldan pa'i slad du'o// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'dus ma byas la
443a5(dkon brtsegs): grangs gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis la grangs gang yang mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dus ma bgyis la grangs mchis par
443a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ de 'dus bgyis pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/ 'dus ma bgyis ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpa' gang 'dus ma byas thob pa'i 'phags pa thams cad la grangs gang yang yod pa

443b1(dkon brtsegs): bral ba lags so/ / bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin nam/ 'on te 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag

443b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'ang ma lags so/ / bka' stsal/ 'jam dpal khyod ci dang ldan/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul mnyam pa nyid dang mi 'gal ba dang ldan lags so// bka' stsal pa/
443b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul rnyed dam/ gsol pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis brnyed na/ bdag gis kyang rnyed lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi/ 'jam
444a1(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi yul ma brnyes sam/ smras pa/ gnas brtan gyis nyan thos kyi
444a2(dkon brtsegs): yul gang yang rnyed dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba'i yul yang med/ yul rnyed pa'ang med do// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
444a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'i yul yang med/ yul brnyes pa'ang med do// spras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ni rjes su bsrung ba med par chos ston te/ khyod ni las dang po pa rnams rjes su mi srung ngo // smras pa/ de
444a4(dkon brtsegs): bas na gnas brtan nyid la yongs su dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa bzhin du lan thob cig/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang sman pa mkhas pas nad pa yongs su srung zhing / kha ba
444a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / sgyur ba dang / tsha ba'i sman ma byin na/ ci des nad pa de la nad med pa'i bde ba byin pa yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du gang chos snga
444a6(dkon brtsegs): bas las dang po pa yongs su srung zhing zab mo'i gtam brlabs te/ gtam sna tshogs bstan na/ des de yang dang yang 'chi ba las thar par byas par mi 'gyur/ shin tu bde ba mya ngan las 'das
444a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la rab tu bzhag par mi 'gyur ro/ / bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// lha'i bu brgyad brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig
444b1(dkon brtsegs): rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ lha'i bu bdun brgya 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spobs pa thob nas/ 'dod cing lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
444b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod nyan thos kyi theg pas sems can
444b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'dul na/ ci khyod nyan thos kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba yin nam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni theg pa thams cad kyis rnam par grol te/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni nyan thos kyi
444b4(dkon brtsegs): theg pas rnam par grol ba'ang yin no/ / kho bo ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba'ang yin no// btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni theg pa chen pos rnam par grol ba'ang yin no// smras pa/
444b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod ci nyan thos sam/ 'on te rang sangs rgyas dang / 'on te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni nyan thos yin te/ pha rol las mnyan
444b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgral sbyor bar brtson pa ni ma yin no/ / kho bo ni rang sangs rgyas yin te/ snying rje chen po dang / mi 'jigs pa dang bral ba ni ma yin no// kho bo ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin te/
444b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i rgyun bcad pa ni ma yin no// sbas pa/ 'jam dpal myo ji ltam nyan thos yin/ spras pa/ chos ma thos pa mnyan pa sems can thams cad la thos par byed de/ des na kho bo nyan thos yin mo/
445a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ji ltar rang sangs rgyas yin/ smras pa/ kho bos chos thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar rtogs te/ des na kho bo rang sangs rgyas yin no//
445a2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ji ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/ smras pa/ kho bos chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par khong du chud de/ des na kho bo yang dag
445a3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ 'on te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sa gang la nges pa yin
445a4(dkon brtsegs): par gzung bar bya/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni sa thams cad la nges pa yin par zung zhig/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod so so'i skye bo'i sa la'ang nges par gzung bar bya 'am/ smras
445a5(dkon brtsegs): pa btsun pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni yang dag pa nyid du nges pa nyid du nges pa'o// nges pa der sems can thams cad kyang nges pa ste/
445a6(dkon brtsegs): kho bo'ang nges pa der nges pa nyid do// des na kho boso so'i skye bo'i sa la'ang nges par gzung bar bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te chos thams cad yang dag pa
445a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid du nges par nges pa yin na/ 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i sa'o// 'di ni nyan thos kyi sa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o zhes/
445b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par gzhag pa gdags par ga la 'gyur/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' la 'di ni shar phyogs kyi nam mkha' 'o// 'di ni lho phyogs kyi'o// 'di ni nub phyogs kyi'o//
445b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni byang phyogs kyi'o// 'di ni shar lho'i 'o// 'di ni lho nub kyi'o// 'di ni nub byang gi'o// 'di ni byang shar gyi'o// 'di ni 'og gi'o// 'di ni steng gi phyogs kyi nam mkha'i 'o zhes brjod kyang phyogs cha la
445b3(dkon brtsegs): dad pa yod kyi/ nam mkha' la ni tha dad pa med do// btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du/ chos thams cad yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams la mkhas pas 'di ni so so'i
445b4(dkon brtsegs): skye bo'i sa'o/ / 'di ni nyan thos kyi sa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o zhes sa rnam par 'jog kyang / sa rnam par gzhag pa la tha
445b5(dkon brtsegs): dad pa yod kyi/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la ni tha dad pa med do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la zhugs sam/ smras pa/ zhugs pa'ang yin la byung ba'ang yin no// smras pa/
445b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na khyod zhugs pa'ang yin la byung ba'ang yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnam kyi thab dang / shes rab dang / ye shwe blta bar bya ste/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni skyes bu
445b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa kha cig bshad pa'i don dpes shes par 'gyur ba yod de/ de'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan pa bya'o// btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na 'phong gi slob dpon chen po zhig la sdug pa/ mdzes pa/
446a1(dkon brtsegs): yid du 'ong ba/ blta na sdug pa'i bu gcig pa zhig kyang yod/ de la mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba phyir rgol ba zhig kyang yod pa la/ des bu gcig pa de thag ring po la ma gol ba'i phyogs
446a2(dkon brtsegs): shig na 'dug pa mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du de ni bdag la phyir rgol ba yin no snyam du sems skyes te/ des de gsad pa'i phyir mda' 'phangs nas/ 'phangs ma thag tu bu gcig pa yin pa'i 'du shes skye ste/
446a3(dkon brtsegs): de sngon goms par byas pas shin tu brgyugs te/ mda' de bu gcig pa'i lus la ma phog pa nyid du lag gis 'dzin pa 'di ni don rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir dper byas pa'o// de la don du blta ba gang
446a4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'phong gi slob dpon zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla dgas so// btsun pa rab 'byor bu gcig pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' bu gcig pa'i
446a5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes nye bar 'jog pa yin no/ / gsod pa phyir rgol ba zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas so// btsun pa rab 'byor mda' zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po'i
446a6(dkon brtsegs): tshig bla dgas so/ / btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na 'phong gi slob dpon gyis mda' 'phangs la/ bu gcig pa'i lus la ma phog par shin tu brgyugs te 'dzin pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub
446a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs bskyed pas/ 'du byed thams cad skye ba med par so sor rtog go// yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la rnam par bltas nas/ snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pa'i sto
446b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pas/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byed kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi gnas kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi sa la'ang 'dzud do// smras pa/
446b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang gi yul yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'jig rten na'ang spyod la/ 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis kyang mi gos
446b3(dkon brtsegs): shing 'jig rten na'ang snang la/ chos thams cad la'ang snang ba med pas/ rab tu phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yul lo// btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa thams
446b4(dkon brtsegs): cad la'ang snang la/ sa ngan pa la'ang mi gnas pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sems can thams cad kyis nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir yang brtson la/ chos kyi dbyings
446b5(dkon brtsegs): zad par ni yang dag par rjes su mi lta ba dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'dus byas las kyang bskyod la/ 'dus ma byas kyang yang dag par ma rnyed pa dang / btsun pa rab
446b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khor ba la skyed mos tshul dang / gzhal med khang du'ang 'du shes la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang don du mi gnyer zhing / bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa
446b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdag med pa'i bzod pa'ang thob la/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang
447a1(dkon brtsegs): dag chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i rang bzhin du'ang shes la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la'ang brtson pa dang / bdun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas
447a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par yang mthong la/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rgyan gyi phyir brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yul lo// smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sem
447a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyod pa 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o/ / smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi chos yongs su shes pa dang ldan yang / 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba'i
447a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston to// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba la rtsoms te spobs par gyis shig/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi
447a5(dkon brtsegs): chos las yang dag par 'da'/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'o// lnga gang zhe na/ gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i
447a6(dkon brtsegs): phung po'o/ / de la gzugs ni lbu ba rdos pa lta bu'o// tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o// 'du shes ni smig tu lta bu'o// 'du byed ni chu shing lta bu'o// rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o// wu ba dang / chu'i chu bur dang / sr-ig
447a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang / chu shing dang / rgyu ma gang yin pa de la 'jig rten yang med/ 'jig rten du gdags pa'ang med/ phung po rnams kyang ce/ phung por gdags pa'ang med par/ gang phung po'i rang bzhin la de ltar mos pa de ni yang
447b1(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs pa'o/ / gang yang dag par zhugs pa de 'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa'o// gang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa de 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' 'o// btsun pa rab byor
447b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / / gang rang bzhin gyis stong pa de la gnyis su med do// gang gnyis su med pa de la ngar 'dzin pa med// nga yir 'dzin pa med do// gang la ngar 'dzin pa med pa dang /
447b3(dkon brtsegs): yir 'dzin pa med pa de la chags pa med de/ chags pa med pa rnyed pa ni 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da' 'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rkyen la rag lus pa'o// gang dag rkyen la rag lus
447b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag rag lus pa med pa'o/ / gang dag rag lus pa med pa de dag bdag po med pa'o// gang dag bdag po med pa de dag bdag gi ba med pa'o// gang dag bdag gi ba med pa de dag yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o// gang
447b5(dkon brtsegs): dag yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de la 'thab pa med do/ / gang la 'thab med pa de la rtsod pa med do// gang la rtsod pa med pa de dag dge sbyong gi chos rtsod pa med pa'o// gang dag dge sbyong gi chos mi rtsod pa de dag nam
447b6(dkon brtsegs): mkha' la lag pa dang mtshungs te/ chos thams cad kyang nam mkha' la lag pa dang mtshungs par shes nas/ 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da' 'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga ni chos kyi dbyings dang
447b7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa'o/ / chos kyi dbyings kyang dbyings med pa ste/ gang dbyings med pa de la mig gi khams med do// gzugs kyi khams med do// mig rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// rna ba'i khams med do// slar
448a1(dkon brtsegs): khams med do/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// sna'i khams med do// dri'i khams med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// lce'i khams med do// ro
448a2(dkon brtsegs): khams med do/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// lus kyi khams med do// reg bya'i khams med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// yid kyi khams med do// chos kyi khams
448a3(dkon brtsegs): med do/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// gang khams med pa de la sa'i khams med do// chu'i khams med do// me'i khams med do// rlung gi khams med do// nam mkha'i khams med
448a4(dkon brtsegs): do rnam par shes pa'i khams do/ / 'dod pa'i khams med do// gzugs kyi khams med do// gzugs med pa'i khams med do// 'dus byas kyi khams med do// 'dus ma byas kyi khams med
448a5(dkon brtsegs): do/ / gang khams med pa de la bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gso ba med/ gang zag med/ shed las skyes med/ shed bu med de/ gang gis de dag rjes su rdzogs pa med pa'i tshul
448a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa de 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da' 'o/ / bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de nas dge slong stong nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnam las sems rnam par
448a7(dkon brtsegs): grol lo/ / de dag sems rnam par grol nas/ rang rang gi bla gos kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bkab ste/ tshig 'di skad du gang dag chos zab mo bstan pa 'di la mos pa med pa'i sem
448b1(dkon brtsegs): can de dag ni thob pa'ang med/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang med do zhes 'dzer to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smrab mo// ma dang ldanapa
448b2(dkon brtsegs): dag gis ci zhig thob cing ci zhig mngon par rtogs/ dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong ni thob pa med pa/ mngon par rtogs pa med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thob pa
448b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de ni g.yo ba nyid do/ / mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba de ni rlom sems nyid do// g.yo ba dang rlom sems gang yin pa de ni bdud kyi las so// lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag ni bdag gis thob bo// bdag
448b4(dkon brtsegs): gis mngon par rtogs so zhes 'di lta bu 'di dag gi tshul du rnam par rtog par 'gyur ro/ / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gis lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams shes sam/ smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das mkhyen pa dang ldan
448b5(dkon brtsegs): pas mkhyen te/ bdag cag ni ji ltar sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid mi shes par bdag gi sdug bsngal yongs su shes so zhes smras pa lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya zhing / kun 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang / 'gog pa'i
448b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid dang / lam gyi mtshan nyid mi shes par bdag gis lam bsgoms so zhes smra ba lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o snyam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid dang / kun 'byung ba'i mtshan
448b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lam gyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid de/ skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'o// mtshan nyid med pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rnam par
449a1(dkon brtsegs): grol ba'o/ / chos thams cad kyang rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid de/ de la ni gang sdug bsngal yongs su shes so// gang kun 'byung ba spong ngo // gang 'gog pa mngon du byed do// 6
449a2(dkon brtsegs): lam sgom mo zhes bya ba gang yang mi dmigs te/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'di thos nas skrag pa de lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge/
449a3(dkon brtsegs): slong de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dge slong 'di dag gis ji skad bstan pa de de bzhin no// rab 'byor dge slong 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'od/
449a4(dkon brtsegs): srungs kyi gsung rab la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid las zab mo'i chos bstan pa 'odi lta bu thos te/ chos zab mo mnyan pa de nyid kyi rgyus 'di ltar mngon par shes pa myur bar gyur to// zab mo'i chos
449a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di la'ang rjes su mthun par gyur te/ mi mthun pa yin no// rab 'byor rnam grangs de na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams ma gtogs par/ gang dag nga'i gsung rab 'di la chos zab mo bstan
449a6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang lhan par mos pa de dag thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la 'dus pa gsum gyi grangs su gtogs par rig par bya'o// gang yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
449a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dad na na bzod pa gang yang drung brjo par 'gyu de nas lha'i bu dpal babalas gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di gad ces smras so// 'jas dpas byang chum du la sa bu tha
449b1(dkon brtsegs): chos ston tam/ 'jam dpal dga' ldan gyi gnas su bzhud de/ der dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams la chos bstan du gsol/ de na lnga'i bu sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
449b2(dkon brtsegs): pab dag yod de/ de dag yul phun sum tshogs pas bag med dbang gis/ bcom ldan 'das dang khyod la chos nyan du mi 'ong bas na/ de dag chos mi nyan pas yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/ de dag khyod
449b3(dkon brtsegs): las chos thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe/ gang gis lha'i bu dpal bzangs dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i ma
449b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa dang / nyams dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang / nyams dga' ba'i tshal dang / nyams dga' ba'i rdzing dang / nyams dga' ba'i skyed mos tshal dang
449b5(dkon brtsegs): rim pa bdun dang / brgyad dang / bcu dang / nyi shu pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa bsil khang dang / ba gam dang / stegs bu dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang ldan pa de dag kyang snang ba dang / lha'i bu mo rkang lag 'jam
449b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing mnyen pa gser gyi dra ba ltar 'od rnam par dag pa/ smin ma legs pa/ dpral ba legs pa/ bzhin legs pa/ mig pad+mo 'dab ma brgya pa sngon po lta bur mdzes shing / dri ma med pa shin tu yangs pa/
449b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i sems bskyed pa/ zla ba tshes pa ltar mngon par dka' ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang bcas pa de dag rgyud gcig pa dang / pi wang dang / sgra snyan dang / 'khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg rdob pa dang /
450a1(dkon brtsegs): du zlas dang / nga dzu dang / rdzuldan pa dang / rdzing du dang / b+hU dbyangs dang / ram ma dbyangs sgyu dang / gar dang / b+hA Sh+kad klung dang / 'dzab da / pad+ma/ rtsa@#
450a2(dkon brtsegs): shing dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod pa dag kyang snang ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas so// de 'dra ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so//
450a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis/ rang gi gnas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'ang mthong / rang gi g.yog 'khor rnams kyang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon
450a4(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal bdag cag 'di ltar myur du dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin te/ nyams dka' ba'i kun dga' ra ba 'di dag dang zhes bya ba nas/ dka' ba dang / rtse ba dang /
450a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' dgur spyod pa dang / bdag gi rang gi gnas 'di dang / rang gi g.yog ces bya ba'i bar du sbyar te/ de dag snang ba ngo mtshar to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i bu dpal
450a6(dkon brtsegs): bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ / lha'i bu khyod ni 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di nas gang du'ang ma g.yos la/ dga' ldan gyi gnas su'ang ma phyin te/ lha'i bu 'on kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i
450a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di dag dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa dang / lha'i bu kho bo cag kyang dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa de ni/ 'jam dpal gzhon
