456b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis nges par sems pa yongs su dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad kyis yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang nye bar zhi bas yongs su dag pa dang / phyi rol tu mi rgyu bas yongs su dag pa dang / khams gsum
456b2(dkon brtsegs): la mi gnas pas yongs su dag pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'thun pas yongs su dag pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pas yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med
456b3(dkon brtsegs): par so sor rtog pas yongs su dag pa dang / chos thams cad la bdag med par so sor rtogs pas yongs su dag pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis shin tu mi 'khrugs pas yongs su dag
456b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ grogs po dag 'di ni rnam pa brgyad kyi nges par sems pa yongs su dag pa'o// grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis bag yod pa yongs su dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/
456b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa med pas yongs su dag pa dang / thos pa yongs su byang bas yongs su dag pa dang / bsam gtan de la chags pa med pas yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab dang
456b6(dkon brtsegs): gsung rab kyis yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa las ma nyams pas yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes kyi rlom sems med pas yongs su dag pa dang / nges par sems pas rtsod pa med
456b7(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs su dag pa dang / dge ba'i chos chud mi za bas yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis bag yod pa yongs su dag / grogs po dag de lta bas na
457a1(dkon brtsegs): khyed bag yod par gyis shig/ bag yod pa la rton pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bde ba gsum las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
457a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bde ba dang / bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba'o// ngan song gsum las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / du
457a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten te/ gsum po de dag go/ sdug bsngal gsum gyis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang / rga ba'i sdug bsngal dang
457a4(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal te/ gsum po de dag go/ 'jigs pa gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa med pa'i 'jigs pa
457a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'khor la bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa ste/ gsum po de dag go/ srid pa gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i srid pa dang / gzugs kyi srid pa dang / gzugs med pa'i srid pa'o//
457a6(dkon brtsegs): dri ma gsum sbyong te/ 'dod chags kyi dri ma dang / zhe sdang gi dri ma dang / gti mug gi dri ma'o// bslab pa gsum yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag
457a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes rab bo/ / yongs su dag pa gsum thob par 'gyur te/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa'o// bsod nams bya ba las byung ba'i dngos po gsum yongs
457b1(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par byed de/ sbyin pa las byung ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / sgom pa las byung ba'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom par byed de/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
457b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'o/ / rigs gsum rgyun mi gcod de/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / chos kyi rigs dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs so// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs gsum rab tu spong ste/ ser sna'i
457b3(dkon brtsegs): dri ma dang / ser sna'i kun tu sbyor ba dang / gtong ba dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims las zlog pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la
457b4(dkon brtsegs): sdang ba dang / gnod sems dang / bzod pa las zlog pa dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / le lo dang / brtson 'grus las zlog pa dang / brtson 'grus dang
457b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / bsam gtan las zlog pa dang / bsam gtan dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab dang /
457b6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab las zlog pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba'o// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis rton pa gsum gsum gyis nye bar rton te/ gsum gsum gang zhe na
457b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / rnam par smin pa la mi ri ba dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / tshul khrims yang dag par len pa dang / tshul khrim
458a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / bzod cing nges pa dang / bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung ba dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang
458a2(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus gces pa mi 'dor ba dang / blang ba med cing dor ba med pa dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / bsam gtan nye bar len pa dang / mi gnas par bsam gtan byed pa dang / byang chub tu
458a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngo ba dang / shes rab kyi snang ba dang / spros pa med pa dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ste/ grogs po dag bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis rton pa
458a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di gsum gsum gyis nye ba ston to/ / grogs po dag de lta bas na/ khyed cag bag yod par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub dang / de las gzhan pa'i dge ba byang chub kyi phyog
458a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos gang yin pa dag kyang bag yod pas thob bo/ / grogs po dag bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshegs chung ngus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs
458a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang la lus kyi gnas med pa dang / tshor ba'i gnas med pa dang / sems kyi gnas med pa dang / chos kyi gnas med pa ste/
458a7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi gnas med cing rten med pa 'di ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa zhes bya'o// tshogs chung ngus yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ yang
458b1(dkon brtsegs): dag pa spong ba bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / gzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma mthong ba dang / mngon par ma grub par yang so sor
458b2(dkon brtsegs): rtog cing / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la/ brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / chos
458b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la las kyi rnam par smin pa med par yang so sor rtog cing / sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyis mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing
458b4(dkon brtsegs): 'bad la/ brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la/ brtson 'grus
458b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / chos thams cad la stong pa nyid du'ang mos la/ dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir/ 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la/
458b6(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par grol bar yang yid ches la/ dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas par bya ba dang / nyams
458b7(dkon brtsegs): pabar mi 'gyur bar bya ba dang / phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la/ brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog la/ chos thams cad la rtsom pa
459a1(dkon brtsegs): med cing brtul ba med par yang mthong ba ste/ yang mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de la chos gang gi skye ba'ang med/ 'gog pa'ang med pa 'di ni/ yang dag pa'i spong ba sgom pa'o// rdzu 'phrul
459a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkyang pa bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang lus dang sems las su rung ba ste/ de sems las su rung bas dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'ang mi 'dor/
459a3(dkon brtsegs): la/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir yang mngon par brtson pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la/ brtags nas kyang chos thams cad mi migs
459a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi sems kyang mi 'dor la/ sems sgyu ma lta bur yang rab tu shes pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul
459a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du'ang spyod la/ chos rnams la gnas par yang mi byed cing / mngon par zhen pa'ang med pa'o// de dbang po lnga bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dbang po drug la rten par mi byed
459a6(dkon brtsegs): cing / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir shes pa'ang gtong la/ gcig tu gnas pa'ang thob par 'gyur zhing / gzhan gyi dad pas kyang mi 'gro ba dang / thams cad
459a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang yongs su thob la/ blang ba'ang med cing dor ba'ang med pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam la'ang rmongs pa med la/ dran pa'ang med cing yid la byed pa'ang med pa dang / thams cad kyi rjes su'ang song
459b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rtag tu mnyam par yang bzhag par gyur cing / chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / rab rib med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba'ang thob par gyur la/ spros pa dang lta ba'ang yang dag
459b2(dkon brtsegs): par chad pa 'di ni/ de'i dbang po bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de stobs lnga bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dad pa'i stobs dang ldan pas/ phas kyis rgol ba thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang /
459b3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis bdud thams cad kyis thub par dka' ba dang / dran pa'i stobs kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad du mi 'phrogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis sgrib
459b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis zil gyis mi non pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pas lta bar gyur pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen pa med pa ste/ de ltar stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de byang chub kyi yan lag
459b5(dkon brtsegs): bdun bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad mi brjed par bya ba'i phyir/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang /
459b6(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / byang chub kyi lam las mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi
459b7(dkon brtsegs): yan lag bsgom pa dang / zang zing med pa'i chos la dga' ba rab tu myong bar bya ba'i phyir/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / lus dang sems kyi g.yo ba dang bral ba'i phyir/ shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag
460a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / mthon dman med
460a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa zhes bya'o// grogs po dag bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshegs chung ngus 'phags pa'i lam
460a3(dkon brtsegs): yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ lam bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang 'di rtag pa dang / chad pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i lta ba bsgom pa dang / 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang /
460a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa bsgom pa dang / bdag dang gzhan la gdung ba med pa'i yang dag pa'i ngag bsgom pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / gzhog
460a5(dkon brtsegs): slongs dang / thob kyis 'jal ba dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba bsgom pa dang / lus dang sems nyam chung ba dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' bsgom pa dang / bdag la bstod pa dang gzhan la
460a6(dkon brtsegs): smod pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i rtsol ba bsgom pa dang / gti mug dang rmongs pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i dran pa bsgom pa dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i ting nge
460a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin bsgom pa ste/ 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa zhes bya'o// des na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub dang / de las gzhan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang
460b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dag kyang bag yod pas thob ces bya'o/ / grogs po dag de ltar na bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag la 'jug go/ zhugs nas 'du byed thams
460b2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi 'dam las rgal lo/ / brgal nas kyang rnam par lta ste/ rnam par bltas na mi mthong ngo // mi 'bar ro// shin tu nye bar zhi ba ste/ rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do// shin tu nye bar
460b3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba gang zhe na/ gang nye bar ma bsgrubs pa de ma byas pa'o// gang ma byas pa de myong ba med pa'o// gang myong ba med pa de la gdags pa med do// gang gdags pa med pa de ni shin tu nye
460b4(dkon brtsegs): bar zhi ba'o/ / bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis//
460b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' lam ji ltar sgom/ smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor ba'ang mi
460b6(dkon brtsegs): spong la/ 'khor ba'i nyes pa rnams kyis kyang mi gos so// 'dus ma byas su'ang mi ltung la/ 'dus ma byas kyi yon tan rnams kyang myong ngo // pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam yang sgom
460b7(dkon brtsegs): la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul la'ang snang ngo // lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam par dag pa'ang yin la/ lta bar gyur pa la'ang mkhas
461a1(dkon brtsegs): shing / lta bar gyur pa la mngon par zhen pa'ang med do// mtshan ma med pas rnam par dag pa'ang yin la/ mtshan mala'ang mkhas shing / mtshan ma la mngon par
461a2(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa'ang med do/ / smon pa med pas rnam par dag pa'ang yin la/ khams gsum pa la'ang mkhas shing / khams gsum pa la mngon par zhen pa'ang med do// skye ba med pa dang 'byung ba med pas rnam
461a3(dkon brtsegs): par dag pa'ang yin la/ skye ba dang 'jig pa la'ang mkhas shing / skye ba dang 'jig pa la mngon par zhen pa'ang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems nges par sems pa rnams ni sems
461a4(dkon brtsegs): can chos thams cad stong pa'o snyam pa'i lta bar gyur par zhugs pa/ lta bar gyur pa bag la nyal bar byas pa rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa spang ba'i phyir chos kyang ston la/ lta bar gyur pa de dag kyang stong pa nyid
461a5(dkon brtsegs): du mthong ngo / / de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems nges par sems pa ni mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa'i
461a6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i rjes su 'thun pa/ 'byung ba dang 'jig pa bag la nyal bar byas pa rnams kyi 'byung ba dang 'jig par lta ba spang ba'i phyir chos kyang ston la/ 'byung ba dang 'jig pa de'ang
461a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dang 'jig pa med pa nyid du mthong ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bsgom pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba
461b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni sems can gyi bsam pa rnams la'o// 'ong ba ni so so ci rigs par chos ston pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro//
461b2(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can gyi nang du skye ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni 'phags pa'i lam du'o// 'ong ba ni 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'gro ba ni mi
461b3(dkon brtsegs): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/ / 'ong ba ni bzod pa de sems can gyis khong du chud par byed pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni 'byung ba la mkhas pa la'o// 'ong ba ni 'byung ba ma yin par
461b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ / byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i phyir ro// 'ong ba ni 'khor ba na sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'gro ba ni gang du'ang 'gro ba dang
461b5(dkon brtsegs): 'o ba med par so sor rtog pa'i phyir ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ong ba ni chos khong du chud par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'gro ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
461b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa bsgom pa'i phyir ro/ / 'ong ba ni rnam par rtog pa gsum spang bar chos ston pa'i phyir ro// 'gro ba ni dam bcas pa brtan par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'ong ba ni dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par
461b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i phyir ro/ / byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'ong ba ni byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i phyir te/ lha'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
462a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi lam 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bya ba'o/ / bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so// de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs
462a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od ces bgyi ba zhig thos na/ 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams
462a3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi 'od de phyogs gang na mchis/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ji skad ces bgyi ba zhig chos ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu steng gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/
462a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
462a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba chos ston to/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs sangs
462a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kun tu bzang po de blta bar bgyi'o/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ de'i tshe dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur
462a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu lus las de dang 'thun pa'i 'od byung ste/ / 'od des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed po de dag snang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'ong de'ang spang ba
462b1(dkon brtsegs): chen pos khyab par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes pa de dag gis 'od de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom
462b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od 'di ltar yongs su dag pa 'di gang nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed
462b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// 'tsho'o// gzhes so// chos kyang ston to// ngan
462b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de'i lus kyi 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs
462b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag snang ba chen pos khyab bo/ / des 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang snang ba chen pos khyab bo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de dang / bcom ldan 'das
462b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa blta bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang pos zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gyi
462b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa las 'od zer stong phyung ste/ / 'od zer de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//
463a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong zhing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas #
463a2(dkon brtsegs): thub pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de mthong zhig/
463a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
463a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa kun tu bzang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rig kyi bu dag der chos kyi gtam chen po 'byung bar 'gyur na/ khyed kyi nang nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'gro bar spo ba
463a5(dkon brtsegs): su yod/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin ces bya ba der 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das de la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi bar spro
463a6(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu da de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes sgron ma 'dzin// byang chub sems dpa'
463a7(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas
463b1(dkon brtsegs): lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'jam
463b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mdun gyi steng gi bar snang la gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs par phyin to/ / de'i g.yog 'khor de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa legs par gnas pa rnams su phyin to// de dag rang rang gi stan las langs nas
463b3(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras so// 'jam dpal bdag cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
463b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kun tu bzang po des khyod la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dir btang ngo // khyod kyis 'od bkye ba de'ang 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to// de nas 'dod pa na
463b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ kye ma ji tsam du 'di ltar myur bar 'od zer 'di 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin pa dang / 'di ltar myur bar byang chub
463b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin pa 'di ni skyes bu dam pa de dag gis mngon par shes pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes ched du brjod
463b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ched du brjod do/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lha'i 'khor chen po de ltar 'dus pa de la ci nas kyang lha khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bsam pa thag pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
464a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems skyes pa de lta de ltar chos bstan to/ / de nas 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa ji srid du dga' ldan gyi gnas su lha rnams kyi don bya ba de srid du byas nas/ byang chub
464a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag dang lhan cig/ rang gi 'khor dang lhan cig/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang lhan cig tu dga' ldan gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/
464a3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis 'gyur ba tsam gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan
464a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis gnang ste/ phyogs gcig tu rang rang gi bstan la 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin dang lhan cig lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag gis/
464a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la/ bcom
464a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ spyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das
464a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
464b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do/ / mang dag par dga' bar mdzad cing / yang dag par 'dzin du bcug la/ yang dag par gzengs bstod de/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas kyang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po
464b2(dkon brtsegs): dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang / sems can sdud pa dang / yongs su
464b3(dkon brtsegs): smin par byed pa dang / thabs dang / rigs pa dang / ye shes dang / shes rab kyis rab tu dbye ba dang / spobs pa la ltos// grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bskal pa grangs med pa nas bzung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
464b4(dkon brtsegs): pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa dag go/ / sems can gang dag gi dbang po drug po dag la skyes bu dam pa 'di dag mngon par 'gyur ba de dag ni phyis bdud kyi yul la gnas par mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya'o//
464b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa las chos thos nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
464b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin dang lhan cig lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo 'os phyag 'tshal te/
464b7(dkon brtsegs): lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams der
465a1(dkon brtsegs): byin to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zu ba zhig/ chos
465a2(dkon brtsegs): shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na/ 'di'i ming ji skad brgya
465a3(dkon brtsegs): bar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de bas na khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam dpal gyi le'u dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa zhes bya
465a4(dkon brtsegs): bar zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i bu dpal bzangs dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma
465a5(dkon brtsegs): yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ sangs rgyas
465a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / mu ne bar ma
